sentences.chinese: 爆炸引起的剧烈震动在方圆40英里内都能感觉得到。

sentences.chinese: 那个邮包上周送到了。

sentences.chinese: 一串葡萄

sentences.english: They had no previous convictions.
sentences.chinese: 他们没有前科。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being sure about something and having no doubts

sentences.english: She sipped her lemonade through a straw.
sentences.chinese: 她用吸管吸着柠檬水。

detailed_translations.chinese: 稻草；吸管；一文不值的东西
detailed_translations.english: a thin tube of paper or plastic for sucking up liquid from a bottle or a cup
having little value or substance

sentences.english: Martin showed me a graph of their recent sales.
sentences.chinese: 马丁给我看了他们最近销售情况的图表。

detailed_translations.english: a drawing that uses a line or lines to show how two or more sets of measurements are related to each other

sentences.english: Regarding your recent inquiry, I have enclosed a copy of our new brochure.
sentences.chinese: 关于你最近的咨询，我随信附上一本我们最新的手册。

detailed_translations.english: a word used especially in letters or speeches to introduce the subject you are writing or talking about

sentences.english: They feasted well into the afternoon on mutton and corn stew.
sentences.chinese: 他们尽情享用玉米炖羊肉，一直吃到下午。

detailed_translations.chinese: 尽情地吃， 宴饮； 参加宴会
detailed_translations.english: If you feast on a particular food, you eat a large amount of it with great enjoyment
a large meal where a lot of people celebrate a special occasion

name: acceptance
trans: 接受； 验收；承认， 认可

sentences.english: He wrote a letter of acceptance (=  a letter in which you agree to accept a job, university place etc  ) to the university.
sentences.chinese: 他给那所大学写了一封接受函。

detailed_translations.chinese: 接受， 承认； 容忍
detailed_translations.english: when you officially agree to take something that you have been offered

sentences.english: unleaded petrol
sentences.chinese: 无铅汽油

sentences.english: petrol prices
sentences.chinese: 汽油价格

sentences.english: The petrol tank is leaking.
sentences.chinese: 油箱漏了。

detailed_translations.english: a liquid obtained from  petroleum that is used to supply power to the engine of cars and other vehicles

sentences.english: They teach the relativity of all ethical ideas.
sentences.chinese: 他们宣扬一切道德观念的相对性。

sentences.english: Einstein put forward his new theory of relativity.
sentences.chinese: 爱因斯坦提出了相对论的新学说。

sentences.english: Everyone was talking about relativity, not only the scientists, but the philosophers and the writers of columns in the newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都在谈论相对论，不仅仅是科学家，甚至哲学家和报纸的专栏作者也是如此。

detailed_translations.english: the relationship in  physics  between time, space, and movement according to Einstein’s  theory

sentences.english: The Koran describes paradise as a place containing a garden of delight.
sentences.chinese: 《古兰经》把天堂描绘成一个拥有快乐花园的地方。

detailed_translations.english: in some religions, a perfect place where people are believed to go after they die, if they have led good lives

name: tackle
trans: 用具， 器械； 滑车
处理， 解决， 对付 <

sentences.english: There is more than one way to tackle the problem.
sentences.chinese: 解决这个问题不止一个办法。

sentences.english: fishing tackle
sentences.chinese: 渔具

detailed_translations.english: to try to deal with a difficult problem
the equipment used in some sports and activities, especially fishing

name: distract
trans: 分散， 打扰；迷惑， 扰乱

sentences.english: Try not to distract the other students.
sentences.chinese: 尽量不要让其他学生分心。

detailed_translations.english: to take someone’s attention away from something by making them look at or listen to something else

name: occasion
trans: 场合， 时节， 时刻；时机， 机会

sentences.english: I’m saving this bottle of champagne for a special occasion.
sentences.chinese: 我要把这瓶香槟酒留到特别的日子喝。

sentences.english: She had met Zahid on two separate occasions.
sentences.chinese: 她遇到过扎希德两次。

sentences.english: This was the occasion for expressions of friendship by the two presidents.
sentences.chinese: 这是两位总统进行友好交流的时机。

detailed_translations.english: an important social event or ceremony

sentences.english: We obtained a loan from the government.
sentences.chinese: 我们得了一笔政府贷款。

sentences.english: If you ask him for a loan, he'll come through.
sentences.chinese: 如果你向他贷款，他会满足你的要求的。

sentences.english: The company won't keep going unless we can get some loan.
sentences.chinese: 除非我们能搞到贷款，否则公司就维持不下去了。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that you borrow from a bank etc

sentences.english: She smiled as he squeezed her hand.
sentences.chinese: 他捏了捏她的手，她笑了。

sentences.english: He squeezed the trigger, but nothing happened.
sentences.chinese: 他扣动扳机，但没有反应。

detailed_translations.english: to press something firmly together with your fingers or hand

detailed_translations.chinese: 挤； 握手； 拮据， 紧缺
detailed_translations.english: an act of pressing something firmly with your fingers or hand

name: virtual
trans: 实际上的， 事实上的； 虚的

sentences.english: The website allows you to take a virtual tour of the art gallery.
sentences.chinese: 这个网站可让你对美术馆作一番虚拟参观。

sentences.english: constructing virtual worlds
sentences.chinese: 构筑虚拟世界

detailed_translations.english: made, done, seen etc on the Internet or on a computer, rather than in the real world

name: worthy
trans: 值得…的， 配得上…的；可尊敬的； 有价值的

sentences.english: Leeds United were worthy winners of the competition.
sentences.chinese: 利兹联队是比赛当之无愧的获胜者。

sentences.english: a worthy opponent
sentences.chinese: 值得钦佩的对手

sentences.english: A couple of other books are worthy of mention.
sentences.chinese: 还有一些其他的书值得一提

detailed_translations.english: deserving respect from people

name: expectation
trans: 预期， 期望， 指望

sentences.english: Having raised expectations (= made people more hopeful ), he went on to help only a few people.
sentences.chinese: 他唤起了大家的希望，但接着只是帮助了几个人。

sentences.english: The show exceeded all expectations (= was much better than expected ).
sentences.chinese: 这场演出比人们预期的要好得多。

sentences.english: The number of people who attended fell short of expectations (= was lower than expected ).
sentences.chinese: 出席的人数比预期的要少。

detailed_translations.english: what you think or hope will happen

name: title
trans: 书名； 标题；头衔， 称号

sentences.english: "Patience and Sarah" was first published in 1969 under the title "A Place for Us."
sentences.chinese: 《耐心与萨拉》于1969年以《我们的地方》为书名首次出版。

sentences.english: Pirandello titled his play "Six Characters in Search of an Author."
sentences.chinese: 皮兰德娄将其戏剧命名为《六个寻找作者的剧中人》。

sentences.english: The single is titled "White Love."
sentences.chinese: 这支单曲名为《白色之恋》。

detailed_translations.chinese: 冠军；标题；头衔；权利；字幕
detailed_translations.english: the name given to a particular book, painting, play etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 加标题于；赋予头衔；把…称为
detailed_translations.english: When a writer, composer, or artist titles a work, they give it a name

sentences.english: We could just see the outline of the house through the mist.
sentences.chinese: 薄雾中我们只能看到房子的轮廓。

sentences.english: He vanished into the mist.
sentences.chinese: 他消失在雾中。

sentences.english: The hills were shrouded in mist (= covered in mist, so that you could not see them ) .
sentences.chinese: 山峦笼罩在雾霭之中。

sentences.english: The mist came down off the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 雾从山上飘下来。

sentences.english: The mists rolled in off the sea (= came on to the land from the sea ) .
sentences.chinese: 雾气从海上涌来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 薄雾；视线模糊不清；模糊不清之物
detailed_translations.english: a light cloud low over the ground that makes it difficult for you to see very far

name: duration
trans: 期间；持久， 持续时间

sentences.english: The course is of three years’ duration.
sentences.chinese: 该课程为期三年。

detailed_translations.english: the length of time that something continues

sentences.english: a rubber plantation
sentences.chinese: 橡胶园

detailed_translations.chinese: 适用于种植园或热带、亚热带国家的

sentences.english: They had recrossed the River Gambia by ferry.
sentences.chinese: 他们乘船又一次渡过了冈比亚河。

sentences.english: The ship was used to ferry supplies to Russia during the war.
sentences.chinese: 这艘船在战时被用来往俄罗斯 运送补给。

detailed_translations.english: a boat that carries people or goods across a river or a narrow area of water
to carry people or things a short distance from one place to another in a boat or other vehicle

sentences.english: Grandad was dozing in his chair.
sentences.chinese: 爷爷在椅子上打瞌睡。

detailed_translations.english: to sleep lightly for a short time

sentences.english: the Northern hemisphere
sentences.chinese: 北半球

detailed_translations.english: a half of the Earth, especially one of the halves above and below the equator

sentences.english: a loaf of bread
sentences.chinese: 一条面包

detailed_translations.english: bread that is shaped and baked in one piece and can be cut into slices

detailed_translations.chinese: 游荡；游手好闲；虚度光阴
detailed_translations.english: to spend time somewhere and not do very much

name: nuclear
trans: 核心的， 中心的；原子核的， 核能的 <

sentences.english: France’s reliance on nuclear energy
sentences.chinese: 法国对核能的依赖

sentences.english: a nuclear power station
sentences.chinese: 核电站

sentences.english: a nuclear-powered submarine
sentences.chinese: 核动力潜艇

detailed_translations.english: relating to or involving the nucleus of an atom, or the energy produced when the nucleus of an atom is either split or joined with the nucleus of another atom

name: applaud
trans: 喝彩， 欢呼， 鼓掌 A

sentences.english: The audience applauded loudly.
sentences.chinese: 观众掌声雷动。

sentences.english: A crowd of 300 supporters warmly applauded her speech.
sentences.chinese: 300名支持者为她的演讲热烈鼓掌。

detailed_translations.english: to hit your open hands together, to show that you have enjoyed a play, concert, speaker etc
to express strong approval of an idea, plan etc

sentences.english: studies of the lunar surface
sentences.chinese: 对月球表面的研究

sentences.english: a lunar eclipse
sentences.chinese: 月食

detailed_translations.english: relating to the Moon or to travel to the Moon

sentences.english: He reads a lot of poetry.
sentences.chinese: 他大量阅读诗歌。

sentences.english: a poetry magazine
sentences.chinese: 诗歌杂志

detailed_translations.english: poems in general, or the art of writing them

sentences.english: Prince William
sentences.chinese: 威廉王子

sentences.english: Prince Rainier of Monaco
sentences.chinese: 摩纳哥的兰尼埃亲王

detailed_translations.english: the son of a king, queen, or prince

sentences.english: He was unbearably arrogant.
sentences.chinese: 他的傲慢让人无法忍受。

sentences.english: an arrogant attitude
sentences.chinese: 傲慢的态度

detailed_translations.english: behaving in an unpleasant or rude way because you think you are more important than other people

name: relax
trans: 松弛， 放松； 休息

sentences.english: Gentle exercise can relax stiff shoulder muscles.
sentences.chinese: 和缓的运动可以使僵硬的肩部肌肉放松。

detailed_translations.english: if you relax a part of your body or it relaxes, it becomes less stiff or less tight
to rest or do something that is enjoyable, especially after you have been working

name: relay
trans: 中继， 转播；接力传递

sentences.english: He quickly relayed this news to the other members of staff.
sentences.chinese: 他马上就把这个消息转告给了其他员工。

sentences.english: The game was relayed by satellite to audiences all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 这场比赛通过卫星向全世界的观众进行了转播。

detailed_translations.english: to pass a message from one person or place to another

sentences.english: He had trained to be a Catholic priest.
sentences.chinese: 他接受培训成了一名天主教神父。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is specially trained to perform religious duties and ceremonies in the Christian church

detailed_translations.chinese: 使成为神职人员；任命…为祭司

sentences.english: He asked permission to leave the room.
sentences.chinese: 他请求离开房间的许可。

sentences.english: They cannot leave the country without permission.
sentences.chinese: 没有许可他们不得离开这个国家。

detailed_translations.english: the act of allowing sb to do sth, especially when this is done by sb in a position of authority

name: grand
trans: 盛大的， 豪华的；重大的， 主要的

sentences.english: a grand country house
sentences.chinese: 豪华的乡间大宅

sentences.english: The party was a grand affair.
sentences.chinese: 这个聚会场面隆重。

sentences.english: New Yorkers build on a grand scale.
sentences.chinese: 纽约人喜欢建高楼大厦。

detailed_translations.english: big and very impressive

name: permeate
trans: 扩散， 弥漫；渗透， 渗入

sentences.chinese: 空气里充斥着柴油的气味。

detailed_translations.english: if liquid, gas etc permeates something, it enters it and spreads through every part of it

sentences.english: How can he fit everything into his busy schedule ?
sentences.chinese: 他是怎么把所有的事情都排进自己忙碌的时间表的？

sentences.english: I’m going to be working to a very tight schedule (= including a lot of things that must be done in a short time ) .
sentences.chinese: 我的工作安排将会非常紧。

detailed_translations.english: a plan of what someone is going to do and when they are going to do it

name: interpret
trans: 解释， 说明；了解， 认为；口译

sentences.english: They spoke good Spanish, and promised to interpret for me.
sentences.chinese: 他们西班牙语说得很好，答应替我翻译。

sentences.english: Freud’s attempts to interpret the meaning of dreams
sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德对梦的含义的解析

detailed_translations.english: to translate spoken words from one language into another

sentences.english: Einstein's equations showed the universe to be expanding.
sentences.chinese: 爱因斯坦的方程式表明宇宙正在扩大。

detailed_translations.english: all space, including all the stars and planets

sentences.english: inherited wealth
sentences.chinese: 继承的财富

detailed_translations.english: to receive money, property etc from someone after they have died
to receive money, property etc from someone after they have died

sentences.english: She huddled herself in the blanket.
sentences.chinese: 她用毯子紧紧裹住自己。

sentences.english: They muffled up her head with a blanket.
sentences.chinese: 他们用毯子蒙住了她的头。

sentences.english: He lapped his daughter in a warm blanket.
sentences.chinese: 他把女儿裹在一个暖和的毯子里。

detailed_translations.english: a cover for a bed, usually made of wool

name: grant
trans: 同意， 准予 <；给予， 授予 A

sentences.english: Britain could grant Spain’s request .
sentences.chinese: 英国可能会同意西班牙的请求。

sentences.english: I would love to be able to grant her wish.
sentences.chinese: 我很希望能够满足她的愿望。

detailed_translations.english: to give someone something or allow them to have something that they have asked for

sentences.english: They are often available at a discount.
sentences.chinese: 它们经常可以以折扣价买到。

sentences.english: This has forced airlines to discount fares heavily in order to spur demand.
sentences.chinese: 这已经迫使多家航空公司对机票大幅打折以刺激需求。

detailed_translations.english: a reduction in the usual price of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 将…打折扣； 不信； 漠视， 低估
detailed_translations.english: If a shop or company discounts an amount or percentage from something that they are selling, they take the amount or percentage off the usual price

sentences.english: I was fascinated by her voice.
sentences.chinese: 我被她的嗓音迷住了。

detailed_translations.english: extremely interested by something or someone

sentences.english: a 19th-century converted barn
sentences.chinese: 由19世纪谷仓改建的房子

detailed_translations.english: to change something into a different form, or to change something so that it can be used for a different purpose or in a different way

name: construct
trans: 建造， 构造 <；创立 <；解释， 说明

sentences.english: There are plans to construct a new road bridge across the river.
sentences.chinese: 有计划要建造一条新的跨河公路桥。

detailed_translations.english: to build something such as a house, bridge, road etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 建筑物； 构想； 观念
detailed_translations.english: an idea formed by combining several pieces of information or knowledge

sentences.english: Weather conditions prevented them from attempting the jump.
sentences.chinese: 天气状况使他们无法尝试跳伞。

detailed_translations.chinese: 尝试， 试图， 努力
detailed_translations.english: to try to do something, especially something difficult

name: relish
trans: 〈喻〉滋味； 兴趣； 兴味， 爱好；调味品； 好味道， 美味

sentences.english: I relish the challenge of doing jobs that others turn down.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢接受挑战做别人拒绝做的工作。

sentences.english: The three men ate with relish.
sentences.chinese: 那3个人吃得津津有味。

detailed_translations.english: to enjoy an experience or the thought of something that is going to happen
Relish is also a noun

name: division
trans: 分， 分割；部门， 科， 处；除法

sentences.english: the division sign (÷)
sentences.chinese: 除号

sentences.english: the Computer Services Division
sentences.chinese: 电脑维修部

detailed_translations.english: the process of finding out how many times one number is contained in another

name: navigation
trans: 航海， 航空；导航， 领航

sentences.english: compasses and other instruments of navigation
sentences.chinese: 罗盘及其他导航仪器

detailed_translations.chinese: 航行， 航海， 航空； 导航， 领航
detailed_translations.english: the science or job of planning which way you need to go when you are travelling from one place to another

name: stale
trans: 变质的， 不新鲜的；陈旧的， 陈腐的

sentences.english: stale jokes
sentences.chinese: 老掉牙的笑话

detailed_translations.english: not interesting or exciting any more

name: balance
trans: 天平， 秤；平衡， 均衡 A <；差额， 结余， 余款

sentences.english: She balanced the cup on her knee.
sentences.chinese: 她把杯子在膝盖上放稳。

detailed_translations.english: to put your body or sth else into a position where it is steady and does not fall
an instrument for weighing things, with two dishes that hang from a bar

name: stalk
trans: 悄悄地跟踪；高视阔步地走 A

sentences.english: celery stalks
sentences.chinese: 芹菜茎

detailed_translations.english: to walk in a proud or angry way, with long steps
a long narrow part of a plant that supports leaves, fruits, or flowers
to follow a person or animal quietly in order to catch and attack or kill them

sentences.english: He was smoking a big cigar.
sentences.chinese: 他在抽一只大雪茄。

detailed_translations.english: a thick tube-shaped thing that people smoke, and which is made from tobacco leaves that have been rolled up

name: pitch
trans: 用沥青覆盖；投掷， 扔 <

sentences.english: She crumpled up the page and pitched it into the fire.
sentences.chinese: 她把那页纸揉成团，扔进了火里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 投掷， 扔； 猛然倒下； (船、 飞机)颠簸
detailed_translations.english: to fall or be moved suddenly in a particular direction, or to make someone or something do this

detailed_translations.chinese: 球场；程度，强度；高度，高音；沥青；顶点
detailed_translations.english: a marked out area of ground on which a sport is played

detailed_translations.chinese: 销售；投掷，扔；使猛然倒下；表达；把…定于特定程度；定调；架设，搭，营
detailed_translations.english: to fall or be moved suddenly in a particular direction, or to make someone or something do this

sentences.english: The old system was fairly complicated whereas the new system is really very simple.
sentences.chinese: 旧系统相当复杂，而新系统却很简单。

sentences.english: Whereas the city spent over $1 billion on its museums and stadium, it failed to look after its schools.
sentences.chinese: 这个城市花了十亿美元建造博物馆和体育馆，但是却忽略了对学校的建设。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that although something is true of one thing, it is not true of another

sentences.english: A racing car is an extraordinary feat of engineering.
sentences.chinese: 赛车是工程学的一项非凡业绩。

detailed_translations.english: something that is an impressive achievement, because it needs a lot of skill, strength etc to do

sentences.english: a beautiful oriental rug
sentences.chinese: 漂亮的东方地毯

sentences.english: oriental art
sentences.chinese: 东方艺术

detailed_translations.english: relating to or from the eastern part of the world, especially China and Japan
a word for someone from the eastern part of the world, especially China or Japan, now considered offensive

sentences.english: After five days of heavy rain the Telle river was a raging torrent (= a very violent torrent ) .
sentences.chinese: 下了五天的大雨之后，泰勒河急流汹涌。

detailed_translations.english: a large amount of water moving very quickly and strongly in a particular direction

sentences.english: Churchill’s statue stands outside the parliament building.
sentences.chinese: 丘吉尔的塑像矗立在议会大厦外。

sentences.english: A bronze statue was erected in his honour.
sentences.chinese: 人们立了一座铜像纪念他。

detailed_translations.english: an image of a person or animal that is made in solid material such as stone or metal and is usually large

sentences.english: The fire was caused by an electrical fault.
sentences.chinese: 大火是电力故障引起的。

sentences.english: an electrical engineer
sentences.chinese: 电力[电气]工程师

detailed_translations.english: relating to electricity

sentences.english: Quit stalling and answer my question!
sentences.chinese: 别拖延时间，快回答我的问题！

sentences.english: He was just stalling for time .
sentences.chinese: 他只是在拖延时间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 熄火； 拖延， 推迟

sentences.english: a law that first came into being in 1912
sentences.chinese: 于1912年制定的一条法律

sentences.english: human beings
sentences.chinese: 人

detailed_translations.english: existence

sentences.english: the classification of wines according to quality
sentences.chinese: 葡萄酒按品质的分类

sentences.english: There are five job classifications.
sentences.chinese: 有五种工作类别。

detailed_translations.english: a process in which you put something into the group or class it belongs to

sentences.english: a nuclear physicist
sentences.chinese: 一位核物理学家

detailed_translations.english: a scientist who has special knowledge and training in physics

sentences.english: The elephants are still menaced by poachers.
sentences.chinese: 大象仍然面临非法捕猎者的威胁。

sentences.english: There was menace in his voice.
sentences.chinese: 他的语气里带着威胁。

sentences.english: The elephants are still menaced by poachers.
sentences.chinese: 大象仍然面临非法捕猎者的威胁。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有危险性的人(或物)；威胁，威吓
detailed_translations.english: something or someone that is dangerous
to threaten

name: curse
trans: 诅咒； 咒； 咒语； 祸根； 祸端； 祸水

sentences.english: He believed that someone had put a curse on the house.
sentences.chinese: 他相信有人对这房子下了诅咒。

detailed_translations.english: a word or sentence used to ask God or a magical power to do something bad to someone or something

name: invalid
trans: 有病的； 伤残的；供病人用的 A；无效的； 作废的；无根据的， 站不住脚的
病人， 病弱者； 伤残人 A

sentences.english: Without the right date stamped on it, your ticket will be invalid.
sentences.chinese: 票上若没有加盖正确日期就是废票。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无效的，作废的；无可靠根据的，站不住脚的
detailed_translations.english: a contract, ticket, claim etc that is invalid is not legally or officially acceptable
someone who cannot look after themselves because of illness, old age, or injury

sentences.english: He left the room, returning after a short interval with a message.
sentences.chinese: 他离开房间，过了一会儿就带回来一条消息。

sentences.english: We can get some drinks in the interval.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以在幕间休息时喝点什么。

sentences.english: Trees had been planted at regular intervals.
sentences.chinese: 树已按均距栽种。

detailed_translations.english: the period of time between two events, activities etc

name: legitimate
trans: 合法的；正当的， 合理的

sentences.english: So all of this is a legitimate source of concern.
sentences.chinese: 因此，这些情况都是引发忧虑的合理根源。

sentences.english: Even though I had legitimate reasons ( bullshit ). You know I have to make them dividends ( bullshit ).
sentences.chinese: 即使我有合法的理由（胡说）。你知道我必须支付利息（胡说）。

sentences.english: Often, as in this case, there is no intentional hoaxing: It is a legitimate, straightforward photograph of something curious.
sentences.chinese: 就像此事一样，它们通常都是无意的闹剧：这是某些稀奇的东西合法的、易懂的照片。

detailed_translations.chinese: 正当的， 合理的； 合法的
detailed_translations.english: fair or reasonable

sentences.english: Yes, I like basketball and baseball.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我喜欢篮球和棒球。

sentences.english: Do you like baseball?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢打棒球吗?。

sentences.english: That man over there used to be one of the best players in baseball .
sentences.chinese: 这句话的意思是：那边那个人以前是最好的棒球运动员之一。

detailed_translations.english: an outdoor game between two teams of nine players, in which players try to get points by hitting a ball and running around four  base s

name: evaluate
trans: 估价， 评价； 求…的值

sentences.english: You should be able to evaluate your own work.
sentences.chinese: 你应该能够评估自己的工作。

sentences.english: We need to evaluate the success of the campaign.
sentences.chinese: 我们要评估一下这次运动是否成功。

sentences.english: It can be difficult to evaluate the effectiveness of different treatments.
sentences.chinese: 要对各种治疗方法的效果作出评估会很难。

detailed_translations.english: to judge how good, useful, or successful something is

name: status
trans: 地位， 身份；情形， 状况

sentences.english: These documents have no legal status in Britain.
sentences.chinese: 这些文件在英国并无法律效力。

sentences.english: What is your marital status (= are you married or not ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你的婚姻状况是什么？

detailed_translations.english: the official legal position or condition of a person, group, country etc

name: upset
trans: 扰乱， 使…心烦意乱；打翻， 推翻 <

sentences.english: You’re not still upset with me, are you?
sentences.chinese: 你不是还在生我的气吧？

detailed_translations.chinese: 心烦的， 苦恼的； 不适的
detailed_translations.english: unhappy and worried because something unpleasant or disappointing has happened

detailed_translations.chinese: 使心烦意乱，使苦恼，使不适；搅乱；弄翻，倾覆
detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel unhappy or worried
an illness that affects the stomach and makes you feel sick

sentences.english: a sweeping curve of railroad track
sentences.chinese: 铁轨的大弧线

sentences.english: The car took the curve much too quickly.
sentences.chinese: 那辆汽车拐弯太快了。

sentences.english: The track curved round the side of the hill.
sentences.chinese: 小路弯弯曲曲，依山盘旋。

detailed_translations.english: a line that gradually bends like part of a circle
to bend or move in the shape of a curve, or to make something do this

sentences.english: a pattern of dots
sentences.chinese: 圆点图案

sentences.english: She never dots her i’s.
sentences.chinese: 她从来不在i上面加点。

detailed_translations.english: a small round mark or spot
to mark something by putting a dot on it or above it

name: skim
trans: 撇；掠过， 擦过；浏览， 略读

sentences.english: seagulls skimming the waves
sentences.chinese: 掠过浪尖的海鸥

sentences.english: Julie skimmed the sports page.
sentences.chinese: 朱莉浏览了体育版。

detailed_translations.english: to move along quickly over a surface, never touching it or not touching it often

name: skip
trans: 跳来跳去； 蹦蹦跳跳；跳跃； 跳绳；跳过， 略过， 漏过

sentences.english: They saw the man with a little girl skipping along behind him.
sentences.chinese: 他们看到那个男人身后跟着一个蹦蹦跳跳的小女孩。

detailed_translations.english: to go from one subject to another in no fixed order
a skipping movement

sentences.english: There will be some scattered showers (= short periods of rain ) in the afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 下午将有零星阵雨。

sentences.english: a widely scattered set of islands
sentences.chinese: 分散得很广的一片群岛

detailed_translations.english: spread over a wide area or over a long period of time

sentences.english: Why do Americans spend such huge amounts of time, money, water, fertiliser and fuel on growing a useless smooth expanse of grass?
sentences.chinese: 为什么美国人要把如此大量的时间、金钱、水、化肥和燃料花在一大片平整却毫无用处的草地上呢？

sentences.english: At the moment we are losing our groundwater very quickly, destroying soil nutrients, and farmers are going into debt because they are dependent on fertiliser and other inputs.
sentences.chinese: 目前，我们正在非常迅速地失去我们的地下水、破坏土壤养分，而农民们正在欠债，因为他们依赖于化肥和其它投入。

name: stream
trans: 小河， 溪流；流， 一股， 一串

sentences.chinese: 泪水顺着他们的脸颊流下来。

detailed_translations.english: to flow quickly and in great amounts

name: laundry
trans: 洗衣房  <；待洗衣物， 所洗衣物；洗熨 <

sentences.english: She did the laundry (= washed the clothes etc ) and hung it out to dry.
sentences.chinese: 她洗了衣服，然后挂出去晾干。

sentences.english: a pile of dirty laundry
sentences.chinese: 一堆待洗的脏衣服

detailed_translations.english: clothes, sheets etc that need to be washed or have just been washed

name: recur
trans: 再发生， 重现；重新提起

sentences.chinese: 这种病有复发的危险。

sentences.english: Love is a recurring theme in the book.
sentences.chinese: 爱情是这本书中反复出现的主题。

detailed_translations.chinese: (尤指不好的事)一再发生；重现

name: herald
trans: 预告， 先兆；传令官 A <

sentences.chinese: 一道闪电预示着暴雨即将来临。

sentences.english: Flashing blue lights heralded the arrival of the police.
sentences.chinese: 闪烁的蓝色灯光预示警察就要到达。

sentences.english: I welcome the report as a herald of more freedom.
sentences.chinese: 我欢迎这份报告，认为它预示着更多的自由。

detailed_translations.english: to be a sign of something that is going to come or happen soon

detailed_translations.chinese: 信使； 预示， 预兆
detailed_translations.english: Something that is a herald of a future event or situation is a sign that it is going to happen or appear

name: coalition
trans: 结合体， 同盟；结合， 联合

sentences.english: the centre-right coalition government
sentences.chinese: 政治上中间偏右的联合政府

sentences.english: an emergency meeting of the three coalition parties
sentences.chinese: 三个联盟政党召开的一次紧急会议

detailed_translations.chinese: 结合体， 同盟； 结合， 联合
detailed_translations.english: a union of two or more political parties that allows them to form a government or fight an election together

name: accumulate
trans: 积累， 积蓄； 堆积

sentences.chinese: 少数特权阶级继续积聚财富，这是不公平的。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually get more and more money, possessions, knowledge etc over a period of time
to gradually get more and more money, possessions, knowledge etc over a period of time

name: dwarf

sentences.chinese: 周围的摩天大楼使得大教堂显得很矮小。

a dwarf plant or animal is much smaller than the usual size

sentences.english: We moved here because there was very little crime.
sentences.chinese: 我们搬到这里来是因为这里的犯罪率很低。

sentences.english: Police officers are being given new powers to help combat crime.
sentences.chinese: 警官们被赋予新的权力帮助他们打击犯罪。

sentences.english: a police crackdown on car crime
sentences.chinese: 警察对汽车犯罪活动的一次严厉打击

sentences.english: a town with a relatively low crime rate
sentences.chinese: 犯罪率相对较低的一个城镇

detailed_translations.english: illegal activities in general

sentences.english: an old straw hat with a broad brim
sentences.chinese: 一顶旧的宽边草帽

detailed_translations.english: the bottom part of a hat that sticks out to protect you from sun and rain

name: leisure
trans: 空闲， 闲暇；悠闲， 安逸 A

sentences.english: Most people now enjoy shorter working hours and more leisure time.
sentences.chinese: 现在大多数人都喜欢工作时间短些，闲暇时间多些。

sentences.english: Watching television is now the nation’s most popular leisure activity.
sentences.chinese: 看电视是当前国民最普遍的消遣活动。

sentences.english: The hotel offers various leisure facilities such as a swimming pool and sauna.
sentences.chinese: 酒店提供游泳池、桑拿浴室等各种休闲设施。

sentences.english: The leisure industry (= the business of providing leisure activities ) is now an important part of the economy.
sentences.chinese: 现在休闲娱乐行业是经济的一个重要组成部分。

detailed_translations.english: time when you are not working or studying and can relax and do things you enjoy

sentences.english: He glared at the people who surrounded the tent.
sentences.chinese: 他怒视着围住帐篷的那些人。

detailed_translations.english: to be all around someone or something on every side

sentences.english: A small group of journalists waited on the pavement outside her house.
sentences.chinese: 有一小群记者守候在她家外面的人行道上。

sentences.english: a pavement cafe
sentences.chinese: 路边咖啡馆

detailed_translations.english: a hard level surface or path at the side of a road for people to walk on

sentences.english: Wipe your feet on the mat.
sentences.chinese: 在地垫上蹭蹭你的鞋底。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of thick rough material which covers part of a floor

sentences.english: It will take time to assimilate all these facts.
sentences.chinese: 充分掌握所有这些情况需要时间。

detailed_translations.english: to completely understand and begin to use new ideas, information etc
if people assimilate, or are assimilated into a country or group, they become part of that group and are accepted by the people in that group

sentences.english: pilgrims visiting a holy shrine
sentences.chinese: 祭拜圣庙的朝圣者

detailed_translations.chinese: 朝圣者；漫游者；（美）最初的移民
detailed_translations.english: a religious person who travels a long way to a holy place

name: addict
trans: 有瘾的人； 入迷的人

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Walt's meth-business partner, the addict Jesse, is still recovering from the drug-related death of his girlfriend Jane at the end of last season.
sentences.chinese: 而沃特的制毒搭档——瘾君子杰西还未从女朋友之死的痛苦中恢复过来。 他的女朋友简在上一季结尾时死于毒品。

name: marvellous
trans: 令人惊奇的； 奇迹般的； 〈口〉妙极的

sentences.english: ‘How was your holiday?’ ‘Marvellous!’
sentences.chinese: “假期过得好吗？”“好极了！”

sentences.english: We had a marvellous time.
sentences.chinese: 我们度过了美好的时光。

sentences.english: I can’t stand him, but my wife thinks he’s marvellous.
sentences.chinese: 我受不了他，但我的妻子认为他很了不起。

sentences.english: It’s marvellous what they can do these days.
sentences.chinese: 他们现在真有本事。

detailed_translations.english: extremely good, enjoyable, impressive etc

sentences.english: If necessary, we can use aluminium instead of steel.
sentences.chinese: 如果必要，我们可用铝代钢。

detailed_translations.english: a silver-white metal that is very light and is used to make cans, cooking pans, window frames etc. It is a chemical  element  : symbol Al

name: comparable
trans: 可比较的， 比得上的 <

sentences.english: A car of comparable size would cost far more abroad.
sentences.chinese: 同样大小的汽车在国外要贵得多。

detailed_translations.english: similar to something else in size, number, quality etc, so that you can make a comparison

sentences.english: He assured her that he would be discreet.
sentences.chinese: 他向她保证会谨慎行事。

sentences.english: I stood back at a discreet distance.
sentences.chinese: 我谨慎地保持一段距离站在后面。

detailed_translations.english: careful about what you say or do, so that you do not offend, upset, or embarrass people or tell secrets

sentences.english: We go to the opera (= go to a performance of opera ) regularly.
sentences.chinese: 我们常去听歌剧。

sentences.english: an opera singer
sentences.chinese: 歌剧演员

detailed_translations.english: a musical play in which all of the words are sung

sentences.english: It’s raining, which presumably means that your football match will be cancelled.
sentences.chinese: 下雨了，这可能意味着你们的足球比赛要取消。

detailed_translations.chinese: 大概， 可能， 据推测
detailed_translations.english: used to say that you think something is probably true

sentences.english: We used worms as bait.
sentences.chinese: 我们用小虫子作诱饵。

sentences.english: The fish wouldn’t take the bait .
sentences.chinese: 鱼儿不上钩。

sentences.english: He baited his hook with pie.
sentences.chinese: 他把馅饼放在钓钩上作饵。

sentences.english: The boys dug pits and baited them so that they could spear their prey.
sentences.chinese: 男孩子们挖了陷阱，在里面放上诱饵，以便用矛刺杀猎物。

detailed_translations.english: food used to attract fish, animals, or birds so that you can catch them
If you bait a hook or trap, you put bait on it or in it

sentences.english: Long-term savers qualify for a cash bonus.
sentences.chinese: 长期储户可获现金红利。

sentences.english: Further additions to your pay may take the form of bonus payments.
sentences.chinese: 工资以外的钱可能以奖金的形式发放。

sentences.english: a Christmas bonus
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节奖金

sentences.english: Each worker receives an annual bonus.
sentences.chinese: 每个员工都可获得一笔年度奖金。

sentences.english: a £20,000 bonus
sentences.chinese: 一笔2万英镑的奖金

detailed_translations.english: money added to someone’s wages, especially as a reward for good work

name: recognition
trans: 认出， 辨认；承认 A

sentences.english: He stared at her, but there was no sign of recognition .
sentences.chinese: 他盯着她看，但似乎没认出她来。

detailed_translations.english: the act of knowing someone or something because you have known or learned about them in the past

sentences.english: Carpenter is free on bail while he appeals his conviction.
sentences.chinese: 卡彭特取保获释，同时对判决提出上诉。

sentences.english: She was murdered by a man who was out on bail for rape.
sentences.chinese: 她被一名犯强奸罪获保在外的男子杀害。

sentences.english: The three men were released on bail pending an appeal.
sentences.chinese: 这三名男子获准保释等候上诉。

sentences.english: He is not likely to be granted bail .
sentences.chinese: 他不大可能获保释。

sentences.english: Carter has been refused bail and will remain in custody.
sentences.chinese: 卡特已经被拒绝保释，继续拘押。

sentences.english: The judge ordered that Jones be held without bail .
sentences.chinese: 法官下令琼斯不得保释。

sentences.english: Why can’t you ask your father to put up bail for you?
sentences.chinese: 为什么不能叫你父亲帮你交保释金？

sentences.english: Two of the defendants jumped bail and fled to New York.
sentences.chinese: 两名被告弃保潜逃到了纽约。

sentences.english: Bail was set at $30,000.
sentences.chinese: 保释金定为三万美元。

detailed_translations.english: money left with a court of law to make sure that a prisoner will return when their  trial  starts

detailed_translations.chinese: 保释，帮助某人脱离困境；往外舀水
detailed_translations.english: to escape from a situation that you do not want to be in any more

sentences.english: Would you like a window seat or an aisle seat (=  seat next to the aisle  ) ?
sentences.chinese: 您想要靠窗的座位还是靠过道的座位？

detailed_translations.english: a long passage between rows of seats in a church, plane, theatre etc, or between rows of shelves in a shop

name: revenue
trans: 收入； 财政收入， 税收

sentences.english: advertising revenue
sentences.chinese: 广告收入

sentences.english: Strikes have cost £20 million in lost revenues .
sentences.chinese: 罢工造成的收入损失达到2,000万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: money that a business or organization receives over a period of time, especially from selling goods or services

sentences.english: Strip the beds and wash the sheets.
sentences.chinese: 把床单撤下来清洗。

sentences.english: a strip of paper
sentences.chinese: 一张纸条

detailed_translations.english: to remove something that is covering the surface of something else
a long narrow piece of paper, cloth etc

sentences.english: In the past central government had a monopoly on television broadcasting.
sentences.chinese: 过去，中央政府对电视节目播放实行垄断。

sentences.english: A good education should not be the monopoly of the rich.
sentences.chinese: 良好的教育不应该成为富人的专利。

detailed_translations.english: the complete control of trade in particular goods or the supply of a particular service; a type of goods or a service that is controlled in this way

sentences.english: continuous economic growth
sentences.chinese: 持续的经济增长

sentences.english: a continuous flow of information
sentences.chinese: 源源不断的信息

detailed_translations.english: continuing to happen or exist without stopping

name: grain
trans: 谷物， 谷类； 粮食；颗粒， 细粒

sentences.english: There were crumbs and grains of sugar on the table.
sentences.chinese: 桌子上有面包屑和糖粒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 谷物， 谷粒， 颗粒； 少量， 微量
detailed_translations.english: a single very small piece of a substance such as sand or salt

sentences.english: Rome was his main place of residence.
sentences.chinese: 罗马是他的主要居住地。

sentences.english: the ambassador’s official residence
sentences.chinese: 大使官邸

detailed_translations.english: the state of living in a place

name: credit
trans: 信用; 信任；信用贷款， 赊欠；名誉， 名望； 光荣； 功劳；学分

sentences.english: We found his statement hard to credit.
sentences.chinese: 我们觉得他的说法令人难以信服。

sentences.english: The witness’s story gained credit with the jury.
sentences.chinese: 证人的陈述被陪审团采信了。

detailed_translations.english: to believe that something is true
the belief that something is true or correct

sentences.english: a kitchen maid
sentences.chinese: 厨房女佣人

detailed_translations.english: a female servant, especially in a large house or hotel

sentences.english: The human brain needs to be without oxygen for only four minutes before permanent damage occurs.
sentences.chinese: 人脑缺氧只需4分钟就会造成永久性损伤。

detailed_translations.english: a gas that has no colour or smell, is present in air, and is necessary for most animals and plants to live. It is a chemical element: symbol O

name: intensive
trans: 加强的； 集中的； 深入细致的 <

sentences.english: a one-week intensive course in English
sentences.chinese: 为期一周的英语强化课程

sentences.english: a day of intensive negotiations
sentences.chinese: 紧张谈判的一天

detailed_translations.english: involving a lot of activity, effort, or careful attention in a short period of time

sentences.english: Her face hadn’t altered much over the years.
sentences.chinese: 过了这么多年，她的容貌并没有多大改变。

sentences.english: The city centre has altered beyond recognition (=  changed very much  ) .
sentences.chinese: 市中心变得都认不出来了。

sentences.english: Nothing can alter the fact that the refugees are our responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 我们有责任帮助难民，这一事实无法改变。

detailed_translations.english: to change, or to make someone or something change

name: combine
trans: 结合， 联合； 化合

sentences.english: Diets are most effective when combined with exercise.
sentences.chinese: 节食和锻炼相结合是最有效的。

sentences.english: Ruth hesitated, uncertain of how to combine honesty and diplomacy in her answer.
sentences.chinese: 露丝犹豫了，她不知道怎样回答才能既诚实又婉转。

detailed_translations.english: if you combine two or more different things, or if they combine, they begin to exist or work together

detailed_translations.chinese: 联合企业； 联合收割机
detailed_translations.english: a machine used by farmers to cut grain, separate the seeds from it, and clean it

sentences.english: He would brook no criticism, even from his beloved daughter.
sentences.chinese: 他不能容忍任何批评，哪怕是自己深爱的女儿也不行。

detailed_translations.english: to not allow or accept something
a small stream

name: ideal
trans: 完美典型， 典范；理想

sentences.english: advice on how to reach your ideal weight
sentences.chinese: 如何达到理想体重的建议

sentences.english: The scheme offers an ideal opportunity for youngsters to get training.
sentences.chinese: 该计划为年轻人提供了获得培训的极好机会。

sentences.english: With so much rain, conditions are far from ideal.
sentences.chinese: 雨水这么多，天气情况很不理想。

detailed_translations.english: the best or most suitable that something could possibly be
a principle about what is morally right or a perfect standard that you hope to achieve

sentences.english: a career in stand-up comedy
sentences.chinese: 单口喜剧表演职业

detailed_translations.english: entertainment that is intended to make people laugh

name: pressure
trans: 压； 压强； 强制， 压迫 A

sentences.english: They are putting pressure on people to vote yes.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在向民众施加压力，要求他们投赞成票。

sentences.english: You must never give in to pressure .
sentences.chinese: 你绝不能屈从压力。

detailed_translations.english: an attempt to persuade someone by using influence, arguments, or threats

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…施加压力， 迫使， 说服
detailed_translations.english: to try to make someone do something by making them feel it is their duty to do it

name: paralyse
trans: 使瘫痪； 使丧失作用

sentences.english: Her legs were partly paralysed in the crash.
sentences.chinese: 在撞车事故中她的双腿部分瘫痪。

detailed_translations.english: if something paralyses you, it makes you lose the ability to move part or all of your body, or to feel it

name: undesirable
trans: 不受欢迎的， 令人不快的

sentences.english: punishment of undesirable behaviour
sentences.chinese: 对不良行为的惩罚

sentences.english: It would be highly undesirable to increase class sizes further.
sentences.chinese: 再增加班级人数，是大家都极不愿意的。

detailed_translations.english: not welcome or wanted because they may affect a situation or person in a bad way

name: numb
trans: 麻木的， 失去感觉的

sentences.english: The cold had numbed her fingers.
sentences.chinese: 她的手指冻僵了。

sentences.english: the numbing effect of the drug
sentences.chinese: 那种药物的麻醉效果

detailed_translations.chinese: 使麻木；使发愣；使失去感觉
detailed_translations.english: to make someone unable to feel pain or feel things they are touching
a part of your body that is numb is unable to feel anything, for example because you are very cold

name: literacy
trans: 识字， 有文化； 读写能力

sentences.english: a new adult literacy campaign
sentences.chinese: 新一轮成人识字[扫盲]运动

detailed_translations.chinese: 识字， 有文化， 读写能力
detailed_translations.english: the state of being able to read and write

sentences.english: The disease originated in Africa.
sentences.chinese: 这种疾病起源于非洲。

sentences.english: All carbohydrates originate from plants.
sentences.chinese: 所有的碳水化合物均来源于植物。

detailed_translations.english: When something originates or when someone originates it, it begins to happen or exist

detailed_translations.chinese: 创造， 创始， 开创
detailed_translations.english: to have the idea for something and start it

sentences.english: a map and compass
sentences.chinese: 地图和指南针

detailed_translations.english: an instrument that shows directions and has a needle that always points north

sentences.english: Students with a background in chemistry will probably find the course easier.
sentences.chinese: 学过化学的学生可能会觉得这门课程容易些。

sentences.english: It’s important to understand other people, people from different backgrounds .
sentences.chinese: 要理解别人，理解那些来自不同背景的人，这是很重要的。

sentences.english: Do you know anything about his background?
sentences.chinese: 关于他的背景，你知道什么吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 出身背景， 经历； 背景资料； 背景， 底子
detailed_translations.english: someone’s family, education, previous work etc

sentences.english: an American millionaire
sentences.chinese: 一位美国百万富翁

sentences.english: a millionaire businessman
sentences.chinese: 一位富商

detailed_translations.english: someone who is very rich and has at least a million pounds or dollars

sentences.english: The region was extremely beautiful. Nonetheless Gerard could not imagine spending the rest of his life there.
sentences.chinese: 那个地区非常漂亮，然而杰拉德却无法想象自己要在那里度过余生。

sentences.english: The paintings are complex, but have plenty of appeal nonetheless.
sentences.chinese: 这些画复杂难懂，不过还是不乏吸引力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 尽管如此， 依然， 然而
detailed_translations.english: in spite of the fact that has just been mentioned

name: dispose
trans: 处理， 处置 <；布置， 安排

sentences.english: Chinese vases are disposed around the gallery.
sentences.chinese: 中国花瓶摆放在展馆四周。

detailed_translations.english: to arrange things or put them in their places

name: constitution
trans: 构成， 构造， 成分；体格， 体质；宪法

sentences.english: The right to speak freely is written into the Constitution of the United States.
sentences.chinese: 言论自由的权利被写入美国宪法。

sentences.english: She’s got a strong constitution – she’ll recover in no time.
sentences.chinese: 她体质强壮，很快就会恢复。

sentences.english: What’s the chemical constitution of the dye?
sentences.chinese: 这种染料的化学成分是什么？

detailed_translations.english: a set of basic laws and principles that a country or organization is governed by

sentences.english: To investigate, his team injected cocaine, capsaicin or both at once into the abdomens of several groups of about 30 mice.
sentences.chinese: 他的团队将辣椒素或可卡因中的一种，或同时将两种注射进几组老鼠的腹部，每组约30只。

sentences.english: Then the researchers repeated the experiment, but this time they injected rats with a dose of cocaine or morphine on one side and with a neutral saline solution on the other.
sentences.chinese: 然后，研究人员重复这项实验，但是这次他们给一边的小白鼠注射小剂量的可卡因或吗啡，而另一边注射中性盐水。

detailed_translations.english: a drug, usually in the form of a white powder, that is taken illegally for pleasure or used in some medical situations to prevent pain

sentences.english: Blend the sugar, eggs, and flour.
sentences.chinese: 把糖、鸡蛋和面粉掺在一起。

sentences.english: a blend of tea
sentences.chinese: 混合茶叶

detailed_translations.english: to thoroughly mix together soft or liquid substances to form a single smooth substance
a mixture of different types of the same thing

name: conceive
trans: 设想， 想象； 构思； 以为 <；怀胎， 受孕

sentences.english: He conceived the idea of transforming the old power station into an arts centre.
sentences.chinese: 他想出了一个把旧发电站改造为艺术中心的主意。

sentences.english: God is often conceived of as male.
sentences.chinese: 上帝常常被想象为男性。

sentences.english: She is unable to conceive.
sentences.chinese: 她不能怀孕。

sentences.english: Their first child was conceived on their wedding night.
sentences.chinese: 他们的第一个小孩是在新婚之夜怀上的。

detailed_translations.english: to form an idea, a plan, etc. in your mind; to imagine sth

sentences.english: ‘I’m a prisoner in my own home.’ ‘Nonsense!’
sentences.chinese: “我在自己家里就像个囚犯。”“胡说！”

sentences.english: If you ask me, these modern teaching methods are a load of nonsense (= a lot of nonsense ).
sentences.chinese: 要我说，这些现代教学方法全是一派胡言。

sentences.english: He was talking utter nonsense as usual.
sentences.chinese: 他像平常一样又在胡说八道了。

sentences.english: By 1832 the idea had become an economic nonsense.
sentences.chinese: 到了1832年，那种观点已经成为经济学的谬论。

detailed_translations.chinese: 胡说， 废话； 冒失的行动
detailed_translations.english: ideas, opinions, statements etc that are not true or that seem very stupid

name: stain
trans: 沾污， 染污；玷污， 败坏；染色

sentences.english: We’ve decided to stain the shelves blue.
sentences.chinese: 我们决定把架子涂成蓝色。

detailed_translations.english: to change the colour of something, especially something made of wood, by using a special liquid
a mark that is difficult to remove, especially one made by a liquid such as blood, coffee, or ink

sentences.english: ...taking tiny bites of a hot dog and daintily wiping my lips with a napkin.
sentences.chinese: …小口咬着热狗并用餐巾文雅地擦着我的嘴唇。

detailed_translations.english: a square piece of cloth or paper used for protecting your clothes and for cleaning your hands and lips during a meal

name: reckless
trans: 轻率的； 鲁莽的； 不考虑后果的

sentences.english: He was accused of causing death by reckless driving .
sentences.chinese: 他被控因鲁莽驾驶致人死亡。

sentences.english: a reckless disregard for safety
sentences.chinese: 不顾安全的鲁莽行为

sentences.english: He ran into the burning house with reckless abandon (= without caring about the danger ) .
sentences.chinese: 他不顾危险冲入着火的房子里。

detailed_translations.english: not caring or worrying about the possible bad or dangerous results of your actions

name: paradox
trans: 似非而是的话； 反论

sentences.english: The paradox is that fishermen would catch more fish if they fished less.
sentences.chinese: 悖论就是: 如果渔夫减少捕鱼，反而会打到更多的鱼。

detailed_translations.english: a statement that seems impossible because it contains two opposing ideas that are both true

sentences.english: a bald man
sentences.chinese: 一名秃顶男子

sentences.english: his shiny bald head
sentences.chinese: 他那亮闪闪的光头

sentences.english: Dad started going bald when he was in his thirties.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸在三十多岁的时候开始谢顶。

sentences.english: He combed his hair and tried to hide his bald patch (=  part of someone’s head where there is no hair  ).
sentences.chinese: 他梳了梳头，试图把头顶的秃块遮掩起来。

detailed_translations.english: having little or no hair on your head

sentences.english: The X-ray showed that her leg was not broken.
sentences.chinese: X光片显示她的腿没有骨折。

detailed_translations.english: a beam of radiation1 that can go through solid objects and is used for photographing the inside of the body
to photograph the inside of someone’s body using X-rays

name: physical
trans: 物质的； 有形的；肉体的， 身体的 <；自然科学的， 物理的

sentences.english: She was in constant physical pain.
sentences.chinese: 她一直感到身上疼痛。

sentences.english: the physical and emotional needs of young adults
sentences.chinese: 青年人的身心需求

sentences.english: people with severe physical disabilities
sentences.chinese: 身体重度残疾的人

sentences.english: Don’t be put off by his physical appearance .
sentences.chinese: 别因为他的外貌讨厌他。

sentences.english: He was obsessed with physical fitness .
sentences.chinese: 他对健身着了迷。

detailed_translations.english: related to someone’s body rather than their mind or emotions

name: fulfil
trans: 完成； 实现， 履行； 符合

sentences.english: There is little doubt that the scheme fulfils a need for our community.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，这计划会满足我们社区的需求。

sentences.english: Visiting Disneyland has fulfilled a boyhood dream.
sentences.chinese: 迪士尼乐园之游使童年梦想成真。

detailed_translations.english: to do or provide what is necessary or needed

name: wicked
trans: 邪恶的， 恶劣的；恶意的

sentences.english: the wicked stepmother in ‘Hansel and Gretel’
sentences.chinese: 《糖果屋》中那个恶毒的继母

detailed_translations.english: behaving in a way that is morally wrong

name: structure
trans: 建筑， 建造； 组织， 安排

sentences.english: challenges to the existing power structure
sentences.chinese: 对现有权力结构的挑战

sentences.english: A new management structure has been introduced.
sentences.chinese: 已推行一种新的管理结构。

sentences.english: molecular structures
sentences.chinese: 分子结构

detailed_translations.english: the way in which the parts of something are connected with each other and form a whole, or the thing that these parts make up

name: masculine
trans: 男性的， 男子的；男子气概的， 男子气的

sentences.english: They’re nice curtains, but I’d prefer something a little more masculine.
sentences.chinese: 这些窗帘很好，但我更喜欢男性化一点的。

sentences.english: She has a very masculine voice.
sentences.chinese: 她的嗓音非常男性化。

sentences.english: Hunting was a typically masculine occupation.
sentences.chinese: 打猎是典型的男性消遣活动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 男性的；阳性的；男子气概的
detailed_translations.english: having qualities considered to be typical of men or of what men do

name: intensity
trans: 强烈， 剧烈；强度 A

sentences.english: The intensity of the hurricane was frightening.
sentences.chinese: 飓风的猛烈程度令人恐惧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 强烈，剧烈；〔光、声等的〕强度
detailed_translations.english: the quality of being felt very strongly or having a strong effect

name: stake
trans: 桩， 标桩； 棍子；赌注；利害关系， 风险

sentences.english: They have to win the contract – thousands of jobs are at stake.
sentences.chinese: 他们必须拿下这份合同，这关系到数千个工作岗位。

sentences.english: National pride is at stake in next week’s game against England.
sentences.chinese: 下星期对英格兰队的比赛关乎民族尊严。

detailed_translations.english: if something that you value very much is at stake, you will lose it if a plan or action is not successful

sentences.english: She gently wakened the sleeping child.
sentences.chinese: 她轻轻地唤醒睡梦中的孩子。

detailed_translations.english: to wake up, or to wake someone up
to wake up, or to wake someone up

name: witness
trans: 目击者， 证人；证据， 证明

sentences.english: Police have appealed for witnesses to come forward.
sentences.chinese: 警方呼吁目击者站出来。

sentences.english: an eye witness (= someone who sees an event ) to the robbery
sentences.chinese: 抢劫案的一名目击者

detailed_translations.english: someone who sees a crime or an accident and can describe what happened

detailed_translations.chinese: 目击； 为…作证， 证明
detailed_translations.english: used to introduce an example that proves something you have just mentioned

name: conform
trans: 遵守， 依照， 顺应； 符合

sentences.english: The building does not conform with safety regulations.
sentences.chinese: 例句：这座建筑物不符合安全条例。

sentences.english: It did not conform to the usual stereotype of an industrial city.
sentences.chinese: 这和一座常规的工业城市那种千篇一律的格局不一样。

detailed_translations.english: to obey a law, rule etc

name: authentic
trans: 真正的， 真实的；可靠的 A

sentences.english: an authentic account
sentences.chinese: 真实可信的说法

detailed_translations.chinese: 真的， 真正的； 可靠的， 可信的
detailed_translations.english: based on facts

name: lodge
trans: 住宿， 投宿， 留宿 A

sentences.english: a building used to lodge prisoners of war
sentences.chinese: 一座关押战俘的建筑物

sentences.english: The bullet lodged in the sergeant's leg, shattering his thigh bone.
sentences.chinese: 子弹射入这个军士的腿部，击碎了他的大腿骨。

detailed_translations.english: to pay to live in a room in someone’s house
If an object lodges somewhere, it becomes stuck there

detailed_translations.chinese: 乡间小屋， 旅舍； 寄宿者， 投宿者
detailed_translations.english: a small house on the land of a large country house, usually at the main entrance gate

name: threat
trans: 恐吓， 威胁；坏兆头， 危险迹象

sentences.english: Your threats don’t scare me.
sentences.chinese: 你的那些威胁吓不倒我。

sentences.english: threats made against his wife and children
sentences.chinese: 对他妻儿的威胁

sentences.english: Nichols never carried out his threat to resign.
sentences.chinese: 尼科尔斯威胁过要辞职，但从未付诸行动。

sentences.english: The government will not give in to terrorist threats .
sentences.chinese: 政府不会屈服于恐怖分子的威胁。

sentences.english: She dismissed the statement as an empty threat .
sentences.chinese: 她无视这项声明，认为是个空口威胁。

sentences.english: They warned him with veiled threats not to mention anything he had witnessed.
sentences.chinese: 他们话中有话地威胁他不要提及他所目睹的事。

sentences.english: The police are investigating death threats made against the two men.
sentences.chinese: 警方正在调查针对这两名男子的死亡恐吓。

sentences.english: Officials at the school say they received a bomb threat at approximately 11:30 a.m. today.
sentences.chinese: 学校的官员说他们在今天上午11点半左右收到过炸弹恐吓。

detailed_translations.english: a statement in which you tell someone that you will cause them harm or trouble if they do not do what you want

sentences.english: These bras are specially designed for women with large breasts.
sentences.chinese: 这些胸罩专为乳房丰满的女性设计。

sentences.english: breast milk
sentences.chinese: 母乳

sentences.english: breast cancer
sentences.chinese: 乳腺癌

sentences.english: Dick cradled her photograph against his breast.
sentences.chinese: 迪克把她的照片轻轻拥在胸前。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two round raised parts on a woman’s chest that produce milk when she has a baby

name: mercy
trans: 仁慈， 怜悯， 宽恕

sentences.english: He showed no mercy to his enemies.
sentences.chinese: 他对敌人毫不仁慈。

sentences.english: God have mercy on his soul.
sentences.chinese: 愿上帝宽恕他的灵魂。

detailed_translations.english: if someone shows mercy, they choose to forgive or to be kind to someone who they have the power to hurt or punish

name: curl
trans: 卷发； 卷曲状； 卷曲物

sentences.english: She has hair that refuses to curl.
sentences.chinese: 她的头发怎么也不卷。

sentences.english: Maria had curled her hair for the event.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚为这次活动卷了头发。

sentences.english: a little boy with beautiful blonde curls
sentences.chinese: 满头漂亮的金色鬈发的小男孩

sentences.english: Decorate the cake with chocolate curls.
sentences.chinese: 用巧克力圈装饰蛋糕。

detailed_translations.english: to form a twisted or curved shape, or to make something do this
a piece of hair that hangs in a curved shape

name: inform
trans: 通知， 告诉， 报告

sentences.english: They would inform him of any progress they had made.
sentences.chinese: 他们将把自己所取得的任何进展都告诉他。

sentences.english: My daughter informed me that she was pregnant.
sentences.chinese: 我女儿告诉我她怀孕了。

detailed_translations.english: If you inform someone of something, you tell them about it
to officially tell someone about something or give them information

name: empirical
trans: 凭经验的， 经验主义的 <

sentences.english: empirical evidence
sentences.chinese: 实验证据

detailed_translations.english: based on scientific testing or practical experience, not on ideas

name: commit
trans: 把…交托给， 提交 <；犯 ， 干  <

sentences.english: Women commit fewer crimes than men.
sentences.chinese: 女性犯罪比男性少。

detailed_translations.chinese: 犯， 干； 使承诺； 把…托付给； 调拨…供使用， 拨出
detailed_translations.english: to do something wrong or illegal

sentences.english: the family’s joys and sorrows
sentences.chinese: 这家人的喜与悲

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of great sadness, usually because someone has died or because something terrible has happened to you
to feel or express sorrow

name: curb
trans: 路缘； 镶边石；勒马绳

sentences.english: measures to curb the spread of the virus
sentences.chinese: 控制病毒扩散的措施

detailed_translations.english: to control or limit something in order to prevent it from having a harmful effect

detailed_translations.chinese: 控制， 约束； 路缘
detailed_translations.english: an influence which helps to control or limit something
