sentences.english: a little boy who wet his bed with monotonous regularity
sentences.chinese: 一个老是尿床的小男孩

detailed_translations.english: boring because of always being the same

name: inspire
trans: 激起， 鼓舞；使产生灵感

sentences.english: We need someone who can inspire the team.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要一个能鼓舞团队士气的人。

sentences.english: Inspired by the sunny weather, I decided to explore the woods.
sentences.chinese: 阳光明媚的天气令人振奋，我决定到森林里寻幽探胜。

sentences.english: The story was inspired by a chance meeting with an old Russian duke.
sentences.chinese: 这个故事的创作灵感来自与一位俄国老公爵的不期而遇。

detailed_translations.english: to encourage someone by making them feel confident and eager to do something

name: impart
trans: 给予， 赋予；传授； 告知， 透露 A

sentences.english: Use a piece of fresh ginger to impart a East Asian flavour to simple ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 用一片鲜姜给简单的原料添上东亚的风味。

sentences.english: She had information that she couldn’t wait to impart.
sentences.chinese: 她得到了消息，迫不及待地想告诉别人。

detailed_translations.english: to give a particular quality to something

name: bureaucracy
trans: 官僚； 官僚主义， 官僚作风；管理人员

sentences.english: the reduction of unnecessary bureaucracy
sentences.chinese: 消除不必要的官僚体制

detailed_translations.english: a complicated official system that is annoying or confusing because it has a lot of rules, processes etc

sentences.english: the very ordered way in which mathematics and geometry describe nature
sentences.chinese: 数学和几何学描述自然的条理性

detailed_translations.english: the study in  mathematics  of the angles and shapes formed by the relationships of lines, surfaces, and solid objects in space

name: glide
trans: 滑行； 滑动； 掠过； 滑翔

sentences.english: Waiters glide between tightly packed tables bearing trays of pasta.
sentences.chinese: 侍者们托着一盘盘的意大利面食在拥挤的餐桌间自如穿行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 滑翔；滑行；悄悄地走；消逝
detailed_translations.english: to move smoothly and quietly, as if without effort
a smooth quiet movement that seems to take no effort

name: agent
trans: 代理商， 代理人， 代表 <

sentences.english: Our agent in Rio deals with all our Brazilian business.
sentences.chinese: 我们在里约热内卢的业务代表处理我们在巴西的全部业务。

detailed_translations.english: a person or company that represents another person or company, especially in business

sentences.english: The church's message of salvation has changed the lives of many.
sentences.chinese: 这个教会的灵魂得救的训诫已经改变了很多人的一生。

detailed_translations.english: something that prevents or saves someone or something from danger, loss, or failure

name: wholly
trans: 完全地， 全部， 一概

sentences.english: a wholly satisfactory solution
sentences.chinese: 完全令人满意的解决办法

sentences.english: The report claimed that the disaster was wholly unavoidable.
sentences.chinese: 报告称这场灾难完全无法避免。

detailed_translations.english: completely

sentences.english: For each approximate solution of a parameterized problem, the app also displays the margin of error.
sentences.chinese: 对于每一个参数化问题的近似结果，这个程序也会显示误差的边界。

sentences.english: Until the versions released in 1995, chunks were left unsorted within bins, so that the best-fit strategy was only approximate .
sentences.chinese: 直到1995年发布的半本，块在箱子里还是未排序的，所以最佳适合策略还只是近似的。

sentences.english: The model downloaded to a smart phone finds an approximate solution for a new set of parameters by reference to the precomputed solutions.
sentences.chinese: 这个模型会被下载到智能手机上，通过引用预先计算好的结果来找到一个对应新的参数组的近似结果。

detailed_translations.english: to be close to a particular number
an approximate number, amount, or time is close to the exact number, amount etc, but could be a little bit more or less than it

sentences.english: I’ve got a few thousand dollars I’m looking to invest.
sentences.chinese: 我有几千美元想作投资。

sentences.english: It was very difficult to leave a home we had invested so much in.
sentences.chinese: 那个家我们投入得太多，要离开真的很难。

detailed_translations.english: to buy shares, property, or goods because you hope that the value will increase and you can make a profit

name: project
trans: 方案， 计划； 工程， 项目
投射， 放映；设计， 规划

sentences.english: The project aims to provide an analysis of children’s emotions.
sentences.chinese: 该计划旨在对儿童情绪作出分析。

sentences.english: a three-year research project
sentences.chinese: 一项为期三年的研究计划

sentences.english: The scheme will now be extended after a successful pilot project (= a small trial to test if an idea will be successful ) .
sentences.chinese: 试行成功后，该方案现在将得到推广。

sentences.english: The project is funded by Wellcome plc.
sentences.chinese: 这个项目由威康公司资助。

sentences.english: a project manager
sentences.chinese: 项目经理

sentences.english: a geography project
sentences.chinese: 一个地理课题

detailed_translations.english: a carefully planned piece of work to get information about something, to build something, to improve something etc

name: by-pass
trans: 旁路， 迂回的旁道； 搭桥术； 旁通管

sentences.english: A new bypass around the city is being built.
sentences.chinese: 一条绕城而过的新旁路正在修建之中。

detailed_translations.chinese: 旁路， 迂回的旁道； 搭桥术； 旁通管
detailed_translations.english: A bypass is a main road that takes traffic around the edge of a town or city rather than through its centre

sentences.english: The wall is weak and requires lateral support.
sentences.chinese: 墙体不坚固，需要从侧面加以支撑。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the sides of something, or movement to the side

sentences.english: Ferraro was the first woman to be nominated for the job of vice president.
sentences.chinese: 费拉罗是第一位获得副总统职位提名的女性。

sentences.english: Next year Mr Jenks will retire and Mr Broadbent will be nominated as his replacement.
sentences.chinese: 明年詹克斯先生退休，布罗德本特先生将获任命接替他的职位。

detailed_translations.english: to officially suggest someone or something for an important position, duty, or prize

sentences.english: We drink whisky mixed with beer.
sentences.chinese: 我们喝掺有啤酒的威士忌。

sentences.english: He drank another glass of whisky, but that didn't support him to hit his wife.
sentences.chinese: 他又喝了一杯威士忌，可这仍然没能令他鼓起勇气去打他的妻子。

sentences.english: After drinking a small cup of whisky,he began to stroke the things happened in these two days.
sentences.chinese: 喝了一小杯威士忌酒之后，他开始理了理这一两天发生的事情。

detailed_translations.english: a strong alcoholic drink made from grain, or a glass of this

sentences.english: Vincent loomed over me, as pale and grey as a tombstone.
sentences.chinese: 文森特赫然出现在我面前，脸色苍白阴沉得像块墓碑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 织布机；若隐若现的景象
detailed_translations.english: a frame or machine on which thread is woven into cloth

detailed_translations.chinese: 可怕地出现；朦胧地出现；隐约可见
detailed_translations.english: to appear as a large unclear shape, especially in a threatening way

sentences.english: Draw a circle six centimetres in diameter.
sentences.chinese: 画一个直径为六厘米的圆。

detailed_translations.english: a straight line from one side of a circle to the other side, passing through the centre of the circle, or the length of this line

sentences.english: The Habsburg dynasty ruled in Austria from 1278 to 1918.
sentences.chinese: 哈布斯堡王朝在1278至1918年间统治奥地利。

detailed_translations.english: a family of kings or other rulers whose parents, grandparents etc have ruled the country for many years

sentences.english: How did you manage to drive into a stationary vehicle?
sentences.chinese: 你是怎么开车的，竟会撞上一辆停着的车子？

detailed_translations.chinese: 固定的， 静止不动的
detailed_translations.english: standing still instead of moving

sentences.english: The barn was heaped with grain.
sentences.chinese: 谷仓里堆满了粮食。

sentences.english: The dilapidated barn detracts charm from the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 圮废失修的谷仓有损景色的美。

sentences.english: The grain is liable to mildew when the humidity in the barn is too high.
sentences.chinese: 仓库里潮气太大， 粮食就容易发霉。

detailed_translations.english: a large farm building for storing crops, or for keeping animals in

sentences.english: He looped the rope over the wood.
sentences.chinese: 他把绳子打了环系在木头上。

detailed_translations.english: to fly a plane up and around in a circle so that the plane is  upside down  for a time
a shape like a curve or a circle made by a line curving back towards itself, or a piece of wire, string etc that has this shape

sentences.english: In Finland purists insist that only birch bark should be added.
sentences.chinese: 在芬兰，纯化论者坚持说只能加白桦树皮。

sentences.english: Cork bark is closely intertwined with the lives of the people in these regions.
sentences.chinese: 软木橡树的树皮与这些地方的百姓生活密切地交织在一起。

sentences.english: In his workshop, a Kakunodate craftsman prepares the cherry bark before applying this as a veneer to a range of objects.
sentences.chinese: 在将这种工艺作为一系列物体的单板运用之前，角馆的工匠在自己的作坊准备樱花树皮。

detailed_translations.english: the outer covering of a tree

name: greedy
trans: 贪婪的； 贪吃的； 渴望的

sentences.english: a greedy and selfish society
sentences.chinese: 一个贪婪自私的社会

sentences.english: He looked at the gold with greedy eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他贪婪地看着这些金子。

sentences.english: Have you eaten them all, you greedy pig?
sentences.chinese: 你把那些全吃了？你这贪吃的猪！

detailed_translations.english: always wanting more food, money, power, possessions etc than you need

name: bare
trans: 赤裸的； 光秃的； 空的；稀少的， 仅有的

sentences.english: a ragged child with bare feet
sentences.chinese: 一个衣衫褴褛、光着脚的小孩

sentences.english: She felt the sun warm on her bare arms.
sentences.chinese: 她感觉到阳光照在她裸露双臂上的暖意。

sentences.english: He got 40% – a bare pass.
sentences.chinese: 他得了40分，勉强及格。

detailed_translations.english: not covered by clothes

sentences.english: The little prefabricated hut was lifted away by a huge crane.
sentences.chinese: 那间小小的预制棚屋被一台巨大的起重机吊走了。

sentences.english: She craned her neck to get a better view.
sentences.chinese: 她伸长脖子以便看得清楚一些。

sentences.english: Children craned to get close to him.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们伸长脖子想靠近他。

detailed_translations.english: a large tall machine used by builders for lifting heavy things
If you crane your neck or head, you stretch your neck in a particular direction in order to see or hear something better

name: formidable
trans: 可怕的， 令人敬畏的 A <；强大的； 难以应付的

sentences.english: The building is grey, formidable, not at all picturesque.
sentences.chinese: 那幢建筑呈灰色，气势凛然，与漂亮沾不上边。

sentences.english: The new range of computers have formidable processing power.
sentences.chinese: 该系列的新型计算机处理能力惊人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可怕的；令人敬畏的，令人惊叹的
detailed_translations.english: very powerful or impressive, and often frightening

name: abound
trans: 富于， 大量存在；充满

sentences.english: Rumors of such coordination abound, but as with many rumors, they have no basis in fact.
sentences.chinese: 关于这类协调的谣传很多；但如同许多其他谣传一样，它们没有事实根据。

sentences.english: Finally, offer this closing prayer to the Lord: May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that you may abound in hope by the power of the Holy Spirit.
sentences.chinese: 最后，将结束的祷告告诉主：愿在你拥有信仰的时候希望的上帝用快乐与和平充满你的人生，让你在圣灵的力量下富于希望。

sentences.english: He's decided to grow a beard.
sentences.chinese: 他已经决定蓄胡须。

detailed_translations.english: hair that grows around a man’s chin and cheeks

name: invert
trans: 倒置， 倒转， 颠倒

sentences.english: Invert the cake onto a serving plate.
sentences.chinese: 把蛋糕倒扣过来放到一个盘子上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…转化；使…颠倒；使…反转；使…前后倒置
detailed_translations.english: to put something in the opposite position to the one it was in before, especially by turning it upside down (= the bottom is on the top and the top is on the bottom )

detailed_translations.chinese: 颠倒的事物；倒置物；倒悬者

sentences.english: You need to pay the amount owing, plus the interest.
sentences.chinese: 你需要付清欠款，外加利息。

detailed_translations.english: if money is owing, it has not yet been paid to the person who should receive it

sentences.english: the Norman Conquest (= the conquest of England by the Normans )
sentences.chinese: 诺曼征服

detailed_translations.english: the act of getting control of a country by fighting

name: dense
trans: 浓厚的， 密集的， 稠密的

sentences.english: a dense rurally-based population
sentences.chinese: 居住在乡村的密集人口

sentences.english: dense fog/smoke/fumes
sentences.chinese: 浓雾 / 烟；浓烈的气体

detailed_translations.english: containing a lot of people, things, plants, etc. with little space between them

name: assurance
trans: 确保； 断言；保证， 担保

sentences.english: Despite my repeated assurances, Rob still looked very nervous.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我再三保证，罗布看起来还是很紧张。

detailed_translations.english: a promise that something will definitely happen or is definitely true, made especially to make someone less worried

name: disrupt
trans: 使破裂； 使分裂， 使瓦解；扰乱； 使中断

sentences.english: Traffic was disrupted by a hoax bomb.
sentences.chinese: 有人虚报有炸弹，造成了交通混乱。

sentences.english: Climate change could disrupt the agricultural economy.
sentences.chinese: 气候变化可能给农业经济带来不良影响。

detailed_translations.english: to prevent something from continuing in its usual way by causing problems

sentences.english: a fortnight’s holiday
sentences.chinese: 十四天的假期

sentences.english: in a fortnight’s time
sentences.chinese: 两周后

sentences.english: a fortnight ago
sentences.chinese: 两周前

detailed_translations.english: two weeks

sentences.english: His hands were badly scarred by the fire.
sentences.chinese: 他的双手被那次大火烧得疤痕累累。

sentences.english: She will probably be scarred for life .
sentences.chinese: 她有可能留下永久的疤痕。

detailed_translations.english: if a wound or cut scars you, it leaves a permanent mark on your body
a permanent mark that is left on your skin after you have had a cut or wound

sentences.english: His eccentric behaviour lost him his job.
sentences.chinese: 他古怪的行为使他丢了工作。

sentences.english: Aunt Nessy was always a bit eccentric.
sentences.chinese: 内西姑妈总是有点古怪。

detailed_translations.english: behaving in a way that is unusual and different from most people
someone who behaves in a way that is different from what is usual or socially accepted

sentences.english: Mourners gathered to bid farewell to the victims of the plane tragedy.
sentences.chinese: 哀悼者来向空难受害者告别。

sentences.english: a farewell speech
sentences.chinese: 告别演说

detailed_translations.english: the action of saying goodbye

detailed_translations.chinese: 别了！（常含有永别或不容易再见面的意思）；再会！
detailed_translations.english: the action of saying goodbye

sentences.english: The device most often used to do this is a load balancer, which is an appliance that accepts requests from the outside world and hands them off to the next available application server.
sentences.chinese: 进行这一操作最常用的设备是一个负载均衡器，这是一个从外部接收请求并将它们移交给下一个可用应用程序服务器的装置。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment, especially electrical equipment, such as a  cooker  or  washing machine  , used in people’s homes

sentences.english: The committee deferred their decision .
sentences.chinese: 委员会延期作出决定。

detailed_translations.english: to delay something until a later date

sentences.english: Brass is an alloy of copper and zinc.
sentences.chinese: 黄铜是铜和锌的合金。

detailed_translations.english: to mix one metal with another
a metal that consists of two or more metals mixed together

name: mass
trans: 大量， 众多；团， 块；质量

sentences.english: a mass protest
sentences.chinese: 大规模的抗议

sentences.english: weapons of mass destruction
sentences.chinese: 大规模杀伤性武器

sentences.english: the problem of mass unemployment
sentences.chinese: 大批人失业的问题

detailed_translations.english: involving or intended for a very large number of people
to come together, or to make people or things come together, in a large group

detailed_translations.chinese: 众多，大量；团，块，堆；群众；质量
detailed_translations.english: a large crowd

name: lord
trans: 主人； 长官； 君主； 贵族

sentences.english: the feudal lords
sentences.chinese: 封建领主

detailed_translations.english: a man in  medieval  Europe who was very powerful and owned a lot of land
a man in  medieval  Europe who was very powerful and owned a lot of land

name: renaissance
trans: 复兴， 再生； 新生；文艺复兴， 文艺复兴时期

sentences.english: ...the Renaissance masterpieces in London's galleries.
sentences.chinese: …伦敦美术馆里文艺复兴时期的杰作。

detailed_translations.english: a new interest in something, especially a particular form of art, music etc, that has not been popular for a long period

sentences.english: Some mushrooms are extremely poisonous.
sentences.chinese: 一些蘑菇有剧毒。

sentences.english: poisonous gases such as hydrogen sulfide
sentences.chinese: 硫化氢等有毒气体

sentences.english: poisonous substances
sentences.chinese: 有毒物质

sentences.english: She was bitten on the ankle by a poisonous snake .
sentences.chinese: 她被毒蛇咬了脚踝。

detailed_translations.english: containing poison or producing poison

name: beast
trans: 兽， 牲畜 A；凶残的人； 举止粗鲁的人

sentences.english: ...the threats our ancestors faced from wild beasts.
sentences.chinese: …我们祖辈所面临的来自野兽的威胁。

detailed_translations.english: an animal, especially a large or dangerous one

sentences.english: Eight drawings by French artist Jean Cocteau will be auctioned next week.
sentences.chinese: 法国艺术家让·科克托的8幅画作将在下周拍卖。

detailed_translations.english: to sell something at an auction
a public meeting where land, buildings, paintings etc are sold to the person who offers the most money for them

name: gesture
trans: 做手势； 用动作示意
姿势， 姿态； 手势

sentences.english: Jim raised his hands in a despairing gesture.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆举起双手，做出绝望的手势。

sentences.english: The Queen has now made a gesture towards public opinion.
sentences.chinese: 女王现在摆出了尊重民意的姿态。

detailed_translations.english: a movement of part of your body, especially your hands or head, to show what you mean or how you feel

name: propel
trans: 推进， 推动；激励， 驱使

sentences.english: a boat propelled by a small motor
sentences.chinese: 由小马达驱动的小船

sentences.english: One of our students was unable to propel her wheelchair up the ramp.
sentences.chinese: 我们有名学生无法把她的轮椅推上坡道。

detailed_translations.english: to move, drive, or push something forward

name: organic
trans: 器官的；有机的； 有机体的

sentences.english: Organic farming is better for the environment.
sentences.chinese: 有机耕作对环境更有利。

sentences.english: organic gardening
sentences.chinese: 有机园艺

detailed_translations.english: relating to farming or gardening methods of growing food without using artificial chemicals, or produced or grown by these methods

sentences.english: a surgical face mask
sentences.chinese: 外科手术口罩

sentences.english: He was attacked and robbed by two people wearing masks .
sentences.chinese: 他被两个蒙面人袭击并抢劫。

detailed_translations.english: something that covers all or part of your face, to protect or to hide it
if a smell, taste, sound etc is masked by a stronger one, it cannot be noticed because of the stronger one

name: patrol
trans: 巡逻， 巡查；巡逻兵， 巡逻队

sentences.english: The security forces increased their patrols in the area.
sentences.chinese: 安全部队加强了对该地区的巡逻。

detailed_translations.english: when someone goes around different parts of an area at regular times to check that there is no trouble or danger
to go around the different parts of an area or building at regular times to check that there is no trouble or danger

sentences.english: a wealthy patron
sentences.chinese: 富有的赞助人

detailed_translations.english: someone who supports the activities of an organization, for example by giving money

name: apply
trans: 申请， 请求；适用， 应用， 运用

sentences.english: We need to apply for planning permission to build a garage.
sentences.chinese: 我们建车库需要申请规划许可。

detailed_translations.chinese: 应用，实施，使用；适用；申请，请求
detailed_translations.english: to make a formal request, usually written, for something such as a job, a place at a university, or permission to do something
to put or spread something such as paint, liquid, or medicine onto a surface

sentences.english: Keep it simple and avoid the use of jargon.
sentences.chinese: 简单点，避免使用术语。

detailed_translations.english: words and expressions used in a particular profession or by a particular group of people, which are difficult for other people to understand – often used to show disapproval

name: overlook
trans: 漏看， 忽略；俯瞰， 眺望；宽容， 放任

sentences.english: Our room overlooks the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 我们的房间可以俯视大海。

sentences.english: It is easy to overlook a small detail like that.
sentences.chinese: 那样的小细节很容易被忽略。

sentences.english: She found him entertaining enough to overlook his faults.
sentences.chinese: 她觉得他很有趣，足以让她包容他的缺点。

detailed_translations.english: if a house, room etc overlooks something, it has a view of it, usually from above

sentences.english: politicians who are trying to get the minority vote
sentences.chinese: 努力争取少数族群选票的政治家

sentences.english: a British Labour politician
sentences.chinese: 英国工党政治家

detailed_translations.english: someone who works in politics, especially an elected member of the government

name: incredible
trans: 不可相信的； 〈口〉惊人的， 不可思议的

sentences.english: It’s incredible that he survived the fall.
sentences.chinese: 他跌下去竟然能够生还，真不可思议。

sentences.english: It’s incredible how much Tom has changed since he met Sally.
sentences.chinese: 自从遇见萨莉后，汤姆的变化之大简直令人难以置信。

sentences.english: I find it almost incredible that no one noticed these errors.
sentences.chinese: 没人发现这些错误，真让我无法相信。

detailed_translations.english: too strange to be believed, or very difficult to believe

sentences.english: All the flats in the building had the same layout.
sentences.chinese: 大楼里所有的公寓布局都是一样的。

detailed_translations.english: the way in which something such as a town, garden, or building is arranged

sentences.english: We’re still searching for a peace formula.
sentences.chinese: 我们仍在寻找和平方案。

sentences.english: There is no magic formula (= a method that is certain to be successful ) that will transform sorrow into happiness.
sentences.chinese: 没有妙方可以化悲为喜。

sentences.english: With viewing figures up a million, the programme has a winning formula .
sentences.chinese: 收视人数增加了一百万，这个节目的确拥有吸引观众的法宝。

sentences.english: the formula for calculating distance
sentences.chinese: 计算距离的公式

detailed_translations.english: a series of numbers or letters that represent a mathematical or scientific rule

name: revolt
trans: 反抗； 起义； 叛乱

sentences.english: The prime minister is now facing a revolt by members of his own party.
sentences.chinese: 首相现在面临着党内倒戈。

sentences.english: the Polish revolt of 1863
sentences.chinese: 1863年的波兰起义

sentences.english: Some members of the government may revolt against this proposed legislation.3
sentences.chinese: 一些政府成员可能会反对这项拟议中的法规。

sentences.english: The peasants threatened to revolt.
sentences.chinese: 农民威胁说要造反。

detailed_translations.english: a refusal to accept someone’s authority or obey rules or laws
to refuse to accept someone’s authority or obey rules or laws

sentences.english: He reached into the bin with a look of disgust on his face.
sentences.chinese: 他把手伸进垃圾箱，脸上带着厌恶的表情。

sentences.english: He disgusted many with his boorish behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 他以其粗鲁的行为使许多人感到厌恶。

detailed_translations.english: a strong feeling of dislike, annoyance, or disapproval
To disgust someone means to make them feel a strong sense of dislike and disapproval

name: tribute
trans: 贡品， 礼物；颂词， 称赞

sentences.english: The players wore black armbands as a tribute to their late teammate.
sentences.chinese: 球员们戴着黑纱悼念已故的队友。

sentences.english: I’d like to pay tribute to (= praise and admire publicly ) the party workers for all their hard work.
sentences.chinese: 我谨向党内工作人员致敬，感谢他们的辛苦努力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 礼物；[税收] 贡物；颂词；（尤指对死者的）致敬，悼念，吊唁礼物
detailed_translations.english: something that you say, do, or give in order to express your respect or admiration for someone

name: stem
trans: 出自， 来源于， 发生于

sentences.english: ‘Writ ’ is the stem of the forms ‘writes ’, ‘writing ’ and ‘written ’.
sentences.chinese: writ是writes、writing和written三个词的词干。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a word that stays the same when different endings are added to it, for example ‘driv-’ in ‘driving’

name: mob
trans: 成群暴动， 群众袭击；成群围住

sentences.english: They were immediately surrounded by the mob.
sentences.chinese: 他们立刻被那帮暴民包围了。

detailed_translations.english: a large noisy crowd, especially one that is angry and violent
if a group of birds or animals mob another bird or animal, they all attack it

name: subordinate
trans: 次要的， 从属的； 下级的

sentences.english: a subordinate officer
sentences.chinese: 下级官员

detailed_translations.chinese: 下级的，级别低的；次要的，从属的
detailed_translations.english: in a less important position than someone else
someone who has a lower position and less authority than someone else in an organization

detailed_translations.chinese: 使处于次要地位， 使从属于
detailed_translations.english: to put someone or something in a less important position

sentences.english: We had three days of spring sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 我们享受了三天的春日阳光。

detailed_translations.english: the light and heat that come from the sun when there is no cloud

sentences.english: The current trend is towards more part-time employment.
sentences.chinese: 当前的趋势是雇用更多的兼职人员。

sentences.english: the general trend towards the centralization of political power
sentences.chinese: 政治权力集中化的普遍趋势

sentences.english: A disturbing trend is that victims of violence are getting younger.
sentences.chinese: 一个令人担心的趋势是，暴力行为的受害者越来越年轻。

sentences.english: The growing trend is for single mothers to bring up children by themselves.
sentences.chinese: 单身母亲独自抚养孩子的趋势在上升。

sentences.english: Even so, the underlying trend is positive.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，基本趋势仍是乐观的。

sentences.english: national and international economic trends
sentences.chinese: 国内和国际的经济趋势

sentences.english: the downward trend in the price of gold
sentences.chinese: 黄金价格的下滑势头

sentences.english: Successive presidents have tried to reverse this trend , but without success.
sentences.chinese: 连续几任总统都试图扭转这一趋势，但均未成功。

detailed_translations.english: a general tendency in the way a situation is changing or developing

sentences.english: a garage mechanic
sentences.chinese: 汽车修理厂的技工

detailed_translations.english: someone who is skilled at repairing motor vehicles and machinery

sentences.english: a birth control method that is cheap and reliable
sentences.chinese: 既便宜又可靠的避孕方法

sentences.english: Miller was a quiet and reliable man.
sentences.chinese: 米勒是个话不多且可靠的人。

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that is reliable can be trusted or depended on

name: incentive
trans: 刺激； 鼓励； 动机 A

sentences.english: As an added incentive, there’s a bottle of champagne for the best team.
sentences.chinese: 给最优秀的队发一瓶香槟作为额外的鼓励。

detailed_translations.english: something that encourages you to work harder, start a new activity etc

sentences.english: I like your sense of humor.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢你的 幽默感。

sentences.english: His remarks participated of the sense of humor.
sentences.chinese: 他的话里带有几分幽默感。

sentences.english: She loved everything about him -- his personality, his humor, the way he dressed.
sentences.chinese: 她爱他的一切——他的性格，他的幽默，还有他的衣着打扮。

sentences.english: The report seeks to relate the rise in crime to an increase in unemployment.
sentences.chinese: 报告试图把犯罪率上升和失业增加联系起来。

sentences.english: He later related the whole story to me.
sentences.chinese: 他后来给我讲了整件事的来龙去脉。

detailed_translations.english: if you relate two different things, you show how they are connected

sentences.english: We’ll have to take the elevator.
sentences.chinese: 我们只好坐电梯了。

detailed_translations.english: a machine that takes people and goods from one level to another in a building

sentences.english: the preliminary stages of the competition
sentences.chinese: 竞赛的预赛阶段

sentences.english: a preliminary draft
sentences.chinese: 初稿

detailed_translations.english: happening before something that is more important, often in order to prepare for it

detailed_translations.chinese: 初步做法， 起始行为

name: obstacle
trans: 障碍， 妨碍， 干扰 <

sentences.english: The tax puts obstacles in the way of companies trying to develop trade overseas.
sentences.chinese: 这项税收为想在海外发展贸易的公司设置了障碍。

sentences.english: Women still have to overcome many obstacles to gain equality.
sentences.chinese: 妇女要获得平等仍需克服重重障碍。

sentences.english: We want to remove all obstacles to travel between the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 我们想要消除在这两个国家之间旅行的所有障碍。

sentences.english: the single biggest obstacle to a Conservative victory in the next election
sentences.chinese: 保守党在下一届大选中获胜的最大障碍

sentences.english: There are formidable obstacles on the road to peace.
sentences.chinese: 通往和平的道路上存在难以逾越的障碍。

detailed_translations.english: something that makes it difficult to achieve some­thing

name: van
trans: 大篷车， 运货车； 有篷货运车厢

sentences.english: a delivery van
sentences.chinese: 运货车

sentences.english: a van driver
sentences.chinese: 小型货车司机

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle used especially for carrying goods, which is smaller than a truck and has a roof and usually no windows at the sides

sentences.english: a degree in biology
sentences.chinese: 生物学学位

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of living things

sentences.english: The resemblance between Susan and her sister was remarkable.
sentences.chinese: 苏珊和她的姐姐十分相像。

detailed_translations.english: the fact of being or looking similar to sb/sth

name: dizzy
trans: 头晕目眩的， 眩晕的；使人头晕的； 极高的

sentences.english: The heat and the champagne made him feel dizzy .
sentences.chinese: 高温和香槟酒使他感到眩晕。

sentences.english: She started to suffer from dizzy spells (= a short period when you feel dizzy ) .
sentences.chinese: 她开始感到一阵阵的眩晕。

detailed_translations.chinese: 晕眩的；使人头晕的；昏乱的；心不在焉的；愚蠢的
detailed_translations.english: feeling unable to stand steadily, for example because you are looking down from a high place or because you are ill

detailed_translations.chinese: 使头晕眼花；使混乱；使茫然

sentences.english: an exceptional student
sentences.chinese: 出类拔萃的学生

sentences.english: A review panel concluded that there were no exceptional circumstances that would warrant a lesser penalty for him.
sentences.chinese: 一个评估小组作出结论：没有什么例外情况可使他获得从轻惩罚。

detailed_translations.english: unusually good

sentences.english: We must redefine what constitutes a family.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须对家庭的构成重新定义。

detailed_translations.english: to be the parts that together form sth

sentences.english: Although I soon convinced him of my innocence, I think he still has serious doubts about my sanity.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我很快就使他相信我是清白的，但是他还是非常怀疑我精神是否正常。

detailed_translations.english: If someone or something convinces you of something, they make you believe that it is true or that it exists

name: mate
trans: 配偶； 伙伴； 同事

sentences.english: He has found his ideal mate.
sentences.chinese: 他已经找到了理想的配偶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 助手，大副；配偶；同事；配对物
detailed_translations.english: someone you work with, do an activity with, or share something with
if animals mate, they have sex to produce babies

sentences.english: missionary work
sentences.chinese: 传教工作

sentences.english: a missionary hospital
sentences.chinese: 教会医院

detailed_translations.english: relating to the work of missionaries
someone who has been sent to a foreign country to teach people about Christianity and persuade them to become Christians

sentences.english: The court ruled that the contract must be terminated.
sentences.chinese: 法庭裁决该合同必须终止。

sentences.english: to terminate a pregnancy (= to perform or have an abortion )
sentences.chinese: 终止妊娠（堕胎）

detailed_translations.english: ito end; to make sth end

name: theory
trans: 理论； 原理； 学说；见解， 看法

sentences.english: Freudian theory has had a great influence on psychology.
sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德理论对心理学产生过巨大影响。

detailed_translations.english: an idea or set of ideas that is intended to explain something about life or the world, especially an idea that has not yet been proved to be true

name: flock
trans: 群， 群 A <；大量， 众多

sentences.english: People have been flocking to the exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 看展览的人络绎不绝。

detailed_translations.english: to go or gather together somewhere in large numbers

name: extension
trans: 延长； 扩大； 伸展；电话分机

sentences.english: Can I have extension 316, please?
sentences.chinese: 能帮我接316号分机吗？

detailed_translations.english: one of many telephone lines connected to a central system in a large building, which all have different numbers

name: internal
trans: 内部的， 内的 <；国内的， 内政的

sentences.english: We have no interest in interfering in the internal affairs of other countries.
sentences.chinese: 我们对干涉其他国家内政不感兴趣。

sentences.english: the threat to internal security
sentences.chinese: 对国内安全的威胁

sentences.english: internal markets
sentences.chinese: 国内市场

sentences.english: There’s to be an internal inquiry into the whole affair.
sentences.chinese: 对整个事件将进行内部调查。

detailed_translations.english: within a particular country

sentences.english: people of the same gender
sentences.chinese: 同性别的人

sentences.english: Discrimination on grounds of race or gender is forbidden.
sentences.chinese: 严禁种族歧视和性别歧视。

sentences.english: There may be gender differences in attitudes to paid work.
sentences.chinese: 对待有偿劳动的态度可能存在着性别差异。

sentences.english: traditional gender roles
sentences.chinese: 传统的性别角色

sentences.english: toys that do not reinforce gender stereotypes
sentences.chinese: 不强化性别模式化观念的玩具

sentences.english: a science fiction story dealing with gender issues
sentences.chinese: 以性别问题为题材的科幻故事

detailed_translations.english: the fact of being male or female

name: signature
trans: 签名， 署名， 签字

sentences.english: Her signature is totally illegible (= cannot be read ) .
sentences.chinese: 她的签字完全无法辨认。

sentences.english: The school collected 4,000 signatures for the petition.
sentences.chinese: 学校为这份请愿书收集到了四千个签名。

sentences.english: The Ukrainians put their signatures to the Lisbon Protocol.
sentences.chinese: 乌克兰签署了《里斯本协议》。

sentences.english: Someone’s forged my signature (= made an illegal copy of my name to deceive people ) on this letter.
sentences.chinese: 有人在这封信中伪造了我的签名。

sentences.english: Each child must obtain the signature of his or her parents.
sentences.chinese: 每个小孩都必须得到父母的签字。

detailed_translations.english: your name written in the way you usually write it, for example at the end of a letter, or on a cheque etc, to show that you have written it

name: literary
trans: 文学的 <；精通文学的； 从事写作的

sentences.english: a literary prize
sentences.chinese: 文学奖

detailed_translations.english: relating to literature

name: republican
trans: 共和政体的； 共和国的

sentences.english: Lower taxes made Republican voters happier with their party.
sentences.chinese: 更低的税率使共和党选民对该党更加满意。

detailed_translations.chinese: 共和国的；共和政体的；共和主义的；拥护共和政体的
detailed_translations.english: relating to or supporting a system of government that is not led by a king or queen
someone who believes in government by elected representatives only, with no king or queen

sentences.english: But I am an architect.
sentences.chinese: 但是我是一名建筑师。

sentences.english: They commissioned an architect to design the new library.
sentences.chinese: 他们委托一位建筑师设计这座新图书馆。

sentences.english: The building was constructed from the design of that architect.
sentences.chinese: 这幢大楼是按那位建筑师的设计建造的。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to design buildings

sentences.english: the lines on her forehead
sentences.chinese: 她前额上的皱纹

detailed_translations.english: the part of your face above your eyes and below your hair

name: foundation
trans: 基础， 根本；建立， 创立；地基；基金， 基金会 A

sentences.english: It took the builders three weeks to lay the foundations .
sentences.chinese: 建筑工人花了三星期的时间打地基。

sentences.english: The earthquake shook the foundations of the house.
sentences.chinese: 地震动摇了那幢房子的地基。

sentences.english: the British Heart Foundation
sentences.chinese: 英国心脏病基金会

detailed_translations.english: the solid layer of  cement  , bricks, stones etc that is put under a building to support it

sentences.english: His hands gently caressed her body.
sentences.chinese: 他的双手温柔地抚摸着她的身体。

sentences.english: Margaret took me to one side, holding my arm in a gentle caress.
sentences.chinese: 玛格丽特把我拉到一旁，轻轻地抚弄着我的手臂。

detailed_translations.english: to touch someone gently in a way that shows you love them
a gentle touch or kiss that shows you love someone

name: punch
trans: 冲压机， 冲床；穿孔机
拳击； 冲压； 穿孔

sentences.english: The guard punched my ticket and I got on.
sentences.chinese: 守卫在我的票上打孔后，我就上去了。

sentences.english: a hole punch
sentences.chinese: 打孔器

detailed_translations.english: to make a hole in something, using a metal tool or other sharp object
a metal tool for cutting holes or for pushing something into a small hole

sentences.english: a slave to fashion
sentences.chinese: 时尚的奴隶

detailed_translations.english: someone who is owned by another person and works for them for no money
to work very hard with little time to rest

sentences.english: Your building society or bank will help arrange a mortgage.
sentences.chinese: 你加入的购房互助协会或银行将会给你安排抵押贷款。

sentences.english: They’ve taken out a 30 year mortgage (= they will pay for their house over a period of 30 years ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们办理了一笔30年期的抵押贷款。

sentences.english: We decided to use Fred’s redundancy money to pay off the mortgage (= pay back all the money we borrowed for a mortgage ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们决定用弗雷德的遣散费来偿清抵押贷款。

sentences.english: Mortgage rates are set to rise again in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 抵押贷款利率到春季肯定还要上涨。

sentences.english: She was having trouble meeting her mortgage payments .
sentences.chinese: 她还抵押贷款有困难。

detailed_translations.english: a legal arrangement by which you borrow money from a bank or similar organization in order to buy a house, and pay back the money over a period of years

if you mortgage your home, land, or property, you borrow money, usually from a bank, and if you cannot pay back the money within a particular period of time, the bank has the right to sell your property in order to get the money you owe it

name: identity
trans: 身份；个性， 特性；同一； 相同， 一致

sentences.english: The identity of the killer is still unknown.
sentences.chinese: 凶手的身份仍未查明。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s identity is their name or who they are

name: installation
trans: 安装， 设置； 设备；就职， 就任

sentences.english: the installation and maintenance of alarm systems
sentences.chinese: 警报系统的安装和维护

sentences.english: The whole computer installation was nearly new.
sentences.chinese: 整套电脑设备几乎是全新的。

sentences.english: nuclear installations
sentences.chinese: 核设施

detailed_translations.english: when someone fits a piece of equipment somewhere

sentences.english: Switzerland is a federal republic.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士是一个联邦共和国。

detailed_translations.english: a federal country or system of government consists of a group of states which control their own affairs, but which are also controlled by a single national government which makes decisions on foreign affairs, defence etc

sentences.english: I verified the source from which I had that information.
sentences.chinese: 我核实了我获知那条信息的来源。

sentences.english: His statement was verified by several witnesses.
sentences.chinese: 他的说法得到了几位证人的证实。

detailed_translations.english: to discover whether something is correct or true

sentences.english: Her family seems snobbish.
sentences.chinese: 她家里人好像挺势利的。

detailed_translations.english: behaving in a way that shows you think you are better than other people because you are from a higher social class or know more than they do

sentences.english: They've gone on an excursion to York.
sentences.chinese: 他们到约克旅游去了。

detailed_translations.english: a short journey made for pleasure, especially one that has been organized for a group of people

name: inaugurate
trans: 开始， 开展；为…举行就职典礼， 使正式就任；为…举行开幕式， 为…举行落成仪式

sentences.english: He will be inaugurated (as) President in January.
sentences.chinese: 他将于一月份就任总统。

sentences.english: The moon landing inaugurated a new era in space exploration.
sentences.chinese: 登陆月球开创了太空探索的新纪元。

detailed_translations.english: to introduce a new public official or leader at a special ceremony

sentences.english: the American Academy of Arts and Letters
sentences.chinese: 美国艺术和文学学会

detailed_translations.chinese: 学院；研究院；学会；专科院校
detailed_translations.english: an official organization which encourages the development of literature, art, science etc

name: reward
trans: 报酬， 赏金， 奖赏
酬劳， 报答； 奖赏

sentences.english: The school has a system of rewards and punishments to encourage good behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 学校有奖惩制度以鼓励良好行为。

sentences.english: The club’s directors rewarded him with a free season ticket.
sentences.chinese: 俱乐部的董事们奖给他一张免费季票。

detailed_translations.english: something that you get because you have done something good or helpful or have worked hard
to give something to someone because they have done something good or helpful or have worked fo

name: graze
trans: 放牧；擦伤； 擦过， 掠过

sentences.english: fields where they used to graze their sheep
sentences.chinese: 他们过去放羊的田野

detailed_translations.english: if an animal grazes, or if you graze it, it eats grass that is growing

detailed_translations.english: next to the side of something

trans: 退； 退潮， 落潮；衰退

sentences.chinese: 他的信心很低落。

trans: 核， 原子核 A；核心

sentences.chinese: 在一个原子的核内，中子和质子聚合在一起。

sentences.chinese: 她感觉泪水刺痛了眼睛。

name: haste
trans: 匆忙， 急速； 草率

sentences.chinese: 拼写错误经常是由于匆忙而造成的。

sentences.chinese: 我的同事打着手势，匆忙地解释着他使用假护照的意图。

sentences.english: the destructive power of modern weapons
sentences.chinese: 现代武器的破坏力

detailed_translations.english: causing damage to people or things

name: nurture
trans: 抚育， 教养； 给…营养物

sentences.chinese: 在温室里培育的植物

name: degenerate
trans: 衰退， 堕落， 蜕化

sentences.chinese: 不活动会使关节僵硬，骨骼因此可能会开始退化。

morally unacceptable

sentences.english: a dress with long sleeves
sentences.chinese: 长袖连衣裙

detailed_translations.english: the part of a piece of clothing that covers all or part of your arm

name: hasty
trans: 匆忙的， 仓促的； 草率的

sentences.chinese: 他很快就对自己仓促作出的决定感到后悔了。

sentences.english: a hasty breakfast
sentences.chinese: 匆忙吃下的一顿早餐

detailed_translations.chinese: 轻率的；匆忙的；草率的；懈怠的
detailed_translations.english: done in a hurry, especially with bad results

name: stir
trans: 搅拌， 搅动；煽动， 鼓动；动， 摇动

sentences.chinese: 谁也别想侮辱了我的家人之后就这么算了！

sentences.english: The shipment was escorted by guards.
sentences.chinese: 货物的运输由卫兵护送。

sentences.english: a police escort

a person or a group of people or vehicles that go with someone in order to protect or guard them

sentences.chinese: 我们屠杀动物的方式令许多人震惊。

sentences.chinese: 处死那两名男子的判决令许多从政者震惊。

name: craft

sentences.chinese: 传统的乡村手工艺

sentences.english: arts and crafts
sentences.chinese: 手工艺

name: existence
trans: 存在， 实在；生存， 生活

sentences.english: Scientists have many theories about how the universe first came into existence (= started to exist ).
sentences.chinese: 关于宇宙的起源，科学家有多种理论。

sentences.chinese: 巴勃罗刚搬到圣胡安时，生活很悲惨。

detailed_translations.english: the state of existing

sentences.chinese: 她打开门，跨过门槛。

detailed_translations.english: the entrance to a room or building, or the area of floor or ground at the entrance

trans: 轴；坐标轴， 构图中心线

sentences.chinese: 地球绕着南北两极之间的地轴自转。

name: portfolio
trans: 公文包；文件夹； 作品集；投资组合

name: desolate

a place that is desolate is empty and looks sad because there are no people there
someone who is desolate feels very sad and lonely

name: coarse
trans: 粗糙的， 粗劣的；粗鲁的， 粗俗的

sentences.chinese: 粗羊毛夹克衫

name: evade
trans: 逃避， 躲避， 躲开；回避

sentences.chinese: 你不能这样继续逃避责任。

detailed_translations.english: to not do or deal with something that you should do

sentences.chinese: 我三天没睡觉了——一点不夸张。

detailed_translations.english: to make something seem better, larger, worse etc than it really is

sentences.chinese: 简化生产过程的努力

trans: 意指， 含…意思； 暗示； 表明

sentences.chinese: 他可以用旅费抵税。

sentences.chinese: 政府军已经成功抓获叛乱分子的头目。

sentences.chinese: 什么东西吓着他了，很可能是你这张丑八怪的脸！

sentences.chinese: 新大楼即将破土动工。

sentences.chinese: 你给家庭财产投保了吗？

sentences.chinese: 确保骑车人安全的设施

sentences.chinese: 镇上的这个地段盗车案屡见不鲜。

name: platform
trans: 台， 平台 A；站台， 月台；政纲， 党纲

sentences.english: The Edinburgh train will depart from platform six.
sentences.chinese: 开往爱丁堡的火车将从六号站台发车。

sentences.english: a small raised platform at one end of the room
sentences.chinese: 房间一端凸起的小讲台

sentences.chinese: 石油勘探平台

sentences.english: ...some of the parameters that determine the taste of a wine.
sentences.chinese: …一些决定葡萄酒味道的参数。

sentences.english: Dinosaurs have been extinct for millions of years.
sentences.chinese: 恐龙已灭绝数千万年了。

sentences.english: Pandas could become extinct in the wild.
sentences.chinese: 熊猫在野生环境中可能会绝种。

sentences.english: an extinct species
sentences.chinese: 已灭绝的一个物种

name: opaque
trans: 不透明的；难理解的， 晦涩的

sentences.chinese: 装有不透明玻璃门的淋浴间

detailed_translations.english: opaque glass or liquid is difficult to see through and often thick

sentences.chinese: 马修的生命危在旦夕。

sentences.english: The report expressed grave concern over the technicians’ lack of training.
sentences.chinese: 报告中对技术人员缺乏培训深表忧虑。

sentences.chinese: 我十分怀疑他的能力。

sentences.english: The situation is becoming very grave.
sentences.chinese: 形势变得非常严峻。

to cut, carve, sculpt, or engrave

name: advantage
trans: 优点， 长处； 有利条件 <；利益， 好处

sentences.chinese: 年轻点的工人申请工作时往往处于优势地位。

sentences.chinese: 住在纽约的诸多好处之一是几乎任何时候都可以外出吃饭。

detailed_translations.english: something that helps you to be more successful than others, or the state of having this

sentences.english: Tokyo is extremely humid in mid-summer.
sentences.chinese: 仲夏的东京十分潮湿。

detailed_translations.english: if the weather is humid, you feel uncomfortable because the air is very wet and usually hot

sentences.english: a political controversy
sentences.chinese: 政治争议

sentences.english: the controversy surrounding Skinner’s theories
sentences.chinese: 围绕斯金纳的理论的争议

sentences.chinese: 对庄稼施用化学品的做法引起了争论。

detailed_translations.english: a serious argument about something that involves many people and continues for a long time

name: command
trans: 命令； 指挥， 统率
命令， 指令；统帅； 指挥；掌握， 运用能力

sentences.english: He commanded his men to retreat.
sentences.chinese: 他命令手下撤退。

sentences.english: He commands the 4th Battalion.
sentences.chinese: 他指挥第四营。

sentences.english: the power and finances commanded by the police
sentences.chinese: 警方掌握的权力和资金

detailed_translations.english: (of sb in a position of authority) to tell sb to do sth

name: compulsory
trans: 强制的； 义务的； 必修的 <

sentences.english: the threat of compulsory redundancies
sentences.chinese: 强制性裁员的威胁

sentences.english: Car insurance is compulsory.
sentences.chinese: 汽车保险是强制性的。

detailed_translations.english: that must be done because of a law or a rule

sentences.english: She had homemade ice cream for dessert.
sentences.chinese: 她吃了些自制冰淇淋当餐后甜点。

detailed_translations.english: sweet food served after the main part of a meal

sentences.english: Within minutes the area was swarming with officers who began searching a nearby wood.
sentences.chinese: 几分钟之内这个地方挤满了警官，他们开始搜查附近的一片树林。

name: anticipate
trans: 预期， 期望； 预料

sentences.chinese: 销量比预期要好。

sentences.english: A good speaker is able to anticipate an audience’s needs and concerns.
sentences.chinese: 好的演讲者能够预先考虑到听众需要什么、关注什么。

sentences.chinese: 丹尼尔热切地期待着她的到来。

detailed_translations.english: to expect that something will happen and be ready for it

name: variable
trans: 易变的， 多变的 <；可变的， 变量的

sentences.english: Expect variable cloudiness and fog tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 预计明天多云有雾，天气多变。

sentences.english: Interest rates can be highly variable.
sentences.chinese: 利率有时会大幅波动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 变量的；可变的；易变的，多变的；变异的，[生物] 畸变的
detailed_translations.english: likely to change often

detailed_translations.chinese: [数] 变量；可变物，可变因素
detailed_translations.english: something that may be different in different situations, so that you cannot be sure what will happen

name: temple
trans: 庙宇， 神殿， 寺；太阳穴

sentences.english: They lighted the temple with many candles.
sentences.chinese: 他们用许多蜡烛照亮这个寺庙。

sentences.english: The entire valley reverberated with the sound of the temple bells.
sentences.chinese: 整个山谷回荡着庙宇的钟声。

sentences.english: After the fire, nothing remained of the magnificent buildings of the temple.
sentences.chinese: 大火过后， 寺院里的那些雄伟建筑已荡然无存。

detailed_translations.english: a building where people go to  worship  , in the Jewish, Hindu, Buddhist, Sikh, and Mormon religions

sentences.english: Please detach and fill out the application form.
sentences.chinese: 请撕下申请表并填好。

detailed_translations.english: to remove sth from sth larger; to become separated from sth

name: fabricate
trans: 捏造， 编造；建造， 制造

sentences.english: The police were accused of fabricating evidence.
sentences.chinese: 警方被控捏造证据。

sentences.english: The discs are expensive to fabricate.
sentences.chinese: 这些磁盘的生产成本很高。

detailed_translations.english: to invent a story, piece of information etc in order to deceive someone

sentences.english: It’s been cold, but today’s an exception.
sentences.chinese: 天气一直寒冷，但今天是个例外。

sentences.english: The law applies to all EU countries; Britain is no exception.
sentences.chinese: 这项法律适用于所有欧盟国家，英国也不例外。

sentences.english: We don’t usually accept checks, but for you we’ll make an exception (= not include you in this rule ).
sentences.chinese: 我们一般不接受支票，但对你我们就破个例。

sentences.english: The spelling of this word is an interesting exception to the rule.
sentences.chinese: 这个单词的拼法是该规则一个有趣的例外。

sentences.english: Successful two-career couples are still the exception, not the rule (= used to emphasize that something is unusual ).
sentences.chinese: 夫妇俩都事业有成的仍不常见。

sentences.chinese: 她丈夫向来胃口极大。

sentences.chinese: 政府的长期经济策略

trans: 剩余物； 其余的人；余数， 余项

sentences.chinese: 香港是中国的领土。

sentences.chinese: 一名笨手笨脚的服务员把葡萄酒洒得她新裙子上到处都是。

sentences.chinese: 一种可能的原因是这种爆炸很像有超级能量的太阳耀斑。

sentences.chinese: 事实上，上个月，我们在看最近一次，也就是几百年前的耀斑发生的有关证据。

sentences.chinese: 它们半透明的闪光象征着优雅与悲剧，天真与绝望，悲伤与奢华。

trans: 维修； 保养；维持， 保持 <；坚持， 主张， 支持

sentences.chinese: 年轻人离开学校以后，职业指导员和他们保持联系。

sentences.chinese: 英国想保持其世界强国的地位。

sentences.chinese: 和顾客建立并保持良好关系很重要，很多事情要取决于此。

sentences.chinese: 我们如何保持对开支的控制？

sentences.chinese: 批评者坚称这些改革会导致教育标准下降。

trans: 替换； 转移； 移动

sentences.english: They need to shift from farming to industry, and they need to do so desperately.
sentences.chinese: 他们需要从农业领域转移到工业领域。 他们需要拼命地那么做。

sentences.english: the shift from one type of economic system to another
sentences.chinese: 从一种经济体系向另一种经济体系的转变

sentences.chinese: 她的尖叫声过后是响亮的回声。

sentences.chinese: 她不是会计，不具有核查所有这些财政细目的专业知识。

name: bargain
trans: 廉价货；交易； 契约， 合同

sentences.chinese: 我履行了我的承诺，希望你也履行你的承诺。

sentences.chinese: 和商贩讨价还价的女人

detailed_translations.english: an agreement, made between two people or groups to do something in return for something else
to discuss the conditions of a sale, agreement etc, for example to try and get a lower price

name: professional
trans: 职业的； 专业的， 专门的 <

sentences.english: What professional qualifications does he have?
sentences.chinese: 他有哪些专业资格？

sentences.english: You may need to seek professional help.
sentences.chinese: 你可能需要寻求专业帮助。

sentences.english: the terms that doctors and other health professionals use
sentences.chinese: 医师和其他保健专业人员使用的术语

detailed_translations.english: relating to a job that needs special education and training
someone who works in a job that needs special education and training, such as a doctor, lawyer, or architect

name: despatch
trans: 派遣， 调遣； 发送
急件， 快信；新闻报道

sentences.english: a pearl necklace
sentences.chinese: 珍珠项链

sentences.english: {"GLOSS":["a necklace made of pearls"],"COLLOINEXA":["a string of pearls"]}
sentences.chinese: 一串珍珠

sentences.english: ...tiny pearl buttons.
sentences.chinese: …珍珠般的小扣子

detailed_translations.chinese: 珍珠；珍珠色；杰出者；珍品
detailed_translations.english: a small round white object that forms inside an  oyster  , and is a valuable jewel
Pearl is used to describe something that looks like a pearl
to set with or as if with pearls

name: remain
trans: 剩下， 余留；仍然是， 依旧是； 保持不变

sentences.english: The refugees were allowed to remain in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 难民获准留在英国。

sentences.english: They were cleaning up the remains of their picnic.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在打扫野餐的残余物。

detailed_translations.english: to stay in the same place without moving away

detailed_translations.chinese: 残余； 残骸； 遗迹
detailed_translations.english: Theremainsof something are the parts of it that are left after most of it has been taken away or destroyed

name: amaze
trans: 使惊奇， 使惊愕， 使惊叹

sentences.english: Dave amazed his friends by suddenly getting married.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫突然结婚，令朋友们非常吃惊。

detailed_translations.english: to surprise someone very much

name: toss
trans: 摇摆， 颠簸；向上扔；辗转反侧

sentences.english: I’ve been tossing and turning all night.
sentences.chinese: 我一晚上辗转反侧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 掷钱币来决定；翻来覆去
detailed_translations.english: to keep changing your position in bed because you cannot sleep

detailed_translations.chinese: 扔，抛，掷；猛抬；拌；掷；使摇动，使颠簸
detailed_translations.english: to throw something, especially something light, with a quick gentle movement of your hand

detailed_translations.chinese: 掷钱币来决定； 猛抬头
detailed_translations.english: the act of throwing a coin in the air to decide something, especially who will do something first in a game

name: mystery
trans: 神秘； 神秘的事物 A；神秘小说， 侦探小说

sentences.english: Twenty years after the event, his death remains a mystery .
sentences.chinese: 事情过去二十年了，他的死仍然是个谜。

sentences.english: The way her mind worked was always a mystery to him.
sentences.chinese: 她脑子里在想些什么对他来说始终是个谜。

sentences.english: ‘Why did he do it?’ ‘I don’t know. It’s a complete mystery .’
sentences.chinese: “他为什么这么做？” “我不知道，这完全是个谜。”

sentences.english: The police never solved the mystery of Gray’s disappearance.
sentences.chinese: 警察一直没有侦破格雷失踪的谜案。

sentences.english: But why would anyone want to kill Jack? The mystery deepened .
sentences.chinese: 但为什么会有人想杀死杰克呢？疑团越来越深了。

sentences.english: What happened to the paintings after that is an unsolved mystery .
sentences.chinese: 后来那些画的命运如何是个不解之谜。

sentences.english: I don’t know how he got the job – it’s one of life’s little mysteries .
sentences.chinese: 我不知道他是怎么得到那份工作的——那永远是个小小的谜。

sentences.english: How life began on Earth is one of the great mysteries of science.
sentences.chinese: 地球生命的起源是一大科学谜团。

detailed_translations.english: an event, situation etc that people do not understand or cannot explain because they do not know enough about it

name: deposit
trans: 沉淀； 付；存放； 储蓄
存款； 保证金；沉积物

sentences.english: You are advised to deposit your valuables in the hotel safe.
sentences.chinese: 建议您把贵重物品存到酒店保险箱里。

sentences.english: As the river slows down, it deposits a layer of soil.
sentences.chinese: 河水流速变慢时，一层泥土便沉积下来。

sentences.english: I’d like to make a deposit (= pay some money ) into my savings account.
sentences.chinese: 我想存一笔钱到我的储蓄账户里。

detailed_translations.english: to put money or something valuable in a bank or other place where it will be safe
an amount of money that is paid into a bank account

name: dissipate
trans: 驱散；浪费； 挥霍 A

sentences.chinese: 他想明白后，怒气就渐渐消了。

sentences.english: Little by little, the smoke was dissipated by the breeze.
sentences.chinese: 在微风的吹拂下烟雾渐渐地消散了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使消散， 使消失， 驱散； 浪费， 挥霍
detailed_translations.english: to gradually become less or weaker before disappearing completely, or to make something do this

sentences.english: the smell of rotten eggs
sentences.chinese: 坏鸡蛋的气味

sentences.english: Some of the wood was completely rotten.
sentences.chinese: 有些木头完全腐烂了。

sentences.english: The apples went rotten very quickly.
sentences.chinese: 苹果很快就腐烂了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 腐烂的；堕落的；恶臭的；虚弱的；极坏的
detailed_translations.english: badly decayed and no longer good to use

sentences.english: Two flashes mean danger.
sentences.chinese: 两次闪光表示危险。

sentences.english: Lightning flashed overhead.
sentences.chinese: 头顶上电光闪闪。

to shine suddenly and brightly for a short time, or to make something shine in this way

sentences.chinese: 他以灵巧的动作使小渔船调过头来。

sentences.english: I like making things by hand because my mother is very skillful, and I liked staying with her when I was young.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢亲手作一些东西，这是因为我母亲的手非常巧，而且我小的时候喜欢同她在一起。

sentences.english: They understand that development is a difficult social activity that can be conquered not by a silver bullet, but rather by dedicated, skillful practitioners who know and leverage proven techniques.
sentences.chinese: 开发是一项有难度的社会活动，不仅不能够通过银弹来征服，而是由理解并实施可靠技术的那些专注且熟练的人们来解决。

name: disturbance
trans: 动乱， 骚乱； 干扰 A <

sentences.english: There were disturbances in the crowd as fans left the stadium.
sentences.chinese: 球迷离开体育场时，人群中发生了骚乱。

sentences.english: When a helicopter lands, it can cause a disturbance to local residents.
sentences.chinese: 直升机降落会惊扰当地居民。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which people behave violently in public

name: simultaneous
trans: 同时的， 同时存在的 A

sentences.english: They grabbed each other’s hands in simultaneous panic.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩同时惊慌起来，相互抓住对方的手。

sentences.chinese: 最多可有20名用户同时登该系统。

sentences.english: The speeches will be broadcast live, with simultaneous translation (= immediate translation, as the person is speaking ) into English.
sentences.chinese: 这些演讲将作现场直播，并配有英语同声传译。

detailed_translations.english: things that are simultaneous happen at exactly the same time

sentences.english: The bank will only lend me money if my parents guarantee the loan.
sentences.chinese: 只有我父母作担保，银行才会给我贷款。

sentences.english: I’m afraid there’s no guarantee of success.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕不能保证一定会成功。

a formal promise that something will be done

name: recommend
trans: 推荐， 介绍；劝告， 建议

sentences.english: I recommend the butter chicken - it’s delicious.
sentences.chinese: 我推荐黄油焗鸡，非常好吃。

sentences.english: Can you recommend a good lawyer?
sentences.chinese: 你能介绍一位好律师吗？

detailed_translations.english: to say that something or someone is good, or suggest them for a particular purpose or job

sentences.english: Mortgage defaults have risen in the last year.
sentences.chinese: 按揭借款违约在近一年里呈上升趋势。

sentences.english: to default on a loan/debt
sentences.chinese: 拖欠借款 / 债务

sentences.chinese: 你可以乘坐直升机去那个岛。

sentences.chinese: 那架直升机就在我们头顶的上方。

sentences.english: They were succoured from the fire by the rescue helicopter.
sentences.chinese: 他们被援救的直升机从大火中解救了出来。

detailed_translations.english: a type of aircraft with large metal blades on top which turn around very quickly to make it fly

sentences.chinese: 热带的太阳整日灼晒着我们。

sentences.chinese: 离百老汇不远有一家餐馆，在那里用餐几乎像是置身于户外一排热带遮护植物中一样。

sentences.chinese: …安赫尔瀑布，世界上最高的瀑布。

sentences.chinese: 啤酒是一种最古老的饮料。

sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，您想为用户提供一种方法，让他们说出自己想要的饮料。

trans: 属性， 品质， 特征
把…归于； 认为…是…所为 A

sentences.chinese: 女性往往把她们的成功归因于外因，如运气。

sentences.english: a clock mechanism
sentences.chinese: 钟表机件

detailed_translations.english: part of a machine or a set of parts that does a particular job

sentences.chinese: 她父亲安葬在一处公墓。

sentences.chinese: 尸体下葬在那个公墓。

sentences.english: He rests in a cemetery in the western suburbs of Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 他长眠于北京西郊的一个公墓中。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of land, usually not belonging to a church, in which dead people are buried

sentences.chinese: 遗传性缺陷

sentences.english: each person’s genetic make-up
sentences.chinese: 每个人的遗传特征

sentences.chinese: 基因研究

sentences.chinese: 凯利在一生中遭遇了种种艰巨任务与挑战，但成功了。

sentences.english: People watched in horror as the plane crashed to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 人们惊恐地看着飞机坠落到地面上。

sentences.chinese: 想到被孤零零地留下，她就不寒而栗。

sentences.chinese: 颠茄和雄黄都是致命的毒物。

sentences.english: a box of rat poison
sentences.chinese: 一盒鼠药

sentences.chinese: 他在茶里下毒杀死了几个人。

sentences.chinese: 然后他们将一立方厘米的水的重量定为一克。

sentences.chinese: 这种分析模块可以在每分钟内处理一克流体的样本。

sentences.chinese: 平面能源正在研发三种不同的电池化学配方。 其中之一是把锂锰氧化物与其他离子化合，充电电压三到五伏，容量200毫安时每克。

detailed_translations.english: the basic unit for measuring weight in the  metric system

name: arouse
trans: 唤醒， 唤起；激起， 引起

sentences.chinese: 马特的行为渐渐引起了邻居的兴趣。

sentences.english: Anne had to be aroused from a deep sleep.
sentences.chinese: 不得不把安妮从沉睡中唤醒。

detailed_translations.english: to make you become interested, expect something etc; to wake someone

name: riot
trans: 暴乱， 骚乱；极度丰富

sentences.english: urban riots
sentences.chinese: 城市骚乱

sentences.english: prison riots
sentences.chinese: 监狱暴乱

sentences.english: His murder triggered vicious race riots (= caused by a problem between different races ) .
sentences.chinese: 他的被杀引发了严重的种族骚乱。

sentences.english: police wearing riot gear
sentences.chinese: 配有防暴装备的警察

sentences.english: police in bullet-proof vests and carrying riot shields
sentences.chinese: 穿防弹背心、持防暴盾牌的警察

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which a large crowd of people are behaving in a violent and uncontrolled way, especially when they are protesting about something
if a crowd of people riot, they behave in a violent and uncontrolled way, for example by fighting the police and damaging cars or buildings

sentences.chinese: 最适宜生长的条件

sentences.english: This design makes the optimum use of the available space.
sentences.chinese: 这一设计最大限度地利用了现有的空间。

detailed_translations.english: the best or most suitable for a particular purpose or in a particular situation

sentences.english: a bird’s nest
sentences.chinese: 鸟窝

sentences.chinese: 雌鸟在5月份筑巢产蛋。

sentences.english: Young eagles leave the nest after only two months.
sentences.chinese: 雏鹰仅仅两个月以后就会飞离鸟巢。

sentences.chinese: 欧盟财政部长会议未能就一体化的进度达成共识。

sentences.english: the current consensus of opinion
sentences.chinese: 目前观点上的一致

sentences.chinese: 大家都认为科技是好东西。

sentences.english: the consensus politics of the fifties
sentences.chinese: 50年代的共识政治

detailed_translations.english: an opinion that everyone in a group agrees with or accepts

name: classic

sentences.chinese: 可口可乐瓶是上个世纪的经典设计之一。

detailed_translations.chinese: 最优秀的，典型的，标准的；传统式样的，典雅的
detailed_translations.english: having all the features that are typical or expected of a particular thing or situation

detailed_translations.chinese: 文学名著， 经典作品， 杰作； 优秀的典范； 古典文学， 古典语文研究
detailed_translations.english: a book, play, or film that is important and has been admired for a long time

sentences.english: a metric tonne
sentences.chinese: 一公吨

sentences.english: The parts all come in metric sizes now.
sentences.chinese: 现在配件都采用公制规格。

detailed_translations.english: using or connected with the  metric system  of weights and measures

sentences.english: I have absolute confidence in her.
sentences.chinese: 我对她充满信心。

sentences.english: Some of the stuff on TV is absolute rubbish.
sentences.chinese: 电视上播放的有些东西简直就是垃圾。

sentences.english: How did you do that? You’re an absolute genius.
sentences.chinese: 你是怎么做的？ 你绝对是个天才。

sentences.english: That meal last night cost an absolute fortune.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚那顿饭花了一大笔钱。

detailed_translations.english: complete or total

name: gossip
trans: 传播流言蜚语； 说长道短
流言蜚语；说长道短的人

sentences.english: Who knows how much of the gossip was true.
sentences.chinese: 有谁知道这些流言蜚语有多少是真的呢？

sentences.english: You must avoid gossip and focus on what you have to do.
sentences.chinese: 务必避免流言蜚语，关注你必须做的事务。

detailed_translations.chinese: 流言蜚语；爱说长道短的人
detailed_translations.english: information that is passed from one person to another about other people’s behaviour and private lives, often including unkind or untrue remarks

sentences.english: The police asked her to describe the man.
sentences.chinese: 警察叫她描述一下那名男子。

sentences.english: Another approach to the problem is described in Chapter 3.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题的另一种解决方法在第三章有所阐述。

detailed_translations.chinese: 形容， 描写； 画出
detailed_translations.english: to say what something or someone is like by giving details about them

sentences.english: I grabbed my bag and ran off.
sentences.chinese: 我抓起我的包就跑。

sentences.english: Two men grabbed her and pushed her to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 两名男子抓住她，把她推倒在地上。

sentences.english: Kay grabbed hold of my arm to stop herself falling.
sentences.chinese: 凯抓住我的手臂，以免自己摔倒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 抓取，攫取；赶紧做；抓住；抓，夺
detailed_translations.english: to take hold of someone or something with a sudden or violent movement
to suddenly try to take hold of something

sentences.english: They waited in silence and sucked their sweets.
sentences.chinese: 他们静静地等着，吮着糖果。

detailed_translations.english: to take air, liquid etc into your mouth by making your lips form a small hole and using the muscles of your mouth to pull it in
an act of sucking

trans: 贫民窟， 贫民区； 陋巷

sentences.chinese: 贫民窟一定是在你内心.

sentences.english: But, she added, even after she had a classroom, she had no idea what might come of her effort to teach kids from the slum.
sentences.chinese: 但她补充说，即使她有了教室后，她并不知道她对贫民窟的孩子施教会得出什么样的结果。

detailed_translations.english: a house or an area of a city that is in very bad condition, where very poor people live

sentences.english: the wealthy nations of the world
sentences.chinese: 世界上的富国

detailed_translations.english: having a lot of money, possessions etc

name: presently
trans: 一会儿， 不久；现在， 目前

sentences.english: The doctor will be here presently.
sentences.chinese: 医生一会儿就到。

sentences.english: Presently, I fell asleep.
sentences.chinese: 一会儿我就睡着了。

sentences.english: The range of courses presently available has grown.
sentences.chinese: 目前可选择的课程范围已经扩大了。

detailed_translations.english: in a short time

sentences.english: a foam mattress
sentences.chinese: 海绵橡胶床垫

detailed_translations.english: a type of soft rubber with a lot of air in it, used in furniture

detailed_translations.chinese: 起泡沫；吐白沫；起着泡沫流动
detailed_translations.english: to produce foam

sentences.english: a jazz band
sentences.chinese: 爵士乐队

sentences.english: a jazz club
sentences.chinese: 爵士乐俱乐部

sentences.english: modern jazz
sentences.chinese: 现代爵士乐

detailed_translations.english: a type of music that has a strong beat and parts for performers to play alone

detailed_translations.chinese: 奏爵士乐，跳爵士舞；游荡

name: administration
trans: 管理， 经营；行政； 政府

sentences.english: We’re looking for someone with experience in administration.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在寻找一个有管理经验的人。

sentences.english: The health service spends too much on administration.
sentences.chinese: 医疗服务部门在行政方面花费太多。

detailed_translations.english: the activities that are involved in managing the work of a company or organization

sentences.english: They dwelt in the forest.
sentences.chinese: 他们住在森林里。

sentences.english: So you made a mistake, but there's no need to dwell on it.
sentences.chinese: 你是错了，不过不必老是想着这事儿。

name: incorporate
trans: 合并， 纳入； 结合

sentences.english: It allows you to harness existing technologies and incorporate them into one application.
sentences.chinese: 它允许您利用现有的技术并将它们合并到同一个应用程序中。

sentences.english: The next step is to generate the report and then incorporate it as an affiliated document of the master document.
sentences.chinese: 紧接着的步骤就是产生这个报告，然后将它作为主文档的附属文档与主文档合并。

sentences.english: The city boasts two excellent museums.
sentences.chinese: 这个城市以拥有两个优秀的博物馆而自豪。

sentences.english: The Society boasts 3,000 members worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 这个协会以拥有3,000名来自世界各地的会员而自豪。

sentences.english: It is the charity's proud boast that it has never yet turned anyone away.
sentences.chinese: 该慈善机构自吹自擂，声称从来没有拒绝过任何人。

detailed_translations.english: if a place, object, or organization boasts something, it has something that is very good

detailed_translations.chinese: 自夸，吹嘘；以拥有…而自豪

detailed_translations.chinese: 自吹自擂， 自夸的话
detailed_translations.english: Boast is also a noun

sentences.english: Hello, operator? Could you put me through to Room 31?
sentences.chinese: 喂，接线员吗？请帮我接31号房间。

sentences.english: computers which can be used by untrained operators
sentences.chinese: 未经训练的操作者也可使用的电脑

detailed_translations.english: someone who works on a telephone switchboard, who you can call for help

sentences.english: There was a note under the door from my landlady.
sentences.chinese: 门下有我女房东的一张便条。

detailed_translations.english: a woman who rents a room, building, or piece of land to someone

sentences.english: His daughter, Louise, is by now a college sophomore.
sentences.chinese: 他的女儿，路易斯，现在是大学二年级学生。

sentences.english: I'd been in television since I was 19 and a sophomore.
sentences.chinese: 我在19岁还是大学二年级的时候就已经上了电视。

sentences.english: It was June 2001, and just the thought of causing any more pain to 20-year-old Michael, a college sophomore diagnosed a few months earlier with a rare form of leukemia, made her anxious.
sentences.chinese: 那是在2001年六月，20岁的迈克尔是一所大学二年级的学生，几个月前他被查出患了一种罕见的白血病。 一想到又要给儿子增加痛苦她就感到不安。

detailed_translations.chinese: 大学二年级生；（美）有二年经验的人
detailed_translations.english: a student who is in their second year of study at a college or  high school

detailed_translations.chinese: 二年级的；二年级学生的

sentences.english: As soon as he heard what was afoot, he telephoned his German and Italian counterparts to protest.
sentences.chinese: 他一听到在进行中的事，马上就给德国和意大利相应人员打电话抗议。

detailed_translations.english: Someone's or something's counterpart is another person or thing that has a similar function or position in a different place

sentences.english: Decorate with orange segments.
sentences.chinese: 用几瓣橙子作点缀。

detailed_translations.english: a part of something that is different from or affected differently from the whole in some way

sentences.english: a shirt with black and white stripes
sentences.chinese: 黑白条纹衬衫

sentences.chinese: 政治的钟摆已经摆向了自由派。

detailed_translations.english: a long metal stick with a weight at the bottom that swings regularly from side to side to control the working of a clock

name: sovereign
trans: 拥有最高统治权的， 至高无上的；独立自主的， 具有独立主权的  <

sentences.english: In March 1889, she became the first British sovereign to set foot on Spanish soil.
sentences.chinese: 1889年3月，她成为首位踏上西班牙国土的英国君主。

sentences.english: a sovereign ruler
sentences.chinese: 最高统治者

detailed_translations.english: a king or queen
having the highest power in a country

sentences.english: The King was clothed in a purple gown.
sentences.chinese: 国王身穿紫袍。

detailed_translations.english: to put clothes on your body

name: imagine
trans: 想象； 设想， 料想

sentences.chinese: 设想你刚刚赢得一百万英镑。

sentences.english: He didn’t quite dare to imagine himself as a real artist.
sentences.chinese: 他不太敢把自己想象成一个真正的艺术家。

detailed_translations.english: to form a picture or idea in your mind about what something could be like

sentences.english: We cater to an exclusive clientele.
sentences.chinese: 我们满足一个特殊客户群的需求。

detailed_translations.chinese: 投合，迎合；满足需要；提供饮食及服务
detailed_translations.english: to provide and serve food and drinks at a party, meeting etc, usually as a business

name: attractive
trans: 有吸引力的； 引起兴趣的； 动人的

sentences.english: an attractive young woman
sentences.chinese: 妩媚动人的年轻女子

sentences.english: Women seem to find him attractive .
sentences.chinese: 女性似乎觉得他很有吸引力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有吸引力的， 引起注意的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is attractive is good looking, especially in a way that makes you sexually interested in them

sentences.english: The food was superb.
sentences.chinese: 食物好吃极了。

sentences.english: superb weather
sentences.chinese: 极好的天气

detailed_translations.english: extremely good

name: duplicate
trans: 复制的； 二重的； 二倍的
复写； 复制； 使加倍 <

sentences.english: A duplicate copy should be made for the county record office.
sentences.chinese: 应该制作一个副本呈交县档案室。

sentences.english: a duplicate key
sentences.chinese: 配制的钥匙

detailed_translations.chinese: 完全一样的， 复制的
detailed_translations.english: exactly the same as something, or made as an exact copy of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 完全一样的东西，复制品
detailed_translations.english: an exact copy of something that you can use in the same way

detailed_translations.chinese: 复制， 复印； 重复
detailed_translations.english: to copy something exactly

sentences.english: The bridge is a triumph of modern engineering.
sentences.chinese: 这座桥是现代工程的一大成就。

sentences.english: a degree in engineering
sentences.chinese: 工程学学位

detailed_translations.english: the activity of applying scientific knowledge to the design, building and control of machines, roads, bridges, electrical equipment, etc.

sentences.english: The number of people who have the disease has decreased significantly in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，这种病的患者人数明显下降。

sentences.english: They want to decrease their reliance on oil.
sentences.chinese: 他们想减少对石油的依赖。

sentences.english: There has been a steady decrease of temperature.
sentences.chinese: 气温在持续下降。

detailed_translations.english: to become less or go down to a lower level, or to make something do this

name: ignorance
trans: 无知， 愚昧； 不知道

sentences.english: Excuse my ignorance, but how does it actually work?
sentences.chinese: 请原谅我的无知，它究竟是如何运作的？

detailed_translations.english: lack of knowledge or information about something

sentences.chinese: 他们得意地宣扬他们是在创造更多的工作岗位。

detailed_translations.english: to tell everyone about something that you are proud of, especially in an annoying way

name: installment
trans: 分期付款， 分期交付；一集； 一期

sentences.english: Now she can reduce the installment size that she can afford to pay, by extending the loan period.
sentences.chinese: 现在，她就可通过展延贷款周期来减小自己有能力支付的分期付款的规模。

name: trifle
trans: 少量， 少许；小事， 琐事； 微不足道的东西

sentences.english: There’s no point in arguing over trifles.
sentences.chinese: 为琐事争吵毫无意义。

detailed_translations.english: something unimportant or not valuable

sentences.english: People migrate to cities like Jakarta in search of work.
sentences.chinese: 人们移居到雅加达这样的城市找工作。

sentences.english: Most birds have to fly long distances to migrate.
sentences.chinese: 大多数的鸟类不得不飞行很长的距离进行迁徙。

detailed_translations.english: if people migrate, they go to live in another area or country, especially in order to find work

sentences.english: on Easter Sunday
sentences.chinese: 在复活节星期日

detailed_translations.english: a Christian holy day in March or April when Christians remember the death of Christ and his return to life

sentences.english: In desperation, Mrs. Jones submitted to an operation on her right knee to relieve the pain.
sentences.chinese: 绝望中，琼斯夫人不得已接受了一次她右膝的手术以减轻疼痛。

detailed_translations.english: If you submit to something, you unwillingly allow something to be done to you, or you do what someone wants, for example because you are not powerful enough to resist

detailed_translations.chinese: 屈从，听从，服从；呈送，提交；主张，建议
detailed_translations.english: to give a plan, piece of writing etc to someone in authority for them to consider or approve

name: import
trans: 进口， 输入；进口商品， 进口物资；要旨， 含义；重要性

sentences.english: a ban on beef imports
sentences.chinese: 禁止进口牛肉

sentences.english: In 2001, Britain exported more cars than it imported.
sentences.chinese: 2001年英国的汽车出口量大于进口

detailed_translations.english: a product that is brought from one country into another so that it can be sold there, or the business of doing this
to bring a product from one country into another so that it can be sold there

name: string
trans: 弦， 线， 细绳 A；一串， 一行

sentences.chinese: 她的钥匙穿了根绳子挂在脖子上。

sentences.chinese: 一团细绳

sentences.chinese: 我需要一根绳子来捆这个包裹。

sentences.english: a string of pearls
sentences.chinese: 一串珍珠

detailed_translations.english: a strong thread made of several threads twisted together, used for tying or fastening things

name: occupy
trans: 占， 占用；占据， 占领；使忙碌， 使从事

sentences.chinese: 足球占去了我大部分的闲暇时间。

detailed_translations.english: if something occupies you or your time, you are busy doing it

sentences.chinese: 富裕的家庭

sentences.chinese: 富人的饮食数十年来没怎么变。

detailed_translations.english: having plenty of money, nice houses, expensive things etc
The affluent are people who are affluent

trans: 侵入， 闯入， 打扰；把强加于

sentences.english: The press has been blamed for intruding into people's personal lives in an unacceptable way.
sentences.chinese: 新闻媒体因以一种令人无法接受的方式侵入人们的私生活而受到谴责。

detailed_translations.english: to come into a place or situation, and have an unwanted effect

name: simplicity
trans: 简单， 简易； 朴素；直率， 单纯 A

sentences.english: Mona wrote with a beautiful simplicity of style.
sentences.chinese: 莫娜的文笔朴实优美。

sentences.english: For the sake of simplicity, the tax form is divided into three sections.
sentences.chinese: 为简明起见，税单分成三个部分。

sentences.english: James’ solution to this problem was simplicity itself (= very simple ) .
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯对这个问题的解决办法十分简单。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being simple and not complicated, especially when this is attractive or useful

sentences.english: I snatched a glance at the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 我乘机瞥了一眼镜子。

detailed_translations.english: If you snatch an opportunity, you take it quickly. If you snatch something to eat or a rest, you have it quickly in between doing other things.

detailed_translations.chinese: 夺，夺走，抢走；一下子拉，一把抓住；抓住机会做，抽空做
detailed_translations.english: to take something away from someone with a quick, often violent, movement
a short part of a conversation, song etc that you hear

name: summit
trans: 最高点， 峰顶， 极点；峰会

sentences.english: the European summit
sentences.chinese: 欧洲首脑会议

sentences.english: The two presidents agreed to hold a summit in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 两位总统商定在春天举行一次首脑会议。

sentences.english: a five-nation summit meeting
sentences.chinese: 五国峰会

detailed_translations.chinese: 最高点， 峰顶； 最高级会议
detailed_translations.english: an important meeting or set of meetings between the leaders of several governments

name: perfume
trans: 香味， 芳香；香水； 香料
使散发香气； 洒香水于

sentences.english: She was wearing the perfume that he’d bought her.
sentences.chinese: 她擦了他买给她的香水。

detailed_translations.english: a liquid with a strong pleasant smell that women put on their skin or clothing to make themselves smell nice
to put perfume on something

sentences.english: At the Sheffield arena, the speakers were magnified ten times on a giant screen.
sentences.chinese: 在谢菲尔德体育馆，演讲者在一个巨大的屏幕上被放大了十倍。

sentences.english: A public address system magnifies all the little noises and coughs.
sentences.chinese: 扩音系统会放大任何细小的噪音和咳嗽声。

sentences.english: The report tends to magnify the risks involved
sentences.chinese: 这份报告有夸大所涉风险的倾向。

name: redundant
trans: 累赘的， 冗长的；过剩的， 多余的

sentences.english: Seventy factory workers were made redundant in the resulting cuts.
sentences.chinese: 在继而发生的裁员中，70名工厂工人被解雇。

detailed_translations.chinese: 过剩的；失业的，被解雇的
detailed_translations.english: if you are redundant, your employer no longer has a job for you

name: conclusion
trans: 结束， 终结；结论， 推论
