trans: 要求； 主张， 声称；索赔
要求， 主张； 断言；索赔；权利， 要求权， 所有权

sentences.english: I don’t claim to be a feminist, but I’d like to see more women in top jobs.
sentences.chinese: 我不会自称是女权主义者，但我希望看到更多的女性担任高职。

sentences.english: Opposition leaders will claim victory if the turnout is lower than 50%.
sentences.chinese: 如果投票率低于 50%，反对党领袖将宣布获胜。

detailed_translations.chinese: 声称，主张；对…提出要求，索取；使失踪或死亡；需要，值得
detailed_translations.english: to state that something is true, even though it has not been proved

detailed_translations.chinese: 要求； 认领； 索赔； 声称， 断言
detailed_translations.english: a statement that something is true, even though it has not been proved

sentences.english: the widespread use of chemicals in agriculture
sentences.chinese: 化学品在农业中的广泛使用

detailed_translations.english: existing or happening in many places or situations, or among many people

sentences.english: an antique rosewood desk
sentences.chinese: 古董红木书桌

detailed_translations.chinese: 古老的，年代久远的；过时的，古董的；古风的，古式的
detailed_translations.english: antique furniture, jewellery etc is old and often valuable

detailed_translations.chinese: 古董，古玩；古风，古希腊和古罗马艺术风格
detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture, jewellery etc that was made a very long time ago and is therefore valuable

name: communication
trans: 通讯； 传达； 传送； 交流

sentences.english: Radio was the pilot’s only means of communication.
sentences.chinese: 无线电是飞行员唯一的通信手段。

sentences.english: There has been a breakdown in communication (= failure to communicate ) .
sentences.chinese: 沟通失败。

sentences.english: Paris has good communications with many European cities.
sentences.chinese: 巴黎与许多欧洲城市之间交通便捷。

detailed_translations.english: the process by which people exchange information or express their thoughts and feelings

name: chronic
trans: 慢性的；积习难改的；严重的； 坏的

sentences.english: chronic arthritis
sentences.chinese: 慢性关节炎

sentences.english: chronic asthma
sentences.chinese: 慢性哮喘

sentences.english: chronic heart disease
sentences.chinese: 慢性心脏病

detailed_translations.english: a chronic disease or illness is one that continues for a long time and cannot be cured

sentences.english: ‘I’m going now,’ she said, fastening her coat.
sentences.chinese: “现在我要走了。”她一边说，一边扣上大衣。

sentences.english: Fasten your seat belt.
sentences.chinese: 请系好安全带。

detailed_translations.english: to join together the two sides of a coat, shirt, bag etc so that it is closed
to firmly close a window, gate etc so that it will not open, or to become firmly closed

sentences.english: Our taxi pulled up at Old Delhi station and a porter sprinted to the door.
sentences.chinese: 我们的出租车停在老德里车站，一个搬运工疾步跑向车门。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to carry people’s bags at railway stations, airports etc

name: tolerance
trans: 容忍， 宽容 A；公差

sentences.english: ...his tolerance and understanding of diverse human nature.
sentences.chinese: …他对各种人性的宽容和理解。

detailed_translations.english: willingness to allow people to do, say, or believe what they want without criticizing or punishing them

sentences.english: fumes from a toxic waste dump
sentences.chinese: 有毒废料堆产生的毒气

sentences.english: a highly toxic pesticide
sentences.chinese: 毒性很强的杀虫剂

detailed_translations.english: containing poison, or caused by poisonous substances

sentences.english: She lived through the turmoil of the French Revolution.
sentences.chinese: 她经历过法国大革命的混乱之后仍旧活着。

detailed_translations.english: a state of confusion, excitement, or anxiety

sentences.english: Nothomb is a Belgian author.
sentences.chinese: 诺东是位比利时作家。

sentences.english: It’s clear that the author is a woman.
sentences.chinese: 显然，这位作者是女性。

detailed_translations.english: someone who has written a book

sentences.english: What we are seeking, after all, is not simply an agreement to limit greenhouse gas emissions.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在寻求的目标毕竟不只是一项限制温室气体排放的协议。

sentences.chinese: 我认为每一个人都是我们每天的行动和选择中排放的温室气体的责任。

sentences.english: But presently it was set in a greenhouse, where the sunlight fell warm upon it, and water was sprinkled over it, and day by day as it waited, a change began to come to it.
sentences.chinese: 但是过了不久，黏土又给人放进了一间温室，这里阳光和煦地照射着它，并且经常给它喷水，这样就在它一天天静静等候的时候，某种变化终于开始到来。

sentences.chinese: 他正开始一个当作家的新生涯。

sentences.chinese: 他和希尔以及他办公室里的其他人进行了商议。

sentences.chinese: 要经常检查绳索，因为与岩石摩擦会使它磨损。

Centigrade is a scale for measuring temperature, in which water freezes at 0 degrees and boils at 100 degrees. It is represented by the symbol °C.

sentences.chinese: 1862年时发明了一种技术，可以拍出一连串展示连续动作的照片。

if two feelings, sounds, smells etc mingle, they mix together with each other

sentences.chinese: 这些浆果可以吃，但那些有毒。

sentences.chinese: 一些更酷的隐形眼镜可以给你一双"猫眼"或者是"猫头鹰的眼睛"。

sentences.chinese: 一只长着黄色硫磺的巨大眼睛的猫头鹰，呼唤着他的名字，但他没有应答。

sentences.chinese: 把洋葱切碎。

sentences.chinese: 所有战舰都能在这个港口装上补充供应品。

trans: 振动， 摇摆， 颤动

if something vibrates, or if you vibrate it, it shakes quickly and continuously with very small movements

sentences.chinese: 这个发现为研究带来新动力。

sentences.chinese: 查尔斯发现他的名字没有出现在名单上，这让他深感愤慨。

sentences.chinese: 专家对犯罪行为的原因不能取得一致意见。

sentences.chinese: 禁止乱扔垃圾。 违者罚款500美元。

sentences.chinese: 提前支取这笔钱将被处以10%的罚金。

sentences.chinese: 莱夫卡斯有葱郁茂盛的植被。

sentences.chinese: 经济复苏的希望越来越渺茫。

detailed_translations.english: the process of getting better after an illness, injury etc

sentences.chinese: 监护人在安全装置内找到了四分之一夸脱石英。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring liquid, equal to two pints. In Britain this is 1.14 litres, and in the US it is 0.95 litres.

sentences.english: The trial was held under tight security .
sentences.chinese: 这场审讯是在戒备森严的情况下进行的。

sentences.chinese: 登机手续柜台松懈的安全措施

sentences.chinese: 昨天一名囚犯越狱后，该监狱被勒令加强安全措施。

sentences.english: We have been asked not to say anything for security reasons .
sentences.chinese: 出于安全考虑，我们被要求守口如瓶。

sentences.chinese: 保安部队开枪打死了两个人。

sentences.chinese: 小偷被保安摄像机当场拍了下来。

sentences.english: There are strict security checks on everyone entering the Opera House.
sentences.chinese: 每个人进入歌剧院都要接受严格的安全检查。

name: limp
trans: 柔软的， 易曲的， 无力的

sentences.english: a limp handshake

sentences.chinese: 他突然身子一软。

detailed_translations.english: not firm or strong

the way someone walks when they are limping

sentences.chinese: 这一课程是由一家培训公司组织的。

sentences.english: Students need to learn how to organize their work.

sentences.english: the salient points of the report

sentences.chinese: 他的声音听上去既无力又遥远。

sentences.english: She was too feeble to leave her room.
sentences.chinese: 她身体虚弱，无法走出自己的房间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 虚弱的， 衰弱的， 无力的； 无效的， 无益的

sentences.chinese: 在菜肴上撒些切碎的新鲜香草。

detailed_translations.english: a small plant that is used to improve the taste of food, or to make medicine

name: continual
trans: 不断的， 连续的； 频繁的

sentences.english: five weeks of continual rain
sentences.chinese: 持续了五个星期的降雨

sentences.english: the Japanese business philosophy of continual improvement
sentences.chinese: 日本人精益求精的经营哲学

name: herd

sentences.chinese: 乔贝还以其大群的大象和水牛而闻名。

sentences.chinese: 她将可以伸开蜷缩的四肢，休息几个小时。

sentences.chinese: 舒特的散文刻板而冷峻。

sentences.english: Clearly, the amount of money people save increases in inverse proportion to the amount they spend.
sentences.chinese: 显然，人们储蓄的增加与消费成反比。

the complete opposite of something

name: confidence
trans: 信任；信心， 自信；秘密， 机密 A

sentences.chinese: 我从未泄露过别人的秘密。

sentences.english: They spent their evenings drinking wine and sharing confidences.
sentences.chinese: 晚上他们就喝喝酒，说说知心话。

detailed_translations.english: a secret or a piece of information that is private or personal

sentences.english: an arbitrary decision
sentences.chinese: 武断的决定

sentences.english: the arbitrary arrests of political opponents
sentences.chinese: 对政敌的任意逮捕

detailed_translations.english: decided or arranged without any reason or plan, often unfairly

sentences.english: ...farming without any purchased chemical, fertilizer or pesticide.
sentences.chinese: …不使用任何购买的化学品、肥料或杀虫剂的耕作。

detailed_translations.english: a substance that is put on the soil to make plants grow

trans: 誓言， 誓约；咒骂， 诅咒语

sentences.chinese: 总统宣誓就职。

detailed_translations.english: a formal and very serious promise

sentences.chinese: 我想强调三条标准。

sentences.chinese: 双方都同意签署该条约。

sentences.english: The peace treaty ends nearly four years of violence.

sentences.chinese: 他们激将他，说他不可能在1小时内擦洗40辆汽车。

detailed_translations.chinese: 反对， 公然反抗； 向…挑战； 对…质疑
detailed_translations.english: to refuse to accept that something is right, fair, or legal

trans: 庄严， 端庄；尊严， 高贵

sentences.chinese: 一盎司杏仁大约包含每日需求量的一半。

sentences.chinese: 我意识到每盎司的重量都会成为一个小小的船锚压迫着我，所以我决定不带任何一样不必要的或多余的东西。

sentences.chinese: 这种设备长9英寸，重9盎司，可在你运动过程中发电——只需把移动设备插到摇摇发电机上，并把发电机垂直地放在包�或挂在臀部，然后走动或跑动即可。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring weight, equal to 28.35 grams. There are 16 ounces in a pound.

sentences.english: The living room was warm and cosy .
sentences.chinese: 客厅暖和又舒适。

a covering for a  teapot  that keeps the tea inside from getting cold too quickly

trans: 咔嚓折断， 啪地绷断； 猛咬； 猛然断裂 <；吧嗒一声；厉声说话， 怒声责骂

sentences.english: A twig snapped under my feet.
sentences.chinese: 一根细枝在我脚下嚓一声断开了。

sentences.english: The wind snapped branches and power lines.
sentences.chinese: 大风刮断了树枝和输电线。

detailed_translations.chinese: 咔嚓折断， 啪地绷断； 猛咬； 猛然断裂 <；吧嗒一声；厉声说话， 怒声责骂
detailed_translations.english: to break with a sudden sharp noise, or to make something do this
a judgment or decision made quickly, without careful thought or discussion
to take a photograph
a sudden loud sound, especially made by something breaking or closing

name: numerous
trans: 众多的， 许多的， 大批的 <

sentences.chinese: 为掩盖事实作了很多尝试。

sentences.english: The two leaders have worked together on numerous occasions.

trans: 统治， 管理；支配； 约束

sentences.chinese: 治理这个国家的领导人

sentences.chinese: 她仍需要分析这些数据。

trans: 宽广的， 宽敞的， 广阔的

sentences.chinese: 宽敞的居住空间

sentences.english: He grew up to resemble his father.
sentences.chinese: 他长大了，很像他父亲。

sentences.chinese: 学校餐厅

name: remote
trans: 远的； 长久的 <；偏僻的；关系疏远的； 漠不关心的

sentences.chinese: 偏远山区的火灾

sentences.chinese: 她把水壶灌满，打开了开关。

sentences.chinese: 水壶里的水开了。

sentences.chinese: 把肉放进一个小锅里。

sentences.chinese: 我到30岁时还是个处女。

sentences.chinese: 贞洁的新娘

without sexual experience

sentences.chinese: 昆虫的数量每年变化很大。

trans: 卧车包房， 隔间；分隔的空间

sentences.chinese: 她把钱藏在公文包的暗层里。

trans: 计算， 推算；计划， 打算

sentences.chinese: 她想出一种加快办公室之间通信联络的方法。

sentences.chinese: 一位著名的新闻记者兼播音员

sentences.chinese: 长时间晒太阳会导致皮肤癌。

trans: 抓住， 攫住， 掌握 <

sentences.chinese: 托尼落入一个有魅力的美国人的掌控，那人给他介绍毒品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 没有手提带或背带的；紧要关头的

sentences.chinese: 警方将该地区人员全部疏散。

sentences.chinese: 20世纪80年代，本田作为一家小型汽车公司因一举击垮行业巨头而声名鹊起。

detailed_translations.english: If you humble someone who is more important or powerful than you, you defeat them easily

隐匿； 窝藏， 包庇

sentences.chinese: 我觉得他对我有点怀恨在心。

sentences.chinese: 农业商品

sentences.chinese: 商品价格急剧下跌。

sentences.chinese: 新当选的总统紧随其后，坐着6匹灰色骏马开道的敞篷马车。

sentences.chinese: 铁路客车厢

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle with wheels that is pulled by a horse, used in the past

sentences.english: There are plans to split the corporation into a number of smaller independent companies.
sentences.chinese: 有计划要把这家大企业分割成一些独立的小公司。

sentences.english: an independent charity
sentences.chinese: 独立的慈善机构

sentences.english: small independent bookshops
sentences.chinese: 私营小书店

sentences.english: schools in the independent sector
sentences.chinese: 私立学校

detailed_translations.english: an independent organization is not owned or controlled by, or does not receive money from, another organization or the government

sentences.english: an obedient child
sentences.chinese: 听话的孩子

sentences.english: citizens who are obedient to the law
sentences.chinese: 遵纪守法的公民

detailed_translations.english: always doing what you are told to do, or what the law, a rule etc says you must do

name: misery
trans: 痛苦， 悲惨， 不幸

sentences.chinese: 我们在这里所目睹的情景是许许多多的人都生活困苦。

sentences.chinese: 战争造成的苦难

name: blur
trans: 模糊； 涂污， 污损

name: plausible
trans: 似乎合理的， 似乎可信的

sentences.chinese: 他的叙述听上去当然很合理。

sentences.chinese: 美国位于赤道以北。

sentences.chinese: 头版报道题为“天外来客会见总统”的报纸

sentences.chinese: 委员会会议

detailed_translations.english: resulting in someone’s death

sentences.english: I understood the psychology of this, but it still hurt.
sentences.chinese: 我理解这种心理，但这仍然让我感到伤心。

sentences.english: It was not until the mid-twentieth century that psychology really came into its own.
sentences.chinese: 直到20世纪中叶心理学才得到应有的重视。

sentences.english: His speciality was psychology -- one important branch on the great tree of knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 他的专业是心理学，这是知识之树上的一个重要分枝。

name: ridge
trans: 岭， 山脉；屋脊 A；鼻梁

sentences.english: We made our way carefully along the ridge.
sentences.chinese: 我们沿着山脊小心前行。

detailed_translations.english: a long area of high land, especially at the top of a mountain

sentences.english: an airline pilot
sentences.chinese: 航空公司飞行员

detailed_translations.english: a company that takes passengers and goods to different places by plane

name: mobile
trans: 可动的， 活动的， 运动的

sentences.english: mobile air-conditioners
sentences.chinese: 移动式空调器

sentences.english: a mobile shop/library (= one inside a vehicle)
sentences.chinese: 流动商店 / 图书馆

detailed_translations.english: that is not fixed in one place and can be moved easily and quickly

name: perform
trans: 履行， 执行； 做；表演， 演出

sentences.english: Chenier and the band are performing at the Silver Palace tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 车尼尔和乐队明天将在银宫演出。

sentences.english: The children perform two plays each school year.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们一学年表演两部话剧。

sentences.english: She was fired for not performing the duties outlined in her contract.
sentences.chinese: 由于没有履行合同中规定的职责，她被解雇了。

detailed_translations.english: to do something to entertain people, for example by acting a play or playing a piece of music

name: evolution
trans: 进化， 渐进， 演化

sentences.english: the theory of evolution
sentences.chinese: 进化论

detailed_translations.english: the scientific idea that plants and animals develop and change gradually over a long period of time

name: peak
trans: 顶点， 最高点；峰， 山峰

sentences.english: snow-capped mountain peaks
sentences.chinese: 白雪覆盖的山顶

sentences.english: jagged peaks
sentences.chinese: 嶙峋的山峰

sentences.english: It was a time of peak demand for the product.
sentences.chinese: 那是对该产品需求最旺的时期。

detailed_translations.english: the sharply pointed top of a mountain
used to talk about the best, highest, or greatest level or amount of something

sentences.english: a family portrait
sentences.chinese: 全家福

sentences.english: She’s been commissioned to paint Jackson’s portrait .
sentences.chinese: 她已受托为杰克逊画肖像。

detailed_translations.english: a painting, drawing, or photograph of a person

name: complaint
trans: 抱怨， 诉苦；申诉；疾病

sentences.english: If you wish to make a complaint, you should see the manager.
sentences.chinese: 如果你要投诉，应该去找经理。

sentences.english: The sales assistants are trained to deal with customer complaints in a friendly manner.
sentences.chinese: 售货员都受过培训，要以友好的态度处理顾客的投诉。

detailed_translations.english: a statement in which someone complains about something

sentences.english: His son was injected with strong drugs.
sentences.chinese: 他的儿子被注射了强效的药。

detailed_translations.english: to put liquid, especially a drug, into someone’s body by using a special needle

name: channel
trans: 海峡， 水道；信道， 频道；途径， 渠道

sentences.english: the news on Channel 4
sentences.chinese: 第四频道播出的新闻

sentences.english: The kids are watching cartoons on the Disney Channel.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在看迪士尼频道的卡通片。

sentences.english: What channel is ‘ER’ on?
sentences.chinese: 《仁心仁术》在哪个频道播放？

sentences.english: He changed channels to watch the basketball game.
sentences.chinese: 他转换频道看篮球比赛。

detailed_translations.english: a television station and all the programmes that it broadcasts

detailed_translations.chinese: 把〔钱、精力等〕导向〔特定目的〕；引导；把…用于
detailed_translations.english: to control and direct something such as money or energy towards a particular purpose

sentences.english: She tried to focus her mind on her work.
sentences.chinese: 她试图集中精神干活。

sentences.english: He focused his blue eyes on her.
sentences.chinese: 他那蓝色的眼睛注视着她。

sentences.english: Eggs became the focus for the food poisoning scare.
sentences.chinese: 鸡蛋成了食物中毒恐慌的焦点。

detailed_translations.english: to give attention, effort, etc. to one particular subject, situation or person rather than another
the thing, person, situation etc that people pay special attention to

sentences.english: The house was surrounded by trees, and invisible from the road.
sentences.chinese: 这所房子树木环绕，从路上是看不见的。

detailed_translations.english: something that is invisible cannot be seen

name: hamper
trans: 妨碍， 阻碍； 牵制， 束缚

sentences.english: She tried to run, but was hampered by her heavy suitcase.
sentences.chinese: 她想跑，但沉重的旅行箱拖累了她。

sentences.english: An attempt to rescue the men has been hampered by bad weather.
sentences.chinese: 对那几名男子的营救行动受到恶劣天气的阻碍。

detailed_translations.english: to make it difficult for someone to do something
a basket with a lid, which is used for carrying food or sending it to someone as a present

name: favorable
trans: 赞许的； 有利的， 顺利的

sentences.english: favourable film reviews
sentences.chinese: 正面的影评

sentences.english: The response has been overwhelmingly favorable.
sentences.chinese: 回应是一边倒的肯定。

detailed_translations.english: a favourable report, opinion, or reaction shows that you think that someone or something is good or that you agree with them

name: entire
trans: 完全的， 全部的， 完整的

sentences.english: It was the worst day in my entire life.
sentences.chinese: 那是我一生中最糟糕的一天。

sentences.english: The entire staff agreed.
sentences.chinese: 全体员工都同意了。

sentences.english: Have you drunk the entire bottle?
sentences.chinese: 你把整瓶酒都喝了吗？

detailed_translations.english: used when you want to emphasize that you mean all of a group, period of time, amount etc

sentences.english: Stay at a cheap motel.
sentences.chinese: 住便宜的汽车旅馆。

sentences.english: We can stay in a motel overnight, then continue on to Copenhagen tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以在一家汽车旅馆过夜，然后明天再继续出发到哥本哈根。

sentences.english: A wide range of hotel, motel and apartment accommodation is available in most cities, major resorts and many rural areas.
sentences.chinese: 在大部分城市、主要旅游点和许多农村地区，都能找到各种类型的旅馆、汽车旅馆和公寓住所。

detailed_translations.english: a hotel for people who are travelling by car, where you can park your car outside your room

sentences.english: He broke his wrist climbing rocks for a cigarette ad.
sentences.chinese: 他为了一个香烟广告攀岩折断了手腕。

detailed_translations.english: the part of your body where your hand joins your arm

name: approach
trans: 靠近， 接近， 邻近
方法， 途径；探讨； 试探

sentences.english: He decided to adopt a different approach and teach the Bible through story-telling.
sentences.chinese: 他决定采用一种不同的方法，通过讲故事来教授《圣经》。

sentences.english: This book takes an unorthodox approach to art criticism.
sentences.chinese: 这本书采用的是非传统的艺术评论方法。

sentences.english: organizations which take a positive approach to creative thinking
sentences.chinese: 对创造性思维采取积极态度的组织

detailed_translations.english: a method of doing something or dealing with a problem

sentences.english: roast chicken with peas and carrots
sentences.chinese: 烤鸡配豌豆胡萝卜

detailed_translations.english: a round green seed that is cooked and eaten as a vegetable, or the plant on which these seeds grow

sentences.english: They were still driving away at the encyclopaedia.
sentences.chinese: 他们仍在孜孜不倦地编写那部百科全书。

sentences.english: I might do an eighth book for charity, a kind of encyclopaedia of the world so that I could use all the extra material that's not in the books ... we'll see!
sentences.chinese: 我可能出于慈善的目的写第八本书，大概是有关这个世界的百科全书，这样我可以使用书中没能出现的所有额外材料······敬请期待！

sentences.english: An encyclopaedia's-worth of knowledge feels trivialised when it can be generated with just a few strokes on the keyboard, just as the live chatter of the world becomes so much waste paper.
sentences.chinese: 当仅靠敲打几下键盘就能创作出那样的作品时，一种百科全书式的学问感瞬间变得微不足道，正如同那对这个世界鲜活的唠叨变成这里的一堆废纸那样。

sentences.english: The girl had only worked for the shopkeeper for three days when she packed him in.
sentences.chinese: 这姑娘替那店主只干了三天， 就辞职不干了。

sentences.english: In Jermyn Street in London, a shopkeeper anxiously asked who the next president would be.
sentences.chinese: 在伦敦的杰明街，一个店主焦急地问道，谁将是（美国）下一任总统。

sentences.english: I was an unknown foreigner, and could have easily evaded payment with impunity, yet no London shopkeeper ever mistrusted me.
sentences.chinese: 我是一个没人知道的异乡人，本可以大胆地轻易逃避付款，但是从来没有一个伦敦的店主不信任我。

detailed_translations.english: someone who owns or is in charge of a small shop

sentences.english: a decisive factor/victory/battle
sentences.chinese: 决定性的因素 / 胜利 / 战役

sentences.english: a decisive leader
sentences.chinese: 果断的领袖

detailed_translations.english: very important for the final result of a particular situation

sentences.english: Your summary should be as clear and concise as possible.
sentences.chinese: 你的总结应该尽可能地明白简洁。

detailed_translations.english: short, with no unnecessary words

sentences.english: Cynthia’s still working on her thesis.
sentences.chinese: 辛西娅还在写论文。

sentences.english: Their main thesis was that the rise in earnings was due to improvements in education.
sentences.chinese: 他们的主要论点是收入增加得益于教育状况的改善。

detailed_translations.english: a long piece of writing about a particular subject that you do as part of an advanced university degree such as an MA or a PhD

sentences.english: She has a bump on the back of her head.
sentences.chinese: 她的后脑勺上肿起了一块。

sentences.english: He had a few injuries, mostly bumps and bruises.
sentences.chinese: 他有几处受了伤，大都是肿块和瘀青。

detailed_translations.english: an area of skin that is raised because you have hit it on something
to hit or knock against something

sentences.english: Local people have decided to revive this centuries-old tradition.
sentences.chinese: 当地人决定复兴这一延续了数个世纪的传统。

sentences.english: an attempt to revive the steel industry
sentences.chinese: 复苏钢铁工业的努力

sentences.english: The doctors revived her with injections of glucose.
sentences.chinese: 医生给她注射葡萄糖，使她苏醒过来。

detailed_translations.english: to bring something back after it has not been used or has not existed for a period of time

sentences.english: How much does it cost per kilo?
sentences.chinese: 每公斤多少钱？

sentences.english: rooms costing £40 per night
sentences.chinese: 每晚收费40英镑的房间

sentences.english: Admission is £9.95 per adult.
sentences.chinese: 成人门票每位9.95英镑。

sentences.english: My car does 12 miles per litre (= for each litre of petrol ) .
sentences.chinese: 我的汽车每升汽油跑12英里。

sentences.english: The meal cost $25 per head (= for or by each person ) .
sentences.chinese: 那顿饭人均花费25美元。

detailed_translations.english: for each

sentences.english: The police are waging war on drug pushers in the city.
sentences.chinese: 警方正在市内开展一场打击毒贩的斗争。

detailed_translations.english: to be involved in a war against someone, or a fight against something

sentences.english: And remember nuts like almonds with their skins on have more fiber than those without.
sentences.chinese: 记住，向杏仁那样有皮的坚果比那些没有皮的更富含纤维素。

sentences.english: While they bite into the fruit, they could savor the various blends of fiber and juices.
sentences.chinese: 当他们咬一口水果，他们可以尝到各种水果纤维和汁液的混合。

sentences.english: Not only do they offer antioxidants, they contain higher content of vitamins, minerals, and fiber.
sentences.chinese: 它们不仅提供抗氧化剂，还含有较高含量的维生素、矿物质和纤维。

name: proceed
trans: 进行， 继续下去； 发生

sentences.english: Before proceeding further, we must define our terms.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须先定义术语，然后再往下展开。

detailed_translations.english: to continue to do something that has already been planned or started

name: corporation
trans: 公司， 企业； 团体 <

sentences.english: He works for a large American corporation.
sentences.chinese: 他在一家美国大公司工作。

sentences.english: multinational corporations
sentences.chinese: 跨国公司

sentences.english: the Siemens Corporation
sentences.chinese: 西门子公司

detailed_translations.english: a big company, or a group of companies acting together as a single organization

sentences.english: Elizabeth understood her husband’s loyalty to his sister.
sentences.chinese: 伊丽莎白理解丈夫对他姐姐的一片忠心。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of remaining faithful to your friends, principles, country etc

sentences.english: a 100-watt bulb
sentences.chinese: 一个100瓦的灯泡

detailed_translations.english: the glass part of an electric light, that the light shines from

name: dismiss
trans: 免职， 解雇， 开除； 解散

sentences.english: He just laughed and dismissed my proposal as unrealistic.
sentences.chinese: 他只是笑了笑，认为我的建议不切实际，拒绝考虑。

sentences.english: Bryant was unfairly dismissed from his post.
sentences.chinese: 布赖恩特被无理免职了。

detailed_translations.english: to refuse to consider someone’s idea, opinion etc, because you think it is not serious, true, or important

name: underlying
trans: 含蓄的； 潜在的； 根本的； 在下面的

sentences.english: To stop a problem you have to understand its underlying causes.
sentences.chinese: 要解决问题，你得了解其潜在原因。

detailed_translations.english: The underlying features of an object, event, or situation are not obvious, and it may be difficult to discover or reveal them

name: intelligence
trans: 智力， 才智； 灵性， 悟性；情报， 消息； 报道

sentences.english: To be good at the game, you need a reasonable level of intelligence.
sentences.chinese: 要想把这种游戏玩好，需要一定的智力水平。

sentences.english: According to our intelligence, further attacks were planned.
sentences.chinese: 根据我们的情报，还会有更进一步的攻击。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to learn, understand, and think about things

sentences.english: How do you analyze this change?
sentences.chinese: 你该如何分析这种变化？

sentences.english: You have to hoover anything before you can analyze it.
sentences.chinese: 在你不具备分析能力之前，你只得胡乱吸收你所能学到的东西。

sentences.english: We should learn to discern and analyze the essentials of complicated questions.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该学会认识和分析复杂问题的本质。

name: indication
trans: 指出， 指示；迹象， 暗示

sentences.english: Could you give me some indication as to when I am likely to receive a reply?
sentences.chinese: 你能给我透露一下什么时候我能收到回复吗？

sentences.english: Indications are that the situation hasn’t improved much.
sentences.chinese: 迹象表明局势并没有多大好转。

sentences.english: There is every indication (= there are very clear signs ) that it is true.
sentences.chinese: 很明显这是真的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 指示， 表示， 表明； 象征， 迹象
detailed_translations.english: a sign, remark, event etc that shows what is happening, what someone is thinking or feeling, or what is true

name: bulk
trans: 体积， 容积；大批， 大量， 大块

sentences.english: The bulk of consumers are based in towns.
sentences.chinese: 大多数消费者都是城镇居民。

sentences.english: The dough will rise until it is double in bulk.
sentences.chinese: 面团会发酵到原来的两倍大。

detailed_translations.english: the main or largest part of something

sentences.english: To the despair of the workers, the company announced the closure of the factory.
sentences.chinese: 令工人们感到绝望的是，公司宣布关闭工厂了。

sentences.english: Despite his illness, Ron never despaired.
sentences.chinese: 尽管疾病缠身，罗恩却从不绝望。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling that you have no hope at all
to feel that there is no hope at all

sentences.english: a herd of cows with one bull
sentences.chinese: 一群母牛加一头公牛

sentences.english: a bull elephant

detailed_translations.chinese: 公牛；看好股市者；粗壮如牛的人；胡说八道；印玺
detailed_translations.english: an adult male animal of the cattle family

detailed_translations.chinese: 大型的；公牛似的；雄性的
detailed_translations.english: male; masculine

detailed_translations.chinese: 企图抬高证券价格；吓唬；强力实现

name: champion
trans: 冠军， 得胜者；拥护者； 勇士

sentences.english: the world heavyweight boxing champion
sentences.chinese: 世界重量级拳击冠军

sentences.english: the Olympic champion
sentences.chinese: 奥运会冠军

sentences.english: He passionately championed the poor.
sentences.chinese: 他曾热情地捍卫穷人。

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that has won a competition, especially in sport
If you champion a person, a cause, or a principle, you support or defend them

sentences.english: The toothbrush gently removes plaque without damaging the gums or causing bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 牙刷轻轻地刷去齿菌斑，没有伤及牙床或引起出血。

detailed_translations.english: your gums are the two areas of firm pink flesh at the top and bottom of your mouth, in which your teeth are fixed

name: queer
trans: 奇怪的， 异常的；不舒服的； 眩晕的

sentences.english: She gave a queer laugh.
sentences.chinese: 她古怪地笑了笑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 奇怪的；同性恋的；不舒服的；心智不平衡的
detailed_translations.english: an offensive word used to describe someone who is homosexual, especially a man. Do not use this word.

detailed_translations.chinese: 同性恋者；怪人；伪造的货币
detailed_translations.english: an offensive word for a homosexual person, especially a man. Do not use this word.

name: circuit
trans: 周线； 巡回； 环行；电路， 线路

sentences.english: We did a circuit of the old city.
sentences.chinese: 我们绕着老城走了一圈。

detailed_translations.english: a path that forms a circle around an area, or a journey along this path

name: gut
trans: 毁坏的内部；取出…的内脏

sentences.english: He had a gut feeling that Sarah was lying.
sentences.chinese: 他凭直觉感到萨拉在撒谎。

sentences.english: Let's have your gut reaction to the facts as we know them.
sentences.chinese: 请告诉我们你对这些我们了解的事实的直觉反应。

detailed_translations.chinese: 内脏；肠子；剧情；胆量；海峡；勇气；直觉；肠
detailed_translations.english: a reaction or feeling that you are sure is right, although you cannot give a reason for it

detailed_translations.chinese: 取出内脏；摧毁（建筑物等）的内部
detailed_translations.english: to remove the organs from inside a fish or animal in order to prepare it for cooking

detailed_translations.chinese: 简单的；本质的，根本的；本能的，直觉的
detailed_translations.english: A gut feeling is based on instinct or emotion rather than reason

sentences.english: The magnificent beau is dancing to the light of chandeliers.
sentences.chinese: 这个衣着华丽的花花公子在枝形吊灯灯光下翩翩起舞。

sentences.english: These magnificent ancient buildings demonstrate the great intelligence of the labouring people.
sentences.chinese: 这些壮丽的古代建筑显示了劳动人民的高度智慧。

sentences.english: Dave’s a nice guy when you get to know him.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫是个好人，你了解他后就知道了。

sentences.english: Jake’s a real tough guy.
sentences.chinese: 杰克是个很厉害的家伙。

detailed_translations.english: a man

sentences.english: The new law restricts the sale of hand guns.
sentences.chinese: 新法规限制手枪的销售。

sentences.english: You may need to restrict access to certain files (= limit the number of people who can read them ) .
sentences.chinese: 某些档案可能需要限制查阅。

sentences.english: The agreement will restrict competition.
sentences.chinese: 这个协议将限制竞争。

sentences.english: The cramped living conditions severely restricted the children’s freedom to play.
sentences.chinese: 拥挤的居住条件严重限制了孩子们玩耍的自由。

detailed_translations.english: to limit or control the size, amount, or range of something

name: instant
trans: 立即的， 直接的；紧迫的；速溶的； 方便的

sentences.english: an instant success
sentences.chinese: 马到成功

sentences.english: a system that provides instant access to client information
sentences.chinese: 能立即查到客户信息的系统

sentences.english: The women took an instant dislike to one another.
sentences.chinese: 这些女人立刻就彼此厌恶起来。

sentences.english: The programme brought an instant response.
sentences.chinese: 节目立即引起了反响。

sentences.english: For an instant, Barney was tempted to flee.
sentences.chinese: 那一瞬间，巴尼很想逃走。

detailed_translations.chinese: 立即的； 紧急的； 可以速食的
detailed_translations.english: happening or produced immediately
An instant is an extremely short period of time

sentences.english: "Fourteen minutes," Chris said, taking a peep at his watch.
sentences.chinese: “十四分钟，”克里斯瞥了一眼手表说道。

detailed_translations.english: a quick or secret look at something

name: ethic
trans: 道德准则， 行为准则， 伦理标准；

sentences.english: The old ethic of hard work has given way to a new ethic of instant gratification.
sentences.chinese: 旧有的崇尚勤勉的道德观已被及时行乐的新观念所取代。

detailed_translations.english: a general idea or belief that influences people’s behaviour and attitudes

sentences.english: I go to the gym as often as I can.
sentences.chinese: 我一有空就去健身房健身。

detailed_translations.english: a special building or room that has equipment for doing physical exercise

name: governor
trans: 总督， 州长， 地方长官

sentences.english: He was governor of Iowa in the late 1970s.
sentences.chinese: 他是20世纪70年代末爱荷华州的州长。

sentences.english: the prison governor
sentences.chinese: 监狱长

detailed_translations.english: the person in charge of governing a state in the US

name: rarely
trans: 很少， 难得； 稀有地

sentences.english: We rarely see someone go after the health area.
sentences.chinese: 我们很少见到有人在健康领域做文章。

sentences.english: He rarely mingles with other students on the campus.
sentences.chinese: 他很少和校园里的其他学生交往。

sentences.english: She wanted to protect her children from the evils of the outside world.
sentences.chinese: 她想保护她的孩子不受外界的不良影响。

sentences.english: Poverty is one of the greatest social evils of our time.
sentences.chinese: 贫困是当代最大的社会弊端之一。

sentences.english: the evils of capitalism
sentences.chinese: 资本主义的种种祸害

sentences.english: There is too much evil in the world.
sentences.chinese: 世上的罪恶太多。

sentences.english: an evil dictator responsible for the deaths of millions
sentences.chinese: 对数百万人之死负责的邪恶独裁者

detailed_translations.english: something that is very bad or harmful
someone who is evil deliberately does very cruel things to harm other people

name: twist
trans: 捻， 搓； 绞， 拧 A
搓， 拧 A <；新手法， 窍门

sentences.english: Her hands began to twist the handles of the bag she carried.
sentences.chinese: 她的双手开始拧她拎着的那个包的拎柄。

sentences.english: He smiled, a slow cynical twist of his lips.
sentences.chinese: 他笑了，嘴巴慢慢一歪，带着嘲笑的意味。

detailed_translations.english: to bend or turn something, such as wire, hair, or cloth, into a particular shape
a twisting action or movement

sentences.english: the forthcoming elections
sentences.chinese: 即将到来的选举

sentences.english: Keep an eye on the noticeboards for forthcoming events .
sentences.chinese: 请注意布告牌上的活动预告。

detailed_translations.english: a forthcoming event, meeting etc is one that has been planned to happen soon

name: perplex
trans: 使困惑； 使费解； 使复杂化

sentences.english: Shea’s symptoms perplexed the doctors.
sentences.chinese: 谢伊的症状令医生们困惑。

detailed_translations.english: if something perplexes you, it makes you feel confused and worried because it is difficult to understand

name: locate
trans: 查找…的位置；使…坐落于， 位于

sentences.english: The business is located right in the center of town.
sentences.chinese: 这家商店就在市中心。

detailed_translations.english: to be in a particular position or place

sentences.english: He went into the hospital to undergo tests for a pain in his abdomen.
sentences.chinese: 他去了医院接受对他的腹部疼痛进行的各项检查。

detailed_translations.english: the part of your body between your chest and legs which contains your stomach,  bowel s  etc

name: combat
trans: 战斗， 搏斗， 格斗
战斗， 搏斗， 格斗

sentences.english: In the case of this battle, the combat did only last a singleday.
sentences.chinese: 在译成战役的情况下，这场战斗仅仅持续了短短的一天。

sentences.english: We will remove our combat brigades from Iraq by the end of next summer, and all of our troops by the end of 2011.
sentences.chinese: 我们会在明年夏末从伊拉克撤回我们的战斗旅，在2011年末，我们所有军队都将从伊拉克撤出。

sentences.english: These people would then be given training in vigilance and combat not just to defend themselves but also the borders.
sentences.chinese: 这些人会被提供警戒和战斗训练，不仅是为了保护自己，而且要保护边界安全。

detailed_translations.english: fighting, especially during a war

sentences.english: She despised her neighbours.
sentences.chinese: 她看不起她的邻居。

detailed_translations.english: to dislike and have a low opinion of someone or something

sentences.english: carbon/sulphur dioxide
sentences.chinese: 二氧化碳／硫

detailed_translations.english: a chemical compound that contains two atoms of oxygen and one atom of another chemical element

name: indulge
trans: 沉溺， 纵容自己， 肆意从事；允许延期付款

sentences.english: Only rarely will she indulge in a glass of wine.
sentences.chinese: 她只是偶尔才会喝上杯葡萄酒。

sentences.english: He returned to Ohio so that he could indulge his passion for football.
sentences.chinese: 他重返俄亥俄以释放自己对足球的激情。

detailed_translations.chinese: 沉溺， 纵容自己， 肆意从事
detailed_translations.english: If you indulge in something or if you indulge yourself, you allow yourself to have or do something that you know you will enjoy

detailed_translations.chinese: 使沉溺于，满足；纵容，迁就
detailed_translations.english: to let someone have or do whatever they want, even if it is bad for them

name: unity
trans: 团结， 一致；统一体， 整体

sentences.english: economic unity
sentences.chinese: 经济统一

sentences.english: European unity
sentences.chinese: 欧洲的一体化

detailed_translations.english: when a group of people or countries agree or are joined together

name: pursue
trans: 追赶， 追踪；继续， 从事 <

sentences.english: She plans to pursue a career in politics.
sentences.chinese: 她计划从政。

sentences.english: Students should pursue their own interests , as well as do their school work.
sentences.chinese: 除了完成课业之外，学生也应该追求自己的兴趣。

sentences.english: a campaign promise to pursue policies that will help the poor
sentences.chinese: 贯彻扶贫政策的竞选承诺

detailed_translations.english: to continue doing an activity or trying to achieve something over a long period of time

sentences.english: Genetics is also bringing about dramatic changes in our understanding of cancer.
sentences.chinese: 遗传学也正使我们对癌症的理解发生巨大的变化。

detailed_translations.english: the study of how the qualities of living things are passed on in their genes

name: vulgar
trans: 粗野的， 下流的；庸俗的， 粗俗的；普通的， 通俗的

sentences.english: vulgar behaviour
sentences.chinese: 粗俗的行为

detailed_translations.english: remarks, jokes etc that are vulgar deal with sex in a very rude and offensive way

sentences.english: From all points of view, war would be a catastrophe.
sentences.chinese: 从各个方面来看，战争都会是一场灾难。

detailed_translations.english: a terrible event in which there is a lot of destruction, suffering, or death

name: convey
trans: 运送， 搬运， 转运；表达； 传播

sentences.english: All this information can be conveyed in a simple diagram.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些信息可以通过一张简单的图表来表示。

sentences.english: Ads convey the message that thin is beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 广告传递的信息是: 瘦就是美。

sentences.english: He was sent to convey a message to the UN Secretary General.
sentences.chinese: 他被派去向联合国秘书长传达一条信息。

detailed_translations.english: to communicate or express something, with or without using words

sentences.english: Olivier’s performance redeemed an otherwise second-rate play.
sentences.chinese: 奥利维尔的表演补救了一出本是二流水平的戏。

detailed_translations.chinese: 赎回；挽回；兑换；履行；补偿；恢复
detailed_translations.english: to make something less bad

sentences.english: The victim received head injuries from which she died a week later.
sentences.chinese: 受害人头部受伤，一周后死亡。

sentences.english: a credit card fraud ring that stole millions of dollars from unsuspecting victims
sentences.chinese: 从毫无戒心的受害者手中盗取数百万美元的信用卡诈骗团伙

detailed_translations.english: someone who has been attacked, robbed, or murdered

sentences.english: Her husband was later treated for a fractured skull.
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫后来因颅骨碎裂而接受治疗。

detailed_translations.english: the bones of a person’s or animal’s head

name: hysterical
trans: 情绪异常激动的， 歇斯底里的 A

sentences.english: Janet became hysterical and began screaming.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮特歇斯底里起来，开始尖叫。

sentences.english: Everyone in the studio burst into hysterical laughter .
sentences.chinese: 演播室里的每个人都爆发出一阵狂笑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 歇斯底里的；异常兴奋的
detailed_translations.english: unable to control your behaviour or emotions because you are very upset, afraid, excited etc

sentences.english: Drinking water supplies are believed to have been contaminated.
sentences.chinese: 据信饮用水已受到污染。

detailed_translations.english: to make a place or substance dirty or harmful by putting something such as chemicals or poison in it

name: lane
trans: 小路， 小巷； 行车道

sentences.english: a quiet country lane
sentences.chinese: 一条宁静的乡间小路

sentences.english: ...after being disqualified for running out of his lane in the 200 metres.
sentences.chinese: …在200米比赛中由于冲出跑道而被取消比赛资格以后。

detailed_translations.english: a narrow road in the countryside

sentences.english: Add a crushed clove of garlic (= single section of it ).
sentences.chinese: 加一瓣压碎的大蒜。

detailed_translations.english: a plant like a small onion, used in cooking to give a strong taste

name: aircraft
trans: 飞行器； 航空器； 飞机

sentences.english: The return flight of the aircraft was delayed.
sentences.chinese: 飞机的返回航程被推迟了。

detailed_translations.english: a plane or other vehicle that can fly

name: accord
trans: 一致， 符合；协议， 条约

sentences.english: The punishments accorded with the current code of discipline.
sentences.chinese: 处罚与现行的纪律规则一致。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which two people, ideas, or statements agree with each other

detailed_translations.chinese: 使符合；使一致；调节；授予，赠与，给予
detailed_translations.english: to give someone or something special attention or a particular type of treatment

name: automatic
trans: 自动的； 机械的； 无意识的

sentences.english: an automatic weapon
sentences.chinese: 自动武器

sentences.english: an automatic gearbox
sentences.chinese: 自动变速箱

sentences.english: My camera is fully automatic .
sentences.chinese: 我的照相机是全自动的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 自动的； 必然发生的； 无意识的
detailed_translations.english: an automatic machine is designed to work without needing someone to operate it for each part of a process
a weapon that can fire bullets continuously

sentences.english: Economic concerns are foremost on many voters’ minds.
sentences.chinese: 经济是许多选民关心的首要问题。

sentences.english: Rostropovich was long considered the world’s foremost cellist.
sentences.chinese: 长期以来，罗斯特罗波维奇一直被视为世界上首屈一指的大提琴家。

detailed_translations.english: in a leading position among a group of people or things

sentences.english: Despite all our efforts to save the school, the authorities decided to close it.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我们竭力想保住这所学校，当局还是决定把它关闭。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that something happens or is true even though something else might have prevented it

name: consecutive
trans: 连续不断的， 连贯的

sentences.english: It had rained for four consecutive days.
sentences.chinese: 雨接连下了四天。

sentences.english: Can they win the title for the third consecutive season?
sentences.chinese: 他们能连续第三个赛季赢得冠军称号吗？

detailed_translations.english: consecutive numbers or periods of time follow one after the other without any interruptions

sentences.english: The kids all groaned when I switched off the TV.
sentences.chinese: 我关掉电视时，孩子们都发出不满的抱怨声。

sentences.english: Richard’s jokes make you groan rather than laugh.
sentences.chinese: 理查德的笑话让你哭笑不得。

detailed_translations.english: to make a long deep sound because you are in pain, upset, or disappointed, or because something is very enjoyable
a long deep sound that you make when you are in pain or do not want to do something

sentences.english: A range of official Disney merchandise was on sale.
sentences.chinese: 一系列正版的迪士尼商品在出售。

sentences.english: They inspected the merchandise carefully.
sentences.chinese: 他们仔细地检查了商品。

detailed_translations.english: goods that are being sold
to try to sell goods or services using methods such as advertising

sentences.english: As the last Ice Age came to an end, somebody picked a pebble out of a small river not far from Bethlehem.
sentences.chinese: 随着最后一个冰河时代宣告结束，有人从伯利恒附近流水淙淙的小溪边，捡起了一枚鹅卵石。

sentences.english: And what I do is, I select a hard stone hammer, in this case a quartzite pebble about the size of a cricket ball, and I elect to hit it in one place - and this is where I start to knap.
sentences.chinese: “现在你瞧瞧，这儿呢，我挑了块燧石，比较细长的，要削薄下来工作量并不大。” “我要做的就是，选择一块够硬的石锤，这次我选这块是个头有板球大小的石英岩卵石。

sentences.english: the Encyclopedia of Music
sentences.chinese: 音乐百科全书

detailed_translations.english: a book or cd, or a set of these, containing facts about many different subjects, or containing detailed facts about one subject

sentences.english: She wears a lot of gold jewelry.
sentences.chinese: 她戴了许多金首饰。

detailed_translations.english: small things that you wear for decoration, such as rings or necklaces

name: conduct
trans: 行为， 举动， 品行；引导， 实施
引导， 带领；处理， 实施， 管理；传导， 传；指挥

sentences.english: The Senator’s conduct is being investigated by the Ethics Committee.
sentences.chinese: 该参议员的行为正受到道德委员会的调查。

sentences.english: an inquiry into the conduct of the police
sentences.chinese: 对警方行为的调查

sentences.english: his arrest for disorderly conduct
sentences.chinese: 他因妨害治安行为而遭逮捕

detailed_translations.chinese: 举止， 行为； 指导； 管理； 实施
detailed_translations.english: the way someone behaves, especially in public, in their job etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 进行； 管理， 指挥， 引导； 传输， 传导
detailed_translations.english: to stand in front of a group of musicians or singers and direct their playing or singing

sentences.english: green velvet drapes
sentences.chinese: 绿色丝绒帷帘

detailed_translations.chinese: 天鹅绒，丝绒；天鹅绒似的东西
detailed_translations.english: a type of expensive cloth with a soft surface on one side

sentences.english: The lost lamb bleated.
sentences.chinese: 迷路的小羊咩咩的叫.

sentences.english: roast lamb
sentences.chinese: 烤羊肉

detailed_translations.english: a young sheep

name: fantastic
trans: 奇异的， 幻想的， 异想天开的；极好的

sentences.english: You look fantastic!
sentences.chinese: 你看上去棒极了！

sentences.english: It’s a fantastic place, really beautiful!
sentences.chinese: 这真是个好地方，漂亮极了！

detailed_translations.chinese: 极好的， 极出色的， 了不起的； 极大的； 难以相信的； 异想天开的， 不实际的； 奇异的， 古怪的
detailed_translations.english: extremely good, attractive, enjoyable etc

name: tidy
trans: 使整齐； 整理， 收拾

sentences.english: a tidy desk
sentences.chinese: 整洁的书桌

sentences.english: I try to keep the garden tidy .
sentences.chinese: 我尽量保持花园整洁。

sentences.english: Ellen’s room is always neat and tidy .
sentences.chinese: 埃伦的房间总是非常整洁。

detailed_translations.english: a room, house, desk etc that is tidy is neatly arranged with everything in the right place
to make a place look tidy

name: lame
trans: 跛的； 站不住脚的； 有缺陷的

sentences.english: a lame attempt to deflect criticism
sentences.chinese: 转移批评的一个无力的尝试

detailed_translations.chinese: 跛足的；僵痛的；不完全的；无说服力的；差劲的，蹩脚的
detailed_translations.english: a lame excuse or explanation is weak and difficult to believe
to make a person or animal unable to walk properly

name: apparatus
trans: 器械， 设备， 仪器， 装置

sentences.english: Astronauts have special breathing apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 航天员有专门的呼吸装装备。

sentences.english: The tax will require a massive administrative apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 税收需要大规模的行政机构。

detailed_translations.chinese: 器械，器具，仪器；机构，组织
detailed_translations.english: the set of tools and machines that you use for a particular scientific, medical, or technical purpose

name: decay
trans: 腐朽， 腐烂；衰减， 衰退

sentences.english: Her body was already starting to decay.
sentences.chinese: 她的尸体已经开始腐烂。

sentences.english: Most archaeological finds are broken, damaged, or decayed.
sentences.chinese: 大部分考古发现物都已破裂、损坏或腐烂。

sentences.english: decaying organic matter
sentences.chinese: 腐烂的有机物

sentences.english: In Orthodox Europe, mass religion seems to have decayed less.
sentences.chinese: 在正教会流行的欧洲地区，集体宗教信仰的影响力似乎衰退得没那么严重。

sentences.english: tooth decay
sentences.chinese: 蛀牙

detailed_translations.english: to be slowly destroyed by a natural chemical process, or to make something do this
the natural chemical change that causes the slow destruction of something

sentences.english: People need time to grieve after the death of a loved one.
sentences.chinese: 人们在所爱之人去世后会有一段悲伤期。

sentences.english: She grieved the loss of her only son.
sentences.chinese: 她因为失去唯一的儿子而悲痛。

detailed_translations.english: to feel extremely sad, especially because someone you love has died
if something grieves you, it makes you feel very unhappy

sentences.english: a stress fracture in his left knee
sentences.chinese: 他左膝上的应力性骨折

sentences.english: a hairline fracture
sentences.chinese: 细小的裂缝

sentences.english: The immense pressure causes the rock to fracture.
sentences.chinese: 巨大的压力造成岩石断裂。

detailed_translations.english: a crack or broken part in a bone or other hard substance
if a bone or other hard substance fractures, or if it is fractured, it breaks or cracks

sentences.english: the fight for liberty and equality
sentences.chinese: 争取自由和平等的斗争

detailed_translations.english: the freedom and the right to do whatever you want without asking permission or being afraid of authority

sentences.english: The fashion world just keeps recycling old ideas.
sentences.chinese: 时装界就是不停地翻新旧观念。

detailed_translations.english: to use something such as an idea, writing etc again instead of developing something new

sentences.english: Perhaps intelligence and civilisation are not what we should be concentrating on.
sentences.chinese: 也许智能和文明不属于我们应该关注的问题。

sentences.english: If I have understood you correctly, you are proposing to do nothing to prevent the likely collapse of industrial civilisation.
sentences.chinese: 如果我对你的理解正确的话，你在主张不做任何事情去防止可能的工业文明的崩溃。

sentences.english: Let us examine our history and see how men - the master race for all of our recorded history in almost every corner of every human civilisation - have fared so far.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，让我们检查一下我们的历史，并且看看男性——在我们所有现存历史，几乎每一个人类文明的角落都是统治者的族群，是如何发展的。

sentences.english: Smoke drifted up from the jungle ahead of us.
sentences.chinese: 我们前方的丛林里有烟升起。

sentences.english: Jenni spent the year drifting around Europe.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮这一年来一直在欧洲各地漂泊。

sentences.english: a drift towards longer working hours
sentences.chinese: 工作时间不知不觉的变长

sentences.english: the drift from the countryside to the cities
sentences.chinese: 大量人口从乡村往城市的流动

detailed_translations.english: to move slowly on water or in the air
a slow change or development from one situation, opinion etc to another

name: confidential
trans: 秘密的， 机密的；亲信的

sentences.english: a confidential government report
sentences.chinese: 一份机密的政府报告

sentences.english: Doctors are required to keep patients’ records completely confidential .
sentences.chinese: 医生必须对病人的病历完全保密。

sentences.english: The information will be regarded as strictly confidential (= completely confidential ) .
sentences.chinese: 这一信息将被视为绝对机密。

detailed_translations.english: spoken or written in secret and intended to be kept secret

sentences.english: The country was plunged into economic chaos.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家陷入了经济大混乱。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which everything is happening in a confused way and nothing is organized or arranged in order

sentences.english: Since earliest times, mankind has been fascinated by fire.
sentences.chinese: 人类自远古以来就对火很感兴趣。

sentences.english: one of the most important events in the history of mankind
sentences.chinese: 人类历史上最重要的事件之一

detailed_translations.english: all humans considered as a group

name: abundant
trans: 丰富的， 充分的， 充裕的

sentences.english: an abundant supply of fresh water
sentences.chinese: 充足的淡水供应

sentences.english: abundant opportunities for well qualified staff
sentences.chinese: 提供给高素质的员工的大量机会

detailed_translations.chinese: 丰富的， 富裕的； 大量的， 充足的
detailed_translations.english: something that is abundant exists or is available in large quantities so that there is more than enough

name: mute
trans: 哑的； 缄默的；弱化的， 微弱的

sentences.english: Billy continued to stand there, mute and defiant.

a small piece of metal, rubber etc that you place over or into a musical instrument to make it sound softer

sentences.chinese: 预报周末有雨。

to make a statement saying what is likely to happen in the future, based on the information that you have now

sentences.chinese: 埃塞尔的健康状况恶化了。

detailed_translations.english: to become worse

sentences.chinese: 幼苗发芽后，揭开盘上的遮盖物。

sentences.chinese: 你穿上制服我认不出你了。

sentences.english: One must recognise that homesickness is natural.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须承认思乡是正常的。

detailed_translations.english: to know who someone is or what something is, because you have seen, heard, experienced, or learned about them in the past

sentences.english: to input text/data/figures

sentences.english: data input
sentences.chinese: 数据输入

detailed_translations.english: to put information into a computer
the act of putting information into a computer; the information that you put in

name: induce
trans: 引诱， 劝使；引起， 导致

sentences.chinese: 没有什么能诱使我再投他的票了。

sentences.chinese: 医生们说手术可能导致心脏病。

sentences.chinese: 胆固醇水平异常

sentences.chinese: 我父母认为一个男孩子对芭蕾舞感兴趣并不正常。

sentences.chinese: 就是一单位的电子伏特。

sentences.chinese: 如果我把这两个乘起来，库仑乘以伏特是多少？

sentences.chinese: 电视成了逃避现实的一种方式。

sentences.english: I think the government has lost touch with reality (= no longer understands what is real or true ) .
sentences.chinese: 我认为政府已经脱离了现实。

sentences.english: political realities
sentences.chinese: 政治现实

sentences.chinese: 无纸化办公室有一天可能会成为现实。

detailed_translations.english: what actually happens or is true, not what is imagined or thought

trans: 机灵的， 敏锐的；精明的

sentences.chinese: 马尔科姆是个精明的商人。

sentences.chinese: 他的话严重冒犯了许多苏格兰人。

sentences.english: The careful language is designed not to offend.
sentences.chinese: 使用谨慎的语言是为了不得罪人。

sentences.english: In Western countries girls are far less likely to offend than boys.
sentences.chinese: 在西方国家，女孩们远不像男孩们那样容易犯罪。

to commit a crime or crimes

sentences.english: The molecules of oxygen gas contain just two atoms.
sentences.chinese: 氧分子中只有两个原子。

detailed_translations.english: the smallest unit into which any substance can be divided without losing its own chemical nature, usually consisting of two or more atoms

sentences.english: ...a memorandum from the Department of Defense on its role.
sentences.chinese: …一份来自国防部的有关其角色的备忘录。

detailed_translations.english: a  memo

sentences.chinese: 一位医院主管因为有人声称他的职位是骗来的而辞职了。

detailed_translations.english: to officially announce that you have decided to leave your job or an organization
to officially announce that you have decided to leave your job or an organization

name: safeguard
trans: 保护； 维护， 捍卫
防护装置； 预防措施

sentences.chinese: 国际安全条约防止核武器数量增加。

to protect something from harm or damage

name: diligent
trans: 勤奋的， 用功的 A

sentences.chinese: 勤勉的学生

name: sophisticated
trans: 尖端的， 复杂的， 先进的 <；老练的， 老于世故的

sentences.chinese: 很先进的软件

sentences.english: a highly sophisticated weapons system
sentences.chinese: 非常精密的武器系统

detailed_translations.english: a sophisticated machine, system, method etc is very well designed and very advanced, and often works in a complicated way

sentences.chinese: 富士山日出的照片

detailed_translations.english: the time when the sun first appears in the morning

sentences.chinese: 为了制造一个铝罐，就得消耗能源。

sentences.chinese: 自那以后，她就一直坐在那个铝制的宝座上。

sentences.chinese: 病房里的其他病人

name: scrutiny
trans: 仔细观察， 详细审查；监督 A

sentences.chinese: 他们的活动受到警方的严密监视。

detailed_translations.chinese: 详细检查， 仔细观察
detailed_translations.english: careful and thorough examination of someone or something

sentences.chinese: 那些狗看到他在跑就追他。

sentences.english: kids chasing around the house
sentences.chinese: 在屋里追逐嬉戏的孩子们

detailed_translations.chinese: 追逐， 追赶， 追求

sentences.chinese: 海洋生物繁多的种类

sentences.english: the effects of oil pollution on marine mammals

sentences.english: marine biology
sentences.chinese: 海洋生物学

detailed_translations.english: relating to the sea and the creatures that live there

sentences.chinese: 窗子打开了，冷不防一只狗探出头来。

sentences.chinese: 他突然想到了一个主意。

detailed_translations.english: to suddenly appear, especially when not expected

sentences.chinese: 美国汽车业的衰亡相对比较容易概括总结，悍马正是美国汽车业的缩影。

sentences.chinese: 约翰的离去打乱了他们的日常生活。

sentences.english: Try to get into a routine (= develop a fixed order of doing things ) .

sentences.chinese: 我每天的锻炼习惯

trans: 关税， 税率；价目表， 收费表

sentences.chinese: 美国想要取消电子类产品的关税。

sentences.chinese: 这家银行能为你提供外币。

sentences.chinese: 当地的货币是瑞士法郎。

detailed_translations.english: the system or type of money that a country uses

sentences.chinese: 我们沿着运河边往前走。

sentences.chinese: 巴拿马运河

detailed_translations.english: a long passage dug into the ground and filled with water, either for boats to travel along, or to take water to a place

name: convict
trans: 证明…有罪， 宣判…有罪

sentences.chinese: 埃塞俄比亚没有多余的食物。

trans: 动力的， 电动的；有生气的

sentences.chinese: 摘要研究了一类捕食者具有年龄结构的捕食系统的动力学行为。

trans: 通信， 信件；符合， 一致；相当， 相似

sentences.chinese: 本杂志无法答复有关医学方面的来信。

sentences.chinese: 我们之间的所有通信必须停止。

name: refresh
trans: 精神振作， 精力恢复

sentences.chinese: 洗个淋浴你就凉快了。

sentences.chinese: 他喝了杯冰茶提了提神。

trans: 阻止， 妨碍， 抑制

sentences.chinese: 不幸福的家庭生活可能会阻碍儿童的学习。

sentences.english: an intimate friend of Picasso’s
sentences.chinese: 毕加索的一个密友

sentences.chinese: 亲密的关系

sentences.chinese: 她与政府官员关系密切。

sentences.english: There have been a number of thefts in the area.
sentences.chinese: 该地区发生了几宗偷窃案。

sentences.english: the theft of £150 from the office
sentences.chinese: 办公室150英镑失窃

detailed_translations.english: an act of stealing something

sentences.chinese: 一些公司已经主动透露了类似的信息。

sentences.chinese: 他拒绝透露那位政治家的身份。

detailed_translations.english: to make something publicly known, especially after it has been kept secret

name: declaration
trans: 宣言， 宣布， 声明 <

sentences.english: to issue/sign a declaration
sentences.chinese: 发布 / 签署公告

sentences.english: the declaration of war
sentences.chinese: 宣战

sentences.english: the Declaration of Independence (= of the United States)
sentences.chinese: （美国）独立宣言

name: religion
trans: 宗教， 信仰；信念， 信条

sentences.english: The U.S. Constitution promises freedom of religion.
sentences.chinese: 美国宪法保证宗教信仰自由。

sentences.english: a course on philosophy and religion
sentences.chinese: 关于哲学和宗教的课程

sentences.english: the Islamic religion
sentences.chinese: 伊斯兰教

detailed_translations.english: a belief in one or more gods

sentences.english: This diagram will illustrate what I mean.
sentences.chinese: 这个图表可说明我的意思。

sentences.english: This is a simpler diagram than the one I just showed you but the principles are the same.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个比我刚展示的还要更简单的图解，但是原理是一样的。

sentences.chinese: 一个在内存空间中的，包含每个外设的名字和可由处理器设置的地址范围的表格或图表。

detailed_translations.chinese: 图解， 简图， 图表
detailed_translations.english: a simple drawing or plan that shows exactly where something is, what something looks like, or how something works

name: tragedy
trans: 悲剧； 惨事， 灾难

sentences.english: The tragedy happened as they were returning home from a night out.
sentences.chinese: 悲剧发生在他们夜里外出归来的路上。

sentences.english: Tragedy struck the family when their two-year-old son was killed in an accident.
sentences.chinese: 悲剧降临到这个家庭，他们两岁的儿子在一次事故中丧生。

detailed_translations.english: a very sad event, that shocks people because it involves death

name: charm
trans: 迷人， 使陶醉；施魔法于

sentences.chinese: 乔身上的稚趣

sentences.english: She turned on the charm (= used her charm ) to all the men.
sentences.chinese: 她对所有那些男人都施展魅力。

sentences.chinese: 这房间没有窗，简直就是牢房。

detailed_translations.english: a special quality someone or something has that makes people like them, feel attracted to them, or be easily influenced by them – used to show approval

sentences.english: iron oxide
sentences.chinese: 氧化铁

detailed_translations.english: a substance which is produced when a substance is combined with oxygen

sentences.english: She’s her mother in miniature.
sentences.chinese: 她是她母亲的缩影。

sentences.english: a miniature railway
sentences.chinese: 微型铁路

detailed_translations.english: exactly like something or someone but much smaller
much smaller than normal

sentences.english: a prosperous landowner
sentences.chinese: 富裕的土地拥有者

detailed_translations.english: rich and successful

sentences.english: a chart showing last year’s sales
sentences.chinese: 显示去年销售情况的一份图表

sentences.english: a weather chart
sentences.chinese: 天气图

sentences.english: the theatre’s seating chart
sentences.chinese: 剧场的座位图

detailed_translations.english: information that is clearly arranged in the form of a simple picture, set of figures,  graph  etc, or a piece of paper with this information on it

detailed_translations.chinese: 用图表表示， 在图上表示
detailed_translations.english: if a record charts, it enters the weekly list of the most popular records

sentences.english: The photographs evoked strong memories of our holidays in France.
sentences.chinese: 那些照片勾起了我们到法国度假的深刻回忆。

sentences.english: His appearance is bound to evoke sympathy.
sentences.chinese: 他的外表肯定会引起人们的同情。

sentences.english: Her speech evoked a hostile response.
sentences.chinese: 她的讲话引起了敌对的反应。

detailed_translations.chinese: 唤起， 引起， 使人想起
detailed_translations.english: to produce a strong feeling or memory in someone

name: preface
trans: 序言， 引言， 前言

sentences.english: ...the preface to Kelman's novel.
sentences.chinese: …凯尔曼小说的前言。

sentences.english: I will preface what I am going to say with a few lines from Shakespeare.
sentences.chinese: 我将引用莎士比亚的几行诗作为我讲话的开场白。

detailed_translations.english: an introduction at the beginning of a book or speech
If you preface an action or speech with something else, you do or say this other thing first

sentences.english: Then all three of you sign the contract and post in on the fridge.
sentences.chinese: 然后你们三个人要都在协议上签名，并把它贴在冰箱上。

sentences.english: I want this beer to chill so I'll leave it in the fridge for an hour.
sentences.chinese: 我想要啤酒变凉，因此我把它放在冰箱里一小时。

sentences.english: It can be anything: spoiled milk from the back of your fridge right down to tar and feathers.
sentences.chinese: 它可以是任何玩意儿：从你冰箱后面那些变质的牛奶到沥青和羽毛。

detailed_translations.english: a large piece of electrical kitchen equipment, used for keeping food and drinks cool

name: embryo
trans: 胚， 胚胎 <；事物的萌芽期

sentences.english: The system already exists in embryo.
sentences.chinese: 该体系已具雏形。

detailed_translations.english: an animal or human that has not yet been born, and has just begun to develop

sentences.english: My mother tilted her head and smiled.
sentences.chinese: 我妈妈歪着头笑了。

sentences.english: Ned’s mouth tilted upwards slightly at the corners.
sentences.chinese: 内德的嘴角微微翘起。

detailed_translations.english: to move a part of your body, especially your head or chin, upwards or to the side

name: secure
trans: 安全的； 可靠的； 放心的
得到某物， 获得；防护， 保卫

sentences.english: There are no secure jobs these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今已经没有铁饭碗了。

sentences.english: We want a secure future for our children.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望我们的孩子未来生活无虞。

sentences.english: United’s position at the top of the league seems relatively secure.
sentences.chinese: 联队在联赛中的头名位置似乎相对稳固。

sentences.chinese: 每个原子团簇是由中子和质子组成的。

detailed_translations.english: a part of an atom that has no electrical charge

name: locomotive
trans: 运动的， 移动的， 运载的

sentences.chinese: 我喜欢吃有黄瓜的三明治。

sentences.chinese: …航空工业。

name: appointment
trans: 任命， 委任；约定， 指定

sentences.chinese: 她站在那里，双手叉腰瞪着他。

sentences.english: a pessimistic view of life

detailed_translations.english: expecting that bad things will happen in the future or that something will have a bad result

sentences.english: a change of emphasis in government policy
sentences.chinese: 政府政策重心的变化

name: interrupt
trans: 中断， 遮断， 阻碍 A；打断， 打扰

sentences.chinese: 他的书在全世界卖出了两千多万本。

sentences.chinese: 经济作为竞选话题已经盖过环境问题。

trans: 吸收；浸泡， 浸湿 A

if you soak something, or if you let it soak, you keep it covered with a liquid for a period of time, especially in order to make it softer or easier to clean

在两地之间坐车往返； 通勤

trans: 支撑， 承受住；维持， 持续；遭受； 忍耐 <

sentences.chinese: 他重重地靠在她身上，让她几乎撑不住了。

sentences.chinese: 那架飞机已经达到了大约三万九千英尺的巡航高度。

detailed_translations.english: a strong vehicle with four wheels, used for carrying heavy loads and usually pulled by horses

sentences.chinese: 骑士完全有理由向前来拜访的朋友夸口，说他在牧羊人会馆的住所是他的安乐窝，退伍的上尉能象他这么逍遥自在的不多。

sentences.chinese: 那位医生过去曾碰到过好几个类似病例。

trans: 赞成， 同意； 满意
批准， 审定， 通过 <

sentences.chinese: 你从未赞赏过亨利，是吧？

sentences.chinese: 这肉太老了，我几乎嚼不动！

sentences.chinese: 所有受伤的行人中有1/3以上是儿童。

sentences.chinese: 我的工资直接存入我的银行账户。

sentences.chinese: 我在巴克莱银行开了一个账户。

sentences.chinese: 她终于睡着了，但睡得并不踏实。

sentences.chinese: 销售数据要到下个月的某个时候才会公布。

trans: 主要地， 大部分， 通常

sentences.chinese: 绿茶主要来自中国或日本。

sentences.chinese: 大厅里大约有15人，大部分是女性。

sentences.chinese: 他责怪他的父母，主要是责怪他爸爸。

detailed_translations.english: used to talk about most members of a group, most occasions, most parts of something etc

trans: 放射性的， 放射引起的

sentences.chinese: 如何处理放射性废物的问题

sentences.english: a consignment of highly radioactive plutonium
sentences.chinese: 发送的一批高放射性钚

detailed_translations.chinese: 放射性的， 有辐射能的
detailed_translations.english: a radioactive substance is dangerous because it contains  radiation (= a form of energy that can harm living things )

name: innocent
trans: 清白的， 无罪的；无害的； 没有恶意的；天真的， 单纯的； 无知的

sentences.english: Nobody would believe that I was innocent.
sentences.chinese: 没人肯相信我是清白的。

sentences.english: The court found him innocent and he was released.
sentences.chinese: 法庭判他无罪，他被释放了。

sentences.english: She had always regarded Greg as a hopeless innocent where women were concerned.
sentences.chinese: 她过去一直认为格雷格在关于女人方面是一个不可救药的无知者。

detailed_translations.english: not guilty of a crime

sentences.chinese: 现代俄语字母表有31个字母。

detailed_translations.english: a set of letters, arranged in a particular order, and used in writing

name: stride
trans: 大步走， 迈进； 跨过

sentences.chinese: 他大步向她走去。

sentences.english: Paco reached the door in only three strides.
sentences.chinese: 帕科三大步就走到了门口。

sentences.chinese: 我回家的路上碰到了一个流浪汉并给了他一些钱。

sentences.chinese: 在伦敦东面哈克尼的汤棚里呆了五分钟，我立刻明白了奥威尔那句“‘典型的流浪汉’不存在”是什么意思。

sentences.english: A tramp does not see such a meal twice in the year, in the spike or out of it.
sentences.chinese: 对于一个流浪汉而言，不论是在收容站还是在外面，如此丰盛的饭食他是见不到第二次的。

sentences.english: ...rumours that there were traitors among us who were sending messages to the enemy.
sentences.chinese: …谣言说我们中有正给敌人送信的叛徒。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is not loyal to their country, friends, or beliefs

name: appreciate
trans: 感谢， 感激；正确评价； 欣赏， 赏识 A

sentences.english: Thanks ever so much for your help, I really appreciate it.
sentences.chinese: 多谢你的帮助，我真的很感激。

sentences.english: I appreciate your concern , but honestly, I’m fine.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢你关心，不过说真的，我很好。

sentences.english: I’d appreciate it if you let me get on with my job.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能让我继续工作，我会非常感激。

sentences.english: Her abilities are not fully appreciated by her employer.
sentences.chinese: 她的才干没有得到雇主的充分赏识。

sentences.english: I’m not an expert, but I appreciate fine works of art.
sentences.chinese: 文例句：我不是专家，但我欣赏优秀的艺术作品。

name: trim
trans: 整理， 修整； 装饰

sentences.chinese: 皮特在修剪玫瑰丛周围的草坪。

sentences.chinese: 我每六周剪一次头发。

sentences.chinese: 不同年龄的儿童和成人在思维方式上有着质的差异。

sentences.chinese: 无论年龄大小，良好的口腔卫生和定期的牙齿保健都非常重要。
