name: diverse
trans: 多种多样的， 不同的

sentences.english: subjects as diverse as pop music and archaeology
sentences.chinese: 像流行音乐和考古学这样各不相同的学科

detailed_translations.english: very different from each other

name: rally
trans: 集合， 团结；恢复， 重新振作

sentences.english: After a shaky start, he rallied and won the title in style.
sentences.chinese: 虽然开局不顺，但他振作精神，最后漂亮地赢得了冠军。

sentences.english: The Tokyo stock market rallied later in the day.
sentences.chinese: 当天晚些时候东京股市止跌回升。

detailed_translations.chinese: 团结；重整；恢复；（网球等）连续对打
detailed_translations.english: to become stronger again after a period of weakness or defeat
a large public meeting, especially one that is held outdoors to support a political idea, protest etc

name: prime
trans: 首要的， 主要的；最好的， 第一流的
青春， 青壮年时期； 全盛时期

sentences.english: Smoking is the prime cause of lung disease.
sentences.chinese: 抽烟是引发肺部疾病的首要原因。

sentences.english: Our prime concern is providing jobs for all young school leavers.
sentences.chinese: 我们的头等大事是为所有的年轻毕业生提供工作。

sentences.english: He was named as the prime suspect in the murder investigation.
sentences.chinese: 在那宗谋杀案的调查中他被定为主要嫌疑人。

sentences.english: Good management is of prime importance in business.
sentences.chinese: 良好的经营管理在商业领域尤为重要。

detailed_translations.english: most important
the time in your life when you are strongest and most active
to prepare someone for a situation so that they know what to do

sentences.english: He sprang up from the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 他从沙发上猛然跳了起来。

sentences.english: She spread a sheet on the sofa for me.
sentences.chinese: 她为我在沙发上铺了一条单子。

sentences.english: There's enough space to have a sofa there.
sentences.chinese: 那里还有足够的地方放下一个沙发。

detailed_translations.english: a comfortable seat with raised arms and a back, that is wide enough for two or three people to sit on

name: festival
trans: 节日； 欢宴；音乐节， 戏剧节

sentences.english: the Swansea Festival of Music and the Arts
sentences.chinese: 斯旺西音乐艺术节

sentences.english: Christmas is one of the main festivals in the Christian Calendar.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节是基督教历的重大节日之一。

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔电影、戏剧、音乐等的〕节，节庆，会演；节日
detailed_translations.english: an occasion when there are performances of many films, plays, pieces of music etc, usually happening in the same place every year

sentences.english: a loyal supporter of the team
sentences.chinese: 球队的忠实支持者

sentences.english: her many years of loyal service to the company
sentences.chinese: 她在公司多年的忠诚服务

sentences.english: loyal customers
sentences.chinese: 忠实客户

detailed_translations.english: always supporting your friends, principles, country etc

name: preference
trans: 偏爱， 喜爱 A；优惠， 优先选择

sentences.english: Do you have a colour preference ?
sentences.chinese: 你有什么颜色上的偏好吗？

sentences.english: Parents may be able to express a preference as to the school their child will attend.
sentences.chinese: 家长也许可以表明愿意让孩子就读哪所学校。

sentences.english: The amount of sugar you add will depend on personal preference .
sentences.chinese: 加多少糖取决于个人的喜好。

sentences.english: Many elderly people expressed a strong preference to live in their own homes.
sentences.chinese: 许多老年人强烈表示喜欢住在自己的家里。

sentences.english: In allocating housing, preference is given to families with young children.
sentences.chinese: 房屋优先分配给有年幼孩子的家庭。

detailed_translations.english: if you have a preference for something, you like it more than another thing and will choose it if you can

name: court
trans: 法院， 法庭；宫廷， 朝廷；院子；球场 A

sentences.english: It could not be proved in a court of law.
sentences.chinese: 这无法在法庭上证实。

sentences.english: The court case lasted six weeks.
sentences.chinese: 这场诉讼持续了六个星期。

sentences.english: Four people will appear in court today, charged with fraud.
sentences.chinese: 今天将有四个人因被指控犯有欺诈罪出庭受审。

sentences.english: The court ruled that no compensation was due.
sentences.chinese: 法庭判决不予赔偿。

sentences.english: She threatened to take the magazine to court (= take legal action against them ) if they didn’t publish an immediate apology.
sentences.chinese: 她威胁说如果这家杂志不立刻刊登道歉声明，她就要把他们告上法庭。

detailed_translations.english: the place where a trial is held, or the people there, especially the judge and the jury who examine the evidence and decide whether someone is guilty or not guilty

sentences.english: His account was badly distorted by the press.
sentences.chinese: 他的话被报界严重歪曲。

sentences.english: an expensive subsidy which distorts the market
sentences.chinese: 扰乱市场秩序的高价补贴

detailed_translations.english: to report something in a way that is not completely true or correct

name: venture
trans: 冒险；冒险行动；投机活动； 商业冒险； 企业

sentences.english: business/commercial venture
sentences.chinese: 商业风投

sentences.english: When darkness fell, he would venture out.
sentences.chinese: 天黑以后，他就会壮着胆子出去。

detailed_translations.english: a new business activity that involves taking risks
to go somewhere that could be dangerous

name: discern
trans: 认出， 发现；辨别， 识别

sentences.english: You need a long series of data to be able to discern such a trend.
sentences.chinese: 你需要一大串数据才能认清这一趋势。

sentences.english: We could just discern a town in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 我们依稀看到远处有一座城镇。

detailed_translations.english: to notice or understand something by thinking about it carefully

sentences.english: Trains are taking a lot of freight that used to be routed via trucks.
sentences.chinese: 火车正在运送过去由卡车运送的大批货物。

detailed_translations.english: to send something somewhere using a particular route
a way from one place to another

sentences.english: Gillian and Darren greeted the speakers with great enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 吉利恩和达伦非常热情地接待了演讲者。

sentences.english: We went along to the local diving club, full of enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 我们兴高采烈地去了当地的潜水俱乐部。

sentences.english: They go about their tasks with little enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 他们执行任务时没多大干劲。

sentences.english: A delay of two hours did not dampen their enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 耽误了两小时没有减弱他们的热情。

detailed_translations.chinese: 热情， 热心， 热忱； 巨大兴趣
detailed_translations.english: a strong feeling of interest and enjoyment about something and an eagerness to be involved in it

name: flexible
trans: 柔韧的， 易弯曲的； 灵活的， 可变通的

sentences.english: We can be flexible about your starting date.
sentences.chinese: 你具体从哪天开始，我们可以灵活一点。

sentences.english: The government needs a more flexible approach to education.
sentences.chinese: 政府在处理教育问题上需要更加灵活。

detailed_translations.english: a person, plan etc that is flexible can change or be changed easily to suit any new situation

sentences.english: the liver, heart, and other internal organs
sentences.chinese: 肝脏、心脏及其他内脏器官

sentences.english: loss of blood flow to his vital organs
sentences.chinese: 他的生命器官供血不足

sentences.english: Extra doses of the hormone caused the animals’ reproductive organs to develop sooner than usual.
sentences.chinese: 额外使用激素使得这些动物的生殖器官比正常情况下发育得更快。

sentences.english: In Arizona, 480 people are waiting for organ transplants.
sentences.chinese: 亚利桑那州有480人在等待器官移植。

sentences.english: dying people who have agreed to be organ donors
sentences.chinese: 愿意捐献器官的垂死的病人

detailed_translations.english: a part of the body, such as the heart or lungs, that has a particular purpose

sentences.english: He spends hours in front of the mirror !
sentences.chinese: 他老是照镜子！

sentences.english: When I looked in the mirror I couldn’t believe it. I looked fantastic!
sentences.chinese: 我看着镜子简直不敢相信，我看上去棒极了！

sentences.english: Henry’s sad smile mirrored that of his son.
sentences.chinese: 亨利脸上那苦涩的笑容跟他儿子一模一样。

sentences.english: The economic recovery in Britain was mirrored in the US.
sentences.chinese: 美国出现了和英国相似的经济复苏。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of special glass that you can look at and see yourself in
if one thing mirrors another, it is very similar to it and may seem to copy or represent it

sentences.english: an operation to remove an obstruction from her throat
sentences.chinese: 去除她喉咙里阻塞物的手术

sentences.english: Police can remove a vehicle that is causing an obstruction.
sentences.chinese: 警察有权把造成阻塞的车辆移走。

detailed_translations.english: when something blocks a road, passage, tube etc, or the thing that blocks it

name: depict
trans: 描绘； 描写， 描述

sentences.english: a book depicting life in pre-revolutionary Russia
sentences.chinese: 描写革命前俄国人生活的一本书

detailed_translations.english: to describe something or someone in writing or speech, or to show them in a painting, picture etc

sentences.english: Jake stood shivering in the cold air.
sentences.chinese: 大冷天里，杰克站着冻得瑟瑟发抖。

sentences.english: A shiver ran through (= went through ) me.
sentences.chinese: 我浑身一阵颤抖。

detailed_translations.english: to shake slightly because you are cold or frightened
a slight shaking movement of your body caused by cold or fear

name: hop
trans: 单足跳跃， 单足跳行；齐足跳跃， 齐足跳行

sentences.english: a little girl hopping and skipping
sentences.chinese: 一个蹦蹦跳跳的小女孩

detailed_translations.chinese: 单足跳跃，单足跳行；齐足跳跃，齐足跳行
detailed_translations.english: to move by jumping on one foot
to move by jumping on one foot
a short jump

sentences.english: The room was filled with cases of liquor.
sentences.chinese: 房间里满是一箱箱的烈性酒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 酒，含酒精饮料；溶液；液体；烈酒
detailed_translations.english: a strong alcoholic drink such as whisky

name: honourable
trans: 可敬的；荣誉的， 光荣的

sentences.english: 长期而光荣的从政生涯
sentences.chinese: 长期而光荣的从政生涯

detailed_translations.english: deserving respect and admiration

sentences.english: Sabrina had none of the vanity so often associated with beautiful women.
sentences.chinese: 萨布里娜没有一点漂亮女人经常会有的那种虚荣。

detailed_translations.english: too much pride in yourself, so that you are always thinking about yourself and your appearance

sentences.english: the highly characteristic (= very typical ) flint walls of the local houses
sentences.chinese: 当地房子非常有特色的燧石墙

sentences.english: Violent images are a defining characteristic of his work.
sentences.chinese: 暴力形象是他作品的一个鲜明特征。

detailed_translations.english: very typical of a particular thing or of someone’s character
a quality or feature of something or someone that is typical of them and easy to recognize

sentences.english: The interior walls are all painted white.
sentences.chinese: 室内墙壁都粉刷成了白色。

sentences.english: The interior of the church was dark.
sentences.chinese: 教堂里很暗。

detailed_translations.english: inside or indoors
the inner part or inside of something

sentences.english: His banging roused the neighbours.
sentences.chinese: 他重重的关门声把邻居都吵醒了。

detailed_translations.english: to wake someone who is sleeping deeply

name: spark
trans: 导致， 产生；冒火花， 飞火星

sentences.english: sparks from the fire
sentences.chinese: 火里飞出的火星

sentences.english: The scrape of metal on metal sent up a shower of sparks .
sentences.chinese: 金属之间互相摩擦，迸出一串火星。

detailed_translations.english: a very small piece of burning material produced by a fire or by hitting or rubbing two hard objects together
a very small piece of burning material produced by a fire or by hitting or rubbing two hard objects together

name: integral
trans: 构成整体所必需的；完整的 <

sentences.english: Rituals, celebrations, and festivals form an integral part of every human society.
sentences.chinese: 仪式、庆典和节日是每个人类社会不可缺少的组成部分。

detailed_translations.english: Something that is an integral part of something is an essential part of that thing

sentences.english: Lubricate all moving parts with grease.
sentences.chinese: 给所有活动部件加润滑油。

detailed_translations.chinese: 润滑；涂油；起润滑剂作用
detailed_translations.english: to put a lubricant on something in order to make it move more smoothly

sentences.english: Halley’s comet
sentences.chinese: 哈雷彗星

detailed_translations.english: an object in space like a bright ball with a long tail, that moves around the sun

name: assembly
trans: 集合， 集会， 会议；装配

sentences.english: Police have imposed conditions on public assemblies.
sentences.chinese: 警方给公共集会设置了条件。

sentences.english: Restrictions on freedom of assembly have gradually been relaxed.
sentences.chinese: 对集会自由的限制渐渐放宽了。

sentences.english: an assembly point
sentences.chinese: 集合地点

sentences.english: instructions for assembly
sentences.chinese: 装配说明（书）

detailed_translations.english: the meeting together of a group of people for a particular purpose

name: hearing
trans: 听， 倾听 A；听力；审讯

sentences.english: a child with a hearing disability
sentences.chinese: 有听力障碍的儿童

detailed_translations.english: the sense which you use to hear sounds

sentences.english: Bullies are often cowards.
sentences.chinese: 恃强凌弱者往往是懦夫。

detailed_translations.english: someone who uses their strength or power to frighten or hurt someone who is weaker
to threaten to hurt someone or frighten them, especially someone smaller or weaker

sentences.english: the age of the silicon chip
sentences.chinese: 芯片时代

sentences.english: chip technology
sentences.chinese: 芯片技术

detailed_translations.chinese: 屑片， 碎片； 炸土豆条； 集成电路片， 集成块； 缺口， 瑕疵
detailed_translations.english: a small piece of  silicon  that has a set of complicated electrical connections on it and is used to store and  process  information in computers

sentences.english: He rubbed his chin thoughtfully.
sentences.chinese: 他若有所思地抚摸着下巴。

detailed_translations.chinese: 下巴；聊天；引体向上动作
detailed_translations.english: the front part of your face below your mouth

detailed_translations.chinese: 用下巴夹住；与…聊天；在单杠上作引体向上动作

sentences.english: The piston moves by steam pressure.
sentences.chinese: 活塞在蒸汽压力下运动。

sentences.english: The machine consists of cylinder, piston, rotary, shaft, gears, bearings, bolts, screws and stainless steel crusts.
sentences.chinese: 那台机器由气缸、活塞、旋转轴、齿轮、轴承、螺栓、螺丝钉和不锈钢外壳组成。

sentences.english: Because of particularity of structure and material, the piston must be measured by the non - contact method. but, at present there isn ' t mature technique.
sentences.chinese: 由于活塞结构和材料的特殊性，对于它的检测只能采用非接触测量的方法，而目前尚没有成熟的技术。

detailed_translations.english: a part of an engine consisting of a short solid piece of metal inside a tube, which moves up and down to make the other parts of the engine move

sentences.english: He threatened to pistol me.
sentences.chinese: 他威胁要用手枪向我射击。

sentences.english: He stowed a small pistol in her handbag.
sentences.chinese: 他在她的手袋里藏了一把小手枪。

sentences.english: He hopped back up the stairs and took his pistol.
sentences.chinese: 他赶紧返回到楼上，拿上了他的手枪。

detailed_translations.english: a small gun you can use with one hand

name: assemble
trans: 集合， 集会；装配， 组装

sentences.english: A large crowd had assembled outside the American embassy.
sentences.chinese: 一大群人聚集在美国大使馆外。

sentences.english: He looked around at the assembled company (=  all the people who had come there  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他环顾四周聚集的人群。

sentences.english: She had assembled a collection of her favourite songs.
sentences.chinese: 她收集了一些自己最喜欢听的歌。

sentences.english: The aircraft will continue to be assembled in France.
sentences.chinese: 飞机将继续在法国组装。

detailed_translations.english: if you assemble a large number of people or things, or if they assemble, they are gathered together in one place, often for a particular purpose

name: blast
trans: 一阵， 一股；爆炸冲击波；管乐器或汽笛声

sentences.english: I had the gas fire going full blast .
sentences.chinese: 我把煤气取暖器开到最大。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden strong movement of wind or air
to criticize someone or something very strongly – used especially in news reports

sentences.english: Elsie muttered something I couldn’t catch and walked off.
sentences.chinese: 埃尔茜咕哝了一句什么，我也没有听懂，她就走掉了。

sentences.english: ‘He’s such an unpleasant man,’ Alyssia muttered under her breath .
sentences.chinese: “他真是个讨厌的人。”阿莉西娅轻声嘟囔着。

detailed_translations.english: to speak in a low voice, especially because you are annoyed about something, or you do not want people to hear you

name: repel
trans: 击退；抵制， 拒绝 <；排斥； 讨厌

sentences.english: The smell repelled him.
sentences.chinese: 这气味让他反感。

detailed_translations.english: if something repels you, it is so unpleasant that you do not want to be near it, or it makes you feel ill

sentences.english: the series of events that led to the outbreak of war
sentences.chinese: 导致战争爆发的一系列事件

sentences.english: The police are investigating a series of attacks in the area.
sentences.chinese: 警方在调查该地区发生的一连串袭击事件。

sentences.english: There’s been a whole series of accidents on this road.
sentences.chinese: 这条路上发生了一连串的交通事故。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一系列， 连续； 丛书， 连续剧
detailed_translations.english: several events or actions of a similar type that happen one after the other

sentences.english: This cupboard’s full of junk.
sentences.chinese: 这个壁橱里塞满了杂物。

detailed_translations.english: old or unwanted objects that have no use or value
to get rid of something because it is old or useless

name: cultivate
trans: 耕作， 栽培； 养殖；培养， 教养； 磨炼

sentences.english: We cultivated maize and watermelons.
sentences.chinese: 我们种植玉米和西瓜。

detailed_translations.english: to plant and take care of a particular crop

sentences.english: plants that thrive in tropical rain forests
sentences.chinese: 在热带雨林蓬勃生长的植物

sentences.english: a business which managed to thrive during a recession
sentences.chinese: 在经济萧条时期也能顺利发展的一家企业

detailed_translations.english: to become very successful or very strong and healthy

name: imaginative
trans: 富有想象力的； 爱想象的

sentences.english: an imaginative use of computer technology
sentences.chinese: 计算机技术的妙用

sentences.english: children’s imaginative play
sentences.chinese: 儿童富有想象力的游戏

sentences.english: an imaginative solution to the litter problem
sentences.chinese: 解决乱扔垃圾的问题的有创意的方法

detailed_translations.english: containing new and interesting ideas

sentences.english: The boy has an analytic mind.
sentences.chinese: 这男孩有分析的头脑。

sentences.english: He has an analytic mind.
sentences.chinese: 他有一个善于分析的头脑。

sentences.english: Quantity and space both play a role in analytic geometry, differential geometry, and algebraic geometry.
sentences.chinese: 数量和空间在解析几何，微分几何和代数几何中都发挥作用。

detailed_translations.english: Analytic means the same as

sentences.english: I locked the door and dropped the keys in my purse.
sentences.chinese: 我锁上门，然后把钥匙丢进手提包里。

detailed_translations.chinese: (女士)手提袋；(国家、家庭、团体等的) 财力
detailed_translations.english: a bag in which a woman carries her money and personal things
if you purse your lips, you bring them together tightly into a small circle, especially to show disapproval or doubt

name: represent
trans: 描述； 表示；代表， 代理；阐明， 说明

sentences.english: Mr Kobayashi was chosen to represent the company at the conference.
sentences.chinese: 小林先生被选中代表公司出席会议。

detailed_translations.chinese: 作为…的代表， 表示， 象征； 描绘， 表现
detailed_translations.english: to officially speak or take action for another person or group of people

name: celebrity
trans: 名望， 著名， 名声；知名人士

sentences.english: a sporting celebrity
sentences.chinese: 体育明星

sentences.english: He’s a national celebrity.
sentences.chinese: 他是全国有名的人物。

sentences.english: We invited a number of minor celebrities (= people who are not very famous ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们邀请了一些小有名气的人物。

sentences.english: celebrity chef/gardener etc
sentences.chinese: 名厨/名人园艺师等

detailed_translations.english: a famous living person

name: dispatch
trans: 派遣， 调遣； 发送
急件， 快信；新闻报道

sentences.english: Goods are normally dispatched within 24 hours.
sentences.chinese: 货物一般在24小时内派送。

sentences.english: I was carrying dispatches from the ambassador.
sentences.chinese: 我正拿着大使的急件。

detailed_translations.english: to send someone or something somewhere for a particular purpose
a message or report sent quickly from one military officer to another or between government officials

sentences.english: The boss dropped an accountant from the payroll.
sentences.chinese: 老板把一名会计师从在职人员名单中除了名。

sentences.english: The accountant checked this unnecessary spending in good time.
sentences.chinese: 会计及时卡住了这笔不必要的开支。

sentences.english: They conferred with the accountant vis-à-vis the proposed budget.
sentences.chinese: 他们与会计商量有关预算提案的事。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to keep and check financial accounts, calculate taxes etc

name: sympathise
trans: 同情， 体谅； 共鸣， 同感

sentences.english: If they want national freedom, of course we sympathise.
sentences.chinese: 如果他们要求民族自由， 我们当然是同情的。

sentences.english: Anybody can sympathise with the sufferings of a friend, but it requires a very fine nature to sympathise with a friend's success.
sentences.chinese: 任何人都能对朋友的不幸感到同情，但要消受一个春风得意的朋友，则需要非常优良的天性。

sentences.english: Anybody can sympathise with the sufferings of a friend, but it requires a very fine nature to sympathise with a friend's success.
sentences.chinese: 同情一个朋友的苦难是任何人都能做到的，但同情一个朋友的成功则需要具有十分出色的素质。—— 王尔德。

sentences.english: The trail led over Boulder Pass before descending to a lake.
sentences.chinese: 小路越过博尔德山口，然后向下通往湖边。

sentences.english: The bus left a trail of black smoke behind it.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车开过，留下一股黑烟。

sentences.english: Police trailed the gang for several days.
sentences.chinese: 警察跟踪了那个团伙好几天。

detailed_translations.english: a rough path across countryside or through a forest
to follow someone by looking for signs that they have gone in a particular direction

name: cyberspace
trans: 计算机世界， 网络空间

sentences.english: Students are discovering the endless amount of information in cyberspace.
sentences.chinese: 学生在网络空间里不断发现无穷尽的信息。

detailed_translations.english: all the connections between computers in different places, considered as a real place where information, messages, pictures etc exist

sentences.english: It seems an absurd idea.
sentences.chinese: 这似乎是个荒唐的想法。

detailed_translations.english: completely stupid or unreasonable

sentences.english: You do not need any prior knowledge of the subject.
sentences.chinese: 你无需事先具备该方面的知识。

sentences.english: Changes may not be made without the prior approval of the council.
sentences.chinese: 未经委员会事先同意，不得作出改变。

sentences.english: Vegetarian meals are provided by prior agreement.
sentences.chinese: 经事先协商可提供素食。

sentences.english: Some prior experience with the software is needed.
sentences.chinese: 要求事先熟悉这个软件。

detailed_translations.english: existing or arranged before something else or before the present situation

sentences.english: Burglars broke into their home.
sentences.chinese: 窃贼闯进了他们家。

detailed_translations.english: someone who goes into houses, shops etc to steal things

name: trait
trans: 特征， 特点， 特性

sentences.english: The study found that some alcoholics had clear personality traits showing up early in childhood.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究发现一些酗酒者早在孩童时就表现出明显的个性特征。

detailed_translations.english: a particular quality in someone’s character

sentences.english: My keys were here a minute ago but now they’ve vanished.
sentences.chinese: 我的钥匙刚刚还在这里，现在却不翼而飞了。

sentences.english: The bird vanished from sight.
sentences.chinese: 那只鸟从视线中消失了。

sentences.english: She seemed to have just vanished into thin air (= suddenly disappeared in a very mysterious way ).
sentences.chinese: 她好像就蒸发了似的。

detailed_translations.english: to disappear suddenly, especially in a way that cannot be easily explained

sentences.english: She swam and sunbathed, went sightseeing and relaxed.
sentences.chinese: 她游泳，晒日光浴，观光，放松。

detailed_translations.english: when you visit famous or interesting places, especially as tourists

sentences.english: The picture shows six of the nine planets in the solar system.
sentences.chinese: 这张图片展示太阳系9个行星中的6个行星。

detailed_translations.english: A planet is a large, round object in space that moves around a star. The Earth is a planet.

name: generalise
trans: 归纳， 概括；推广， 普及

sentences.english: Several dead birds had been washed ashore.
sentences.chinese: 几只死鸟被冲上了岸。

detailed_translations.english: on or towards the shore of a lake, river, sea etc

sentences.english: He crept back up the stairs, trying to avoid the ones that creaked.
sentences.chinese: 他蹑手蹑脚地回楼上，尽量避开那些嘎吱作响的梯级。

detailed_translations.chinese: 爬行；蔓延；慢慢地移动；起鸡皮疙瘩
detailed_translations.english: if something such as an insect, small animal, or car creeps, it moves slowly and quietly

detailed_translations.chinese: 爬行；毛骨悚然的感觉；谄媚者

sentences.english: a Shakespearean scholar
sentences.chinese: 研究莎士比亚的学者

detailed_translations.english: someone who knows a lot about a particular subject, especially one that is not a science subject

name: vision
trans: 视觉， 视力；眼光， 洞察力

sentences.english: She suffered temporary loss of vision after being struck on the head.
sentences.chinese: 她头部受撞击以后出现暂时性失明。

sentences.english: Tears blurred her vision (= made it difficult for her to see ).
sentences.chinese: 泪水模糊了她的视线。

sentences.english: The idea came to her in a vision.
sentences.chinese: 她在神示中想到了这个主意。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to see

sentences.english: Children under 14 must be accompanied by an adult.
sentences.chinese: 14岁以下儿童必须有成人陪同。

sentences.english: Wherever her husband went, she would accompany him.
sentences.chinese: 不论丈夫去哪里，她都陪伴左右。

detailed_translations.chinese: 陪同， 伴随； 为…伴奏
detailed_translations.english: to go somewhere with someone

sentences.english: States differ in standards for products and the labelling thereof.
sentences.chinese: 各州的产品标准不同，标签的标注也不同。

sentences.english: Money, or the lack thereof , played a major role in their marital problems.
sentences.chinese: 钱，或者说没钱，是他们婚姻出现问题的主要原因。

detailed_translations.english: relating to something that has just been mentioned

sentences.english: a drug that has a beneficial effect on the immune system
sentences.chinese: 有益于免疫系统的一种药物

sentences.english: an arrangement that is mutually beneficial
sentences.chinese: 一项互惠互利的协定

detailed_translations.english: having a good effect

name: reckon
trans: 认为， 估计；计算， 测算

sentences.english: ‘There’s nothing we can do about it.’ ‘You reckon (= used to express doubt or disagreement ) ?’
sentences.chinese: “这件事我们无能为力。”“是吗？”

detailed_translations.english: spoken to think or suppose something

name: excerpt
trans: 摘录， 选录， 节录

sentences.english: ...an excerpt from Tchaikovsky's Nutcracker.
sentences.chinese: …柴可夫斯基的《胡桃夹子》选段。

detailed_translations.english: a short piece taken from a book, poem, piece of music etc

sentences.english: a scene of indescribable confusion
sentences.chinese: 难以形容的混乱场面

sentences.english: To avoid confusion, the teams wore different colours.
sentences.chinese: 为了避免混淆，各队穿着不同颜色的服装。

detailed_translations.english: a very confusing situation, that usually has a lot of noise and action, so that it is difficult for someone to understand it or control it

sentences.english: Anderson was to sing at the Constitution Hall auditorium.
sentences.chinese: 安德森将要在宪法厅的观众席演唱。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a theatre where people sit when watching a play, concert etc

sentences.english: Your arm should hinge from the shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 你的手臂应该像从肩膀铰链住一般。

sentences.english: Each compartment should have a hinged seal door with a concealed or piano-type hinge .
sentences.chinese: 每个隔室应具有一个带暗装或钢琴型铰链的铰接密封门。

sentences.english: GATE: external direct (opposite side of the hinge). Flow direction should climb over the gasket side.
sentences.chinese: 浇口：外部方向（铰链对面）。流向须爬过衬垫侧。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of metal fastened to a door, lid etc that allows it to swing open and shut
to attach something, using a hinge

name: blank
trans: 空白的， 空着的；失色的， 无表情的

sentences.english: Leave the last page blank.
sentences.chinese: 最后一页留空。

sentences.english: a blank cassette
sentences.chinese: 一盒空白磁带

sentences.english: When you’ve filled in the blanks , hand the form back to me.
sentences.chinese: 你填好表格以后把它交还给我。

detailed_translations.english: without any writing, print, or recorded sound
an empty space on a piece of paper, where you are supposed to write a word or letter

sentences.english: His landlord doubled the rent.
sentences.chinese: 他的房东把房租提高了一倍。

detailed_translations.english: a man who rents a room, building, or piece of land to someone

sentences.english: She’s got an analytical mind.
sentences.chinese: 她思维缜密。

detailed_translations.english: thinking about things in a detailed and intelligent way, so that you can examine and understand things

sentences.english: Board members met in closed session (= with nobody else present ) .
sentences.chinese: 委员会成员举行了闭门会议。

detailed_translations.english: a formal meeting or group of meetings, especially of a law court or parliament

sentences.english: Additional information can be obtained from the centre.
sentences.chinese: 可以从中心获取更多信息。

detailed_translations.english: more than what was agreed or expected

name: reception
trans: 接待； 招待会；接收， 接受； 接收效果

sentences.english: She was unsure of her reception after everything that had happened.
sentences.chinese: 发生了这些事后，她对自己是否还受欢迎没把握。

sentences.english: The plans received a mixed reception from unions (= some people liked them, others did not ) .
sentences.chinese: 各工会对这些计划反响不一。

detailed_translations.english: a particular type of welcome for someone, or a particular type of reaction to their ideas, work etc

name: tank
trans: 坦克 A；罐， 槽， 箱

sentences.english: The water tank is leaking.
sentences.chinese: 水箱在漏水。

sentences.english: Somehow the chemical got from a storage tank into water supplies.
sentences.chinese: 不知怎么的，这种化学物从储存箱进入了供水系统。

sentences.english: the plane’s fuel tank
sentences.chinese: 飞机的油箱

detailed_translations.english: a large container for storing liquid or gas

name: outward
trans: 向外的； 外面的； 外表的

sentences.english: The economy and outward appearance of the area have changed considerably.
sentences.chinese: 该地区的经济和面貌发生了很大的变化。

sentences.english: His clenched fist was the only outward sign of his anger.
sentences.chinese: 他那紧握的拳头是他内心愤怒的唯一外在表现。

sentences.english: Other poor countries looked outward, strengthening their ties to the economic superpowers.
sentences.chinese: 其他的穷国向外看，加强它们和经济大国的联系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 向外的；外面的；公开的；外服的；肉体的
detailed_translations.english: relating to how a person or situation seems to be, rather than how it really is

detailed_translations.chinese: 向外（等于outwards）；在外；显而易见地
detailed_translations.english: If you say that a person or a group of people, such as a government, looks outward, you mean that they turn their attention to another group that they are interested in or would like greater involvement with

sentences.english: It serves you bloody well right.
sentences.chinese: 你实在是活该。

detailed_translations.chinese: 血腥的；非常的；嗜杀的，残忍的；血色的
detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize an angry statement or order
to injure someone so that blood comes, or to cover something with blood

name: sole
trans: 单独的， 唯一的；专有的， 独用的 <

sentences.english: the sole American in the room
sentences.chinese: 房间里唯一的美国人

sentences.english: Griffiths is the sole survivor of the crash.
sentences.chinese: 格里菲思是此次撞车事故唯一的幸存者。

sentences.english: The soles of his feet were caked in mud.
sentences.chinese: 他的脚掌上沾满了泥巴。

sentences.english: the soles of her shoes
sentences.chinese: 她鞋子的鞋底

detailed_translations.english: the sole person, thing etc is the only one
the bottom surface of your foot, especially the part you walk or stand on

sentences.english: water vapour
sentences.chinese: 水蒸气

detailed_translations.english: a mass of very small drops of a liquid which float in the air, for example because the liquid has been heated

sentences.english: the members of the jury
sentences.chinese: 陪审团成员

sentences.english: The jury found him not guilty.
sentences.chinese: 陪审团裁定他无罪。

sentences.english: the right to trial by jury
sentences.chinese: 由陪审团进行审理的权利

detailed_translations.english: a group of 12 ordinary people who listen to the details of a case in court and decide whether someone is guilty or not

sentences.english: A blue bus lumbered past.
sentences.chinese: 一辆蓝色公共汽车慢吞吞地驶过。

detailed_translations.chinese: 伐木；喧闹地向前走；笨重地行动，缓慢地移动
detailed_translations.english: to move in a slow awkward way

detailed_translations.chinese: 木材；废物，无用的杂物；隆隆声
detailed_translations.english: pieces of wood used for building, that have been cut to specific lengths and widths

sentences.english: the holy city of Varanasi
sentences.chinese: 圣城瓦拉纳西

detailed_translations.english: connected with God and religion

sentences.english: ‘You are an idiot, ’ he tells them.
sentences.chinese: ‘你确实是傻瓜，’他对他们说。

sentences.english: Reader, suppose you were an idiot. And suppose you were a member of Congress. But I repeat myself.
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的读者，假设你是一个白痴。再假设你是一名国会成员。不过我的话说重复了。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is mentally ill or has a very low level of intelligence

name: solo
trans: 单独的， 单独进行的
独奏 ， 独唱 ， 独舞

sentences.english: a gorgeous piano solo
sentences.chinese: 一首极其美妙的钢琴独奏曲

sentences.english: He had just completed his final solo album.
sentences.chinese: 他刚刚完成他最后一张个人专辑。

sentences.english: When did you first fly solo?
sentences.chinese: 你第一次单独飞行是什么时候？

sentences.english: a solo effort
sentences.chinese: 独自的努力

sentences.english: a solo album
sentences.chinese: 独唱专辑

detailed_translations.english: a piece of music for one performer
done alone without anyone else helping you

sentences.english: I had to have extra tuition in maths.
sentences.chinese: 我不得不上数学补习课。

detailed_translations.english: teaching, especially in small groups

sentences.english: How much is the postage for a postcard?
sentences.chinese: 寄一张明信片的邮资是多少？

detailed_translations.english: the money charged for sending a letter, package etc by post

name: tame
trans: 驯服的， 温顺的 <；沉闷的， 乏味的

sentences.english: Most of the criticism has been pretty tame.
sentences.chinese: 评论的大部分内容很乏味。

sentences.english: I decided that teaching was too tame for me.
sentences.chinese: 我最终认为教书对我来说太枯燥。

detailed_translations.chinese: 驯服的，顺从的；沉闷的，乏味的
detailed_translations.english: dull and disappointing

detailed_translations.chinese: 制服， 控制并利用； 驯化， 驯服
detailed_translations.english: to reduce the power or strength of something and prevent it from causing trouble

sentences.english: A vacant plot of land adjoins his house.
sentences.chinese: 有一块空地紧挨着他家。

detailed_translations.english: to be next to or joined to sth

name: spectacular
trans: 壮观的； 引人注目的

sentences.english: a mountainous area with spectacular scenery
sentences.chinese: 景色壮丽的山区

sentences.english: a spectacular success
sentences.chinese: 辉煌的成就

sentences.english: a television spectacular
sentences.chinese: 场面盛大的电视节目

detailed_translations.english: very impressive
an event or performance that is very large and impressive

name: peculiar
trans: 古怪的， 异常的 A <；特殊的， 特有的 <

sentences.english: He’s been a little peculiar lately.
sentences.chinese: 最近他有点怪异。

sentences.english: She’s a very peculiar child.
sentences.chinese: 她是个非常古怪的孩子。

detailed_translations.english: behaving in a strange and slightly crazy way

sentences.english: ..familiar idioms and metaphors, such as "turning over a new leaf.
sentences.chinese: …如“翻开新的一页”这样熟悉的习语和比喻。

detailed_translations.english: a group of words that has a special meaning that is different from the ordinary meaning of each separate word. For example, ‘under the weather’ is an idiom meaning ‘ill’.

name: hug
trans: 拥抱； 搂抱； 抱紧

sentences.english: We stood there crying and hugging each other.
sentences.chinese: 我们站在那里哭着互相拥抱。

sentences.english: She went to her daughter and hugged her tightly .
sentences.chinese: 她走到女儿身边，紧紧地拥抱她。

detailed_translations.english: to put your arms around someone and hold them tightly to show love or friendship
to put your arms around someone and hold them tightly to show love or friendship
the action of putting your arms around someone and holding them tightly to show love or friendship

name: muscular
trans: 肌肉的；肌肉发达的；强健的

sentences.english: She was fast and strong, with a slender, muscular body.
sentences.chinese: 她动作敏捷，身体强壮，身材苗条，肌肉结实。

sentences.english: He’s very muscular.
sentences.chinese: 他很强壮。

detailed_translations.english: having large strong muscles

name: hum
trans: 哼曲子；发嗡嗡声；忙碌； 活跃， 充满活力
嗡嗡声， 营营声， 嘈杂声

sentences.english: He began to hum a tune.
sentences.chinese: 他开始哼唱一支曲子。

detailed_translations.english: to sing a tune by making a continuous sound with your lips closed
a low continuous sound

sentences.english: The sea sparkled in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 阳光下大海碧波闪耀。

sentences.english: The crystal chandelier sparkled.
sentences.chinese: 那水晶枝形吊灯闪闪发光。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发光，闪耀，闪烁；活跃，焕发
detailed_translations.english: to shine in small bright flashes

detailed_translations.chinese: 闪光， 闪耀， 闪烁； 活力， 生气
detailed_translations.english: a bright shiny appearance, with small points of flashing light

sentences.english: I really envy you and Ian, you seem so happy together.
sentences.chinese: 我真是羡慕你和伊恩，你俩在一起看起来多幸福。

sentences.english: She has a lifestyle which most people would envy.
sentences.chinese: 她的生活方式会令大多数人感到羡慕。

sentences.english: She could see that all the other girls were green with envy(= feeling a lot of envy ).
sentences.chinese: 她看得出其他女孩都很眼红。

detailed_translations.english: to wish that you had someone else’s possessions, abilities etc
the feeling of wanting something that someone else has

name: staple
trans: 用订书钉订， 把…订起来

sentences.english: Oil is Nigeria’s staple export.
sentences.chinese: 石油是尼日利亚的主要出口产品。

sentences.english: a staple ingredient of comedy
sentences.chinese: 喜剧最重要的成分

detailed_translations.chinese: 主要的； 经常需要的
detailed_translations.english: forming the greatest or most important part of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 订书钉，U形钉；主食；主要产品
detailed_translations.english: a small piece of thin wire that is pushed into sheets of paper and bent over to hold them together
to fasten two or more things together with a staple

sentences.english: a wooden hut
sentences.chinese: 小木屋

detailed_translations.english: a small simple building with only one or two rooms

sentences.english: I sent him a memo reminding him about the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 我发给他一个通知，提醒他开会的事。

detailed_translations.english: a short official note to another person in the same company or organization

sentences.english: At school the other children treated them like royalty .
sentences.chinese: 在学校里，其他孩子将他们奉若王族。

detailed_translations.english: members of a royal family

sentences.english: Much later he collaborated with his son Michael on the English translation of a text on food production.
sentences.chinese: 后来他和儿子迈克尔合作，把一个有关食品生产的文本翻译成英语。

detailed_translations.english: to work together with a person or group in order to achieve something, especially in science or art

name: superficial
trans: 表面的 <；肤浅的， 浅薄的 <

sentences.english: Despite their superficial similarities, the two novels are, in fact, very different.
sentences.chinese: 这两本小说尽管表面上有相似之处，但实际上大不一样。

sentences.english: They only have the most superficial understanding of prison life.
sentences.chinese: 他们对监狱生活只有最粗浅的了解。

detailed_translations.english: seeming to have a particular quality, although this is not true or real

name: executive
trans: 总经理； 董事； 行政负责人

sentences.english: a commission with executive powers
sentences.chinese: 有执行权的委员会

detailed_translations.english: relating to the job of managing a business or organization and making decisions
a group of people who are in charge of an organization and make the rules

name: tablet
trans: 药片；碑， 匾； 平板

sentences.english: She took a couple of headache tablets .
sentences.chinese: 她吃了几片头痛药。

detailed_translations.chinese: 碑；药片；写字板；小块；平板电脑
detailed_translations.english: a small round hard piece of medicine which you swallow

detailed_translations.chinese: 用碑牌纪念；将(备忘录等)写在板上；将…制成小片或小块

name: hook
trans: 钩； 吊钩； 钩状物

sentences.english: We hooked the trailer to the back of the car.
sentences.chinese: 我们把拖车挂在汽车尾部。

sentences.english: a dress that hooks at the back
sentences.chinese: 从后背用钩扣的连衣裙

detailed_translations.english: to fasten or hang sth on sth else using a hook; to be fastened or hanging in this way

sentences.english: It was warmer now, and the snow was beginning to melt.
sentences.chinese: 现在天气暖和了，雪开始融化。

sentences.english: Melt the butter in a saucepan.
sentences.chinese: 把黄油放在深平底锅里化开。

detailed_translations.english: if something solid melts or if heat melts it, it becomes liquid

name: action
trans: 行动， 行为；动作， 活动；作用

sentences.english: The government must take action (=do something) now to stop the rise in violent crime.
sentences.chinese: 政府现在必须采取行动遏止暴力犯罪的上升。

detailed_translations.english: the process of doing something, especially in order to achieve a particular thing

sentences.english: the new Olympic Stadium
sentences.chinese: 新的奥林匹克体育场

detailed_translations.chinese: 体育场；露天大型运动场
detailed_translations.english: a building for public events, especially sports and large rock music concerts, consisting of a playing field surrounded by rows of seats

sentences.english: Once an isolated highland, it has been the home shared by people of more than 10 nationalities, with pure blue sky, clear and beautiful lake as well as the legendary matriarchal community.
sentences.chinese: 这里曾是与世界隔离的地方，一个10多个民族混居的地方。 有高原上湛蓝纯净的天空，清澈美丽的湖水，还有传说中的母系社会。

sentences.english: There are a number of Highland Games held through the highlands Scotland.
sentences.chinese: 有大量的高地游戏存在于苏格兰的丘陵地带。

detailed_translations.english: relatively high ground
relating to the Scottish Highlands or its people

name: displacement
trans: 移置， 转移； 取代

sentences.english: the displacement of traditional agriculture by industrial crops
sentences.chinese: 经济作物对传统农业的替代

detailed_translations.english: the act of displacing sb/sth; the process of being displaced

sentences.english: We have had our first casualty. One runner has dropped out with cramp.
sentences.chinese: 我们有了第一位伤员，有一位队员因腿部痉挛退出了。

sentences.english: Any history of bombing must also be a history of civilian casualty, for bombing saves the lives of soldiers only at the expense of other lives.
sentences.chinese: 任何空袭的历史也必定是平民伤亡的历史，因为空袭救了士兵的性命只能以其他人的生命为代价。

sentences.english: The first item always on that was the overnight casualty report from Iraq and Afghanistan, and I would often come and see that had been circled by the president or that he would be reflecting on that.
sentences.chinese: 上面的第一条永远是,这一晚在伊拉克和阿富汗,士兵的伤亡报告，我来的时候会看到那条消息,被布什总统圈了出来,他看着报告会陷入沉思。

name: gauge
trans: 标准尺寸， 规格； 量规， 量表

sentences.english: Retail sales are a gauge of consumer spending.
sentences.chinese: 零售额是衡量消费支出的一个标准。

detailed_translations.chinese: 计量器；标准尺寸；容量规格
detailed_translations.english: an instrument for measuring the size or amount of something
to measure or calculate something by using a particular instrument or method

sentences.english: He went outside to chop some more wood for the fire.
sentences.chinese: 他出去再砍些木材来生火。

sentences.english: Can you chop up some carrots for me?
sentences.chinese: 你能帮我切一些胡萝卜吗？

sentences.english: Add two finely chopped onions and a clove of garlic.
sentences.chinese: 加上两个切碎的洋葱和一瓣大蒜。

detailed_translations.english: to cut something into smaller pieces
to cut something into smaller pieces

name: sensitive
trans: 敏感的， 灵敏的；易受伤害的

sentences.english: a very sensitive child
sentences.chinese: 一个很敏感的小孩

sentences.english: a highly sensitive electronic camera
sentences.chinese: 高敏感度的电子摄像机

detailed_translations.english: easily upset or offended by events or things that people say

sentences.english: ‘I don’t see why I should take the blame for this!’ she protested.
sentences.chinese: “我不明白为什么我要对此承担责任！”她抗议道。

detailed_translations.english: to come together to publicly express disapproval or opposition to something
something that you do to show publicly that you think that something is wrong and unfair, for example taking part in big public meetings, refusing to work, or refusing to buy a company’s products

sentences.english: Only a few apartments were still vacant.
sentences.chinese: 只有几套公寓仍然空着。

sentences.english: There was only a vacant lot (= empty unused area of land in a city ) where her house used to be.
sentences.chinese: 她以前房子所在的地方只剩下一块空地了。

detailed_translations.english: a vacant seat, building, room or piece of land is empty and available for someone to use

sentences.english: Police finally managed to catch the culprit.
sentences.chinese: 警察终于抓住了罪犯。

detailed_translations.chinese: 犯人，罪犯；被控犯罪的人
detailed_translations.english: the person who is guilty of a crime or doing something wrong

name: underground
trans: 地下的， 地面下的；秘密的

sentences.english: This animal spends most of its life underground.
sentences.chinese: 这种动物一生中的大部分时间都待在地下。

sentences.english: nuclear waste buried deep underground
sentences.chinese: 深埋在地下的核废物

detailed_translations.english: under the earth’s surface

detailed_translations.chinese: 地下的；秘密的；先锋派的
detailed_translations.english: below the surface of the earth

detailed_translations.chinese: 地下；地铁；地道；地下组织；秘密活动；先锋派团体
detailed_translations.english: a railway system under the ground

name: impression
trans: 印象； 感想；盖印， 压痕

sentences.english: When we looked around the school we got a very good impression.
sentences.chinese: 我们参观了学校，对它的印象很好。

sentences.english: I got the impression that she wasn’t very happy with her job.
sentences.chinese: 我有这样的印象，她的工作干得并不愉快。

sentences.english: Some of the fallen trees had left a clear impression in the hardened mud.
sentences.chinese: 有一些倒下的树木在坚硬的泥地上留下了清晰的压痕。

detailed_translations.english: the opinion or feeling you have about someone or something because of the way they seem

name: machinery
trans: 机器， 机械； 机制

sentences.english: ...quality tools and machinery.
sentences.chinese: …优质工具和机械。

detailed_translations.english: You can use machinery to refer to machines in general, or machines that are used in a factory or on a farm

name: shield
trans: 防护物， 护罩；盾， 盾状物 A

sentences.english: He clanged his sword three times on his shield.
sentences.chinese: 他用他的剑当当当地敲了3下盾。

sentences.english: He used his left hand as a shield against the reflecting sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 他用左手遮挡反射过来的阳光。

sentences.english: He held up his hands, shielding his eyes from the sun.
sentences.chinese: 他抬手遮住眼睛免受阳光照射。

detailed_translations.english: a large piece of metal or leather that soldiers used in the past to protect themselves when fighting
to protect someone or something from being harmed or damaged

name: inference
trans: 推理， 推论， 推断；推断结果， 结论

sentences.english: There were two inferences to be drawn from her letter.
sentences.chinese: 从她的来信可以得到两种推论。

detailed_translations.english: something that you think is true, based on information that you have

name: deliver
trans: 交付， 递送； 释放；发表； 表达；接生

sentences.english: The morning mail has just been delivered.
sentences.chinese: 早晨的邮件刚送到。

sentences.english: Do you deliver on Saturdays?
sentences.chinese: 星期六你们送货吗？

sentences.english: I’m having some flowers delivered for her birthday.
sentences.chinese: 我在安排人给她送花祝贺生日。

detailed_translations.english: to take goods, letters, packages etc to a particular place or person

sentences.english: modern methods of instantaneous communication
sentences.chinese: 现代的即时通信方法

detailed_translations.english: happening immediately

sentences.english: Homelessness is not a new phenomenon .
sentences.chinese: 无家可归已不是什么新现象。

detailed_translations.english: something that happens or exists in society, science, or nature, especially something that is studied because it is difficult to understand

name: obsession
trans: 牵挂， 惦念；迷住， 入迷； 困扰；萦绕于心的事物或人；固执的念头 <

sentences.english: Gambling became an obsession, and he eventually lost everything.
sentences.chinese: 他迷上赌博，最后失去了一切。

sentences.english: The game pachinko became a national obsession.
sentences.chinese: 弹珠机游戏已经风靡全国。

sentences.english: He has an enthusiasm for art, to the point of obsession in my opinion.
sentences.chinese: 他对艺术很热衷，在我看来已经到了痴迷的程度。

sentences.english: She looked after him with a devotion bordering on obsession.
sentences.chinese: 她尽心尽力地照顾他，简直到了沉迷的地步。

detailed_translations.chinese: 痴迷；困扰；[内科][心理] 强迫观念
detailed_translations.english: an extreme unhealthy interest in something or worry about something, which stops you from thinking about anything else

name: notify
trans: 通知， 告知； 报告

sentences.english: You will be notified of any changes in the system.
sentences.chinese: 系统中有任何变化都会通知你。

sentences.english: In August we were notified that our article had been rejected.
sentences.chinese: 8月份我们接到通知，说我们的文章不予采用。

detailed_translations.english: to formally or officially tell someone about something

sentences.english: On New Year's Eve we had a barbecue on the beach.
sentences.chinese: 除夕那天我们在海滩上举行了烧烤野餐。

sentences.english: barbecued chicken
sentences.chinese: 〔用烤架烧的〕烤鸡

detailed_translations.english: a meal or party during which food is cooked on a metal frame over a fire and eaten outdoors
to cook food on a metal frame over a fire outdoors

sentences.english: We will keep your details on file (= store them for later use ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们将把你的详细资料存档。

sentences.english: The contracts are filed alphabetically.
sentences.chinese: 这些合同是按字母顺序归档的。

detailed_translations.english: a set of papers, records etc that contain information about a particular person or subject
to keep papers, documents etc in a particular place so that you can find them easily

sentences.english: At the end of this chapter there is a select bibliography of useful books.
sentences.chinese: 本章末尾附着有用书籍的精选书目。

detailed_translations.english: a list of all the books and articles used in preparing a piece of writing

name: generalize
trans: 归纳， 概括；推广， 普及

sentences.english: She has a tendency to generalize from her husband to all men.
sentences.chinese: 她总爱把自己对丈夫的看法推及所有的男人。

detailed_translations.english: to form a general principle or opinion after considering only a small number of facts or examples

sentences.english: Michael’s shoulders heaved with silent laughter.
sentences.chinese: 迈克尔憋着不笑出声来，双肩直抖。

sentences.english: The sea heaved up and down beneath the boat.
sentences.chinese: 船的下面大海波涛汹涌。

detailed_translations.english: to move up and down with very strong movements

detailed_translations.chinese: 举起，提起，拉起，拖；扔；发出
detailed_translations.english: to pull or lift something very heavy with one great effort

detailed_translations.chinese: 举起； 起伏， 升降
detailed_translations.english: a strong rising or falling movement

sentences.english: The cream contains vitamin A to nourish the skin.
sentences.chinese: 这种护肤霜含有滋养肌肤的维生素A。

sentences.english: a well nourished baby
sentences.chinese: 营养良好的婴儿

detailed_translations.english: to give a person or other living thing the food and other substances they need in order to live, grow, and stay healthy

name: grease
trans: 动物脂， 油脂； 润滑油

sentences.english: ...grease-stained hands.
sentences.chinese: …沾满了油渍的手。

sentences.english: I greased front and rear hubs and adjusted the brakes.
sentences.chinese: 我把前后轮轴都加了润滑油并调试了刹车。

detailed_translations.chinese: 动物脂， 油脂； 润滑油
detailed_translations.english: a fatty or oily substance that comes off meat when it is cooked, or off food made using butter or oil
If you grease a part of a car, machine, or device, you put grease on it in order to make it work smoothly

sentences.english: She alleged that there was rampant drug use among the male members of the group.
sentences.chinese: 她指称该组织中有大量的男性成员吸毒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 断言， 宣称， 硬说
detailed_translations.english: to say that something is true or that someone has done something wrong, although it has not been proved

sentences.english: We shone our torches around the cavern.
sentences.chinese: 我们用手电筒照着山洞。

detailed_translations.chinese: 火把，火炬；手电筒；启发之物
detailed_translations.english: a small electric lamp that you carry in your hand

name: positive
trans: 积极的； 肯定的 <；确实的， 明确的；〈美〉正电的； 【化】阳性的；十足的， 完全的

sentences.english: At least something positive has come out of the situation.
sentences.chinese: 至少这个情况也产生了一些积极的东西。

sentences.english: Write down all the positive things about your life.
sentences.chinese: 记下生活中所有好的事情。

sentences.english: The rural environment was having a positive effect on the children’s health.
sentences.chinese: 乡村环境对孩子们的健康有好处。

sentences.english: It’s been a very positive experience for her.
sentences.chinese: 那对她来说是一次非常有益的经历。

sentences.english: TV can be a positive influence .
sentences.chinese: 电视也会有好的影响。

sentences.english: the positive contribution to the community made by many older people
sentences.chinese: 许多老年人为社区做出的积极贡献

sentences.english: It’s been a difficult time but, on the positive side , I feel physically fine.
sentences.chinese: 日子过得不容易，不过从好的方面看，我的身体状况还不错。

sentences.english: Women should be portrayed in a more positive light .
sentences.chinese: 应该从更正面的角度来描绘女性。

detailed_translations.chinese: 确实的， 明确的； 积极的， 肯定的
detailed_translations.english: good or useful

sentences.english: He took aim and squeezed the trigger.
sentences.chinese: 他瞄准目标，扣动了扳机。

sentences.english: The assassination triggered off a wave of rioting.
sentences.chinese: 这次暗杀事件引发了一阵骚乱。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a gun that you pull with your finger to fire it
to make something happen very quickly, especially a series of events

name: favourite
trans: 特别喜欢的， 中意的

sentences.english: a child’s favourite toy
sentences.chinese: 孩子最喜欢的玩具

sentences.english: What’s your favourite colour?
sentences.chinese: 你最喜欢什么颜色？

sentences.english: a favorite spot for picnickers
sentences.chinese: 野餐者最喜欢的地方

detailed_translations.english: your favourite person or thing is the one that you like the most
something that you like more than other things of the same kind

sentences.english: A large detachment of police was used to segregate the two rival camps of protesters.
sentences.chinese: 一大队分遣警察被派来隔离两群敌对的抗议者。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使隔离；使分离；在…实行种族隔离
detailed_translations.english: to separate one group of people from others, especially because they are of a different race, sex, or religion

name: prospect
trans: 景色；前景， 前途， 展望

sentences.english: The prospect of marriage terrified Alice.
sentences.chinese: 想到要结婚，艾丽斯害怕极了。

sentences.english: I had no job, no education, and no prospects .
sentences.chinese: 我没有工作，没受过什么教育，前途渺茫。

detailed_translations.english: a particular event which will probably or definitely happen in the future – used especially when you want to talk about how you feel about it

sentences.english: The coastline can now be monitored by radar.
sentences.chinese: 现在能用雷达监测海岸线了。

sentences.english: We could see the plane quite clearly on the radar screen.
sentences.chinese: 我们在雷达屏幕上可清晰地看到飞机。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that uses radio waves to find the position of things and watch their movement

name: withhold
trans: 拒给， 不给；使停止； 阻挡

sentences.english: I withheld payment until they had completed the work.
sentences.chinese: 我扣着钱，直到他们完工。

sentences.english: Ian was accused of withholding vital information from the police.
sentences.chinese: 伊恩被控向警方隐瞒重要信息。

detailed_translations.english: to refuse to give someone something

sentences.english: Refugees were streaming across the border.
sentences.chinese: 难民正涌过边境。

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["refugee camps"]}
sentences.chinese: 难民营

detailed_translations.chinese: 难民，避难者；流亡者，逃亡者
detailed_translations.english: someone who has been forced to leave their country, especially during a war, or for political or religious reasons

name: specialize
trans: 专攻； 专用于； 专业化

sentences.english: "I think the feedback can be helpful because we all have blinders on when we fall in love, " says Eva Ritvo, a Miami psychiatrist who specialize sin marriage and family therapy.
sentences.chinese: 专门从事婚姻与家庭疗法研究的迈阿密精神病专家瑞塔沃说：“我认为信息回馈是有用的，因为人们在恋爱时都会变得盲目。

sentences.english: The research work is being done by a small group of dedicated and imaginative scientists who specialize in extracting from various sea animals substances that may improve the health of the human race.
sentences.chinese: 一小部分富有想像力和敬业精神的科学家正在进行这项研究，他们专门研究从各种海洋动物中提取能增进人类健康的物质。

detailed_translations.english: to limit all or most of your study, business etc to a particular subject or activity

detailed_translations.chinese: 使适应特殊目的， 使专用于

sentences.english: The Earth rotates on its axis once every 24 hours.
sentences.chinese: 地球每24小时绕地轴自转一周。

sentences.english: Rotate the pan halfway through the baking time.
sentences.chinese: 烘烤到一半时把盘子转一下。

detailed_translations.english: to turn with a circular movement around a central point, or to make something do this
to turn with a circular movement around a central point, or to make something do this

name: instance
trans: 例子， 事例， 例证

sentences.english: In this instance I think she was mistaken.
sentences.chinese: 在这一点上我认为她弄错了。

detailed_translations.english: an example of a particular kind of situation

sentences.english: Well, at least I can face them all with a clear conscience (= the knowledge that you have done nothing wrong ) .
sentences.chinese: 好吧，至少我可以问心无愧地面对他们所有人。

sentences.english: I can’t tell you what to do – it’s a matter of conscience (= something that you must make a moral judgment about ) .
sentences.chinese: 我不能告诉你怎么办——这是良心问题。

sentences.english: a crisis of conscience among medical staff (= a situation in which it is very difficult to decide what is the right thing to do )
sentences.chinese: 医务人员中的良心危机

detailed_translations.english: the part of your mind that tells you whether what you are doing is morally right or wrong

sentences.english: a state banquet (=  one attended by heads of government and other important people  )
sentences.chinese: 国宴

detailed_translations.english: a formal dinner for many people on an important occasion

name: thrill
trans: 使激动， 使兴奋；使毛骨悚然

sentences.english: Winning first place must have been quite a thrill.
sentences.chinese: 赢得第一名肯定让人非常激动。

sentences.english: Even though I’ve been acting for years, I still get a thrill out of going on stage.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我演了多年戏，走上舞台我仍然感到十分激动。

sentences.english: It gave Pat a thrill to finally see the group perform live.
sentences.chinese: 帕特终于看到这个乐队现场表演，感到十分激动。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden strong feeling of excitement and pleasure, or the thing that makes you feel this

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…颤动；使…紧张；使…感到兴奋或激动
detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel excited and happy

sentences.english: Bird evolved from reptiles, so the first bird must have come out of an egg--laid by a reptile.
sentences.chinese: 禽类是由爬虫类进化而来，所以，第一只禽鸟肯定是从爬虫类孵化的蛋里出来的。

sentences.english: No matter how dry your skin gets, you will never turn into an alligator or any other type of reptile.
sentences.chinese: 不论皮肤多么干燥，你永远不会变成美洲鳄或任何其他一种皮肤粗糙的爬行动物。

sentences.english: This small reptile, which measures just 10 centimeters long, can swim through the sand dunes at up to 15 centimeters per second.
sentences.chinese: 这种身长只有10厘米小型爬行动物，可以在沙子中以最快每秒15厘米的速度游动。

detailed_translations.english: a type of animal, such as a snake or  lizard  , whose body temperature changes according to the temperature around it, and that usually lays eggs to have babies

sentences.english: His two albums released on cassette have sold 10 million copies.
sentences.chinese: 他以磁带形式发行的两张专辑已售出1000万份。

detailed_translations.english: a small flat plastic case containing  magnetic tape  , that can be used for playing or recording sound

sentences.english: a razor blade
sentences.chinese: 剃刀刀片

detailed_translations.english: the flat cutting part of a tool or weapon

name: solution
trans: 解答， 解决办法；溶解， 溶液

sentences.english: The best solution would be for them to separate.
sentences.chinese: 最好的解决方法是他们分开。

sentences.english: he solution of glucose in water
sentences.chinese: 葡萄糖在水中的溶解

detailed_translations.english: a way of solving a problem or dealing with a difficult situation

name: opponent
trans: 对手， 反对者， 敌手

sentences.english: She bowled out her opponent.
sentences.chinese: 她打败了她的对手。

sentences.english: The soldier jabbed at his opponent.
sentences.chinese: 那个战士猛击他的对手。

sentences.english: He avowed himself an opponent of all alliances.
sentences.chinese: 他声称他是所有联盟的反对者。

detailed_translations.english: someone who you try to defeat in a competition, game, fight, or argument

name: host
trans: 主人； 旅店老板；节目主持人；一大群， 许多
主持； 作为主人招待

sentences.english: Which country is going to host the next World Cup?
sentences.chinese: 哪个国家将主办下一届世界杯？

detailed_translations.english: to provide the place and everything that is needed for an organized event

sentences.english: measures to accelerate the rate of economic growth
sentences.chinese: 加快经济增长速度的措施

detailed_translations.english: if a process accelerates or if something accelerates it, it happens faster than usual or sooner than you expect

name: backward
trans: 向后的； 落后的； 倒行的；迟钝的

sentences.english: She went without a backward glance.
sentences.chinese: 她头也不回地走了。

sentences.english: He works backward, building a house from the top downward.
sentences.chinese: 他倒着干活，从上往下盖房子。

detailed_translations.english: looking or facing in the direction that is behind you
If you do something backward, you do it in the opposite way to the usual way

name: regardless
trans: 不留心的， 不注意的；不管

sentences.english: Despite her recent surgery she has been carrying on regardless.
sentences.chinese: 尽管她最近动了手术，她却一直在不顾一切地继续工作。

detailed_translations.english: without being affected or influenced by something

sentences.english: Everybody was in a very relaxed and jolly mood.
sentences.chinese: 大家的心情都非常轻松愉快。

detailed_translations.english: happy and enjoying yourself
very

detailed_translations.chinese: （口）用好话劝某人做…；（口）用好话使高兴
(Jolly)人名；(法)若利；(英、印)乔利；(德)约利

sentences.english: upward pressure on bank interest rates
sentences.chinese: 针对银行利率的越来越大的压力

sentences.english: They climbed upward along the steep cliffs surrounding the village.
sentences.chinese: 他们沿着环绕村庄的陡峭悬崖向上爬。

sentences.english: 'There,' said Jack, pointing upwards.
sentences.chinese: “那儿，”杰克往上指着说。

detailed_translations.english: increasing to a higher level
If someone moves or looks upward, they move or look up towards a higher place

name: illustrate
trans: 举例说明， 阐明；图解， 加插图

sentences.english: Let me give an example to illustrate the point.
sentences.chinese: 让我举个例子来说明这一点。

sentences.english: She illustrated her discussion with diagrams.
sentences.chinese: 她用图表来说明她的论述。

detailed_translations.english: to make the meaning of something clearer by giving examples

name: specialise
trans: 专攻； 专用于； 专业化

sentences.english: 'I never intended to 'specialise' in water balloons,' he added.
sentences.chinese: “我从来都没有打算“专门研究”水球，”他补充道。

sentences.english: 'I never intended to 'specialise' in water balloons,' he added. 'The idea was to create some interesting images and then move on to another subject.
sentences.chinese: “我从来都没有打算“专门研究”水球，”他补充道。“这个主意是为了拍一些有趣的图片然后转移到另外的主题上。”

sentences.english: Water in the engine compartment is sucked away by a hose.
sentences.chinese: 发动机舱里的水由一条软管吸走。

detailed_translations.english: A hose is a pipe made of rubber or plastic, along which a liquid or gas flows, for example from one part of an engine to another
to wash or pour water over something or someone, using a hose

sentences.english: flowers waving in the breeze
sentences.chinese: 在微风中摇曳的花儿

detailed_translations.chinese: 微风；轻而易举的事；煤屑；焦炭渣；小风波
detailed_translations.english: a gentle wind

sentences.english: Visit your dentist twice a year for a checkup.
sentences.chinese: 每年看两次牙医做检查。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to treat people’s teeth

name: trash
trans: 垃圾， 废物；拙劣的文学作品；没用的人， 社会渣滓

sentences.english: Will someone take out the trash (= take it outside the house ) ?
sentences.chinese: 谁把垃圾拿出去好吗？

sentences.english: Just put it in the trash .
sentences.chinese: 就把它扔到垃圾桶里吧。

detailed_translations.english: things that you throw away, such as empty bottles, used papers, food that has gone bad etc

sentences.english: The creature is a tiny centipede, just 10 millimetres long.
sentences.chinese: 那个生物是一只很小的蜈蚣，只有10毫米长。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring length. There are 1,000 millimetres in one metre.

name: horn
trans: 角， 触角；号， 喇叭；角状物； 角制品 A

sentences.english: A mature cow has horns.
sentences.chinese: 成年母牛头上长有角。

detailed_translations.english: a container in the shape of an animal’s horn, used in the past for drinking from, carrying  gunpowder  etc

sentences.english: A lot can be inferred from these statistics.
sentences.chinese: 根据这些统计资料可以推断出很多事情。

sentences.english: From the evidence, we can infer that the victim knew her killer.
sentences.chinese: 根据证据我们可以推断出受害者认识凶手。

detailed_translations.english: to form an opinion that something is probably true because of information that you have

sentences.english: a heart specialist
sentences.chinese: 心脏专科医生

detailed_translations.english: someone who knows a lot about a particular subject, or is very skilled at it

sentences.english: baggage that is lost or damaged in transit
sentences.chinese: 在运输过程中丢失或损坏的行李

sentences.english: transit by air or sea
sentences.chinese: 空运或海运

detailed_translations.english: the process of moving goods or people from one place to another

sentences.english: All these questions involve policy and tactics.
sentences.chinese: 这些问题，都涉及政策和策略。

sentences.english: In the next part of this post, I'll show you a few ways you can protect yourself from some of these tactics.
sentences.chinese: 在这篇文章的下一部分中，我将向您展示几个方法可以保护自己免受这些策略。

sentences.english: Be Flexible But Firm Encourage your staff for a frank discussion of goals, tactics and strategies. Do not change your direction without good reason.
sentences.chinese: 灵活而坚定的鼓励你的员工对目标，战术和战略进行坦诚的讨论。没有充分的理由，不要改变你的方向。

detailed_translations.english: the art and science of the detailed direction and control of movement or manoeuvre of forces in battle to achieve an aim or task

name: adolescent
trans: 青春期的， 青少年的

sentences.english: It is important that an adolescent boy should have an adult in whom he can confide.
sentences.chinese: 一个青春期男孩应该有一个他能倾吐心声的成年人，这是很重要的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 青春期的； 青少年的
detailed_translations.english: Adolescent is used to describe young people who are no longer children but who have not yet become adults. It also refers to their behaviour.
a young person, usually between the ages of 12 and 18, who is developing into an adult

sentences.english: I had a sore throat and aching limbs.
sentences.chinese: 我喉咙疼，四肢酸痛。

sentences.english: Mac’s still sore because I didn’t invite him.
sentences.chinese: 马克还在因为我没邀请他而生气呢。

sentences.english: They were starving and covered with sores.
sentences.chinese: 他们在挨饿，身上长满了疮。

detailed_translations.english: a part of your body that is sore is painful, because of infection or because you have used a muscle too much
a painful, often red, place on your body caused by a wound or infection

name: petty
trans: 小的； 琐碎的；气量小的

sentences.english: petty squabbles
sentences.chinese: 小口角

sentences.english: petty restrictions
sentences.chinese: 小限制

detailed_translations.chinese: 琐碎的；小气的；小规模的
detailed_translations.english: a petty problem, detail etc is small and unimportant

name: glow
trans: 发热， 发光， 发红

sentences.english: The bedside lamp glowed dimly.
sentences.chinese: 床头灯发出暗淡的光。

sentences.english: The fireplace was still glowing with the remains of last night’s fire.
sentences.chinese: 壁炉中，隔夜的余烬依然在微微发光。

sentences.english: The red tip of his cigarette was glowing in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 他那红红的烟头在黑暗中幽幽发光。

sentences.english: The moisturizer gave my face a healthy glow that lasted all day.
sentences.chinese: 这种润肤霜给我脸上带来了持续整天的一种健康的红光。

detailed_translations.english: to produce or  reflect  a soft steady light
A glow is a pink colour on a person's face, usually because they are healthy or have been exercising

sentences.english: Foster joined in the laughter.
sentences.chinese: 福斯特也跟着笑了起来。

sentences.english: He looked shocked, then burst into laughter (= started laughing ).
sentences.chinese: 他一脸的震惊，接着便放声大笑起来。

detailed_translations.english: when people laugh, or the sound of people laughing

name: sentiment
trans: 思想感情； 情绪； 情操

sentences.english: the spread of nationalist sentiments
sentences.chinese: 民族主义情绪的传播

sentences.english: the anti-immigrant sentiments expressed by some Americans
sentences.chinese: 一些美国人表露出的反移民情绪

detailed_translations.english: a feeling or an opinion, especially one based on emotions

name: strife
trans: 冲突， 斗争， 纷争； 竞争

sentences.english: Money is a major cause of strife in many marriages.
sentences.chinese: 钱在许多婚姻中是导致冲突的一个主要原因。

detailed_translations.english: trouble between two or more people or groups

name: patent
trans: 专利； 专利品； 专利权
批准专利， 获得专利

sentences.english: a patent lock
sentences.chinese: 专利锁

sentences.english: He held a number of patents for his many innovations.
sentences.chinese: 他为他的许多革新申请了几项专利。

detailed_translations.english: protected by a patent
A patent is an official right to be the only person or company allowed to make or sell a new product for a certain period of time.

sentences.english: birth/death/marriage certificate (=giving details of someone’s birth, death, or marriage)
sentences.chinese: 出生/死亡/结婚证书

sentences.english: a degree certificate
sentences.chinese: 学位证书

detailed_translations.chinese: 证书，证件，执照；（毕业）文凭，合格证书
detailed_translations.english: an official document that states that a fact or facts are true

sentences.english: The old machine used to make an awful racket .
sentences.chinese: 这台旧机器以前噪音大得吓人。

detailed_translations.english: a loud noise

name: mess
trans: 混乱， 混杂； 脏乱
弄脏， 弄乱， 搞糟

sentences.english: What a mess!
sentences.chinese: 太乱了！

sentences.english: Sorry – the place is a bit of a mess .
sentences.chinese: 对不起——这里有些乱。

sentences.english: When I got home, the house was a complete mess .
sentences.chinese: 我回到家时，屋子里一片狼藉。

sentences.english: You can make cookies if you promise not to make a mess in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 如果你答应不把厨房搞得乱七八糟，你可以去做甜饼。

sentences.english: She hates mess.
sentences.chinese: 她讨厌到处乱糟糟的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 凌乱状态，混乱的局面；困境
detailed_translations.english: if there is a mess somewhere or a place is a mess, things there are dirty or not neatly arranged

detailed_translations.chinese: 弄糟， 弄脏， 搞乱
detailed_translations.english: to make something look untidy or dirty

name: sour
trans: 酸的； 发酸的； 酸痛的；脾气坏的； 刻薄的

sentences.english: Rachel sampled the wine. It was sour.
sentences.chinese: 雷切尔尝了尝葡萄酒，是酸的。

sentences.english: sour cherries
sentences.chinese: 酸樱桃

detailed_translations.chinese: 酸的；发酵的；刺耳的；酸臭的；讨厌的
detailed_translations.english: having a sharp acid taste, like the taste of a  lemon  or a fruit that is not ready to be eaten
if milk sours, or if something sours it, it begins to have an unpleasant sharp taste

sentences.english: His name was deleted from the list.
sentences.chinese: 他的名字从名单上删掉了。

sentences.english: I deleted the file by mistake.
sentences.chinese: 我误删了这个文件。

detailed_translations.english: to remove something that has been written down or stored in a computer

name: speciality
trans: 特产； 特色菜；专业； 专长

sentences.english: the region’s speciality cheese
sentences.chinese: 该地区的特色干酪

sentences.english: His speciality is international law.
sentences.chinese: 他的专业是国际法。

detailed_translations.chinese: (specialty) 特色食品; 特产；专业；专门研究；专长
detailed_translations.english: Someone's speciality is a particular type of work that they do most or do best, or a subject that they know a lot about

name: transform
trans: 改变， 变换； 使改观；变压； 转化 A；改造， 改革

sentences.english: Increased population has transformed the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 人口的增加使景观发生了变化。

detailed_translations.english: to completely change the appearance, form, or character of something or someone, especially in a way that improves it

name: plumber
trans: 管子工， 铅管工， 水暖工

sentences.english: Not only is there no God, but try getting a plumber on weekends.
sentences.chinese: 不仅上帝不存在，而且周末连一个水管工都找不到。

sentences.english: At the age of 74, he is still going strong as the oldest plumber in business in Boise, Idaho.
sentences.chinese: 尽管他已经74岁高龄，但身体依然很健壮，是爱达荷州博伊西商界中最老的水管工。

sentences.english: Even without a high-school diploma, a black man can probably find a job if he looks. And some manual jobs, such as plumber or cable technician, pay quite well.
sentences.chinese: 即便没有高中文凭，一个黑人只要有求职意愿，他仍可能找到工作，并且水管工和电缆维修员这类体力活，薪酬还挺不错。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to repair water pipes, baths, toilets etc

sentences.english: The US must now take a firm leadership role.
sentences.chinese: 美国现在必须扮演一个强有力的领导人角色。

sentences.english: the Conservative leadership contest
sentences.chinese: 保守党的领导人角逐

sentences.english: The next leadership election is due in November.
sentences.chinese: 下一届领导人选举将在十一月举行。

detailed_translations.english: the position of being the leader of a group, organization, country etc

name: magnitude
trans: 大小， 数量；巨大， 广大；重要性， 重要程度

sentences.english: an increase of this order of magnitude
sentences.chinese: 如此大幅度的增长

sentences.english: The star varies in brightness by about three magnitudes.
sentences.chinese: 星体的亮度大约分三个星等。

detailed_translations.english: the great size or importance of something

name: genuine
trans: 真正的， 名副其实的 <

sentences.english: ‘Did he really?’ Her surprise seemed genuine.
sentences.chinese: “他真的这样？”她好像是真的惊讶。

detailed_translations.english: a genuine feeling, desire etc is one that you really feel, not one you pretend to feel

name: agitate
trans: 使激动， 使不安；搅动， 搅拌 A

sentences.english: All you need to do is gently agitate the water with a finger or paintbrush.
sentences.chinese: 你只需要用手指或刷子轻轻搅动水。

detailed_translations.english: to shake or mix a liquid quickly

name: immune
trans: 免疫的， 有免疫力的 A；不受影响的；免除的， 豁免的

sentences.english: Once we’ve had the disease, we’re immune for life.
sentences.chinese: 我们一旦得过这种病，就获得了终身免疫力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 免疫的， 有免疫力的， 不受影响的； 免除的， 豁免的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is immune to a particular disease cannot catch it

sentences.english: a holiday brochure
sentences.chinese: 度假手册

detailed_translations.english: a thin book giving information or advertising something

sentences.english: a White House spokesman
sentences.chinese: 白宫发言人

detailed_translations.english: a man who has been chosen to speak officially for a group, organization, or government

name: equation
trans: 等式， 方程式；相等； 均衡

sentences.english: When children enter the equation , further tensions may arise within a marriage.
sentences.chinese: 有了孩子以后，婚姻中可能出现新的矛盾。

detailed_translations.english: a problem or situation in which several things must be considered and dealt with

name: impressive
trans: 给人深刻印象的；威严的； 使人敬畏的

sentences.english: The figures certainly look impressive.
sentences.chinese: 这些数字看上去确实很可观。

sentences.english: Among the guests was an impressive array of authors and critics.
sentences.chinese: 来宾中有不少出色的作家和评论家。

detailed_translations.english: something that is impressive makes you admire it because it is very good, large, important etc

name: stern
trans: 严厉的； 苛刻的； 难以忍受的；坚决的， 坚定的

sentences.english: It is placed in the stern of a boat.
sentences.chinese: 它被放在船尾。

detailed_translations.english: the back of a ship
serious and strict, and showing strong disapproval of someone’s behaviour

sentences.english: the rotary movement of the helicopter blades
sentences.chinese: 直升机螺旋桨叶的转动

detailed_translations.english: turning in a circle around a fixed point, like a wheel

detailed_translations.chinese: 旋转式机器；[动力] 转缸式发动机

name: compound
trans: 混合的； 化合的； 复合的

sentences.english: ...the big compound eyes of dragonflies.
sentences.chinese: …蜻蜓的大复眼。

detailed_translations.english: Compound is used to indicate that something consists of two or more parts or things
a substance containing atoms from two or more  elements

detailed_translations.chinese: 使恶化， 加重； 使化合， 使合成
detailed_translations.english: to make a difficult situation worse by adding more problems

name: master
trans: 男主人； 雇主；师傅； 大师， 名家；硕士

sentences.english: a work of art by a true master
sentences.chinese: 一件真正的大师之作

sentences.english: You’ll have to ask the master’s permission.
sentences.chinese: 你得去请求主人的同意。

sentences.english: You’ll have to ask the master’s permission.
sentences.chinese: 你得去请求主人的同意。

sentences.english: Master of Arts/Science/Education etc
sentences.chinese: 文学/理学/教育学等硕士

detailed_translations.english: someone who is very skilled at something

sentences.english: ...a ruby and diamond ring.
sentences.chinese: …一枚红宝石钻戒。

detailed_translations.english: a red jewel

sentences.english: the one basic principle that underlies all of the party’s policies
sentences.chinese: 贯穿该党各项政策的那一条基本原则

detailed_translations.english: to be the cause of something, or be the basic thing from which something develops

sentences.english: It took an extraordinary amount of work.
sentences.chinese: 这费了相当多的功夫。

sentences.english: It’s extraordinary that he should make exactly the same mistake again.
sentences.chinese: 真想不到他又犯了完全相同的错误。

sentences.english: The U.S. has called for an extraordinary emergency meeting of the UN Human Rights Commission to examine the crisis.
sentences.chinese: 美国已要求召开一次联合国人权委员特别紧急会议来调查这次危机。

detailed_translations.chinese: 非同寻常的；特别的（会议）
detailed_translations.english: very unusual or surprising

name: regulation
trans: 规则， 规章；调节， 校准， 调整

sentences.english: There seem to be so many rules and regulations these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今好像条条框框很多。

sentences.english: regulations governing the safety of toys
sentences.chinese: 监控玩具安全的条例

sentences.english: All companies must comply with the regulations .
sentences.chinese: 所有公司都必须遵守规定。

detailed_translations.english: an official rule or order

sentences.english: I think that is because we unnecessarily complicate it.
sentences.chinese: 我想这是因为我们不必要地将生活复杂化了。

sentences.english: If the answer to all of these questions is no, a framework will only complicate matters.
sentences.chinese: 如果所有这些问题的答案都为否，那么使用框架只会把事情变复杂。

sentences.english: The selection service is one of the more difficult services to implement correctly because it has some valuable features that complicate the implementation.
sentences.chinese: 选择服务是比较难以正确实现的服务之一，因为它具有一些使实现复杂化的有价值的功能。

sentences.english: The meaning of the poem has always been a puzzle.
sentences.chinese: 那首诗的含义始终是个谜。

sentences.english: He thought he had solved the puzzle.
sentences.chinese: 他认为他已经解开了那个谜。

sentences.english: What puzzles me is why his books are so popular.
sentences.chinese: 令我不解的是，他的书为什么如此受欢迎。

detailed_translations.english: something that is difficult to understand or explain
to confuse someone or make them feel slightly anxious because they do not understand something

sentences.english: It would be sheer hypocrisy to pray for success, since I’ve never believed in God.
sentences.chinese: 我从不相信上帝，因此为获成功而祈祷是纯粹的虚伪之举。

detailed_translations.english: when someone pretends to have certain beliefs or opinions that they do not really have – used to show disapproval

sentences.english: Bob ate his lunch with evident enjoyment.
sentences.chinese: 显然鲍勃吃午饭吃得津津有味。

detailed_translations.english: easy to see, notice, or understand

sentences.english: The price for the holiday includes flights and accommodation.
sentences.chinese: 度假的价格包括机票和住宿。

sentences.english: living accommodations for the crews
sentences.chinese: 船员的起居舱

sentences.english: travel and hotel accommodations

sentences.chinese: 16年军人统治后民主制度的恢复

sentences.english: the Korean peninsula
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜半岛

sentences.chinese: 学校逐步形成了自己的教学风格。

trans: 令人惊奇的； 奇迹般的； 〈口〉妙极的

sentences.chinese: 他们担心这会对全球金融市场产生不利影响。

sentences.chinese: 下午3:30发布了公告，宣布总统暂时脱离了危险。

sentences.chinese: 是的，现在你知道性别比例的问题了吧！ ！

sentences.chinese: 一年之内这个比例可以达到四分之一。

sentences.chinese: 阿伯特路与米尔街的交叉口

sentences.chinese: 40号高速公路上的第5交叉口
