to move or turn skilfully or to move or turn something skilfully, especially something large and heavy

name: vocabulary
trans: 词汇， 词汇量 A；词汇表

sentences.english: Teachers were impressed by his vocabulary.
sentences.chinese: 他的词汇量给老师们留下了深刻的印象。

detailed_translations.english: all the words that someone knows or uses

name: retire
trans: 退休， 引退 <；退却， 撤退；就寝

sentences.english: At the age when most people retire, he is ready to face a new career.
sentences.chinese: 在大多数人退休的年纪，他准备要面对一项新事业。

sentences.english: I retired late that evening.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上我睡得晚。

detailed_translations.english: to stop working, usually because you have reached a certain age

name: aspect
trans: 样子， 外表， 面貌；方面

sentences.english: a south-facing aspect
sentences.chinese: 朝南方向

detailed_translations.english: one part of a situation, idea, plan etc that has many parts

sentences.english: Our youngest daughter is a vegetarian.
sentences.chinese: 我们的小女儿是个素食主义者。

sentences.english: dishes suitable for vegetarians
sentences.chinese: 适合素食者的菜肴

sentences.english: I’m thinking about becoming a vegetarian.
sentences.chinese: 我在考虑戒除荤食。

sentences.english: Yasmin sticks to a strict vegetarian diet.
sentences.chinese: 亚斯敏坚持一种严格的纯素饮食。

detailed_translations.english: someone who does not eat meat or fish
Someone who is vegetarian never eats meat or fish

name: aggressive
trans: 侵略的， 好斗的 <；敢作敢为的， 有进取心的； 积极的 A；强有力的

sentences.english: Jim’s voice became aggressive.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆的声音凶了起来。

sentences.english: Teachers apparently expect a certain amount of aggressive behaviour from boys.
sentences.chinese: 老师显然料到男孩子多少会有些好勇斗狠的行为。

sentences.english: A successful businessman has to be aggressive.
sentences.chinese: 成功的实业家必须得有股冲劲。

detailed_translations.chinese: 挑衅的，好斗的；有上进心的
detailed_translations.english: behaving in an angry threatening way, as if you want to fight or attack someone

sentences.english: Saint Patrick
sentences.chinese: 圣帕特里克

sentences.english: Statues of saints lined the walls of the church.
sentences.chinese: 教堂的墙边立着一排圣徒像。

detailed_translations.chinese: 圣人；圣徒；道德崇高的人
detailed_translations.english: someone who is given the title ‘saint’ by the Christian church after they have died, because they have been very good or holy

name: instalment
trans: 分期付款， 分期交付；一集； 一期

sentences.english: the second instalment of a loan
sentences.chinese: 一项贷款的第二期还款

sentences.english: They’re letting me pay for the washing machine by monthly instalments.
sentences.chinese: 他们允许我以每月分期付款的方式买下这台洗衣机。

detailed_translations.english: one of a series of regular payments that you make until you have paid all the money you owe

sentences.english: Some tribes use special facial markings to signify status.
sentences.chinese: 有些部落使用特殊的面部标记来表示地位。

sentences.english: The image of the lion signified power and strength.
sentences.chinese: 狮子的形象代表权力和力量。

sentences.english: These figures don’t really signify in the overall results.
sentences.chinese: 这些数字对于总体结果影响不是很大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 表示,意味；要紧,有重要性
detailed_translations.english: to represent, mean, or be a sign of something

name: oblige
trans: 迫使； 责成；感激， 施恩于

sentences.english: Mr. Oakley has always been ready to oblige journalists with information.
sentences.chinese: 奥克利先生一直乐于提供信息帮助记者们。

sentences.english: We called up three economists to ask how to eliminate the deficit and they obliged with very straightforward answers.
sentences.chinese: 我们致电3位经济学家咨询消除赤字的方法，他们满足了我们的要求，给出了非常直接的答复。

detailed_translations.english: To oblige someone means to be helpful to them by doing what they have asked you to do

detailed_translations.chinese: 迫使；施恩于，帮…的忙；使感激
detailed_translations.english: if you are obliged to do something, you have to do it because the situation, the law, a duty etc makes it necessary

sentences.english: And the mission to civilise that was the colonial kind of project is now a mission to civilise France's own population.
sentences.chinese: 文明化工程在过去本是殖民性质的工程，可现在它却成了教化法国自己人口的工程。

name: swing
trans: 摇摆， 摇荡；回转， 旋转

sentences.english: Let your arms swing as you walk.
sentences.chinese: 边走边摆动双臂。

sentences.english: a sign swinging in the wind
sentences.chinese: 在风中摇摆的指示牌

sentences.english: He was swinging his bag back and forth .
sentences.chinese: 他前后甩动着他的包。

sentences.english: She swung her legs from side to side .
sentences.chinese: 她左右晃动着两条腿。

sentences.english: She swung her legs from side to side .
sentences.chinese: 他对准球猛地挥拍一击。

detailed_translations.english: to make regular movements forwards and backwards or from one side to another while hanging from a particular point, or to make something do this
a swinging movement or rhythm

name: turbulent
trans: 吵闹的； 狂暴的； 汹涌的；动乱的， 无秩序的

sentences.english: the turbulent times of the French Revolution
sentences.chinese: 法国大革命的动荡时期

sentences.english: He has had a turbulent political career.
sentences.chinese: 他的政治生涯动荡不定。

detailed_translations.english: a turbulent situation or period of time is one in which there are a lot of sudden changes

sentences.english: the invasion of Normandy
sentences.chinese: 对诺曼底的入侵

detailed_translations.english: when the army of one country enters another country by force, in order to take control of it

name: precedent
trans: 先例， 范例； 惯例

sentences.english: The Obama administration and police officers around the country say no, and their precedent is the past.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马政府和全国各地的警官说不可以，他们引为依据的先例就是“过去”。

sentences.english: There is no historical precedent that can tell us what happens to established democracies when most citizens go years, even decades, without an improvement in their standard of living.
sentences.chinese: 没有历史先例能告诉我们，当大多数人民的生活水平在几年、甚至几十年间维持不变时，一个已经确立根基的民主国家会发生什么。

sentences.english: An east London school has set a precedent by fining pupils who break the rules.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦东区的一所学校开创了对违反校规的学生处以罚金的先例。

detailed_translations.english: an action or official decision that can be used to give support to later actions or decisions

name: spin
trans: 旋转；纺纱；织网， 吐丝

sentences.english: The plane’s propellers were spinning.
sentences.chinese: 飞机的螺旋桨在快速旋转。

sentences.english: She sat by the window spinning.
sentences.chinese: 她坐在窗前纺线。

sentences.english: the Earth’s spin
sentences.chinese: 机的螺旋桨在快速旋转。

detailed_translations.english: to turn around and around very quickly, or to make something do this
an act of turning around quickly

sentences.english: a shallow river
sentences.chinese: 浅河

sentences.english: The lake is quite shallow.
sentences.chinese: 这湖很浅。

sentences.english: the shallow end of the pool
sentences.chinese: 游泳池的浅水区

sentences.english: Place the meat in a shallow dish.
sentences.chinese: 把肉放在一个浅盘里。

detailed_translations.english: measuring only a short distance from the top to the bottom

sentences.english: Nick rolled down his window and spat.
sentences.chinese: 尼克摇下窗子，啐了口唾沫。

detailed_translations.chinese: 吐痰；吐口水；发出劈啪声
detailed_translations.english: to force a small amount of  saliva (= the liquid in your mouth )  out of your mouth
the watery liquid that is produced in your mouth

sentences.english: He sent three scouts ahead to take a look at the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 他派出三名侦察兵到前面侦察大桥的情况。

detailed_translations.chinese: 搜索，侦察；侦察员；侦察机
detailed_translations.english: a soldier, plane etc that is sent to search the area in front of an army and get information about the enemy
to examine a place or area in order to get information about it

name: register
trans: 注册， 登记 <；指示； 自动记下；把挂号

sentences.english: Have you signed the hotel register ?
sentences.chinese: 你在酒店登记簿上签名了吗？

sentences.english: Police want a national register of DNA samples.
sentences.chinese: 警方想要一个全国范围的DNA样本登记册。

sentences.english: How many students have registered for English classes?
sentences.chinese: 有多少学生注册选修英语课了？

detailed_translations.english: an official list of names of people, companies etc, or a book that has this list
to put someone’s or something’s name on an official list

name: restless
trans: 得不到休息的；不平静的；不安的， 坐立不安的

sentences.english: After a few weeks in Marseille, I grew restless and decided to move on.
sentences.chinese: 在马赛住了几星期后，我开始待不住了，决定换个地方。

detailed_translations.english: unwilling to keep still or stay where you are, especially because you are nervous or bored

trans: 鞍； 马鞍； 鞍状物

sentences.chinese: 她能给马备鞍并没有什么值得惊讶的。

sentences.chinese: 自行车的车架、车轮、车把和车座都用以此方式制造的纸板制成，然后组装在一起。

sentences.chinese: 他的作品得到艺术评论家的推崇。

sentences.english: Angela Bassett has won critical acclaim for her excellent performance.
sentences.chinese: 安杰拉·巴西特因她出色的表演而赢得了评论界的赞扬。

detailed_translations.english: the process of sending out electronic signals, messages etc, using radio, television, or other similar equipment

sentences.chinese: 因为燃料短缺，所以没有供暖。

sentences.english: There is no shortage of funds.

sentences.chinese: 威尔逊看到她在注视着自己，不由得脸红了。

trans: 使人厌倦的； 讨厌的

sentences.chinese: 女性的直觉

detailed_translations.english: the ability to understand or know something because of a feeling rather than by considering the facts

sentences.chinese: 我的信很快就得到了回复。

sentences.chinese: 安摆好姿势露出笑脸准备拍照。

sentences.english: The law was amended to include women.
sentences.chinese: 该法律经修改把女性也包括在内。

sentences.chinese: 被告后来修改了证词。

sentences.chinese: “史蒂夫偷的——应该说是借的。”他改口道。

sentences.chinese: 这名下院议员的评论引发了一场政治论战。

sentences.chinese: 这座火山1980年喷发，摧毁了华盛顿州的大片地区。

sentences.chinese: 我们学校的问题没有简单的解决办法。

sentences.chinese: 为了改善这种情况，水必须进行化学处理。

trans: 同意； 赞成， 答应
同意； 赞成， 答应

sentences.chinese: 主席是大家一致推选出来的。

sentences.chinese: 拿破仑从莫斯科的撤退

trans: 相互的， 彼此的； 共有的 <

sentences.chinese: 周围炮弹四处飞落，我们奔跑着寻找地方躲避。

sentences.chinese: 一枚爆炸的迫击炮弹

sentences.chinese: 我在电话簿上找不到你的电话号码。

sentences.chinese: 英国的国家元首是君主立宪的国王或女王。

sentences.chinese: 她表现得很有责任心。

sentences.chinese: 这些螺丝可以用手拧开。

sentences.chinese: 他专修考古学。

sentences.chinese: 我在最近的研究中发现，这三点综合发生着作用，除此之外，它们也帮助我发现考古学的重要意义，它不仅仅意味着一堆石头和骨头。

sentences.english: "There was no access to clean water, there was no access to basic education especially in the rural areas where the archaeology was," she says.
sentences.chinese: 在那里的考古学特别是农村地区，我们并没有获得干净的水，有没有基本的教育的机会，“她说。

sentences.chinese: 民主政府

sentences.english: the role of the media in the democratic process
sentences.chinese: 民主进程中媒体的作用

detailed_translations.english: controlled by representatives who are elected by the people of a country

sentences.english: Nothing remained of the colonel.
sentences.chinese: 上校身后毫无遗物。

sentences.chinese: 这名上尉一连跳过了好几级，现在是上校了。

sentences.english: What if they go on to behave as murderously as the colonel and his paid killers?
sentences.chinese: 如果他们像他们的是上校和他的杀手们一样继续表现为杀气腾腾的又该怎么办？

sentences.english: Rodney put the recorder on the desk top and pushed the play button.
sentences.chinese: 罗德尼把录音机放在桌面上，按下了播放键。

sentences.chinese: 我们希望这些地区会乐意接受民主改革。

sentences.english: Most West European countries have embraced the concept of high-speed rail networks with enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 大多数西欧国家都表现出极大的兴趣，欣然接受修建高速铁路网的想法。

name: identify
trans: 确认； 识别； 鉴定；把…和…看成一样， 打成一片

sentences.chinese: 他离得太远，没法看面孔认出谁是谁。

sentences.english: The police took fingerprints and identified the body.
sentences.chinese: 警方采集了指纹，对尸体作了身份确认。

detailed_translations.english: to recognize and correctly name someone or something

sentences.chinese: 对于氮气我们知道什么？

sentences.english: The plant requires nitrogen in order to make proteins.
sentences.chinese: 植物需要氮以便制造蛋白质。

sentences.english: All of these from the group one and two through the group five and six elements, but what about elements, what about molecules like hydrogen, or nitrogen, or maybe oxygen?
sentences.chinese: 所有的这些都是来自于第一主族和第二组主族,到第五主族和第六组主族的悬殊，那么元素呢，比如氢气，氮气或氧气那样的分子呢？

detailed_translations.english: a gas that has no colour or smell, and that forms most of the Earth’s air. It is a chemical element: symbol N

name: label
trans: 标签， 标记；称号， 外号

sentences.chinese: 行李标签

detailed_translations.english: a piece of paper or another material that is attached to something and gives information about it
to attach a label onto something or write information on something

name: message
trans: 消息， 信息， 通讯；启示， 要旨

sentences.english: The message of the film is that good always triumphs over evil.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影的主题思想是善良终必战胜邪恶。

sentences.english: The result of this legal battle sends an important message to people in similar situations.
sentences.chinese: 这场诉讼战的结果给情况相似的人们传递了一个重要的信息。

sentences.english: It’s perfectly possible to get your message across (= communicate what you want to say ) without being so angry.
sentences.chinese: 就算不这么生气，你也完全可以把意思说清楚。

sentences.english: They use illustrations to convey their message.
sentences.chinese: 他们用图示来表达他们的意思。

detailed_translations.english: the main or most important idea that someone is trying to tell people about in a film, book, speech etc

name: modify
trans: 更改， 修改； 改造 <；缓和； 减轻； 降低

sentences.english: The feedback will be used to modify the course for next year.
sentences.chinese: 这些反馈意见将用于修改明年的课程。

sentences.english: The regulations can only be modified by a special committee.
sentences.chinese: 这些法规只能由特别委员会来修改。

detailed_translations.english: to make small changes to something in order to improve it and make it more suitable or effective

name: clone
trans: 无性繁殖系， 克隆；复制品， 翻版

sentences.english: The idea of cloning extinct life forms still belongs to science fiction.
sentences.chinese: 对绝种的生命形式进行克隆的想法仍然属于科学幻想。

detailed_translations.english: to make an exact copy of a plant or animal by taking a cell from it and developing it artificially

detailed_translations.chinese: 无性繁殖系，克隆；复制品，翻版
detailed_translations.english: an animal or plant produced by scientists from one cell of another animal or plant, so that they are exactly the same

sentences.english: The meeting ended with a pledge to step up cooperation between the six states of the region.
sentences.chinese: 会议以加快该地区6个州之间合作的承诺结束。

detailed_translations.english: a serious promise or agree-ment, especially one made publicly or officially
to make a formal, usually public, promise that you will do something

name: exempt
trans: 被免除的， 被豁免的

sentences.english: So we have the current argument over how much of the derivative market will be exempt from regulation.
sentences.chinese: 所以我们就看到了当前有关衍生产品市场到底有多大份额可以得到规则的豁免的辩论。

sentences.english: All the new rules do is exempt the user from legal liability - something Apple does not appear to be pursuing anyway.
sentences.chinese: 新法规做到的仅仅是免除了用户的法律责任 - 看起来苹果本来也不打算追究这种责任。

sentences.english: So empirical approaches to literature, the simple observation of data from which one can generalize -they exempt these from the general charge against literary theory.
sentences.chinese: 文学的经验主义研究方法，对我们所概括的事物的简单数据观察,对文学理论的普遍控诉中,他们免除了这些。

sentences.english: All these earthquakes happened when the water level in Zipingpu reservoir was low.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些地震都发生在紫坪铺水库水位很低的时候。

detailed_translations.english: a lake, especially an artificial one, where water is stored before it is supplied to people’s houses

name: aesthetic
trans: 美学的， 艺术的；审美的

sentences.english: From an esthetic point of view, it’s a nice design.
sentences.chinese: 从美学角度看，这是个不错的设计。

sentences.english: a work of great aesthetic appeal
sentences.chinese: 极富美之神韵的作品

detailed_translations.english: connected with beauty and the study of beauty

sentences.english: He's not very good at arithmetic.
sentences.chinese: 他不太擅长算术。

sentences.english: a quick bit of mental arithmetic

sentences.english: The wine, incidentally, goes very well with a mature cheese.
sentences.chinese: 顺便说一下，这种葡萄酒配熟干酪味道很好。

detailed_translations.english: used to add more information to what you have just said, or to introduce a new subject that you have just thought of

sentences.english: This system traps the gasoline vapor escaping from the fuel tank and carburetor .
sentences.chinese: 这个系统能收集从燃油箱和化油器泄漏出来的汽油蒸气。

sentences.english: The phenomenon of vapor explosions threatens the safe storage and transportation of liquefied petroleum gas.
sentences.chinese: 液化石油气蒸汽爆炸是对其安全储运构成很大威胁的一种观象。

sentences.english: And so, you make not only water vapor, NOX but you make some nitrous oxides, NOX, or nox as it is known, and this is the precursor to smog.
sentences.chinese: 这样不仅仅得到的水蒸气，但是你会得到一些氮氧化物，或者如大家所知到的nox，这是烟雾的前驱体。

sentences.english: I am a historian, and I teach in an American university.
sentences.chinese: 我是一位历史学家，在美国一所大学任教。

sentences.english: "There’s nothing I can tell you about how [this or] any other incidents were or are handled, " CIA historian David Robarge said.
sentences.chinese: “关于[这一或]或任何其他事故是如何处理的，我没有什么可以告诉你的，”中央情报局历史学家大卫·罗巴尔说。

sentences.english: The historian drew a horizontal line on the date to remember it.
sentences.chinese: 历史学家在日期上画了一条水平线来记住这天。

detailed_translations.english: A historian is a person who specializes in the study of history, and who writes books and articles about it

sentences.english: Languages are an essential part of the school curriculum.
sentences.chinese: 语言是学校课程中必不可少的部分。

sentences.english: curriculum planning
sentences.chinese: 课程安排

detailed_translations.english: the subjects that are taught by a school, college etc, or the things that are studied in a particular subject

sentences.english: These may either be the drug in question or some analogue of it that.
sentences.chinese: 这些小分子可以是目标药物或其它一些类似物。

sentences.english: The kanic acid (KA) is a structural analogue of the aminoglutaminic acid, excitatory amino acid in the brain.
sentences.chinese: 海人酸（KA）是脑内兴奋性氨基酸递质—谷氨酸的结构类似物。

sentences.english: DCA, or dichloroacetic acid, is an analogue of acetic acid in which chlorine atoms replace two of the three hydrogen atoms on the methyl group.
sentences.chinese: DCA也叫二氯乙酸或二氯醋酸，是一种类似乙酸的化合物，但乙基团上有两个氢原子被氯原子所取代。

detailed_translations.english: a physical object or quantity, such as a pointer on a dial or a voltage, used to measure or represent another quantity

sentences.english: She sat quietly, meditating on the day’s events.
sentences.chinese: 她静静地坐着，思考着这一天发生的事。

sentences.english: I try to meditate for half an hour every evening.
sentences.chinese: 我每天晚上尽量默想半小时。

detailed_translations.chinese: 想,考虑；(尤指宗教上的)沉思,冥想
detailed_translations.english: to think seriously and deeply about something

sentences.english: How do you test the prototype of the vending machine?
sentences.chinese: 你如何测试一个自动售货机的原型?。

sentences.english: What is the difference between these prototype declaration?
sentences.chinese: 这些原型声明的区别是什么？

sentences.english: But how do you come up with the architecture for this evolutionary prototype?
sentences.chinese: 但是你将如何为这个进化的原型提出系统的架构呢？

detailed_translations.english: the first form that a new design of a car, machine etc has, or a model of it used to test the design before it is produced

sentences.english: My first novel was rejected by six publishers. In the meantime I had written a play.
sentences.chinese: 我的第一部小说遭到六家出版商的拒绝。其间我又完成了一部戏剧。

sentences.english: The doctor will be here soon. In the meantime, try and relax.
sentences.chinese: 医生很快就来，现在尽量放松一下。

sentences.english: I'll contact them soon. Meantime don't tell them I'm back.
sentences.chinese: 我会尽快和他们联系。在此期间，不要告诉他们我回来了。

detailed_translations.english: in the period of time between two times or two events
英文释义: meanwhile

sentences.english: All I recollect is a grey sky.
sentences.chinese: 我只记得一片灰色的天空。

detailed_translations.chinese: 回忆,想起,记起,忆起,记得
detailed_translations.english: to be able to remember something

name: powerful
trans: 强大的， 有力的； 有权的 A

sentences.english: He was one of the most powerful men in Bohemia.
sentences.chinese: 他是波希米亚最有权势的人物之一。

sentences.english: a very influential and powerful family
sentences.chinese: 很有权势的家庭

sentences.english: a powerful speech
sentences.chinese: 有感染力的演讲

detailed_translations.english: a powerful person, organization, group etc is able to control and influence events and other people’s actions

sentences.english: The elections were a complete sham.
sentences.chinese: 这次大选完全是一场骗局。

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that is not what they are claimed to be – used to show disapproval
to pretend to be upset, ill etc to gain sympathy or an advantage
made to appear real in order to deceive people

name: meditation
trans: 沉思， 冥想， 默念<

sentences.english: Yoga involves breathing exercises, stretching, and meditation.
sentences.chinese: 瑜伽包括呼吸训练、伸展和冥想。

sentences.english: She found him sitting alone, deep in meditation.
sentences.chinese: 她发现他独自坐着，陷入沉思。

detailed_translations.chinese: 默想，冥想；沉思，深思，思考
detailed_translations.english: the practice of emptying your mind of thoughts and feelings, in order to relax completely or for religious reasons

sentences.english: The judge cited a 1956 Supreme Court ruling in her decision.
sentences.chinese: 法官在她的判决中引用了1956年最高法院的一项裁决。

sentences.english: The passage cited above is from a Robert Frost poem.
sentences.chinese: 以上的引文出自罗伯特•弗罗斯特的一首诗。

sentences.english: She was cited in the divorce proceedings.
sentences.chinese: 她在离婚诉讼中被传唤。

detailed_translations.chinese: 引证；引用；〔法院〕传召，传讯
detailed_translations.english: to mention something as an example, especially one that supports, proves, or explains an idea or situation

sentences.english: She was a casual acquaintance of my family in Vienna.
sentences.chinese: 她是我们家在维也纳的一个交情不深的朋友。

sentences.english: They developed an acquaintance over the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 他们在因特网上相识。

sentences.english: The practice of a lawyer requires acquaintance with court procedures.
sentences.chinese: 当律师要熟悉法庭程序。

detailed_translations.english: someone you know, but who is not a close friend

sentences.english: carbon atoms
sentences.chinese: 碳原子

detailed_translations.english: the smallest part of an  element  that can exist alone or can combine with other substances to form a  molecule

name: moan
trans: 呻吟声， 呜咽声 A

sentences.english: ‘I feel seasick already,’ she moaned.
sentences.chinese: “我已经开始晕船了。”她抱怨道。

sentences.english: He moaned and groaned all the way there.
sentences.chinese: 他去的一路上抱怨个没完。

sentences.english: Tony moaned in his sleep and then turned over on his side.
sentences.chinese: 托尼在睡梦中呻吟了一下，然后转身侧躺。

detailed_translations.english: to complain in an annoying way, especially in an unhappy voice and without good reason

detailed_translations.chinese: 呻吟声， 呜咽声 A
detailed_translations.english: a long low sound expressing pain, unhappiness, or sexual pleasure
If you moan, you make a low sound, usually because you are unhappy or in pain

name: royal
trans: 王室的， 皇家的；一流的； 高贵的

sentences.english: the royal palace
sentences.chinese: 王宫

sentences.english: the royal family
sentences.chinese: 王室

detailed_translations.english: relating to or belonging to a king or queen

name: shed
trans: 流出；发散， 散发；脱落； 摆脱

sentences.english: The company is planning to shed about a quarter of its workforce.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司正计划裁减约四分之一的人员。

sentences.english: The magazine is desperately trying to shed its old-fashioned image.
sentences.chinese: 这份杂志急于摆脱其过时的形象。

sentences.english: a diet to help you shed pounds
sentences.chinese: 帮助你减肥的食谱

detailed_translations.chinese: 脱落，脱去；流出，流下；发出，散发
detailed_translations.english: to get rid of something that you no longer need or want
a small building, often made of wood, used especially for storing things

sentences.english: a pair of gloves
sentences.chinese: 一副手套

sentences.english: boxing gloves
sentences.chinese: 拳击手套

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing that you wear on your hand in order to protect it or keep it warm

sentences.english: precision engineering
sentences.chinese: 精密工程

sentences.english: precision bombing
sentences.chinese: 精确轰炸

detailed_translations.chinese: 精度，[数] 精密度；精确
detailed_translations.english: the quality of being very exact or correct
made or done in a very exact way

name: correspond
trans: 通信；符合， 一致；相当于， 对应

sentences.english: The two halves of the document did not correspond.
sentences.chinese: 这份文件的前后两部分不相符。

sentences.english: The French ‘baccalauréate’ exam roughly corresponds to English A levels.
sentences.chinese: 法国的毕业会考大致相当于英国的高级程度考试。

detailed_translations.english: if two things or ideas correspond, the parts or information in one relate to the parts or information in the other

name: spur
trans: 靴刺， 马刺；刺激， 刺激物 A

sentences.english: The crowd’s reaction only acted as a spur.
sentences.chinese: 人群的反应不过起了刺激作用。

sentences.english: The band were spurred on by the success of their last two singles.
sentences.chinese: 乐队因最近两张单曲唱片的成功而深受鼓舞。

sentences.english: It was an article in the local newspaper which finally spurred him into action .
sentences.chinese: 是当地报纸上的一篇文章最终促使他行动起来。

detailed_translations.english: a fact or event that makes you try harder to do something
to encourage someone or make them want to do something

sentences.english: the most efficient mode of transport
sentences.chinese: 最高效的运输方式

sentences.english: Set the monitor to 256 colour mode.
sentences.chinese: 把显示器调成256色彩模式。

detailed_translations.english: a particular way or style of behaving, living or doing something

sentences.english: Several months elapsed before his case was brought to trial.
sentences.chinese: 过了几个月他的案子才开审。

sentences.english: The assignment must be completed within an overall elapsed time of one week.
sentences.chinese: 这项任务总的时限为一周，必须按时完成。

detailed_translations.english: if a particular period of time elapses, it passes

name: rear
trans: 后方的， 后部的； 背后的

sentences.english: It’s a good place to rear young children.
sentences.chinese: 这地方非常适合抚养小孩子成长。

sentences.english: The birds have been successfully reared in captivity.
sentences.chinese: 这些鸟笼养成功。

detailed_translations.english: to look after a person or animal until they are fully grown

name: symmetry
trans: 对称；匀称； 整齐 A

sentences.english: the symmetry of the design
sentences.chinese: 图案的对称性

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being symmetrical

sentences.english: The peasants leaned down to reap wheat.
sentences.chinese: 农民们俯身收割小麦。

detailed_translations.english: to cut and collect a crop of grain

sentences.english: an insect bite
sentences.chinese: 昆虫的叮咬

sentences.english: flying insects
sentences.chinese: 飞虫

sentences.english: Don’t forget to bring insect repellant (= a chemical to keep insects away ).
sentences.chinese: 不要忘记带上驱虫剂。

detailed_translations.english: a small creature such as a fly or ant, that has six legs, and sometimes wings

sentences.english: a cold buffet
sentences.chinese: 冷餐会

detailed_translations.chinese: 自助餐；小卖部；打击；猛烈冲击
detailed_translations.english: a meal at a party or other occasion, in which people serve themselves at a table and then move away to eat
if something, especially wind, rain, or the sea, buffets something, it hits it with a lot of force

name: presume
trans: 假定， 假设； 认为；揣测

sentences.english: They're resentful that outsiders presume to meddle in their affairs.
sentences.chinese: 他们对外人擅自干预他们的事务怨恨不已。

sentences.english: I presume you're here on business.
sentences.chinese: 我想你是来这儿出差的吧。

sentences.english: "Had he been home all week?"—"I presume so."
sentences.chinese: “他整个星期都在家吗？”—“我想是。”

detailed_translations.english: If you say that someone presumes to do something, you mean that they do it even though they have no right to do it

detailed_translations.chinese: 推测，假定，相信；冒昧，擅自；认定，推定
detailed_translations.english: If you presume that something is the case, you think that it is the case, although you are not certain

name: complement
trans: 补充， 补足；余数；补语

sentences.english: The team needs players who complement each other.
sentences.chinese: 球队需要能够相互取长补短的队员。

sentences.english: This wine would be a nice complement to grilled dishes.
sentences.chinese: 这种葡萄酒配烧烤食物会很不错。

detailed_translations.english: to make a good combination with someone or something else
someone or something that emphasizes the good qualities of another person or thing

name: qualify
trans: 具有资格， 证明合格；限制， 限定； 修饰

sentences.english: Free school lunches are given to children who qualify.
sentences.chinese: 符合条件的儿童可获得免费的学生午餐。

detailed_translations.english: to have the right to have or do something, or to give someone this right

name: pregnant
trans: 怀孕的， 妊娠的；充满的

sentences.english: care for pregnant women
sentences.chinese: 孕妇保健

sentences.english: I knew right away that I was pregnant.
sentences.chinese: 我立即明白我怀孕了。

sentences.english: I thought I was too old to get pregnant .
sentences.chinese: 我觉得自己年龄太大，已经不能怀孕了。

sentences.english: I didn’t mean to get her pregnant (= make her pregnant ) .
sentences.chinese: 我没想让她怀孕。

sentences.english: His wife was heavily pregnant (= almost ready to give birth ) .
sentences.chinese: 他的妻子即将临产。

detailed_translations.english: if a woman or female animal is pregnant, she has an unborn baby growing inside her body

name: border
trans: 交界， 与…接壤； 接近 <

sentences.english: countries that border the Mediterranean
sentences.chinese: 地中海沿岸的国家

sentences.english: ...the European and Arab countries bordering the Mediterranean.
sentences.chinese: …地中海沿岸的欧洲国家和阿拉伯国家。

detailed_translations.english: if one country, state, or area borders another, it is next to it and shares a border with it
a band along or around the edge of something such as a picture or piece of material
A country that borders another country, a sea, or a river is next to it

sentences.english: What is a reasonable standard for one family is not applicable for another.
sentences.chinese: 对一个家庭合理的标准对于另一个家庭并不适用。

detailed_translations.english: if something is applicable to a particular person, group, or situation, it affects them or is related to them

name: admission
trans: 允许进入； 接纳， 收容 <；入场费， 入场券；承认

sentences.english: Reese, by his own admission , lacks the necessary experience.
sentences.chinese: 里斯自己也承认缺乏必要的经验。

sentences.english: No admission after 10 pm.
sentences.chinese: 晚上10点以后免进。

sentences.english: The Museum has no admission charge .
sentences.chinese: 那家博物馆不收门票。

detailed_translations.chinese: 承认；准许进(加)入；入场费
detailed_translations.english: a statement in which you admit that something is true or that you have done something wrong

sentences.english: Small particles adhere to the seed.
sentences.chinese: 微小的粒子紧贴着种子。

sentences.english: We adhere to the principles of equal rights and freedom of expression for all.
sentences.chinese: 我们坚持人人平等和言论自由的原则。

detailed_translations.english: to stick firmly to something

name: expense
trans: 花费， 消费； 消耗

sentences.english: He borrowed £150,000 and used the money for legal expenses.
sentences.chinese: 他借了15万英镑用于支付律师费。

sentences.english: Conference rooms were equipped at great expense.
sentences.chinese: 装备会议室花费巨大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 花费， 消费， 费用； 开支， 业务费用
detailed_translations.english: the amount of money that you spend on something

sentences.english: You can paint, do repairs, and if you have already hired contractors in April or earlier, continue to work on your plans.
sentences.chinese: 你可以涂涂油漆，做点小修补，如果你已经在四月或更加之前就已经雇到承包商的话，按原计划进行没关系。

sentences.english: This past April while visiting my parents on the farm I’d grown up on, I wandered outside to drink in the feel of “home”, a comfort I really needed right then.
sentences.chinese: 刚刚过去的那个四月，我回到我在那长大的农场探望我的父母。 我在屋外漫步，沉浸在“家”的舒适感觉中——当时我真的很需要家的慰藉。

detailed_translations.english: the fourth month of the year, between March and May

sentences.english: His name has come up in the rumour mill as a possible director for the project.
sentences.chinese: 有谣传说他可能出任这个项目的主管。

detailed_translations.english: information or a story that is passed from one person to another and which may or may not be true

name: panorama
trans: 概观， 全景； 综述

sentences.english: Horton looked out over a panorama of fertile valleys and gentle hills.
sentences.chinese: 霍顿眺望着那一片肥沃山谷和平缓山脉的景象。

sentences.english: a panorama of life in England 400 years ago
sentences.chinese: 400年前英格兰生活的全景图

detailed_translations.english: an impressive view of a wide area of land

name: contemporary
trans: 同时代的；现代的， 当代的 <

sentences.english: She writes a lot of contemporary music for people like Whitney Houston.
sentences.chinese: 她为惠特尼·休斯敦等人创作大量当代音乐作品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 现代的， 当代的； 同时代的
detailed_translations.english: belonging to the present time

sentences.english: an attempt to mobilize popular opinion
sentences.chinese: 鼓动公众舆论的尝试

sentences.english: a campaign to mobilize support for the strike
sentences.chinese: 动员大家支持罢工的宣传活动

detailed_translations.english: to encourage people to support something in an active way
to encourage people to support something in an active way

name: mock
trans: 仿制的， 假装的；模拟的， 演习的

sentences.english: Opposition MPs mocked the government’s decision.
sentences.chinese: 反对党议员讥笑政府的这一决策。

sentences.english: ‘Running away?’ he mocked.
sentences.chinese: “想逃跑？”他取笑道。

sentences.english: It’s easy for you to mock, but we put a lot of work into this play.
sentences.chinese: 你讲风凉话是很轻松，但我们这出戏可是费了很大力气的。

detailed_translations.english: to laugh at someone or something and try to make them look stupid by saying unkind things about them or by copying them

detailed_translations.chinese: 仿制的， 假装的；模拟的， 演习的
detailed_translations.english: not real, but intended to be very similar to a real situation, substance etc
school examinations taken as practice before official examinations

sentences.english: We can use them as an amplifier.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以将其当作放大器。

sentences.english: The audio interface must support your amplifier and speaker setup.
sentences.chinese: 音频接口必须支持您的扩音器和扬声器设置。

sentences.english: I was not just one college kid, I was an amplifier for him throughout the whole computer science department.
sentences.chinese: 我不仅是一个大学生，我同时也是那个可以帮他在整个计算机系中发声的扩音器。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of electrical equipment that makes sound louder

sentences.english: His mountain bike had 18 gears.
sentences.chinese: 他的山地自行车有18挡。

sentences.english: Andy drove cautiously along in third gear.
sentences.chinese: 安迪挂着三挡小心地行驶。

sentences.english: Does this thing have a reverse gear?
sentences.chinese: 这玩意儿有倒挡吗？

sentences.english: Any cyclist can climb a difficult hill; you just change gear.
sentences.chinese: 谁都能骑上难爬的山坡，只要换挡就行了。

sentences.english: Don’t turn off the engine while you’re still in gear.
sentences.chinese: 还挂着挡的时候不要关发动机。

sentences.english: It’s a good habit to take the car out of gear while you’re at a stoplight.
sentences.chinese: 等红灯时换空挡的习惯很好。

sentences.english: Colleges are not always geared to the needs of mature students.
sentences.chinese: 大学并不总是去适应成年学生的需要。

sentences.english: My training was geared toward winning gold.
sentences.chinese: 我的训练是为赢得金牌去规划的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 齿轮，传动装置，排挡；用具，设备；衣服
detailed_translations.english: the machinery in a vehicle such as a car, truck, or bicycle that you use to go comfortably at different speeds
If someone or something is geared to or toward a particular purpose, they are organized or designed in order to achieve that purpose

name: facilitate
trans: 使变得容易， 使便利

sentences.english: The new trade agreement should facilitate more rapid economic growth.
sentences.chinese: 新贸易协定应当会加快经济发展。

sentences.english: Structured teaching facilitates learning.
sentences.chinese: 有条理的教导有利于学习。

detailed_translations.english: to make an action or a process possible or easier

sentences.english: They killed four policemen while robbing a bank.
sentences.chinese: 他们抢劫一家银行的时候杀了4名警察。

sentences.english: A 77-year-old woman was robbed at knifepoint.
sentences.chinese: 一名77岁老妪遭到持刀抢劫。

detailed_translations.english: to steal money or property from a person, bank etc

sentences.chinese: 这突然一动震动了那个箱子，然后它从桌上掉了下去。

detailed_translations.english: If an object jars, or if something jars it, the object moves with a fairly hard shaking movement

sentences.chinese: 数百万老年人生活在贫困之中。

trans: 求助； 诉诸； 凭借 <

sentences.chinese: 他那累人的工作日程已经使他不得不求助于毒品了。

sentences.chinese: 莫尔托先生已经同意出庭作证。

sentences.chinese: 闪电式突袭

sentences.chinese: 他一拳打在他的下巴上。

sentences.chinese: 采用双倍行距和宽阔的页边空白，以便留出地方写评注。

sentences.chinese: 用“一见钟情”来形容他见到她时的感觉再恰当不过。

name: reed

sentences.chinese: 沿河岸长着一丛丛芦苇。

detailed_translations.english: a type of tall plant like grass that grows in wet places

name: shabby
trans: 破旧的， 破烂的；衣衫褴褛的；卑鄙的； 不公正的

sentences.english: Hugh’s jacket was old and shabby.

detailed_translations.english: shabby clothes, places, or objects are untidy and in bad condition because they have been used for a long time

name: refine
trans: 精炼； 精制； 提纯 <

sentences.chinese: 油经过提炼去除天然生成的杂质。

sentences.chinese: 愤怒的示威者要求两名高级官员辞职。

name: mount
trans: 登上， 爬上 <；安装， 装配； 固定； 镶嵌

detailed_translations.english: to go up a step or stairs
used as part of the name of a mountain

sentences.english: Andy reeled away from the bar and knocked over his stool.
sentences.chinese: 安迪踉跄着离开吧台，把凳子都撞倒了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 摇摇晃晃地移动，蹒跚；眩晕，发昏
detailed_translations.english: to walk in an unsteady way and almost fall over, as if you are drunk
a round object onto which film, wire, a special string for fishing etc can be wound
to wind (cotton, thread, etc) onto a reel

name: pathetic
trans: 可怜的， 引起怜悯的；令人难过的

sentences.english: You’re pathetic! Here, let me do it.
sentences.chinese: 你真没用！来，让我做吧。

sentences.english: I know it sounds pathetic now, but at the time I was frightened.
sentences.chinese: 我知道现在听起来挺窝囊，不过当时我很害怕。

sentences.english: Vic made a pathetic attempt to apologise.
sentences.chinese: 维克很勉强地道了歉。

detailed_translations.chinese: 差劲的， 令人生厌的； 引起怜悯的， 可怜的， 可悲的
detailed_translations.english: something or someone that is pathetic is so useless, unsuccessful, or weak that they annoy you

sentences.english: roast turkey
sentences.chinese: 烤火鸡

detailed_translations.english: a bird that looks like a large chicken and is often eaten at Christmas and at Thanksgiving

name: gently
trans: 文雅地， 有礼貌地；轻轻地， 温和地

sentences.english: ‘You go back to bed now,’ he said gently.
sentences.chinese: “你回去睡觉吧。”他温柔地说道。

sentences.english: She kissed me gently on the cheek.
sentences.chinese: 她温柔地亲吻我的脸颊。

sentences.english: Gently cook the peppers for 10-15 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 用文火将辣椒煮10到15分钟。

sentences.english: Rain pattered gently on the roof above.
sentences.chinese: 雨点轻轻拍打着上面的屋顶。

sentences.english: The road curved gently upwards.
sentences.chinese: 路缓缓地蜿蜒而上。

detailed_translations.english: in a gentle way

sentences.english: ...a tiny fossil plant, only a few centimetres high.
sentences.chinese: …一块小小的植物化石，只有几厘米高。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring length. There are 100 centimetres in one metre.

name: overtime
trans: 超过； 在加班时间内

sentences.english: six hours’ overtime
sentences.chinese: 六小时的加班

sentences.english: They’re working overtime to get the job finished.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在加班赶工。

sentences.english: He’s been doing a lot of overtime recently.
sentences.chinese: 他近来加班很多。

sentences.english: Many employees work countless hours of unpaid overtime.
sentences.chinese: 许多员工无偿加班无数个小时。

sentences.english: Many of our offices will be working on overtime until the end of the year.
sentences.chinese: 我们的许多办事处都要加班到年底。

detailed_translations.chinese: [劳经] 加班时间；延长时间；加时赛
detailed_translations.english: time that you spend working in your job in addition to your normal working hours

sentences.english: The captain was rectifying his telescope.
sentences.chinese: 船长正在调他的望远镜。

sentences.english: The telescope reveals many distant stars to our sight.
sentences.chinese: 望远镜把许多遥远的星球显现在我们的眼前。

sentences.english: With the aid of a telescope a ship could be made out on the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 借助望远镜可以看出在地平线上有一只船。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment shaped like a tube, used for making distant objects look larger and closer

sentences.english: The professor stands accused of (=  has been accused of  ) stealing his student’s ideas and publishing them.
sentences.chinese: 那位教授被指控剽窃学生的观点拿去发表。

detailed_translations.english: to say that you believe someone is guilty of a crime or of doing something bad

sentences.english: What on earth is wrong with the poor devil?
sentences.chinese: 这可怜的家伙到底怎么了？

detailed_translations.chinese: 魔鬼；撒旦；家伙；恶棍；淘气鬼；冒失鬼
detailed_translations.english: the most powerful evil spiritin some religions, especially in Christianity

detailed_translations.chinese: 虐待，折磨；（用扯碎机）扯碎；（替作家，律师等）做助手；抹辣味料烤制或煎煮

name: predecessor
trans: 前任， 前辈；原有事物； 前身

sentences.english: Kennedy’s predecessor as President was the war hero Dwight Eisenhower.
sentences.chinese: 肯尼迪总统的前任是战争英雄德怀特·艾森豪威尔。

detailed_translations.english: someone who had your job before you started doing it

sentences.english: I smelled the odor of money.
sentences.chinese: 我闻到了一股铜臭气。

sentences.english: The researchers demonstrate that it is possible to generate odor in a compact device that can fit on the back of a TV with potentially thousands of odors.
sentences.chinese: 研究员表示，将一个可以散发上千种气味的小型设备安装在电视背后，从而实现电视(根据情景)生成气味是可能的。

sentences.english: Pewter has an odor.
sentences.chinese: 锡器有一股臭气。

name: acquire
trans: 取得， 获得； 学到 <

sentences.english: Manning hoped to acquire valuable works of art as cheaply as possible.
sentences.chinese: 曼宁希望以尽可能低的价格买到有价值的艺术品。

sentences.english: She has acquired an email address and a site on the World Wide Web.
sentences.chinese: 她获得了一个电子邮件地址和万维网网址。

detailed_translations.chinese: 取得， 获得； 学到
detailed_translations.english: to obtain something by buying it or being given it

name: trolley
trans: 手推车， 小车；〈英〉无轨电车； 〈美〉有轨电车

sentences.english: a supermarket trolley
sentences.chinese: 超市购物手推车

detailed_translations.chinese: 手推车；（美）有轨电车（等于trolley car）；（英）无轨电车（等于trolleybus）；空中吊运车
detailed_translations.english: a large basket on wheels that you use for carrying bags, shopping etc

sentences.english: the automobile industry
sentences.chinese: 汽车工业

detailed_translations.english: a car

name: fertile
trans: 肥沃的， 富饶的 <；能繁殖的

sentences.english: the product of a fertile imagination
sentences.chinese: 想象力丰富的产物

detailed_translations.english: (of a person's mind or imagination) that produces a lot of new ideas

name: notion
trans: 概念， 意念；看法， 想法， 观点

sentences.english: She had no notion what he meant.
sentences.chinese: 她根本不明白他是什么意思。

sentences.english: misguided notions of male superiority
sentences.chinese: 男尊女卑的错误观念

detailed_translations.english: an idea, belief, or opinion

sentences.english: Iron-ox is another name for tractor.
sentences.chinese: 铁牛是拖拉机的别名。

sentences.english: The tractor hauled the fertilizer away.
sentences.chinese: 拖拉机把肥料拉走了。

sentences.english: In addition to the tractor, we have acquired a new rice transplanter.
sentences.chinese: 除了拖拉机， 我们又添了一台插秧机。

detailed_translations.english: a strong vehicle with large wheels, used for pulling farm machinery

name: grace
trans: 优美， 优雅；恩惠， 恩泽

sentences.english: Lena moved with the grace of a dancer.
sentences.chinese: 莉娜走路姿势有着舞者般的优美。

sentences.english: He conducted himself with grace and dignity throughout the trial.
sentences.chinese: 在整个审讯过程中他表现得文雅而有尊严。

detailed_translations.english: a smooth way of moving that looks natural, relaxed, and attractive

sentences.english: He doesn't have the patience to wait.
sentences.chinese: 他没有耐心等。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to stay calm and accept a delay or sth annoying without complaining

name: captive
trans: 被俘虏的， 被监禁的

sentences.english: captive soldiers
sentences.chinese: 被俘的士兵

sentences.english: captive animals
sentences.chinese: 被关住的动物

sentences.english: His son had been taken captive (= became a prisoner ) during the raid.
sentences.chinese: 他的儿子在这次突袭中被劫持了。

sentences.english: a pilot who was held captive (= kept as a prisoner ) for six years
sentences.chinese: 一名被囚六年的飞行员

detailed_translations.chinese: 被俘虏的， 被监禁的
detailed_translations.english: kept in prison or in a place that you are not allowed to leave
someone who is kept as a prisoner, especially in a war

name: dividend
trans: 红利， 股息；回报， 效益；被除数

sentences.english: The first quarter dividend has been increased by nearly 4 percent.
sentences.chinese: 第一季度的股息增加了近4％。

detailed_translations.chinese: 红利；股息；[数] 被除数；奖金
detailed_translations.english: a part of a company’s profit that is divided among the people with  share s  in the company

sentences.english: He had to have ten stitches in his head.
sentences.chinese: 他头上不得不缝了十针。

detailed_translations.english: a short piece of thread that has been sewn into a piece of cloth, or the action of the thread going into and out of the cloth
to sew two pieces of cloth together, or to sew a decoration onto a piece of cloth

sentences.english: Smoking is my only vice.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟是我唯一的恶习。

detailed_translations.english: a bad habit

sentences.english: Peden was greatly esteemed by the people of Ayrshire.
sentences.chinese: 佩登深受艾尔郡人的尊敬。

sentences.english: He was esteemed as a literary wit.
sentences.chinese: 他被尊为文学才子。

detailed_translations.english: to respect and admire someone or something

sentences.english: Though shorn of some of its powers, the party remains in control.
sentences.chinese: 虽然被削去了一些权力，该党仍然掌握着控制权。

sentences.english: Trim the shrubs with shears.
sentences.chinese: 用大剪刀修剪这些灌木。

detailed_translations.english: to cut the wool off a sheep
A pair of shears is a garden tool like a very large pair of scissors. Shears are used especially for cutting hedges.

name: thoughtful
trans: 认真思考的， 沉思的；体贴的， 关心的；富有思想性的； 颇有创见的

sentences.english: Paul is very thoughtful.
sentences.chinese: 保罗非常体贴人。

sentences.english: a thoughtful look
sentences.chinese: 若有所思的神情

detailed_translations.english: always thinking of the things you can do to make people happy or comfortable

sentences.english: cancer of the bowel
sentences.chinese: 肠癌

detailed_translations.english: the system of tubes inside your body where food is made into solid waste material and through which it passes out of your body

name: holder
trans: 持有者， 占有者；支持物

sentences.english: the 800 m world record holder
sentences.chinese: 800米世界纪录保持者

sentences.english: Season-ticket holders are furious at the rise in rail fares.
sentences.chinese: 买季票的人对火车票价上涨极为愤怒。

sentences.english: British passport holders
sentences.chinese: 英国护照持有人

detailed_translations.chinese: 持有人；所有人；固定器；（台、架等）支持物
detailed_translations.english: someone who owns or controls something

name: suppress
trans: 镇压， 压制 <；抑制， 忍住 <；查禁； 禁止发表 <

sentences.english: The uprising was ruthlessly suppressed.
sentences.chinese: 起义受到了残酷的镇压。

detailed_translations.english: to stop people from opposing the government, especially by using force

sentences.english: Her face was a mass of wrinkles.
sentences.chinese: 她的脸上布满皱纹。

sentences.english: Alex wrinkled up her nose at the smell.
sentences.chinese: 闻到那股味道，亚历克丝皱起了鼻子。

detailed_translations.english: wrinkles are lines on your face and skin that you get when you are old
if you wrinkle a part of your face, or if it wrinkles, small lines appear on it

sentences.english: The price of home ownership is increasing.
sentences.chinese: 房价在不断上涨。

detailed_translations.english: the fact of owning something

sentences.english: When do you think the patient can be operated on for the tumor?
sentences.chinese: 你认为这个病人什么时候可以做肿瘤手术？

sentences.english: Staging of prostatic adenocarcinoma is based upon how extensive the tumor is.
sentences.chinese: 前列腺腺癌的分级是根据肿瘤的浸润程度而定的。

sentences.english: The tumor in his prostate gland was caught at an early and very likely curable stage.
sentences.chinese: 由于他的前列腺肿瘤是在早期被发现的，处在很有可能治愈阶段。

sentences.english: Griffiths closely supervised the research.
sentences.chinese: 格里菲思密切指导该项研究。

detailed_translations.english: to be in charge of an activity or person, and make sure that things are done in the correct way

sentences.english: Rennie had eaten his supper in the canteen.
sentences.chinese: 伦尼已在食堂吃过晚饭。

detailed_translations.english: a place in a factory, school etc where meals are provided, usually quite cheaply

name: fabulous
trans: 寓言式的；极为巨大的；极好的

sentences.english: the Duke’s fabulous wealth
sentences.chinese: 那位公爵的巨额财富

sentences.english: You look fabulous!
sentences.chinese: 你看上去美极了！

sentences.english: a fabulous meal
sentences.chinese: 丰盛的一餐

sentences.english: The room has fabulous views across the lake.
sentences.chinese: 那个房间可以看到美丽的湖景。

detailed_translations.english: very large in amount or size

sentences.english: a moral dilemma
sentences.chinese: 道德上进退两难的窘境

sentences.english: This placed Robert Kennedy in a dilemma.
sentences.chinese: 这让罗伯特·肯尼迪陷入了两难的境地。

sentences.english: Many women are faced with the dilemma of choosing between work and family commitments.
sentences.chinese: 许多女性面临着出去工作还是照顾家庭的两难境地。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which it is very difficult to decide what to do, because all the choices seem equally good or equally bad

sentences.english: You’ll have to rub harder if you want to get it clean.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想把它弄干净，就得更使劲地擦。

sentences.english: I hurriedly rubbed myself dry.
sentences.chinese: 我赶紧把自己擦干。

detailed_translations.english: to move your hand, or something such as a cloth, backwards and forwards over a surface while pressing firmly

name: engagement
trans: 约会， 约定；婚约； 订婚

sentences.english: Their engagement was announced in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 他们订婚的消息在报上公布了。

sentences.english: This is his only public speaking engagement on the tour.
sentences.chinese: 这是他此行唯一一场公开演讲。

detailed_translations.english: an agreement between two people to marry, or the period of time they are engaged

sentences.english: A Persian rug covered the hardwood floors.
sentences.chinese: 一张波斯小地毯铺在了那硬木地板上。

sentences.english: The old lady was seated in her chair at the window, a rug over her knees.
sentences.chinese: 这位老妇人坐在靠窗的椅子上，膝上盖着一块小毛毯。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of thick cloth or wool that covers part of a floor, used for warmth or as a decoration

sentences.english: The street lights go on at dusk.
sentences.chinese: 街灯在黄昏时亮起来。

detailed_translations.english: the time before it gets dark when the sky is becoming less bright

name: organisation
trans: 组织， 机构； 体制， 结构

sentences.english: Please describe the goals your organisation is hoping to achieve through this partnership as well as any recognition you hope to receive for your partnership with the UN.
sentences.chinese: 请描述您的组织希望通过这个合作关系实现的目标，以及您希望从与联合国的合作关系得到的任何认可。

name: occasional
trans: 偶然的， 非经常的； 特殊场合的；临时的； 不时的

sentences.english: He made occasional visits to London.
sentences.chinese: 他有时候会去伦敦。

sentences.english: They had an occasional coffee together after shopping.
sentences.chinese: 他们偶尔会在购物后一起喝杯咖啡。

sentences.english: He only has occasional use of a car.
sentences.chinese: 他只是偶尔用一下汽车。

sentences.english: We should have enough money for the occasional trip.
sentences.chinese: 我们的钱应该足够偶尔出去旅行一次的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 偶尔的， 间或发生的
detailed_translations.english: happening sometimes but not often or regularly

sentences.english: The bomb went off at 9.30 in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 炸弹在早上9点半爆炸。

sentences.english: Enemy planes dropped over 200 bombs during the raid.
sentences.chinese: 袭击中敌机投下了两百多枚炸弹。

sentences.english: He was killed in a bomb explosion.
sentences.chinese: 他在一次炸弹爆炸中身亡。

sentences.english: The town was heavily bombed in World War II.
sentences.chinese: 这座城镇在第二次世界大战中遭到猛烈轰炸。

detailed_translations.english: a weapon made of material that will explode
to attack a place by leaving a bomb there, or by dropping bombs on it from a plane

sentences.english: repeated calls for change
sentences.chinese: 再三呼吁变革

sentences.english: repeated attempts to kill him
sentences.chinese: 再三企图杀害他

detailed_translations.english: done or happening again and again

sentences.english: the gun-control debate in the US
sentences.chinese: 美国有关控制枪支的争论

sentences.english: The new drug has become the subject of heated debate within the medical profession.
sentences.chinese: 这种新药成了医学界激烈争论的话题。

sentences.english: There was much lively debate about whether women should spend more time in the home.
sentences.chinese: 就妇女是否应该花更多时间待在家里这个话题有许多热烈的争论。

sentences.english: A fierce debate raged over which artist’s work should be chosen for the prize.
sentences.chinese: 就哪位艺术家的作品应该得奖一事展开了激烈的争论。

sentences.english: The issue will be debated on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题将在星期二讨论。

detailed_translations.english: discussion of a particular subject that often continues for a long time and in which people express different opinions
to discuss a subject formally when you are trying to make a decision or find a solution

sentences.english: the world's largest and most expensive unmanned spacecraft
sentences.chinese: 世界上最大、最贵的无人航天器

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle that is able to travel in space

sentences.english: Please extinguish all cigarettes.
sentences.chinese: 请把香烟都熄灭了。

sentences.english: Firemen were called to extinguish the blaze.
sentences.chinese: 有人打电话叫消防队员来扑灭大火。

sentences.english: All hope was almost extinguished.
sentences.chinese: 所有的希望都快要破灭了。

detailed_translations.english: to make a fire or light stop burning or shining

sentences.english: Israel, which has tried for years to mobilise international action against Iran , suddenly appears more sanguine.
sentences.chinese: 以色列， 多年来一直试图动员国际社会采取行动（果）霎时看到了转机和希望。

sentences.english: He took advantage of me when I was at my most vulnerable.
sentences.chinese: 他在我最脆弱的时候利用了我。

sentences.english: We work mainly with the elderly and other vulnerable groups.
sentences.chinese: 我们主要和老年人以及其他弱势群体打交道。

detailed_translations.chinese: 脆弱的, 易受影响的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is vulnerable can be easily harmed or hurt

name: view
trans: 景象， 风景；视点， 见解；观察， 观看；眼界， 视野
看待， 考虑；观看， 观察

sentences.english: an opportunity to view the film before it goes on general release
sentences.chinese: 在影片公映之前观影的机会

detailed_translations.english: to think about something or someone in a particular way

name: preach
trans: 宣讲；竭力鼓吹， 宣传， 说教

sentences.english: He traveled the southern states, preaching the gospel .
sentences.chinese: 他游历南方各州宣讲福音。

detailed_translations.chinese: 说教；讲道；鼓吹；传道；反复灌输
detailed_translations.english: to talk about a religious subject in a public place, especially in a church during a service

name: jet
trans: 喷气发动机； 喷气式飞机；喷口， 喷嘴

sentences.english: He owns a private jet.
sentences.chinese: 他拥有一架私人喷气式飞机。

detailed_translations.chinese: 喷射，喷嘴；喷气式飞机；黑玉
detailed_translations.english: a fast plane with a jet engine
if a liquid or gas jets out from somewhere, it comes quickly out of a small hole

sentences.english: people who volunteer to donate blood
sentences.chinese: 自愿献血者

detailed_translations.english: to give something, especially money, to a person or an organization in order to help them

name: helpful
trans: 有帮助的， 有益的， 有用的

sentences.english: Thank you for your advice; it’s been very helpful.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢你的建议，它非常有用。

sentences.english: It is helpful if we address a few key questions here.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们在这里解决一些关键问题会很有用的。

detailed_translations.english: providing useful help in making a situation better or easier

name: taboo
trans: 禁忌， 忌讳；禁止 A

sentences.english: The topic of addiction remains something of a taboo in our family.
sentences.chinese: 毒瘾在我们家依然是个有些忌讳的话题。

detailed_translations.english: a custom that says you must avoid a particular activity or subject, either because it is considered offensive or because your religion does not allow it
a taboo subject, word, activity etc is one that people avoid because it is extremely offensive or embarrassing

name: mold
trans: 浇铸， 造型； 塑造， 形成

sentences.english: Because of its flexibility, we can mold software into any form to do almost anything.
sentences.chinese: 由于灵活性，我们可以将软件塑造成任何形式从而处理几乎所有的问题。

sentences.english: The women of a nation mold its morals, its religion, and its politics by the lives they live.
sentences.chinese: 一个国家的妇女通过她们的生活方式塑造了这个国家的道德、宗教和政治。

name: bold
trans: 大胆的， 勇敢的；冒失的， 冒昧的；黑体的， 粗体的

sentences.english: In a surprisingly bold move , he is threatening court action against the company.
sentences.chinese: 他出人意料地做出一个大胆举动，威胁要起诉这家公司。

sentences.english: My aunt Flo was a bold determined woman.
sentences.chinese: 我姑妈芙洛是一个大胆果断的人。

sentences.english: He had the ability to take bold imaginative decisions.
sentences.chinese: 他能够作出富有创见的大胆决定。

sentences.english: She marched into his office as bold as brass (= very confident and not showing enough respect ).
sentences.chinese: 她放肆地直闯进他的办公室。

detailed_translations.english: not afraid of taking risks and making difficult decisions

name: significant
trans: 有意义的； 重大的， 重要的

sentences.english: His most significant political achievement was the abolition of the death penalty.
sentences.chinese: 他政治上最重大的成就是废除了死刑。

sentences.english: Please inform us if there are any significant changes in your plans.
sentences.chinese: 你们的计划如有重大变动，请通知我们。

detailed_translations.english: having an important effect or influence, especially on what will happen in the future

sentences.english: Cord held the reins while the stallion tugged and snorted.
sentences.chinese: 当那匹牡马使劲挣扎，打着响鼻的时候，科德勒紧了缰绳。

detailed_translations.english: a long narrow band of leather that is fastened around a horse’s head in order to control it

detailed_translations.chinese: 勒缰使停步； 控制， 约束

sentences.english: Your nose is bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 你的鼻子流血了。

sentences.english: Tragically, she bled to death .
sentences.chinese: 非常不幸，她失血过多死了。

detailed_translations.english: to lose blood, especially because of an injury

sentences.english: a mail order catalog
sentences.chinese: 邮购商品目录

sentences.english: an online catalogue
sentences.chinese: 网上目录

detailed_translations.english: a complete list of things that you can look at, buy, or use, for example in a library or at an art show
to make a complete list of all the things in a group

sentences.english: When the bag is folded, the bottom overlaps one side.
sentences.chinese: 把包折叠起来时，其底部与一边就重合了。

sentences.english: Overlap the slices carefully so there are no gaps.
sentences.chinese: 把薄片小心地叠放在一起，那样就没有间隙。

detailed_translations.chinese: 部分重叠； 部分相同
detailed_translations.english: If one thing overlaps another, or if you overlap them, a part of the first thing occupies the same area as a part of the other thing. You can also say that two things overlap.
the amount by which two activities, ideas, things etc overlap

name: volunteer
trans: 志愿的， 义务的， 无偿的

sentences.english: Most of the relief work was done by volunteers.
sentences.chinese: 大部分救援工作都由志愿人员完成。

sentences.english: I volunteered my services as a driver.
sentences.chinese: 我主动提出来当司机。

detailed_translations.english: someone who does a job willingly without being paid
to offer to do something without expecting any reward, often something that other people do not want to do

sentences.english: The Senate approved the bill.
sentences.chinese: 参议院批准了这项议案。

detailed_translations.english: the smaller and more important of the two parts of the government with the power to make laws, in countries such as the US, Australia, and France

sentences.english: the instability of the market
sentences.chinese: 市场的变化无常

sentences.english: political instability in the region
sentences.chinese: 该地区的政局不稳

detailed_translations.english: when a situation is not certain because there is the possibility of sudden change

sentences.english: a plot to assassinate the President
sentences.chinese: 刺杀总统的阴谋

detailed_translations.english: to murder an important person

sentences.english: Ben rushed to his father, crowing with pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 本欢叫着跑向他爸爸。

detailed_translations.english: if a  cock  crows, it makes a loud high sound
a large shiny black bird with a loud cry

name: neighborhood
trans: 邻居； 四邻； 街道， 住宅区

sentences.english: Iterates may be categorized into stable and unstable sets depending on whether a neighborhood under iteration converges or diverges. Some move toward stability, others away.
sentences.chinese: 根据一个受迭代影响的社区是聚合还是发散，迭代可以被归类到稳定和不稳定集。有些转向稳定，有些转离。

sentences.english: Hundreds of people gathered to mourn the slain president.
sentences.chinese: 成百上千人聚集在一起悼念遇刺的总统。

detailed_translations.english: to feel very sad and to miss someone after they have died

sentences.english: Was this money a bolt from the blue or did you know you were going to get it?
sentences.chinese: 这是一笔意料之财呢，还是你本来就知道会有的？

sentences.english: The pig rose squealing and bolted.
sentences.chinese: 那头猪尖叫着站起来，飞快地跑开了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 螺栓，螺钉；闪电，雷电；门闩；弩箭;（布的）一匹，一卷
detailed_translations.english: a screw with a flat head and no point, for fastening things together

detailed_translations.chinese: 筛选；囫囵吞下；（把门、窗等）闩上；突然说出，脱口说出
detailed_translations.english: to lock a door or window by sliding a bolt across

detailed_translations.chinese: 突然地；像箭似地；直立地
detailed_translations.english: If a person or animal bolts, they suddenly start to run very fast, often because something has frightened them

sentences.english: ...a tumbler with about an inch of whiskey in it.
sentences.chinese: …一个装了大约一英寸高的威士忌酒的大玻璃杯。

detailed_translations.english: Whiskey is a strong alcoholic drink made, especially in the United States and Ireland, from grain such as barley or rye

sentences.english: You’re in a good mood this morning!
sentences.chinese: 你今天早晨心情不错啊！

sentences.english: the general mood of depression in the office
sentences.chinese: 办公室里普遍的沮丧情绪

detailed_translations.english: the way you feel at a particular time

sentences.english: Many toys have no attraction beyond their novelty value.
sentences.chinese: 许多玩具除了有些新奇感之外，别无吸引力。

sentences.english: Then the Internet was still something of a novelty.
sentences.chinese: 那时因特网还是个挺新鲜的东西。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being new, unusual, and interesting

name: boom
trans: 迅速发展， 兴旺；发出隆隆声

sentences.english: The boom has created job opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 经济繁荣创造了就业的机会。

sentences.english: the economic boom of the 1950s
sentences.chinese: 20世纪50年代的经济繁荣

sentences.english: The economy went from boom to bust (=  from increasing to decreasing  ) very quickly.
sentences.chinese: 经济很快就从繁荣走向了萧条。

detailed_translations.english: a quick increase of business activity

name: absence
trans: 缺席， 不在场；缺乏， 没有 A

sentences.chinese: 警察没有证据，只好把迈尔斯放了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缺席， 不在； 缺席的时间， 外出期； 缺乏， 不存在
detailed_translations.english: when you are not in the place where people expect you to be, or the time that you are away

sentences.english: Slavery was abolished in the US in the 19th century.
sentences.chinese: 美国于19世纪废除了奴隶制。

detailed_translations.english: to officially end a law, system etc, especially one that has existed for a long time

name: attract
trans: 吸引， 引诱； 引起

sentences.english: I’m not usually attracted to blondes.
sentences.chinese: 我一般不喜欢金发女子。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone interested in something, or make them want to take part in something

sentences.english: The booklet gives a brief description of each place.
sentences.chinese: 这本小册子对每一个地方都作了简短的介绍。

sentences.english: Berlin sounds fascinating from your description.
sentences.chinese: 从你的描述来看，柏林是个迷人的城市。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of writing or speech that gives details about what someone or something is like

sentences.english: a paperback edition
sentences.chinese: 平装本

sentences.english: the US edition of Marie Claire magazine
sentences.chinese: 《嘉人》杂志的美国版

sentences.english: Martin was reading the early edition of the Evening News.
sentences.chinese: 马丁在看《新闻晚报》的早间版

sentences.english: The textbook was first published in 1858 and is now in its 39th edition.
sentences.chinese: 该课本初版于1858年，现在已经是第39版了。

detailed_translations.english: the form that a book, newspaper, magazine etc is produced in

sentences.english: a cautious driver
sentences.chinese: 一位谨慎的司机

sentences.english: a cautious approach to the crisis
sentences.chinese: 处理危机的谨慎态度

sentences.english: The air-pollution board has reacted with cautious optimism to the announcement.
sentences.chinese: 空气污染委员会对这项通告表示谨慎乐观。

detailed_translations.english: careful to avoid danger or risks

sentences.english: At this point the path seemed to disappear altogether (= disappear completely ) .
sentences.chinese: 小路到这里好像完全消失了。

sentences.english: The two girls disappeared while walking home from school..
sentences.chinese: 这两名女孩在放学回家的路上失踪了。

detailed_translations.english: to become impossible to see any longer

sentences.english: the economic recession of the early 1980s
sentences.chinese: 20世纪80年代初的经济衰退

sentences.english: There is deep recession in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 英国处于严重的经济衰退之中。

detailed_translations.english: a difficult time when there is less trade, business activity etc in a country than usual

sentences.english: The house is situated near the college.
sentences.chinese: 这幢房子位于学院附近。

sentences.english: a farm situated in the valley
sentences.chinese: 位于山谷里的一个农场

sentences.english: The hotel is ideally situated near the seafront.
sentences.chinese: 酒店的位置理想，靠近海滨。

detailed_translations.english: to be in a particular place or position

name: negative
trans: 否定的； 消极的； 反面的；【数】负的； 【电】阴性的

sentences.english: students with a negative attitude to school
sentences.chinese: 对上学抱消极态度的学生

sentences.english: They have a uniformly negative image of the police.
sentences.chinese: 他们都对警察印象不好。

sentences.english: Jean rarely sounded so negative about her mother.
sentences.chinese: 琼很少这么说她母亲不好。

detailed_translations.chinese: 否定的，消极的；负的，阴性的
detailed_translations.english: considering only the bad qualities of a situation, person etc and not the good ones

detailed_translations.chinese: 负片， 底片； 负数
detailed_translations.english: an image on a photographic film that shows dark areas as light and light areas as dark, from which the final picture is printed

name: ally
trans: 同盟国， 同盟者；支持者

sentences.english: a meeting of the European allies
sentences.chinese: 欧洲盟国会议

sentences.english: He will have no choice but to ally himself with the new movement.
sentences.chinese: 他将别无选择，只能与这个新运动结盟。

detailed_translations.chinese: 同盟国；伙伴；同盟者；助手
detailed_translations.english: a country that agrees to help or support another country in a war
If you ally yourself with someone or something, you give your support to them

name: hence
trans: 从此， 今后； 因此

sentences.english: The cost of transport is a major expense for an industry. Hence factory location is an important consideration.
sentences.chinese: 运输成本是企业的一大支出，因此工厂选址是重要的考虑因素。

detailed_translations.english: for this reason

sentences.english: hiking boots
sentences.chinese: 远足靴

sentences.english: a pair of boots
sentences.chinese: 一双靴子

detailed_translations.english: a type of shoe that covers your whole foot and the lower part of your leg

name: learned
trans: 博学的， 有学问的 A

sentences.english: a learned professor
sentences.chinese: 一位博学的教授

detailed_translations.english: a learned person has a lot of knowledge because they have read and studied a lot

name: substance
trans: 物质， 实质；大意；财产， 财物

sentences.english: The leaves were covered with a strange sticky substance.
sentences.chinese: 树叶上覆着一层黏糊糊的怪东西。

sentences.english: The substance of his argument was that people on welfare should work.
sentences.chinese: 他论点的主旨是享受社会福利的人应该去工作。

detailed_translations.english: a particular type of solid, liquid, or gas

sentences.english: She frowned as she read the letter.
sentences.chinese: 她看着信皱起了眉头。

detailed_translations.english: to make an angry, unhappy, or confused expression, moving your  eyebrows  together

name: bond
trans: 结合， 黏结， 联结；公债， 债券； 契约

sentences.english: My father put all his money into stock market bonds.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲把他所有的钱都投在上市债券上。

sentences.english: furious trading on the bond market
sentences.chinese: 债券市场疯狂的交易

sentences.english: the emotional bond between mother and child
sentences.chinese: 母亲和孩子之间的感情纽带

detailed_translations.english: an official document promising that a government or company will pay back money that it has borrowed, often with interest

sentences.english: The girls were awed by the splendour of the cathedral.
sentences.chinese: 女孩们对大教堂的宏伟气势大为惊叹。

detailed_translations.english: if you are awed by someone or something, you feel great respect and liking for them, and are often slightly afraid of them
a feeling of great respect and liking for someone or something

name: momentum
trans: 动力， 冲力， 势头；动量

sentences.english: incentives to maintain the momentum of European integration
sentences.chinese: 保持欧洲一体化发展势头的激励措施

sentences.english: Governments often lose momentum in their second term of office.
sentences.chinese: 政府往往会在第二届任期中丧失冲劲。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to keep increasing, developing, or being more successful

name: target
trans: 目标， 对象， 靶子

sentences.english: There is no target date for completion of the new project.
sentences.chinese: 这个新的项目何时完工没有预定日期。

sentences.english: The government may fail to meet (= achieve ) its target of recycling 25% of domestic waste.
sentences.chinese: 政府可能达不到回收利用25%的生活垃圾的目标。

sentences.english: Jiang set annual growth targets of 8–9%.
sentences.chinese: 江确定了8%至9%的年增长目标。

detailed_translations.english: something that you are trying to achieve, such as a total, an amount, or a time
to make something have an effect on a particular limited group or area

name: discourse
trans: 演讲， 谈话， 论文

sentences.english: "I do not know. " And thus ended their discourse.
sentences.chinese: “我也不晓得。”就这样，他们的谈话结束了。 。

sentences.english: They listened to his discourse on human relations.
sentences.chinese: 他们听他作关于人际关系的演讲。

sentences.english: In discourse thou must attend to what is said, and in every movement thou must observe what is doing.
sentences.chinese: 在谈话中你必须注意所说的话，在任何活动中你都必须观察在做什么。

detailed_translations.chinese: 演讲， 谈话， 论文
detailed_translations.english: a serious speech or piece of writing on a particular subject

name: obstruct
trans: 妨碍， 阻止 A；阻塞， 截断

sentences.english: A small aircraft was obstructing the runway.
sentences.chinese: 一架小型飞机堵住了跑道。

sentences.english: The column obstructed our view of the stage.
sentences.chinese: 柱子挡着，我们看不见舞台。

detailed_translations.english: to block a road, passage etc

sentences.english: a stone for grinding knives and scissors
sentences.chinese: 磨刀剪的石头

sentences.english: The lenses are ground to a high standard of precision.
sentences.chinese: 镜片被磨到很高的精确度。

detailed_translations.english: to make something smooth or sharp by rubbing it on a hard surface or by using a machine

a movement in  skateboarding  or  rollerblading  , which involves moving sideways along the edge of something, so that the bar connecting the wheels of the  skateboard  or  rollerblade  presses hard against the edge

sentences.english: I went to a counselor for guidance on my career.
sentences.chinese: 我去找了一位顾问给我作职业指导。

detailed_translations.english: help and advice that is given to someone about their work, education, or personal life

sentences.english: ...the stairway leading to the top floor.
sentences.chinese: …通往顶层的楼梯。

detailed_translations.english: a staircase, especially a large or impressive one

name: cape
trans: 斗篷； 披肩；海角， 岬

sentences.english: ...a woollen cape.
sentences.chinese: …一件羊毛披肩。

sentences.english: Cape Cod
sentences.chinese: 科德角

detailed_translations.english: a long loose piece of clothing without sleeves that fastens around your neck and hangs from your shoulders

name: delicate
trans: 纤弱的；精致的；微妙的； 灵敏的 A

sentences.english: his delicate hands
sentences.chinese: 他纤细的手

sentences.english: delicate hand-cut glass
sentences.chinese: 易碎的手工刻花玻璃

sentences.english: The sun can easily damage a child’s delicate skin .
sentences.chinese: 阳光很容易晒伤小孩娇嫩的皮肤。

detailed_translations.english: small and having a beautiful shape or appearance

name: fancy
trans: 花式的； 奇特的； 异样的
爱好， 喜爱， 迷恋；想象， 设想

sentences.english: Harry took me to a fancy restaurant for our anniversary.
sentences.chinese: 哈里带我去了一家豪华餐厅，庆祝我们的结婚纪念日。

detailed_translations.english: fancy hotels, restaurants, cars etc are expensive and fashionable
an idea or opinion that is not based on fact
to like or want something, or want to do something

name: rebel
trans: 反抗， 反叛， 起义

sentences.english: Voters rebelled against high property taxes.
sentences.chinese: 投票者们反对高额财产税。

detailed_translations.english: to oppose or fight against someone in authority or against an idea or situation which you do not agree with
someone who opposes or fights against people in authority

sentences.english: Stop bouncing up and down on the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 别在沙发上蹦来蹦去了。

detailed_translations.english: if a ball or other object bounces, or you bounce it, it immediately moves up or away from a surface after hitting it
the action of moving up and down on a surface

sentences.english: land usage
sentences.chinese: 土地的利用

sentences.english: a book on modern English usage
sentences.chinese: 关于现代英语用法的书

detailed_translations.english: the degree to which something is used or the way in which it is used

name: tissue
trans: 组织；织物， 薄绢， 纸巾

sentences.english: ...a small package wrapped in tissue paper.
sentences.chinese: …一个小包裹，用薄棉纸包着。

sentences.english: As we age we lose muscle tissue.
sentences.chinese: 随着年纪的增大，我们会失去一些肌肉组织。

detailed_translations.english: light thin paper used for wrapping, packing etc

sentences.english: You’ll need a spanner to loosen that bolt.
sentences.chinese: 你需要扳手来拧开那个螺栓。

sentences.english: The screws have loosened.
sentences.chinese: 螺丝松了。

sentences.english: Harry loosened his tie.
sentences.chinese: 哈里松开了领带。

detailed_translations.english: to make something less tight or less firmly fastened, or to become less tight or less firmly fastened

sentences.english: I pay the rent at the beginning of every month.
sentences.chinese: 我每逢月初交付房租。

sentences.english: She rents out two rooms to students.
sentences.chinese: 她把两个房间出租给学生

detailed_translations.english: the money that someone pays regularly to use a room, house etc that belongs to someone else
to let someone live in a house, room etc that you own, or use your land, in return for money

sentences.english: He is a carpenter by profession.
sentences.chinese: 他以木工为业。

sentences.english: At an early age, I was apprenticed to a carpenter.
sentences.chinese: 我小时候曾给木匠当过学徒。

sentences.english: That carpenter wanted to become a lawyer， but he was advised to stick to his last.
sentences.chinese: 那个木匠想当律师， 但别人劝他安分守己地干他自己的老本行。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is making and repairing wooden objects

sentences.english: He said sometimes they would invite some friends to share the happiness of Thanksgiving Day.
sentences.chinese: 他说有时候他们也会邀请一些朋友来一起分享感恩节快乐。

sentences.english: I hear about these people every Thanksgiving, then never think about them again for the next 364 days.
sentences.chinese: 我在每个感恩节都听说过这群人，而后在接下来的364天，就再也没有想起过他们。

sentences.english: It compares with "Cyber Monday" in the US - the day after Thanksgiving marketed as a big online shopping day.
sentences.chinese: 它与“网络星期一”在美国，感恩节后的第一天销售作为一个大型网上购物一天。

detailed_translations.english: a public holiday in the US and in Canada when families have a large meal together to celebrate and be thankful for food, health, families etc

sentences.english: I brought her proficiency up to the required level.
sentences.chinese: 我把她的熟练程度提高到所规定的水平。

sentences.english: With study and practice, almost anyone can do it with some level of proficiency, but most people don't learn how to think critically or analytically—nor are they even aware of its value.
sentences.chinese: 通过学习和实践，几乎任何人都能以不同的熟练程度来掌握它，但是大多数人都不会去学习如何进行批判性或分析性思维，或者说，他们根本意识不到其价值。

sentences.english: How do you think of your proficiency in written and spoken English?
sentences.chinese: 你认为你的书面 英语和 口语熟练程度如何？

detailed_translations.english: a good standard of ability and skill

sentences.english: The edge of this axe has turned.
sentences.chinese: 这把斧子卷了刃了。

sentences.english: He had just hit her over the head with the blunt end of an axe, fracturing her skull in three places.

sentences.english: the risk of frost damage to crops

if a situation, fact etc inclines you to do or think something, it influences you towards a particular action or opinion

sentences.chinese: 语言使人类高于其他动物。

sentences.chinese: 这楼层已定为无烟区。

sentences.english: Buildings are designated by red squares on the map.

detailed_translations.english: to say officially that sth has a particular character or name; to describe sth in a particular way

sentences.chinese: 她的老板在所有同事面前羞辱了她。

sentences.english: The original 1965 bottle is now a collector’s item (= one of a set of objects people like to collect because they are interesting or valuable ).

sentences.chinese: 人类基因

sentences.english: the genes that regulate cell division
sentences.chinese: 控制细胞分裂的基因

detailed_translations.english: a part of a cell in a living thing that controls what it looks like, how it grows, and how it develops. People get their genes from their parents

name: violet
trans: 紫罗兰；紫罗兰色； 紫色

sentences.chinese: 她一边闻紫罗兰的芳香， 一边说“好香啊！”

trans: 空的， 中空的；空洞的， 空虚的

trans: 大衣箱， 皮箱； 行李箱；树干； 躯干

detailed_translations.english: the thick central woody stem of a tree

trans: 储蓄； 储蓄金， 存款

detailed_translations.chinese: 节省， 节约； 储蓄金， 存款
detailed_translations.english: all the money that you have saved, especially in a bank

trans: 依赖， 依靠；信赖， 信任

sentences.chinese: 他滑开玻璃柜的门。

to move smoothly over a surface while continuing to touch it, or to make something move in this way

trans: 风格； 文体；式样， 类型

sentences.chinese: 将日本的管理方式用于欧洲企业的尝试

sentences.english: his excessive drinking
sentences.chinese: 他的酗酒

sentences.english: $15 for two beers seems a little excessive.
sentences.chinese: 两杯啤酒要15美元，似乎有点过分。

detailed_translations.english: much more than is reasonable or necessary

sentences.chinese: 一种肉色雪白、肉质紧实的淡水鱼

detailed_translations.english: the soft part of the body of a person or animal that is between the skin and the bones

name: jungle
trans: 丛林， 密林；乱七八糟的一堆 A <

sentences.english: the Amazon jungle
sentences.chinese: 亚马孙丛林

detailed_translations.english: a thick tropical forest with many large plants growing very close together

name: assault
trans: 攻击； 突击； 袭击

sentences.chinese: 他离开酒吧之后遭到两名男子的袭击。

detailed_translations.english: to attack someone in a violent way

sentences.chinese: 一串樱桃

sentences.chinese: 黛安娜喜爱漂亮有女人味的东西。

sentences.chinese: 气候模式近年已经发生了变化。

sentences.chinese: 人质被拘押在恶劣环境中。

sentences.chinese: 晚上，我们聚集在壁炉周围轻声交谈。

sentences.chinese: 她从翻了的车里钻出来，只擦破一点皮，碰了几块淤青。

name: bleak
trans: 荒凉的；没有希望的， 冷酷的

sentences.chinese: 一月里一个阴冷的下午

sentences.english: The landscape was bleak.
sentences.chinese: 景色一片凄凉。

detailed_translations.english: to make the effect of a fall or hit less painful, for example by having something soft in the way

trans: 壮丽的， 辉煌的；光荣的

sentences.chinese: 无比美好的将来

sentences.chinese: 沿海的迷人景色

sentences.chinese: 一个宽阔的山谷展开，通向一片平坦的高原耕地。

sentences.english: Inflation rates have reached a plateau.
sentences.chinese: 通货膨胀率已趋平稳。

sentences.chinese: 据信是埃利斯改良了得克萨斯州的监狱制度。

sentences.chinese: 传教士们去异国他乡教化当地人民。

sentences.chinese: 现代/古典/中世纪等的建筑风格

sentences.english: He studied architecture at university.
sentences.chinese: 他在大学里读的是建筑学。

detailed_translations.english: the style and design of a building or buildings

name: stress
trans: 压力；重音；【物】应力；强调， 重点， 着重

sentences.english: Crawford stressed the need for more housing downtown.
sentences.chinese: 克劳福德强调市中心需要建更多的住宅。

sentences.chinese: 她强调了均衡饮食的重要性。

sentences.chinese: 好了，走开，不要捣乱。

sentences.english: They’ve got enough toys to keep them out of mischief for a while.
sentences.chinese: 他们有足够的玩具玩，暂时不会捣蛋。

sentences.chinese: 要是看不到尼克，就可以肯定他又在捣什么鬼了。

sentences.english: the country’s heavy reliance on trade
sentences.chinese: 该国对贸易的严重依赖

detailed_translations.english: when someone or something is dependent on someone or something else

name: display

sentences.chinese: 令人目眩神迷的花卉展

sentences.chinese: 橱窗陈列吸引了她的目光。

sentences.english: shop windows displaying the latest fashions
sentences.chinese: 展示最新时装的商店橱窗
