sentences.english: a modern building with no superfluous decoration
sentences.chinese: 一栋没有多余装饰的现代建筑

detailed_translations.chinese: 多余的；不必要的；奢侈的
detailed_translations.english: more than is needed or wanted

name: conductor
trans: 领队， 指挥；售票员， 列车员；导体， 导线

sentences.english: He showed his ticket to the conductor and got on.
sentences.chinese: 他向检票员出示了车票，然后上了车。

sentences.english: The conductor's eyes darted to Wilfred, then fixed on Michael again.
sentences.chinese: 乐队指挥飞快地扫了威尔弗雷德一眼，然后视线又落回到迈克尔身上。

name: bore
trans: 钻， 挖， 打眼， 钻探；烦扰， 使厌烦

sentences.english: Get the special drill bit to bore the correct size hole for the job.
sentences.chinese: 找个特殊的钻头，钻个尺寸合适的孔。

something that is not interesting to you or that annoys you

name: acrobat
trans: 特技演员， 杂技演员

sentences.english: The acrobat balanced himself on the high rope.
sentences.chinese: 杂技演员在高绳上保持平衡。

sentences.english: Leggy models and a child acrobat wait offstage at a pop music concert in Ulaanbaatar.
sentences.chinese: 乌兰巴托的一场流行音乐会会场外，一群美腿模特和一位少年杂技演员正在等待入场。

sentences.english: He also added a crotch belt, a unicycle-like seat and an acrobat’s trapeze for a footrest; all help to keep the operator in optimal flying position.
sentences.chinese: 此外，他还添加了三叉腰带、独轮车式车座、还有一个杂技演员所用的秋千，用来放脚。 所有这些装置，都能够帮助操作者保持良好的飞行位置。

detailed_translations.english: someone who entertains people by doing difficult physical actions such as walking on their hands or balancing on a high rope, especially at a  circus

name: disorder
trans: 混乱， 杂乱； 骚乱；【医】失调； 疾病

sentences.english: severe eating disorders such as bulimia and anorexia
sentences.chinese: 像贪食症和厌食症这类严重的进食障碍

detailed_translations.chinese: 混乱， 杂乱， 骚乱
detailed_translations.english: a situation in which a lot of people behave in an uncontrolled, noisy, or violent way in public

name: aggravate
trans: 使恶化， 加重， 加剧 <

sentences.english: Their money problems were further aggravated by a rise in interest rates.
sentences.chinese: 由于利率上调，他们的财务问题更加严重。

sentences.english: Building the new road will only aggravate the situation .
sentences.chinese: 建造那条新路只会使情况恶化。

detailed_translations.english: to make a bad situation, an illness, or an injury worse

sentences.english: In my childhood, local dairies bought milk from local farmers.
sentences.chinese: 在我小时候，本地的乳品公司向当地农场主收购牛奶。

sentences.english: dairy products/produce
sentences.chinese: 乳制品；奶类产品

detailed_translations.english: a place on a farm where milk is kept and butter and cheese are made
made from milk

name: transistor
trans: 晶体管； 晶体管收音机

sentences.english: Every transistor has at least three electrodes.
sentences.chinese: 每个晶体管至少有三个电极。

sentences.english: The transistor became the basis of a new invention called the "computer" which I suspect those of you reading this may be familiar with.
sentences.chinese: 晶体管后来成为了一项叫做“计算机”的新发明的基础，我想正在阅读本文的你对于这个应该比较熟悉吧。

sentences.english: When you got a transistor radio, you could walk around with it, and today you can put your whole record collection in your pocket.
sentences.chinese: 而当你使用晶体管收音机时，你可以带着它到处走动，时至今日你可以把你收集的唱片装进口袋里。

sentences.english: If you can’t stop giggling you’ll have to leave the room.
sentences.chinese: 如果你再咯咯地笑个不停，就给我离开屋子。

sentences.english: She gave a little giggle.
sentences.chinese: 她咯咯地笑了一下。

detailed_translations.english: to laugh quickly, quietly, and in a high voice, because something is funny or because you are nervous or embarrassed
Giggle is also a noun

sentences.english: It can be tricky at first, but persevere.
sentences.chinese: 一开始会有些棘手，不过要坚持。

detailed_translations.chinese: 坚持；不屈不挠；固执己见（在辩论中）
detailed_translations.english: to continue trying to do something in a very determined way in spite of difficulties – use this to show approval

name: mature
trans: 成熟的； 熟的； 成年人的 A

sentences.english: Laura is very mature for her age.
sentences.chinese: 相对她的年龄来说劳拉是很成熟的。

sentences.english: We’re mature enough to disagree on this issue but still respect each other.
sentences.chinese: 我们都很成熟，尽管我们对此事意见不同，但还是彼此尊重。

sentences.english: As the fish matures, its colours and patternings change.
sentences.chinese: 随着发育成熟，这种鱼的颜色和斑纹都会改变。

detailed_translations.english: someone, especially a child or young person, who is mature behaves in a sensible and reasonable way, as you would expect an adult to behave
to become fully grown or developed

sentences.english: the British Navy
sentences.chinese: 英国海军

sentences.english: He joined the navy during the war.
sentences.chinese: 他在战争期间参加了海军。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a country’s military forces that fights at sea

name: alleviate
trans: 减轻， 缓解； 缓和

sentences.english: measures to alleviate poverty
sentences.chinese: 扶贫措施

detailed_translations.english: to make something less painful or difficult to deal with

name: influence
trans: 影响； 作用；势力， 权势

sentences.english: He used his influence to get his son into medical school.
sentences.chinese: 他利用权势把儿子弄进了医学院。

sentences.english: He denies exerting any political influence over them.
sentences.chinese: 他否认曾向他们施加过政治影响。

detailed_translations.english: the power to make other people agree with your opinions or do what you want

sentences.english: He has a lot of talent , and his work is fresh and interesting.
sentences.chinese: 他很有天赋，作品新颖有趣。

sentences.english: a persuasive speaker with a natural talent for leadership
sentences.chinese: 有领导天赋、颇有辩才的演说者

sentences.english: His latest book reveals hidden talents.
sentences.chinese: 他最新的一本书展现了他深藏不露的才能。

sentences.english: Sadly, she inherited none of her father’s musical talent.
sentences.chinese: 可惜的是，她一点都没有继承她父亲的音乐天赋。

sentences.english: He is a great talent.
sentences.chinese: 他是个了不起的人才。

sentences.english: Britain’s footballing talent
sentences.chinese: 英国的足球天才

detailed_translations.english: a natural ability to do something well

name: percentage
trans: 百分数， 百分率， 百分比

sentences.english: Interest rates fell by six percentage points (= 6% ) .
sentences.chinese: 利息下降了6个百分点。

sentences.english: The numbers are small in percentage terms (= when calculated as a percentage ) .
sentences.chinese: 按百分比来看，这些数字很小。

detailed_translations.english: an amount expressed as if it is part of a total which is 100

name: negotiate
trans: 谈判， 交涉， 商议

sentences.english: His first aim is to get the warring parties back to the negotiating table (= discussing something ).
sentences.chinese: 他的首要目标就是把交战各方拉回到谈判桌上。

detailed_translations.english: to discuss something in order to reach an agreement, especially in business or politics

sentences.english: He plays the violin in an orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 他在管弦乐队中演奏小提琴。

sentences.english: She is first violin of an orchestra .
sentences.chinese: 她是管弦乐队的第一小提琴手。

sentences.english: All this from playing the violin and the cello.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些都来自于小提琴和大提琴的演奏。

detailed_translations.english: a small wooden musical instrument that you hold under your chin and play by pulling a bow(= special stick ) across the strings

sentences.english: There’s a package here for a Miami Lakes address.
sentences.chinese: 这里有一个寄往迈阿密湖的包裹。

detailed_translations.english: something wrapped in paper, packed in a box, and then sent by mail or delivered
to put food or other goods into a bag, box etc ready to be sold or sent

sentences.english: The country now faces an economic crisis .
sentences.chinese: 该国目前正面临一场经济危机。

sentences.english: The Prime Minister was criticized for the way in which he handled the crisis .
sentences.chinese: 首相处理危机的方式遭到了批评。

sentences.english: the current debt crisis
sentences.chinese: 当前的债务危机

sentences.english: a major political crisis
sentences.chinese: 重大的政治危机

sentences.english: I was relieved that we had averted yet another financial crisis .
sentences.chinese: 我如释重负，我们又避免了一场财政危机。

sentences.english: Oil companies were heavily criticized when they made large profits during the oil crisis of the 1970s.
sentences.chinese: 石油公司因在20世纪70年代的石油危机中赚取了丰厚利润而受到严厉抨击。

sentences.english: The car industry is now in crisis .
sentences.chinese: 汽车工业现在正处于危机之中。

sentences.english: He doesn’t seem to be very good at crisis management .
sentences.chinese: 他好像不大擅长处理危机。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which there are a lot of problems that must be dealt with quickly so that the situation does not get worse or more dangerous

sentences.english: Put disinfectant down the toilet to kill any germs.
sentences.chinese: 在抽水马桶里投放消毒剂杀菌。

sentences.english: germ cells containing DNA
sentences.chinese: 含DNA的生殖细胞

detailed_translations.english: a very small living thing that can make you ill

name: shatter
trans: 使…粉碎； 使散开；使破灭； 使震惊

sentences.english: The explosion shattered the building.
sentences.chinese: 这次爆炸把大楼炸成一片废墟。

sentences.english: A tragic accident shattered her dreams of Olympic glory.
sentences.chinese: 一场不幸的意外事故使她获得奥运奖牌的梦想破灭了。

detailed_translations.english: to break suddenly into very small pieces, or to make something break in this way

sentences.english: ...the glamour of show biz.
sentences.chinese: …演艺业的诱惑力。

detailed_translations.english: the attractive and exciting quality of being connected with wealth and success

sentences.english: After a little gentle persuasion , Debbie agreed to let us in.
sentences.chinese: 好言劝说了几句后，黛比就同意让我们进去了。

sentences.english: It had taken a great deal of persuasion to get him to accept.
sentences.chinese: 费尽了口舌才让他接受。

sentences.english: She used all her powers of persuasion (= skill at persuading people ) to convince Tilly that it was the right thing to do.
sentences.chinese: 她使尽浑身解数，才劝服蒂莉应该那么做。

detailed_translations.english: the act of persuading someone to do something

sentences.english: ...ground covered over with moss.
sentences.chinese: …长满青苔的地面。

detailed_translations.english: a very small green plant that grows in a thick soft furry mass on wet soil, trees, or rocks

name: glimpse
trans: 一瞥； 一看； 短暂的感受

sentences.english: I glimpsed a figure at the window.
sentences.chinese: 我瞥见窗前有个身影。

sentences.english: They caught a glimpse of a dark green car.
sentences.chinese: 他们瞥见一辆深绿色的汽车。

detailed_translations.english: to see someone or something for a moment without getting a complete view of them
a quick look at someone or something that does not allow you to see them clearly

sentences.english: She hired a detective to find out if her husband was having an affair.
sentences.chinese: 她雇了一个私人侦探调查她丈夫是否有外遇。

detailed_translations.english: a police officer whose job is to discover information about crimes and catch criminals

name: transfer
trans: 换车；转业， 转学；调动， 转职

sentences.english: He was transferred for a fee of £8 million.
sentences.chinese: 他以800万英镑的转会费转到了其他球队。

detailed_translations.chinese: 搬， 转移； 调动， 转学； 转让， 过户； 乘车， 转乘
detailed_translations.english: to move from one place, school, job etc to another, or to make someone do this, especially within the same organization

sentences.english: He heard someone’s footsteps in the hall.
sentences.chinese: 他听见门厅里有脚步声。

detailed_translations.english: the sound each step makes when someone is walking

sentences.english: He is a veteran of the last revolution in medical technology, gene therapy, which, after some hyped expectations in the 1990s, fell into disfavor after some unsuccessful trials.
sentences.chinese: 他是基因治疗这项最新医学技术的老手，经过了1990年代的兴奋期和之后几次失败的实验后，基因治疗技术已经失宠了。

detailed_translations.english: someone who has been a soldier, sailor etc in a war

name: phrase
trans: 短语， 词语， 习语

sentences.english: It is impossible to hypnotise someone simply by saying a particular word or phrase.
sentences.chinese: 不可能仅通过说某个词或短语就能把人催眠。

sentences.english: Who first used the phrase ‘survival of the fittest’?
sentences.chinese: “适者生存”这一说法最早是谁说的？

sentences.english: Shakespeare’s plays are full of well-known phrases .
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亚的戏剧中写满了众所周知的名言警句。

detailed_translations.english: a group of words without a finite verb, especially when they are used to form part of a sentence, such as ‘walking along the road’ and ‘a bar of soap’

sentences.english: She looked back on those days with affection .
sentences.chinese: 她深情地回顾那些日子。

sentences.english: Their father never showed them much affection .
sentences.chinese: 他们的父亲对他们从来没有表现出多少慈爱。

sentences.english: Anne had two men trying to win her affections.
sentences.chinese: 安妮有两个男人追求。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of liking or loving sb/sth very much and caring about them

sentences.english: a condition which affects the nerves in the back
sentences.chinese: 影响背部神经的疾病

sentences.english: She finally found the nerve to tell him she wanted a divorce.
sentences.chinese: 她终于鼓起勇气告诉他自己想离婚。

detailed_translations.english: nerves are parts inside your body which look like threads and carry messages between the brain and other parts of the body

sentences.english: ...the illegal diversion of profits from secret arms sales.
sentences.chinese: …销售秘密武器所得收益的非法转移。

sentences.english: The party will make a pleasant diversion.
sentences.chinese: 晚会会是一个很不错的消遣。

detailed_translations.english: a change in the direction or use of something, or the act of changing it

name: omit
trans: 省略， 删去；遗漏， 忽略 <

sentences.english: Please don’t omit any details, no matter how trivial they may seem.
sentences.chinese: 请不要忽略任何细节，不管它多细小。

detailed_translations.english: to not include someone or something, either deliberately or because you forget to do it

sentences.english: Who guesses one centimeter?
sentences.chinese: 谁觉得是一厘米？

sentences.english: In every square centimeter!
sentences.chinese: 每一平方厘米！

sentences.english: With the profile of a dinosaur and the texture of a rose bush, a thorny devil in Alice Springs Desert Park looks like trouble, but this slow-moving, six-inch [15-centimeter] lizard eats only ants.
sentences.chinese: 长着恐龙的外形和一身的刺犹如一丛玫瑰，这样一个棘手的恶魔在阿丽斯春天的沙漠公园里看似麻烦，但他动作缓慢，六英寸[15厘米]蜥蜴只吃蚂蚁。

sentences.english: His economic predictions are based on some erroneous assumptions.
sentences.chinese: 他的经济预测是基于错误假设之上的。

detailed_translations.english: erroneous ideas or information are wrong and based on facts that are not correct

name: sponsor
trans: 发起人； 主办者； 保证人

sentences.english: When you define the project, you make sure that you have an agreement with the project sponsor on what work should be completed in this project.
sentences.chinese: 在你定义项目的时候，你要确保和项目发起人在项目应该完成的所有工作内容上达成一致意见。

sentences.english: It is important that your sponsor be truly committed to the value of the project to ensure that funds and support are not in jeopardy if adoption is not immediate.
sentences.chinese: 发起人必须真正认可项目的价值，这一点很重要，只有这样才能确保在推广没有立即见效时资金和支持不会随之消失。

detailed_translations.english: someone who officially introduces or supports a proposal for a new law

sentences.english: a nuclear limitation treaty
sentences.chinese: 核限制条约

detailed_translations.chinese: 限制， 限度； 局限
detailed_translations.english: the act or process of controlling or reducing something

sentences.english: Her husband’s violence terrified her.
sentences.chinese: 丈夫的暴力行为让她感到害怕。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone extremely afraid

sentences.english: I go jogging every morning.
sentences.chinese: 我每天早晨都去慢跑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 慢跑；轻推；蹒跚行进；使颠簸
detailed_translations.english: to run slowly and steadily, especially as a way of exercising
a slow steady run, especially done as a way of exercising

name: ascertain
trans: 查明， 弄清， 确定

sentences.english: A postmortem was ordered to try to ascertain the cause of death.
sentences.chinese: 下令验尸以查明死因。

detailed_translations.chinese: 弄清， 查明； 确定
detailed_translations.english: to find out something

name: trolly
trans: 手推车， 小车；〈英〉无轨电车； 〈美〉有轨电车

detailed_translations.chinese: 手推车， 小车；〈英〉无轨电车； 〈美〉有轨电车

sentences.english: He took a small key from his pocket and slowly inserted it into the lock.
sentences.chinese: 他从衣袋里掏出一把小钥匙，然后缓缓地将其插入锁孔里。

detailed_translations.english: to put something inside or into something else

detailed_translations.chinese: 插入物；管芯；镶块；[机械]刀片
detailed_translations.english: something that is designed to be put inside something else

sentences.english: He was forbidden to leave the house, as a punishment.
sentences.chinese: 作为惩罚，他被禁止离开家。

sentences.english: Lack of space forbids listing the names of all those who contributed.
sentences.chinese: 由于篇幅限制，无法列出所有捐款人的姓名。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that they are not allowed to do something, or that something is not allowed

sentences.english: The Malvern Hills have provided inspiration for many artists and musicians over the decades.
sentences.chinese: 几十年来，莫尔文丘陵为很多艺术家和音乐家提供了灵感。

sentences.english: He raised his eyes to the altar as if seeking inspiration.
sentences.chinese: 他抬头看看祭坛，似乎在寻求灵感。

sentences.english: He draws inspiration from ordinary scenes.
sentences.chinese: 他从日常生活中得到灵感。

sentences.english: Mary Quant’s inspiration comes from the glam style of the seventies.
sentences.chinese: 玛莉·官的灵感来自70年代的魅惑风格。

sentences.english: He had a sudden flash of inspiration.
sentences.chinese: 他突然灵感闪现。

sentences.english: He has always been a source of inspiration for me.
sentences.chinese: 他一直是我灵感的源泉。

detailed_translations.chinese: 灵感； 鼓舞人心的人
detailed_translations.english: a good idea about what you should do, write, say etc, especially one which you get suddenly

name: highlight
trans: 使显著， 使突出； 强调
最精彩的部分； 最重要的事件

sentences.english: Your résumé should highlight your skills and achievements.
sentences.chinese: 你的简历应该突出自己的技能和成绩。

sentences.english: That weekend in Venice was definitely the highlight of our trip.
sentences.chinese: 在威尼斯度过的那个周末无疑是我们这次旅行最精彩的部分。

detailed_translations.english: to make a problem or subject easy to notice so that people pay attention to it
the most important, interesting, or enjoyable part of something such as a holiday, performance, or sports competition

sentences.english: customer details held on a database
sentences.chinese: 存储在数据库内的客户详细信息

detailed_translations.english: a large amount of data stored in a computer system so that you can find and use it easily

name: reject
trans: 拒绝； 抵制； 驳回；丢弃；排斥； 退掉

sentences.english: Sarah rejected her brother’s offer of help.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉拒绝了她弟弟的帮助。

sentences.english: Dexter flatly rejected (= completely rejected ) calls for his resignation.
sentences.chinese: 德克斯特断然拒绝让他辞职的要求。

sentences.english: His proposal was rejected outright (= completely rejected ) .
sentences.chinese: 他的建议被彻底否决了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拒绝； 拒纳， 退回， 摈弃
detailed_translations.english: to refuse to accept, believe in, or agree with something

detailed_translations.chinese: 被拒货品， 不合格产品
detailed_translations.english: a product that has been rejected because there is something wrong with it

name: sheer
trans: 纯粹的； 十足的， 全然的；陡峭的， 险峻的

sentences.english: cliffs which rose sheer from the sea
sentences.chinese: 从海面垂直拔起的悬崖

detailed_translations.english: straight up or down in an almost vertical line
to change direction suddenly, especially in order to avoid something

detailed_translations.chinese: 完全的，十足的；陡峭的，垂直的；极薄的，透明的
detailed_translations.english: a sheer drop, cliff, slope etc is very steep and almost vertical

name: miracle
trans: 奇迹， 令人惊奇的人

sentences.english: It’s a miracle you weren’t killed!
sentences.chinese: 你没有死真是奇迹！

sentences.english: By some miracle, we managed to catch the plane.
sentences.chinese: 我们奇迹般地赶上了飞机。

sentences.english: the economic miracle of the 1950s
sentences.chinese: 20世纪50年代的经济奇迹

sentences.english: She’s our miracle baby.
sentences.chinese: 她是我们的奇迹宝宝。

detailed_translations.english: something very lucky or very good that happens which you did not expect to happen or did not think was possible

sentences.english: All the guests paid her extravagant compliments.
sentences.chinese: 所有客人都对她赞不绝口。

sentences.english: Being compared to Abba is a great compliment.
sentences.chinese: 能和阿巴乐队相提并论是极大的赞誉。

detailed_translations.chinese: 恭维；称赞；问候；致意；道贺
detailed_translations.english: a remark that shows you admire someone or something
to say something nice to someone in order to praise them

name: imitation
trans: 模仿， 仿效；仿制； 仿造品

sentences.english: The remake of ‘Casablanca’ was a pale imitation (= something that is much less good than the thing it imitates ) of the original movie.
sentences.chinese: 重拍的《卡萨布兰卡》远不如原版。

sentences.english: ...a complete set of Dickens bound in imitation leather.
sentences.chinese: …用人造革装帧的一整套《狄更斯全集》。

detailed_translations.english: when you copy someone else’s actions
Imitation things are not genuine but are made to look as if they are

name: profit
trans: 得利， 获益； 利用； 有利于

sentences.english: The shop’s daily profit is usually around $500.
sentences.chinese: 这家商店每天的利润一般在500美元左右。

sentences.english: She sold the business and bought a farm with the profits.
sentences.chinese: 她卖了公司，用所得利润买下了一座农场。

sentences.english: They sold their house at a healthy profit.
sentences.chinese: 他们卖掉房子，赚了一大笔钱。

sentences.english: There’s no profit in letting meetings drag on.
sentences.chinese: 会议拖拖拉拉没什么好处。

detailed_translations.english: money that you gain by selling things or doing business, after your costs have been paid
to get money from doing something

sentences.english: Please pay the full amount (=  of money  ) by the end of the month.
sentences.chinese: 请在月底前全额付清。

detailed_translations.english: a quantity of something such as time, money, or a substance

name: comply
trans: 照做， 遵照， 应允

sentences.english: The commander said that the army would comply with the ceasefire.
sentences.chinese: 指挥官说过部队会遵从停火协议。

sentences.english: Some beaches had failed to comply with environmental regulations.
sentences.chinese: 一些海滩没能遵守环保规定。

detailed_translations.english: to do what you have to do or are asked to do

name: original
trans: 最初的， 原始的； 原文的 <；新颖的， 有独创性的
原物； 原作； 原文

sentences.english: The land was returned to its original owner.
sentences.chinese: 这块土地归还给了原主。

sentences.english: The kitchen still has many original features (= parts that were there when the house was first built ).
sentences.chinese: 这间厨房仍保留着当初的许多特点。

sentences.english: the original meaning of the word
sentences.chinese: 这个单词的原意

sentences.english: The original plan was to fly out to New York.
sentences.chinese: 原先的计划是飞往纽约。

detailed_translations.english: existing or happening first, before other people or things

sentences.english: nylon fabric
sentences.chinese: 尼龙织物

sentences.english: The tent was made of nylon.
sentences.chinese: 那顶帐篷是尼龙做的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 尼龙，[纺] 聚酰胺纤维；尼龙袜
detailed_translations.english: a strong artificial material that is used to make plastics, clothes, rope etc

sentences.english: They stopped you as soon as you deviated from the script.
sentences.chinese: 你一偏离剧本，他们就会叫停。

detailed_translations.english: to change what you are doing so that you are not following an expected plan, idea, or type of behaviour

name: album
trans: 粘贴簿； 集邮簿； 相册

sentences.english: a photograph album
sentences.chinese: 相册

detailed_translations.chinese: 相簿；唱片集；集邮簿；签名纪念册
detailed_translations.english: a book that you put photographs, stamps etc in

name: assignment
trans: 分配， 委派； 任务；作业

sentences.english: She’s gone to Italy on a special assignment.
sentences.chinese: 她去意大利执行一项特殊任务。

sentences.english: a history assignment
sentences.chinese: 历史作业

sentences.chinese: 艾伦伸伸懒腰，打了个呵欠。

sentences.chinese: 屋子里仅有的工具是一把锤子和一把锯。

sentences.chinese: 她在后院锯木头。

to cut something using a saw

sentences.chinese: 封建制度

sentences.english: feudal society
sentences.chinese: 封建社会

detailed_translations.chinese: 封建制度的；领地的；世仇的

detailed_translations.english: a country ruled by a king or queen

sentences.english: The two systems differ in many respects.
sentences.chinese: 这两个系统在许多方面不同。

sentences.english: Experts have differing views on the subject.
sentences.chinese: 在这个问题上专家们意见不同。

detailed_translations.english: to be different from something in some way

sentences.chinese: 20分钟的木偶表演

sentences.english: When the invasion occurred he seized power and ruled the country as a puppet of the occupiers.
sentences.chinese: 他趁入侵之时夺取了政权，作为占领者的傀儡统治着这个国家。

sentences.english: The government is in danger of becoming a mere puppet of the military.
sentences.chinese: 政府面临沦为军方傀儡的危险。

sentences.chinese: 在后一种情况下，买家付15%的佣金。

sentences.chinese: 他想成为一家美国公司的会员，因为他需要法律事务方面的专家意见。

name: equivalent
trans: 相等的， 等价的， 等值的  <
相等物， 等价物， 等值物； 对应词

sentences.chinese: 我没有美金，但给了他等值的英镑。

detailed_translations.english: having the same value, purpose, job etc as a person or thing of a different kind
something that has the same value, purpose, job etc as something else

sentences.english: The explorers paddled their canoe cautiously upstream.
sentences.chinese: 探险者们谨慎地把独木舟向上游划去。

sentences.english: At a summer job working as park naturalists that year, I flipped the canoe Air and I were paddling and we had to push it to shore.
sentences.chinese: 那年我在公园里做暑期兼职，我把独木舟翻转个身，然后我们一起合力将它推到岸边，这样我们就可以划船了。

sentences.english: I remember the first time I visited a village in Vietnam, in 1995: we endured hours and hours of rutty roads or long hours in a canoe to reach project sites.
sentences.chinese: 我记得1995年第一次访问越南一个村落，我们捱过很多小时的路途颠簸、坐了很多小时的独木舟，才到达项目的所在地。

detailed_translations.english: to travel by canoe
a long light boat that is pointed at both ends and which you move along using a  paddle

name: wedge
trans: 楔牢， 楔入； 挤进

sentences.english: He hammered the wedge into the crack in the stone.
sentences.chinese: 他用锤子把楔子砸入石缝里。

sentences.english: The phone was wedged under his chin.
sentences.chinese: 电话夹在他下巴下面。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of wood, metal etc that has one thick edge and one pointed edge and is used especially for keeping a door open or for splitting wood
to force something firmly into a narrow space

trans: 使疏远， 使格格不入；使不友好； 离间A

sentences.english: The latest tax proposals will alienate many voters.
sentences.chinese: 最新的纳税提案将失去远许多选民的支持。

detailed_translations.english: to do something that makes someone unfriendly or unwilling to support you

trans: 瘟疫； 祸患， 灾害

sentences.chinese: 资金问题持续困扰着该公司。

name: perpetual
trans: 永久的， 永恒的； 长期的 A

sentences.chinese: 山顶的终年积雪

sentences.chinese: 回过头看，我在想我们是否应该做得更多些。

trans: 取缔， 查禁； 禁止

sentences.chinese: 大楼内禁止吸烟。

sentences.chinese: 政治让富兰克林的父亲着迷。

detailed_translations.english: If something fascinates you, it interests and delights you so much that your thoughts tend to concentrate on it

name: diplomatic
trans: 外交的， 从事外交的；有策略的， 有手腕的

sentences.english: Diplomatic efforts to end the fighting began on October 25.
sentences.chinese: 停战的外交努力于10月25日开始。

detailed_translations.english: relating to or involving the work of diplomats

name: suffer
trans: 遭受； 忍受， 忍耐 <

sentences.english: At least he died suddenly and didn’t suffer.
sentences.chinese: 至少他死得突然，没有遭罪。

sentences.english: She’s suffering a lot of pain.
sentences.chinese: 她遭受着巨大的痛苦。

trans: 条， 杆， 棒， 棍， 闩；酒吧； 吧台；栅， 栏， 障碍
闩上； 阻拦， 拦住； 妨碍

sentences.english: The public bar was crowded.
sentences.chinese: 大众酒吧间里人很多。

sentences.english: a candy bar
sentences.chinese: 一根糖果棒

sentences.english: houses with bars across the windows
sentences.chinese: 窗户上钉有铁条的房屋

detailed_translations.english: one of the rooms inside a pub

name: bat
trans: 球拍， 球棒； 短棒；蝙蝠

sentences.chinese: 蝙蝠凭回声测定方向。

sentences.english: Having been suggested by a bat, people invented sonar.
sentences.chinese: 受到蝙蝠的启发，人们发明了声呐。

sentences.english: It is technically incorrect to talk about bat ‘radar’, since they do not use radio waves.
sentences.chinese: 严密来说，说蝙蝠有“雷达”系统是错误的，因为他们并不使用无线电波。

trans: 放映机， 幻灯机， 投影仪

sentences.chinese: …幻灯机。

detailed_translations.chinese: [仪] 投影仪；放映机；探照灯；设计者
detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that makes a film or picture appear on a screen or flat surface

name: neighbourhood
trans: 邻居； 四邻； 街道， 住宅区

sentences.chinese: 安静点！ 你会把邻居全都吵醒的！

sentences.chinese: 她是在波士顿一个清静的街区里长大的。

trans: 草稿， 草案， 草图

sentences.chinese: 他的新小说的草稿

sentences.chinese: 我读了第一稿，觉得非常好。

sentences.chinese: 各方最后都同意了和平条约的终稿。

trans: 复杂的；合成的， 综合的

sentences.chinese: 复杂的公路网

detailed_translations.chinese: 综合体， 集合体； 情结， 夸大的情绪反应

sentences.chinese: 房间的温度保持在72度，相对湿度50%。

sentences.chinese: 他还不能吃固体食物，只能进流食。

sentences.chinese: 一只狗忽然嚎叫起来，对月长嗥。

sentences.chinese: 政治宣传册

detailed_translations.english: a very thin book with paper covers, that gives information about something

sentences.chinese: 过了不多久，查尔斯来了。

sentences.english: She died not long afterwards .
sentences.chinese: 不久以后她去世了。

sentences.english: Afterwards, I was asked to write a book.
sentences.chinese: 后来，有人要我写一本书。

detailed_translations.english: after an event or time that has already been mentioned

sentences.chinese: 动脉的动脉的，似动脉的，或在动脉里的。

sentences.english: When they are found, doctors pass a tube with a balloon into the narrowed area and inflate the balloon to compress plaque deposits against the side of the artery.
sentences.chinese: 当它们被发现后，医生通过一个软管把一个小气球进入狭小的区域并且膨胀这个气球去压缩动脉边沉淀下来的血小板。

sentences.chinese: 该术语是用来形容如下的一种情况：提供给大脑部分的血液突然地削弱，这种削弱是由于血液的凝固或由于动脉割裂导致血液漏到大脑里面。

sentences.chinese: 我们低估了到那里所需的时间。

sentences.english: Never underestimate the power of the press.

name: plastic
trans: 塑料的， 塑胶的；可塑的， 塑性的

sentences.chinese: 塑料汤匙

sentences.english: plastic bags
sentences.chinese: 塑料袋

detailed_translations.english: made of plastic

name: globe
trans: 球体， 地球仪；地球， 世界

sentences.chinese: 3个巨大的地球仪立在地板上。

sentences.english: We export our goods all over the globe.
sentences.chinese: 我们的商品出口到世界各地。

detailed_translations.english: the world

sentences.english: transient fashions
sentences.chinese: 短暂的时尚

detailed_translations.english: continuing only for a short time

detailed_translations.chinese: 瞬变现象；过往旅客；候鸟

trans: 打听， 询问；调查， 研究

sentences.chinese: 我们很高兴收到您的询问函。

sentences.chinese: 她将我的询问当成了人身侮辱。

sentences.chinese: 等新货上市时，我们才能回头考虑你们的询盘。

name: dean
trans: 教长； 主持牧师 A；学院院长； 系主任； 训导主任

sentences.english: the admissions dean
sentences.chinese: 招生主任

detailed_translations.english: someone in a university who is responsible for a particular area of work

sentences.english: Clean the rug by sponging it gently.
sentences.chinese: 用湿布轻轻擦洗以清洁小地毯。

detailed_translations.english: to put paint on a surface using a sponge
a piece of a soft natural or artificial substance full of small holes, which can suck up liquid and is used for washing

sentences.english: several cases of child abuse
sentences.chinese: 数宗虐待儿童案

sentences.english: An independent committee will look into alleged human rights abuses.
sentences.chinese: 一个独立委员会将对涉嫌践踏人权的行为进行调查。

detailed_translations.english: cruel or violent treatment of someone

name: insulate
trans: 隔离， 孤立；使绝缘， 使绝热

sentences.chinese: 隔热[隔音]的阁楼

sentences.english: Pipes may need insulating against the cold.
sentences.chinese: 管道可能需要隔温以防冰冻。

detailed_translations.english: to cover or protect something with a material that stops electricity, sound, heat etc from getting in or out

name: scheme
trans: 计划， 策划； 阴谋
计划， 方案； 阴谋；配置； 安排

sentences.english: The money will be used for teacher training schemes.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱将用于教师培训计划。

sentences.english: a pension scheme
sentences.chinese: 退休金计划

sentences.english: a get-rich-quick scheme
sentences.chinese: 快速致富的手段

detailed_translations.english: an official plan that is intended to help people in some way, for example by providing education or training

sentences.english: the areas affected by the hurricane
sentences.chinese: 受飓风影响的地区

sentences.english: a disease that affects the central nervous system
sentences.chinese: 影响中枢神经系统的疾病

sentences.english: decisions which affect our lives
sentences.chinese: 影响我们生活的决定

sentences.english: Trading has been adversely affected by the downturn in consumer spending.
sentences.chinese: 贸易受到消费支出回落的不利影响。

sentences.english: We were all deeply affected by her death.
sentences.chinese: 我们都为她的去世深感悲痛。

detailed_translations.english: to do something that produces an effect or change in something or in someone’s situation

sentences.english: communication between deaf and hearing people
sentences.chinese: 失聪者和听力正常者之间的交流

sentences.english: I think Mum’s going a bit deaf .
sentences.chinese: 我觉得妈妈有点耳聋了。

sentences.english: She’s deaf and dumb (= unable to hear or speak ) and communicates using sign language.
sentences.chinese: 她又聋又哑，用手语交流。

sentences.english: She was deaf to his pleas.
sentences.chinese: 她对他的恳求充耳不闻。

detailed_translations.english: physically unable to hear anything or unable to hear well

name: drain
trans: 排水沟， 阴沟；流出； 消耗

sentences.english: He flushed the drain.
sentences.chinese: 他用水冲排水沟。

sentences.english: The boat drifted helplessly along the drain until some people saw him.
sentences.chinese: 船儿无助地顺着排水沟漂流直到有人看见他。

detailed_translations.english: something that continuously uses a lot of time, money etc

sentences.english: He made funny faces to amuse the children.
sentences.chinese: 他做鬼脸逗孩子们开心。

sentences.english: The kids amused themselves playing hide-and-seek.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们玩捉迷藏玩。

sentences.english: Doing jigsaws would amuse Amy for hours on end.
sentences.chinese: 拼图能让埃米连续玩上几个小时。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone laugh or smile

sentences.english: The town was isolated by the floods.
sentences.chinese: 洪水使该镇与外界隔绝。

sentences.english: The US has sought to isolate Cuba both economically and politically.
sentences.chinese: 美国一直想在经济和政治上孤立古巴。

detailed_translations.english: to separate one person, group, or thing from other people or things

name: inward
trans: 在内的， 里面的； 内心的 <

sentences.english: a feeling of inward satisfaction
sentences.chinese: 内心的满足感

sentences.english: inward panic
sentences.chinese: 内心的恐慌

sentences.english: He pushed open the front door, which swung inward with a groan.
sentences.chinese: 他推开前门，门呀的一声向里开了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 向内的；内部的；精神的；本质上的；熟悉的
detailed_translations.english: felt or experienced in your own mind but not expressed to other people
If something moves or faces inward, it moves or faces toward the inside or centre of something

name: responsibility
trans: 责任， 责任心；职责， 任务

sentences.english: Kelly’s promotion means more money and more responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 凯利获得提升，这意味着钱多了，责任也更大了。

detailed_translations.english: a duty to be in charge of someone or something, so that you make decisions and can be blamed if something bad happens

name: enquire
trans: 询问；打听；问好， 问候

sentences.english: I am writing to confirm /enquire/inform you…
sentences.chinese: 我写信是要确认/询问/通知你…

sentences.english: I recently e-mailed one website to enquire why my goods had not yet arrived.
sentences.chinese: 我最近给一个网站发邮件去询问为什么我订购的商品还没有到达。

sentences.english: And into whatsoever city or town ye shall enter, enquire who in it is worthy; and there abide till ye go thence.
sentences.chinese: 你们无论进那一城，那一村，要打听那里谁是好人，就住在他家，直住到走的时候。

name: civil
trans: 公民的， 市民的；国内的， 民间的；民用的；有礼貌的， 文明的

sentences.english: They were married in a civil ceremony in May.
sentences.chinese: 他们在五月份举行了世俗婚礼。

detailed_translations.chinese: 公民的；民间的；文职的；有礼貌的；根据民法的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the people who live in a country

name: subsequent
trans: 随后的， 后来的 A

sentences.english: These skills were passed on to subsequent generations.
sentences.chinese: 这些技能代代相传。

sentences.english: subsequent pages of the book
sentences.chinese: 接下去的书页

detailed_translations.english: happening or coming after something else

name: indicate
trans: 指出； 指示 A；表明或暗示…的可能性 A

sentences.english: The study indicates a connection between poverty and crime.
sentences.chinese: 研究显示贫穷和犯罪有关联。

detailed_translations.english: to show that a particular situation exists, or that something is likely to be true

name: contain
trans: 包含； 容纳， 装有；等于， 相当于 A

sentences.english: The thieves stole a purse containing bank-notes.
sentences.chinese: 小偷们偷到了一个里面有钞票的钱包。

sentences.english: The museum contains a number of original artworks.
sentences.chinese: 这家博物馆藏有一些原创艺术品。

detailed_translations.english: if something such as a bag, box, or place contains something, that thing is inside it

sentences.english: People who drop litter can be fined in some cities.
sentences.chinese: 在有些城市，乱扔垃圾的人会被罚款。

sentences.english: A litter of notes, papers, and textbooks were strewn on the desk.
sentences.chinese: 一堆笔记、考卷和课本乱七八糟地摊在桌子上。

sentences.english: The floor was littered with papers.
sentences.chinese: 地板上乱七八糟扔了许多报纸。

detailed_translations.english: waste paper, cans etc that people have thrown away and left on the ground in a public place
to leave waste paper, cans etc on the ground in a public place

sentences.english: I learned to sew at school.

sentences.chinese: 我们将竭诚为您提供愉快进餐的良机，优雅的啜饮，舒适的休憩。

sentences.chinese: 政党领袖是通过无记名投票选举产生的。

sentences.chinese: 什么原因让你买下了那套西装？

sentences.chinese: 高等物理（学）

sentences.chinese: 把你的垃圾放进箱子。

sentences.chinese: 电脑打印机和行李包都运进了宿舍之后，所有人都到学校的体育馆集合，学生在露天看台的一侧，家长们在另一侧。

sentences.chinese: 他已忠心耿耿地为这家人服务了40年。

sentences.chinese: 裁决为“无罪”。

sentences.chinese: 神力的传统教义

sentences.chinese: 马克思主义学说

detailed_translations.english: a set of beliefs that form an important part of a religion or system of ideas

sentences.english: It was so large and complex, they initially assumed it was a bacterium.
sentences.chinese: 由于它们是如此庞大和复杂，最初被认为是一种细菌。

sentences.chinese: 他们还通过“基因移植”，把一个物种的细菌转变为另一种。

sentences.chinese: 但也许是时候更新这份必需元素目录了，因为科学家们发现一种细菌会用砷来代替磷，不需要磷也可生存。

name: judgement
trans: 审判， 判决；判断力， 识别力； 看法， 意见

sentences.chinese: 他相信他的判断。

sentences.chinese: 一切行动均以判断为基础。

sentences.english: The judgement is often biased by interest.
sentences.chinese: 判断往往因利害关系而有偏差。

name: sly

sentences.chinese: 他俯身向前诡秘地一笑。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is sly cleverly deceives people in order to get what they want

name: paragraph

detailed_translations.english: part of a piece of writing which starts on a new line and contains at least one sentence

name: proportion
trans: 比例；部分， 份儿；均衡， 相称

sentences.chinese: 那个地区的很大一部分海豚最终都会死去。

sentences.chinese: 你们班里男女生的比例是多少？

name: crystal
trans: 水晶的； 晶体的； 透明的 A <
水晶； 水晶饰品 <；结晶， 晶体

sentences.english: ice/salt crystals
sentences.chinese: 冰 / 盐的结晶体

sentences.english: a pair of crystal earrings
sentences.chinese: 一对水晶耳环

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of a substance with many even sides, that is formed naturally when the substance becomes solid

name: pursuit
trans: 追赶； 追求；职业； 工作

sentences.english: The quarterback sprinted toward the end zone with Jansen in hot pursuit (= following closely behind ) .
sentences.chinese: 那名四分卫快速冲向底线区，詹森穷追不舍。

detailed_translations.english: when someone tries to get, achieve, or find something in a determined way

sentences.english: the prophet Elijah
sentences.chinese: 先知以利亚

detailed_translations.english: a man who people in the Christian, Jewish, or Muslim religion believe has been sent by God to lead them and teach them their religion

name: cycle
trans: 骑自行车；循环， 轮转

sentences.chinese: 女性的月经周期

detailed_translations.chinese: 自行车、 摩托车； 循环
detailed_translations.english: a number of related events that happen again and again in the same order

sentences.chinese: 无情的独裁者

sentences.english: They have shown a ruthless disregard for basic human rights.
sentences.chinese: 他们冷酷地无视基本人权。

detailed_translations.english: so determined to get what you want that you do not care if you have to hurt other people in order to do it

name: lure
trans: 诱惑物； 诱饵， 鱼饵

sentences.chinese: 他把她诱骗到家里，然后用父亲的枪把她打死。

name: inquiry
trans: 打听， 询问；调查， 研究

sentences.english: I don’t know who sent the gift, but I’ll make some inquiries.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道礼物是谁送的，但我会打听一下。

detailed_translations.english: a question you ask in order to get information

detailed_translations.english: if a solid dissolves, or if you dissolve it, it mixes with a liquid and becomes part of it

偏见， 成见；损害， 侵害

sentences.chinese: 女性在职场中仍然面临歧视。

sentences.english: It takes a long time to overcome these kinds of prejudices.

sentences.chinese: 在大多数的高校，你能够得到神职人员的劝导。有些学校有很多来自不同宗教的代表。

detailed_translations.english: the official leaders of religious activities in organized religions, such as priests,  rabbi s  , and  mullah s

sentences.chinese: 非法移民

detailed_translations.english: someone who enters another country to live there permanently

sentences.english: the tradition that the eldest son inherits the property

detailed_translations.english: a belief, custom, or way of doing something that has existed for a long time, or these beliefs, customs etc in general

sentences.chinese: 他急需治疗。

sentences.english: an urgent message

detailed_translations.english: very important and needing to be dealt with immediately

sentences.english: a small bundle containing mostly clothing
sentences.chinese: 一个小包袱，里面主要是衣服

sentences.english: He was bundled into a car and driven 50 miles to a police station.
sentences.chinese: 他被塞进一辆小汽车，被带到50英里外的警察局。

detailed_translations.english: a group of things such as papers, clothes, or sticks that are fastened or tied together

detailed_translations.chinese: 收集， 归拢； 把…塞入
detailed_translations.english: If someone is bundled somewhere, someone pushes them there in a rough and hurried way

sentences.english: a long, low hedge of thorns
sentences.chinese: 一长排矮矮的荆棘树篱

detailed_translations.english: a sharp point that grows on the stem of a plant such as a rose

sentences.english: a systematic approach to solving the problem
sentences.chinese: 系统解决问题的办法

detailed_translations.english: done according to a system or plan, in a thorough, efficient or determined way

sentences.english: an atmosphere of hypocrisy and deceit

sentences.english: It’s in the kitchen cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 它在厨房的碗柜里。

sentences.chinese: 柜门开着。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture with doors, and sometimes shelves, used for storing clothes, plates, food etc

name: likewise
trans: 同样地， 照样地；又， 也， 而且

sentences.chinese: 蛤蜊味道鲜美，茄子也同样美味。

detailed_translations.english: in the same way

trans: 已婚的， 夫妇的；与…结婚的； 密切结合在一起的

sentences.chinese: 他们已经结婚八年了。

sentences.chinese: 已婚男子比单身男子多挣70%。

sentences.chinese: 她初到伦敦时刚结婚，而且没有工作。

trans: 持续的， 不断的；永恒的， 不变的；坚定的， 忠实的

sentences.chinese: 他不由自主地抽噎起来。

sentences.chinese: 她的呜咽声变得更大了。

trans: 把…带错路， 使误入歧途

sentences.chinese: 他们的观点很快在欧洲传播开来。

trans: 攀登， 爬；争夺， 抢夺

sentences.chinese: 树枝承受不住他们的重量断裂了。

sentences.chinese: 这本指南正被翻译成好几种语言，准备在圣诞节前后出版。

sentences.chinese: 考试成绩的延期公布

sentences.chinese: 三月底播种。

sentences.chinese: 拉此横杆开启大门。

sentences.chinese: 总统宣布共和国独立。

sentences.chinese: 有什么不对劲吗？你看起来有点紧张。

detailed_translations.english: a tense situation is one in which you feel very anxious and worried because of something bad that might happen
to make your muscles tight and stiff, or to become tight and stiff

any of the forms of a verb that show the time, continuance, or completion of an action or state that is expressed by the verb. ‘I am’ is in the present tense, ‘I was’ is past tense, and ‘I will be’ is future tense.

sentences.english: ...a piece of candy.
sentences.chinese: …一块糖果。

detailed_translations.chinese: 用糖煮；使结晶为砂糖；美化
糖果（等于sweets）；冰糖（等于sugar candy，rock candy）；毒品
detailed_translations.english: Candy is sweet foods such as chocolate or toffees

detailed_translations.chinese: 新潮的（服饰）；甜言蜜语的

trans: 占优势的；主要的， 突出的

sentences.chinese: 社会中的主导群体

sentences.chinese: 这幅画的主色调是黑色。

detailed_translations.english: more powerful, more common, or more easily noticed than others

name: recipe

sentences.chinese: 一本烹饪书

detailed_translations.english: a set of instructions for cooking a particular type of food

name: decent
trans: 体面的， 像样的；正派的， 宽厚的

sentences.chinese: 得体的葬礼

sentences.english: Paul visited the local bars more frequently than was decent for a senior lecturer.
sentences.chinese: 保罗过于频繁地光顾当地酒吧，不太合乎高级讲师的身份。

sentences.chinese: 主席体面地辞去了职务。

sentences.chinese: 她鞠了一躬，离开了舞台。

sentences.chinese: 仆人深深一鞠躬，把那个封好的短笺递给了主人。

sentences.chinese: 与此同时，还要向国王或女王正式鞠躬行礼。

the act of bending the top part of your body forward to show respect for someone when you meet them, or as a way of thanking an audience

sentences.chinese: 种族歧视的受害者

sentences.english: This part of the community needs to be protected from racial prejudice .
sentences.chinese: 需保护社区里的这一部分人，使其免受种族偏见的伤害。

sentences.english: evidence of racial harassment
sentences.chinese: 种族骚扰的证据

sentences.english: the campaign for racial equality
sentences.chinese: 争取种族平等的运动

sentences.english: the need for tolerance and racial harmony
sentences.chinese: 包容与种族融洽的必要性

detailed_translations.english: relating to the relationships between different races of people who now live in the same country or area

name: switch
trans: 转换；打开或关掉…的开关
开关， 电闸；转换；枝条； 鞭子

sentences.english: The terrorists will switch tactics .
sentences.chinese: 恐怖分子会改变战术。

detailed_translations.english: to change from doing or using one thing to doing or using another

sentences.english: his niece, the daughter of his eldest sister
sentences.chinese: 他的外甥女，他大姐的女儿

detailed_translations.english: the daughter of your brother or sister, or the daughter of your wife’s or husband’s brother or sister

sentences.english: They sell drinks to passersby.
sentences.chinese: 他们卖饮料给过路的人。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is walking past a place by chance

sentences.english: a nursing auxiliary
sentences.chinese: 护理辅助人员

detailed_translations.chinese: 助动词；辅助者，辅助物；附属机构
detailed_translations.english: a worker who provides additional help for another group of workers
auxiliary workers provide additional help for another group of workers

name: savage
trans: 野蛮的， 未开化的；凶恶的， 残暴的

sentences.chinese: 一条凶猛的狗

sentences.english: a savage murder
sentences.chinese: 凶残的谋杀

detailed_translations.chinese: 野蛮的；残酷的；狂怒的；荒凉的
detailed_translations.english: very violent or cruel

detailed_translations.chinese: 未开化的人；粗鲁的人；残暴成性的人
detailed_translations.english: a very offensive word for someone who has a simple, traditional way of life
if an animal such as a dog savages someone, it attacks them and injures them badly

sentences.english: She has gone from being a healthy, fit, and sporty young woman to being a cripple.
sentences.chinese: 她从一个健康、强壮、爱好体育运动的年轻姑娘变成了一个残疾人。

to hurt someone badly so that they cannot walk properly

name: highly
trans: 高度地， 很， 非常；赞许地

sentences.english: Tom’s mother was highly critical of the school’s approach.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆的母亲对学校的处理方法持强烈的批评态度。

sentences.english: highly competitive industries
sentences.chinese: 竞争非常激烈的行业

sentences.english: a highly desirable neighborhood
sentences.chinese: 宜居的街区

sentences.english: T.S. Eliot’s highly influential poem, ‘The Waste Land’ T.S.
sentences.chinese: 艾略特极有影响力的诗作《荒原》

sentences.english: a highly developed economy
sentences.chinese: 高度发达的经济

detailed_translations.english: very

sentences.chinese: 狮子咬断了那头斑马的脖子。

sentences.english: But what if your horse suddenly grows zebra stripes?
sentences.chinese: 可是如果那匹马突然长出了斑马的条纹呢？

sentences.english: Sixty acres of woods and ponds are home to camels, zebra, bison, water buffalo, ostrich and antelope.
sentences.chinese: 六十英亩的森林和池塘是骆驼，斑马，野牛，水牛，鸵鸟和羚羊的家园。

sentences.english: No one could console her when Peter died.
sentences.chinese: 彼得去世时没人能够安慰她。

name: initiative
trans: 创始的； 起始的， 初步的
第一步， 创始； 主动精神

sentences.english: I wish my son would show more initiative.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我的儿子能表现得再主动一些。

sentences.english: Don’t keep asking me for advice. Use your initiative.
sentences.chinese: 别老是要我给你出主意，发挥一下你自己的决断能力吧。

sentences.english: Lt. Carlos was not obeying orders. He acted on his own initiative (= he was not told what to do ).
sentences.chinese: 卡洛斯中尉没有服从命令，而是自作主张。

sentences.english: social issues, such as unemployment and education
sentences.chinese: 失业和教育之类的社会问题

sentences.english: the country’s serious social problems
sentences.chinese: 该国严重的社会问题

sentences.english: a challenge to the social order
sentences.chinese: 对社会秩序的一个挑战

detailed_translations.chinese: 社会的； 交际的， 社交的
detailed_translations.english: relating to human society and its organization, or the quality of people’s lives

sentences.english: Screw the lid on clockwise.
sentences.chinese: 按顺时针方向拧紧盖子。

sentences.english: Gently swing your right arm in a clockwise direction.
sentences.chinese: 按顺时针方向轻轻摆动你的右臂。

detailed_translations.english: in the same direction as the  hands  of a clock move
Clockwise is also an adjective

name: lobby
trans: 门廊， 门厅； 休息厅

sentences.english: a hotel lobby
sentences.chinese: 宾馆大堂

sentences.english: I’ll meet you in the entrance lobby.
sentences.chinese: 我们在入口大厅见。

sentences.english: The group is lobbying for a reduction in defence spending.
sentences.chinese: 该团体正在游说政府削减国防开支。

detailed_translations.english: a wide passage or large hall just inside the entrance to a public building
to try to persuade the government or someone with political power that a law or situation should be changed

sentences.english: The family acknowledge the need for change.
sentences.chinese: 全家人都承认需要改变一下。

sentences.english: I would be grateful if you would acknowledge receipt of this letter.
sentences.chinese: 收到此信后请告知，不胜感谢。

detailed_translations.english: to admit or accept that something is true or that a situation exists

name: pulse
trans: 脉搏， 脉冲；意向， 动向； 情绪

sentences.english: His breathing was shallow and his pulse was weak .
sentences.chinese: 他呼吸很浅，脉搏微弱。

sentences.english: She felt his neck. There was no pulse.
sentences.chinese: 她摸了摸他的颈部，没有脉搏。

sentences.english: Her pulse raced (= beat very quickly ) with excitement.
sentences.chinese: 她激动得脉搏急速跳动。

detailed_translations.english: the regular beat that can be felt, for example at your wrist, as your heart pumps blood around your body
to move or flow with a steady quickbeat or sound

sentences.english: Rebels were already making plans to overthrow the government.
sentences.chinese: 反叛者已在密谋颠覆政府。

sentences.english: The organization was dedicated to the overthrow of capitalism.
sentences.chinese: 该组织致力于推翻资本主义。

detailed_translations.english: to remove a leader or government from power, especially by force
the defeat and removal from power of a leader or government, especially by force

sentences.english: a heroine of the French Resistance
sentences.chinese: 法国抵抗运动的一位女英雄

sentences.english: The heroine is a senior TV executive.
sentences.chinese: 女主人公是一位电视台高级主管。

detailed_translations.english: a woman who is admired for doing something extremely brave

name: inland
trans: 在国内； 在内地， 在内陆
国内的； 内地的， 内陆的

sentences.english: The next day, we drove inland.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，我们乘车开往内陆。

sentences.english: We beached the boat and headed inland.
sentences.chinese: 我们想使船靠岸，朝内陆方向驶去。

sentences.english: In 1985 a glacier buried this shore; since then the ice has retreated a half mile inland.
sentences.chinese: 1985年，一座冰川在海滨融化，自那时起冰川已经向内陆退缩了半英里。

detailed_translations.english: an inland area, city etc is not near the coast

detailed_translations.chinese: 在内地；向内地；向内陆；在内陆
detailed_translations.english: in a direction away from the coast and towards the centre of a country

sentences.english: He wanted to do a worthwhile job.
sentences.chinese: 他想做有意义的工作。

sentences.english: We decided to give the money to a worthwhile cause (= one that helps people ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们决定把这笔钱投入到慈善事业中。

detailed_translations.english: if something is worthwhile, it is important or useful, or you gain something from it

name: mould
trans: 浇铸， 造型； 塑造， 形成

sentences.english: Clothes mould in wet weather.
sentences.chinese: 天气潮湿时衣服会发霉。

sentences.english: Such oil can contain carcinogens and toxic mould.
sentences.chinese: 这种油可能包含致癌物和有毒的霉。

detailed_translations.english: to become or cause to become covered with this growth
a hollow container that you pour a liquid or soft substance into, so that when it becomes solid, it takes the shape of the container

name: stumble
trans: 跌， 绊；结结巴巴地说话

sentences.english: In her hurry, she stumbled and spilled the milk all over the floor.
sentences.chinese: 匆忙中她绊了一下，把牛奶洒得满地都是。

sentences.english: I make it into the darkness with only one stumble.
sentences.chinese: 我只踉跄了一下就把它弄进了黑暗中。

detailed_translations.chinese: 跌， 绊；结结巴巴地说话
detailed_translations.english: to hit your foot against something or put your foot down awkwardly while you are walking or running, so that you almost fall
Stumble is also a noun

name: cunning
trans: 狡猾的， 狡诈的；精巧的， 巧妙的

sentences.english: a cunning opponent
sentences.chinese: 狡猾的对手

detailed_translations.english: someone who is cunning is clever and good at deceiving people in order to get what they want
the ability to achieve what you want by deceiving people in a clever way

sentences.english: a bar stool
sentences.chinese: 酒吧高凳

detailed_translations.english: a seat that has three or four legs, but no back or arms

name: specialty
trans: 特产； 特色菜；专业； 专长

sentences.english: Johnson’s specialty is medieval European history.
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊的专业是中世纪欧洲史。

detailed_translations.chinese: 专业，专长；特产；特性；招牌菜
detailed_translations.english: a subject or job that you know a lot about or have a lot of experience of

sentences.english: He slipped and fell, badly bruising an elbow.
sentences.chinese: 他滑倒了，严重挫伤了一只胳膊肘。

detailed_translations.english: the joint where your arm bends
to push someone with your elbows, especially in order to move past them

sentences.english: We had to stoop to pass through the low entrance.
sentences.chinese: 我们得弯腰通过那低矮的入口。

sentences.english: Dave stooped down to tie his shoes.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫俯身系鞋带。

detailed_translations.english: to bend your body forward and down
if sb has a stoop , their shoulders are always bent forward

sentences.english: Test scores vary from school to school.
sentences.chinese: 测验成绩各校不同。

sentences.english: The heights of the plants vary from 8 cm to 20 cm.
sentences.chinese: 这些植物的高度从8厘米到20厘米不等。

sentences.english: Medical treatment varies greatly from state to state.
sentences.chinese: 医疗制度州与州之间差异很大。

sentences.english: Cooking times may vary slightly, depending on your oven.
sentences.chinese: 烹饪时间可能略有不同，因烤炉而异。

sentences.english: Charges vary according to size.
sentences.chinese: 费用因大小而异。

sentences.english: She has tried different diets with varying degrees of success.
sentences.chinese: 她试过各种不同的节食方式，效果各不相同。

sentences.english: tests of varying levels of difficulty
sentences.chinese: 难易程度不一的测验

sentences.english: Quentin’s mood seems to vary according to the weather.
sentences.chinese: 昆廷的情绪似乎随天气而变化。

detailed_translations.english: if several things of the same type vary, they are all different from each other

name: coherent
trans: 黏着的， 黏附的；条理清楚的， 连贯的

sentences.english: The three years of the course are planned as a coherent whole.
sentences.chinese: 这三年的课程是作为连贯的整体来安排的。

sentences.english: a coherent account of the incident
sentences.chinese: 对该事件条理分明的陈述

sentences.english: He's so calm when he answers questions in interviews. I wish I could be that coherent.
sentences.chinese: 他如此镇定地回答了访谈中的问题。我希望我也能那样有条不紊。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一致的，协调的；(话语等)条理清楚的
detailed_translations.english: if a piece of writing, set of ideas etc is coherent, it is easy to understand because it is clear and reasonable

name: upper
trans: 较高的； 上面的；较高的； 上层的

sentences.english: the upper lip
sentences.chinese: 上唇

detailed_translations.english: in a higher position than something else

sentences.english: Fairfax County, Virginia
sentences.chinese: 弗吉尼亚州费尔法克斯县

detailed_translations.english: an area of a state or country that has its own government to deal with local matters

sentences.english: social intercourse
sentences.chinese: 社交

detailed_translations.english: an exchange of ideas, feelings etc which make people or groups understand each other better

sentences.english: Some 3,500 new dwellings are planned for the area.
sentences.chinese: 大约三千五百套新住宅计划在这个地区新建。

detailed_translations.english: a house, apartment etc where people live

sentences.english: Both the model and the satellite sensor use infrared energy to measure clouds.
sentences.chinese: 模型和卫星传感器都使用红外能量来进行云的估算。

sentences.english: "This is an exciting result, " says Tinetti. "This is the first near-infrared spectrum of a planet.
sentences.chinese: 迪奈蒂说：“这是个令人兴奋的结果，这是行星上发现的第一个近红外光谱。

sentences.english: His discovery of the electromagnetic spectrum led to the development of television, radio, microwaves, as well as aiding in the development of radio and infrared telescopes.
sentences.chinese: 他发现的电磁特性最终导致电视、广播、微波炉的发明，并且也对无线电和红外望远镜的发明起到了重要作用。

detailed_translations.english: Infrared radiation is similar to light but has a longer wavelength, so we cannot see it without special equipment

sentences.english: I'd like to try and forget the whole episode.
sentences.chinese: 我倒想尽量把那段经历全部忘掉。

sentences.english: One of the funniest episodes in the book occurs in Chapter 6.
sentences.chinese: 书中最有趣的片段之一在第6章。

detailed_translations.chinese: （人生的）一段经历；（小说的）片段，插曲
detailed_translations.english: an event, a situation, or a period of time in sb's life, a novel, etc. that is important or interesting in some way

sentences.english: She asked the doctor to speak to her parents on her behalf.
sentences.chinese: 她请医生代她同她父母谈谈。

sentences.english: On behalf of everyone here, may I wish you a very happy retirement.
sentences.chinese: 请允许我代表在座的各位祝你退休后生活愉快。

detailed_translations.english: instead of someone, or as their representative

name: ponder
trans: 思索， 考虑， 沉思

sentences.english: He continued to ponder the problem as he walked home.
sentences.chinese: 他一边往家走一边继续思考那个问题。

detailed_translations.english: to spend time thinking carefully and seriously about a problem, a difficult question, or something that has happened

sentences.english: He vowed to achieve certain objectives before the end of his presidency.
sentences.chinese: 他立誓要在他的总统任期结束之前实现某些目标。

sentences.english: the best way to accomplish your objectives
sentences.chinese: 完成目标的最佳方法

sentences.english: The degree program has two main objectives.
sentences.chinese: 该学位课程有两个主要目标。

sentences.english: Managers should set specific performance objectives for their teams.
sentences.chinese: 经理应该为自己的团队制定明确的绩效目标。

sentences.english: The main objective was to improve children’s knowledge of geography.
sentences.chinese: 主要目的是要增长儿童的地理知识。

sentences.english: A clear objective was set and adhered to.
sentences.chinese: 定下了明确的目标并坚持到底。

sentences.english: One of your first business objectives should be to get your own office.
sentences.chinese: 你的首要工作目标之一应该是拥有自己的办公室。

detailed_translations.english: something that you are trying hard to achieve, especially in business or politics

name: injure
trans: 损害， 损伤， 伤害 A

sentences.english: Angus injured his leg playing rugby.
sentences.chinese: 安格斯在打橄榄球时弄伤了腿。

detailed_translations.english: to hurt yourself or someone else, for example in an accident or an attack

sentences.english: the Women’s Guild
sentences.chinese: 妇女协会

detailed_translations.english: an organization of people who do the same job or have the same interests

sentences.english: They exerted considerable influence within the school.
sentences.chinese: 他们在校内施加了很大的影响力。

sentences.english: Environmental groups are exerting pressure on the government to tighten pollution laws.
sentences.chinese: 环境保护组织在向政府施加压力，要求从严执行环保法律法规。

detailed_translations.english: to use your power, influence etc in order to make something happen

name: scandal
trans: 丑闻；恶意诽谤； 流言蜚语；反感， 愤慨

sentences.english: It caused quite a scandal when he left his wife.
sentences.chinese: 他离开妻子成了一大丑闻。

sentences.english: The college has recently been involved in a drugs scandal .
sentences.chinese: 这所大学最近卷入了毒品丑闻。

sentences.english: He has been at the centre of a political scandal .
sentences.chinese: 他成了一桩政治丑闻的焦点。

sentences.english: a major scandal involving the government
sentences.chinese: 涉及政府的一桩重大丑闻

sentences.english: a series of financial scandals
sentences.chinese: 一连串金融丑闻

sentences.english: a sex scandal that ruined his reputation
sentences.chinese: 让他名誉扫地的性丑闻

sentences.english: They had already left the country when the scandal broke .
sentences.chinese: 丑闻爆出时他们已经离开了这个国家。

detailed_translations.chinese: 丑事， 丑闻； 流言蜚语； 反感， 愤慨
detailed_translations.english: an event in which someone, especially someone important, behaves in a bad way that shocks people

sentences.english: Cuba is a composite of diverse traditions and people.
sentences.chinese: 古巴是一个不同传统和民族的融合体。

detailed_translations.english: something made up of different parts or materials
made up of different parts or materials

sentences.english: His career has been hindered by injury.
sentences.chinese: 由于受伤，他的事业受到了阻碍。

sentences.english: policies that will hinder rather than help families
sentences.chinese: 对家庭有害无益的政策

detailed_translations.english: to make it difficult for something to develop or succeed

name: horrible
trans: 令人恐怖的， 可怕的；极讨厌的， 使人不愉快的

sentences.english: The weather has been really horrible all week.
sentences.chinese: 整个星期天气都很糟。

sentences.english: a horrible smell
sentences.chinese: 极难闻的气味

sentences.english: The food looked horrible, but it tasted OK.
sentences.chinese: 那食物看上去很糟，可吃起来还不错。

detailed_translations.chinese: 令人恐惧的， 可怕的； 骇人听闻的； 极讨厌的， 使人不愉快的； 糟透的
detailed_translations.english: very bad - used, for example, about things you see, taste, or smell, or about the weather

sentences.english: Because the reason you freelance is for the freedom, right?
sentences.chinese: 你选择做自由职业者的原因就是自由，是吧？

sentences.english: Every once in a while I have an open hour for my freelance clients - they can give me a call about anything they like.
sentences.chinese: 作为自由职业者，每隔一段时间，我会拿出一个小时给我的客户 - 他们可以打电话给我，聊他们愿意聊的事。

sentences.english: Read up on business: The fact that you’re reading this blog is a good sign — you can get a ton of information about running your freelance business online.
sentences.chinese: 研习商务：事实上，你阅读这篇博客是一个好的现象，因为从中你可以知道许多关于自由职业者如何经营自己事业的信息。

detailed_translations.english: working independently for different companies rather than being employed by one particular company

sentences.english: Our friendship has steadily strengthened over the years.
sentences.chinese: 我们的友谊逐年加深。

sentences.english: Steve’s opposition only strengthened her resolve to go ahead.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫的反对反而坚定了她继续下去的决心。

sentences.english: The company plans to strengthen its hand (= make itself more powerful ) in Europe by opening an office in Spain.
sentences.chinese: 该公司计划在西班牙设立办事处，以此增强在欧洲的实力。

detailed_translations.english: to become stronger or make something stronger

sentences.english: a yellow rose with a lovely scent
sentences.chinese: 香气怡人的黄玫瑰

detailed_translations.english: a pleasant smell that something has

name: injury
trans: 损伤， 损害， 毁坏

sentences.english: She was taken to hospital with serious head injuries.
sentences.chinese: 她头部受重伤被送到医院。

sentences.english: Beckham has missed several games through injury
sentences.chinese: 贝克汉姆因伤错过了几场比赛。

sentences.english: He’s a lawyer who specializes in personal injury claims.
sentences.chinese: 他是个专门从事人身伤害索赔的律师。

detailed_translations.english: a wound or damage to part of your body caused by an accident or attack

sentences.english: Her paintings have been exhibited all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 她的绘画作品在世界各地展出。

detailed_translations.english: to show something in a public place so that people can go to see it
something, for example a painting, that is put in a public place so that people can go to see it

sentences.english: mushroom soup
sentences.chinese: 蘑菇汤

detailed_translations.chinese: 蘑菇，伞菌；蘑菇形物体；暴发户
detailed_translations.english: one of several kinds of  fungus  with stems and round tops, some of which can be eaten

detailed_translations.chinese: 蘑菇的；蘑菇形的；迅速生长的
迅速增加；采蘑菇；迅速生长
detailed_translations.english: to grow and develop very quickly

sentences.english: I don’t drink alcohol anymore.
sentences.chinese: 我不再喝酒了。

sentences.english: alcohol abuse
sentences.chinese: 酗酒

sentences.english: people with alcohol problems
sentences.chinese: 有酗酒问题的人

detailed_translations.english: drinks such as beer or wine that contain a substance which can make you drunk

sentences.english: The government denied the existence of poverty among 16- and 17-year-olds.
sentences.chinese: 政府否认十六七岁的青少年当中存在贫困问题。

detailed_translations.english: to say that something is not true, or that you do not believe something

sentences.english: Orders came that we should spade the trench in an hour.
sentences.chinese: 有命令要我们必须在一小时内挖好战壕。

sentences.english: From nine to eleven he planned to dig a hole, or trench, and possibly find something good to eat buried in the dirt.
sentences.chinese: 九点到十一点，他打算挖一个洞，或者一条小沟也行，没准儿还能从脏土里翻出什么好吃的呢。

sentences.english: The bridge lies like a trench in the fortress of the moat, which is shaped to blend in with the outlines of the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 这座桥就像是坐落在护城河中的一条沟渠，这种造型是为了使它与周围的风景融合在一起。

detailed_translations.english: a long narrow hole dug into the surface of the ground

sentences.english: I’ve been so miserable since Pat left me.
sentences.chinese: 自从帕特离我而去后，我十分痛苦。

sentences.english: I spent the weekend feeling miserable .
sentences.chinese: 我那个周末心情很糟糕。

sentences.english: Jan looks really miserable .
sentences.chinese: 简看上去很痛苦。

sentences.english: Why do you make yourself miserable by taking on too much work?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么揽这么多活儿，把自己弄得很辛苦呢？

detailed_translations.english: extremely unhappy, for example because you feel lonely, cold, or badly treated

sentences.english: Then the deal is that when you sell the house they subtract -you've got to pay this.
sentences.chinese: 那么当你售出房子后，他们会从中减去，这个余额，这就是你要付给他们的。

sentences.english: That is, if you find that a sensor consistently overestimates by a certain value, you can subtract that value before the final value is reported.
sentences.chinese: 也就是说，如果您发现某个传感器总是偏高于某个特定数值，那么就可以减去该数值后再报告最终的数值。

sentences.english: Thus, if you have staff activities in loops and want to run the above request, you need to ensure that you subtract only events which belong together.
sentences.chinese: 因此，如果您在循环中具有人员活动，并且想要运行以上的请求，那么您必须确保您只减去了属于一起的事件。

detailed_translations.english: to take a number or an amount from a larger number or amount

sentences.english: I still remember a hurricane that hit us thirty years ago.
sentences.chinese: 我还记得三十年前袭击我们的一次飓风。

sentences.english: Our love is not fierce, not hot, but despite the tsunami hurricane, also vowed.
sentences.chinese: 我们的爱，不剧烈，不炙热，可是任凭海啸飓风，也矢志不渝。

sentences.english: If an earthquake, hurricane, winter storm, or other disaster strikes your community, you might not have access to food , water, and electricity for days or even weeks.
sentences.chinese: 如果有地震、飓风、暴风雪或其他的灾害突袭你的家园，你可能会好几天甚至好几个星期都得不到食物、水和电。

detailed_translations.english: a storm that has very strong fast winds and that moves over water

name: hike
trans: 徒步旅行；增加， 上升

sentences.english: He wants to hike round the world.
sentences.chinese: 他打算徒步旅行环游世界一周。

sentences.english: You can organize a picnic in the park, a group hike or bike ride, or meet up with friends for one of those free local events.
sentences.chinese: 你可以组织在公园野餐一群徒步旅行或者骑自行车或者和朋友会面为其中的一个免费本地事件。

detailed_translations.english: to take a long walk in the mountains or countryside
a long walk in the mountains or countryside
to increase a price, tax etc by a large amount

name: glory
trans: 光荣， 荣誉； 荣耀的事

sentences.english: She dreamt of future glory as an Olympic champion.
sentences.chinese: 她梦想着将来能得到奥运冠军的荣誉。

sentences.english: Goran’s moment of glory came when he defeated Rafter.
sentences.chinese: 戈兰击败拉夫特，迎来了荣耀的一刻。

sentences.english: He began the season in a blaze of glory , scoring seven goals in as many games.
sentences.chinese: 这个赛季一开始他便光芒四射，七场比赛进了七个球。

detailed_translations.english: the importance, honour, and praise that people give someone they admire a lot

name: zigzag
trans: 成之字形， 曲折盘旋 A

sentences.english: Some species weave designs into their webs, creating zigzag patterns that can either attract prey, like bees, in bright sunlight, or camouflage the net in the shade.
sentences.chinese: 一些种类的蜘蛛能设计织网，设计出可以在明媚的阳光下吸引猎物，如蜜蜂，或在阴暗处能掩饰蜘蛛网的之字形图案。

sentences.english: Located at 4210 Silver Hill Road just outside of Washington, D.C., the museum is a massive zigzag-shaped edifice constructed of five interconnected pods—each pod larger than a football field.
sentences.chinese: 这座博物馆位于华盛顿特区郊外的银山路4210号，建得宏伟壮观，五个相互连通的分区组成之字形，每个分区的面积比足球场还大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 曲折的；锯齿形的；之字形的
使成之字形；使曲折行进
detailed_translations.english: to move forward in sharp angles, first to the left and then to the right etc
a pattern that looks like a line of z’s joined together

detailed_translations.chinese: 曲折地；之字形地；Z字形地
detailed_translations.english: to move forward in sharp angles, first to the left and then to the right etc

name: secondary
trans: 次要的， 二级的；中级的； 第二的 A

sentences.english: the novel’s secondary characters
sentences.chinese: 这本小说中的次要人物

detailed_translations.chinese: 第二的；中等的；次要的；中级的
detailed_translations.english: not as important as something else

sentences.english: We were each handed a badge with our name on it.
sentences.chinese: 我们每个人都拿到一个徽章，上面有我们的名字。

sentences.english: He now sees his wartime injuries as a badge of honor.
sentences.chinese: 现在，他把自己在战争中受的伤看成是一种光荣标记。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of metal or plastic, with a design or words on it, that a person wears to show that they belong to an organization, support sth, have achieved sth, have a particular rank, etc.

name: mission
trans: 使命， 任务；使团， 代表团

sentences.english: He was sent on over 200 missions before being killed in action.
sentences.chinese: 在阵亡之前他奉命执行过200多次军事任务。

sentences.english: US troops taking part in the peacekeeping mission
sentences.chinese: 参与维和任务的美军

sentences.english: a British trade mission to Moscow
sentences.chinese: 派往莫斯科的英国贸易代表团

detailed_translations.english: an important job that involves travelling somewhere, done by a member of the air force, army etc, or by a spacecraft

sentences.english: My message is "If you try to smuggle drugs you are stupid."
sentences.chinese: 我的讯息是，“你若企图走私毒品，那是犯傻。”

detailed_translations.chinese: 走私， 偷带， 偷运
detailed_translations.english: to take something or someone illegally from one country to another

detailed_translations.chinese: 走私，非法私运；偷运，偷带
detailed_translations.english: to take something or someone illegally from one country to another

name: sue
trans: 控告， 对…提出诉讼， 起诉

sentences.english: If the builders don’t fulfil their side of the contract, we’ll sue.
sentences.chinese: 如果建筑商不履行合同，我们就要提出起诉。

sentences.english: The company is suing a former employee.
sentences.chinese: 该公司正在起诉一名前雇员。

sentences.english: The railway may sue for damages (= in order to get money ) because of loss of revenue.
sentences.chinese: 铁道部门可能会因收入损失而提出起诉，要求赔偿。

sentences.english: He is being sued for divorce (= in order to end a marriage ) by his wife.
sentences.chinese: 他的妻子对他提出起诉，要求离婚。

detailed_translations.english: to make a legal claim against someone, especially for money, because they have harmed you in some way

detailed_translations.chinese: (Sue)人名；(日)末(名)；(法)休；(英)休(女子教名Susan、Susanna的昵称)

name: access
trans: 接近， 进入； 接近的方法 A；入口； 通道

sentences.english: Access is by means of a small door on the right.
sentences.chinese: 入口是右边的一扇小门。

detailed_translations.chinese: 接近；通道，入口；接近的机会
detailed_translations.english: the way you use to enter a building or reach a place
to find information, especially on a computer

name: primitive
trans: 原始的， 远古的， 早期的 <；粗糙的； 简单的

sentences.english: a primitive society
sentences.chinese: 原始社会

sentences.english: a primitive nomadic tribe
sentences.chinese: 原始的游牧部落

sentences.english: the tools used by primitive man
sentences.chinese: 原始人所用的工具

sentences.english: primitive art
sentences.chinese: 原始艺术

sentences.english: The first station buildings were quite primitive.
sentences.chinese: 最初的车站建筑很简陋。

detailed_translations.chinese: 原始的；简单的；简单的，简陋的
detailed_translations.english: belonging to a simple way of life that existed in the past and does not have modern industries and machines

sentences.english: I deem it advisable to buy property now.
sentences.chinese: 我认为现在购置房地产是明智的。

sentences.english: It would't be advisable for us to kiss off their objections.
sentences.chinese: 对人家的意见不予理睬是不明智的。

sentences.english: She lived in a college dormitory.
sentences.chinese: 她住在一幢大学宿舍楼里。

detailed_translations.english: a large building at a college or university where students live

name: cooperate
trans: 合作， 协作， 相配合

sentences.english: They agreed to co-operate with Brazil on a programme to protect the rain forests.
sentences.chinese: 他们同意和巴西合作进行一个保护热带雨林的项目。

sentences.english: I advised my client to cooperate fully with the police.
sentences.chinese: 我建议我的当事人要全力与警方配合。

detailed_translations.english: to work with someone else to achieve something that you both want

sentences.english: He struggled to overcome his shyness.
sentences.chinese: 他努力克服自己的羞怯。

sentences.english: Her financial problems could no longer be overcome.
sentences.chinese: 她的经济困难再也无法解决。

sentences.english: Australia overcame the Netherlands 2-1.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚队2比1战胜了荷兰队。

detailed_translations.english: to successfully control a feeling or problem that prevents you from achieving something

name: sum
trans: 总数， 和；金额；算术题

sentences.english: He owes me a large sum of money .
sentences.chinese: 他欠我一大笔钱。

sentences.english: You will have to pay the sum of the two sets of costs.
sentences.chinese: 你得支付那两笔费用的总和。

sentences.english: I was good at sums at school.
sentences.chinese: 我上学时擅长算术。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money

sentences.english: She recited a poem that she had learnt at school.
sentences.chinese: 她背诵了一首学校里学的诗。

detailed_translations.english: to say a poem, piece of literature etc that you have learned, for people to listen to

name: current
trans: 当前的， 现在的 <；通用的， 流行的
电流； 水流； 气流；潮流， 趋势

sentences.english: the current President
sentences.chinese: 现任总统

sentences.english: In its current state, the car is worth £1,000.
sentences.chinese: 这辆车按现在的车况来看值1,000英镑。

detailed_translations.english: happening or existing now

sentences.english: Each year they audit our accounts and certify them as being true and fair.
sentences.chinese: 每年他们都会审核我们的账目，以证明其准确合理。

detailed_translations.english: to officially examine a company’s financial records in order to check that they are correct
an official examination of a company’s financial records in order to check that they are correct

sentences.english: He offered to do the job for a few coppers.
sentences.chinese: 他说他来做这份工作，给他几个铜板就行。

sentences.english: His hair has reverted back to its original copper hue.
sentences.chinese: 他的头发恢复到了原来的铜色。

detailed_translations.english: a soft reddish-brown metal that allows electricity and heat to pass through it easily, and is used to make electrical wires, water pipes etc. It is a chemical element: symbol Cu
Copper is sometimes used to describe things that are reddish-brown in colour

sentences.english: Many innocent civilians were killed during the war.
sentences.chinese: 许多无辜的平民在战争中丧生。

sentences.english: It was difficult to return to civilian life after ten years in the military.
sentences.chinese: 从军十年后重新过平民生活不容易。

detailed_translations.english: anyone who is not a member of the military forces or the police
used to describe people or things that are not military

sentences.english: audio and video equipment
sentences.chinese: 音频视频设备

detailed_translations.chinese: 声音的；[声] 音频的，[声] 声频的
detailed_translations.english: relating to sound that is recorded or broadcast

name: offensive
trans: 冒犯的， 攻击的； 讨厌的 <

sentences.english: I found her remarks deeply offensive.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得她的话令人非常恼火。

sentences.english: offensive behaviour
sentences.chinese: 无礼的行为

detailed_translations.chinese: 冒犯的，无礼的；进攻的，攻击性的
detailed_translations.english: very rude or insulting and likely to upset people
a planned military attack involving large forces over a long period

name: texture
trans: 质地， 纹理， 结构

sentences.english: This cloth has a silky texture.
sentences.chinese: 这种布具有丝的质地。

sentences.english: What is the texture of your experience?
sentences.chinese: 这次经历的实质是什么？

sentences.english: No slipper is allowed in the laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 不应在实验室穿著拖鞋。

sentences.english: The boy ran away with the big slipper though she was begging.
sentences.chinese: 那个男孩不管她怎么哀求，还是拿着那只大拖鞋跑开了。

sentences.english: My foot was rather sore, but I managed to ease it into a large slipper.
sentences.chinese: 我的脚很疼，不过我很小心地把它伸进一只大拖鞋里。

detailed_translations.english: a light soft shoe that you wear at home

name: launch
trans: 发射；使下水， 发动； 开展
发射； 下水；新产品的投产或投放

sentences.english: A test satellite was launched from Cape Canaveral.
sentences.chinese: 一颗实验人造卫星从卡纳维拉尔角发射升空。

sentences.english: The organization has launched a campaign to raise $150,000.
sentences.chinese: 为了筹集15万美元，该组织发起了一场募捐活动。

sentences.english: The Canadian police plan to launch an investigation into the deal.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大警方计划对这宗交易进行调查。

sentences.english: The book launched his career as a novelist.
sentences.chinese: 这本书开启了他的小说创作生涯。

detailed_translations.english: to send a weapon or spacecraft into the sky or into space

sentences.english: The dollar has fallen in value amid rumors of weakness in the US economy.
sentences.chinese: 在一片美国经济疲软的传言中，美元贬值了。

sentences.english: Demonstrators ripped up the national flag amid shouts of ‘Death to the tyrants!’
sentences.chinese: 示威者在“处死暴君！”的叫喊声中将国旗撕得粉碎。

detailed_translations.english: while noisy, busy, or confused events are happening – used in writing or news reports

sentences.english: He never recovered from the death of his beloved daughter.
sentences.chinese: 他一直没有走出失去爱女的阴影。

sentences.english: He’s always talking about his beloved computer!
sentences.chinese: 他老是在谈论他的宝贝电脑！

sentences.english: It was a gift from her beloved.
sentences.chinese: 那是她心爱的人送的礼物。

detailed_translations.english: loved very much by someone
someone who is loved very much

name: confirm
trans: 证实； 确认 <；批准； 确认； 巩固， 加强

sentences.english: New evidence has confirmed the first witness’s story.
sentences.chinese: 新的证据证实了第一个证人的说法。

sentences.english: To confirm my diagnosis I need to do some tests.
sentences.chinese: 为了证实我的诊断，我要做一些化验。

sentences.english: Could you confirm the dates we discussed?
sentences.chinese: 你能确认我们商讨过的日期吗？

sentences.english: After a six-month probationary period, her position was confirmed.
sentences.chinese: 经过六个月的试用期后，她获准正式担任该职。

detailed_translations.english: to state or show that sth is definitely true or correct, especially by providing evidence

sentences.english: rose buds
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰花苞

detailed_translations.english: a young tightly rolled-up flower or leaf before it opens
to produce buds

sentences.english: She threw off her cloak with an abandoned gesture.
sentences.chinese: 她以一种放纵的姿势脱掉了斗篷。

detailed_translations.english: a warm piece of clothing like a coat without sleeves that hangs loosely from your shoulders
to deliberately hide facts, feelings etc so that people do not see or understand them – used especially in news reports

sentences.english: a 20 gallon fish tank
sentences.chinese: 一个20加仑的鱼缸

sentences.english: The car does about 50 miles per gallon.
sentences.chinese: 这辆车每加仑油能开50英里左右。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring liquids, equal to eight pints. In Britain this is 4.55 litres, and in the US it is 3.79 litres.

name: bug
trans: 臭虫 A；小毛病 A；窃听器

sentences.english: There’s a nasty bug going round (=  that a lot of people have caught  ) .
sentences.chinese: 现在流行着一种很烦人的传染病。

sentences.english: a 24-hour flu bug
sentences.chinese: 一天即愈的流感

detailed_translations.chinese: 虫子；小病；故障，缺陷；窃听器
detailed_translations.english: an illness that people catch very easily from each other but is not very serious

detailed_translations.chinese: 烦扰， 纠缠； 在…装窃听器
detailed_translations.english: to put a  bug (=  small piece of electronic equipment  )  somewhere secretly in order to listen to conversations

sentences.english: The boy traded his knife for a cricket bat.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩用他的刀子换了一个板球棒。

sentences.english: He angrily stomped his cricket after failing the fight.
sentences.chinese: 比赛失败后，他生气地踏死了他的蟋蟀。

sentences.english: He was pressganged into playing in the charity cricket match.
sentences.chinese: 他是被强拉去参加这场板球义赛的。

detailed_translations.english: a game between two teams of 11 players in which players try to get points by hitting a ball and running between two sets of three sticks

sentences.english: I was forced to attempt a gallop.
sentences.chinese: 我被迫尝试一次骑马疾驰。
